Summary: Was very clean and staff was friendly and kind!  Was only two blocks from Disney and for the price we paid, it was worth it! Our room wasn‚Äôt ready when we arrived, but we got in at about 8:30 AM. So the front desk held our bags no problem for us until we came back! Definitely would stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice place, near to Disney parks.    Easy to check in, nice people and comfortable rooms.     Best option to stay if you dont want to drive back home in the Night.   Big rooms .  also they have a big beds.   For 3/4/5 all your member of your party ..

Summary: The rooms were clean and updated. The staff was friendly and helpful. It is a double strip style and there‚Äôs only one set of steps far from the room. I noticed other reviews complaint about pillows I feel the same they are a little conservative on them and the AC/Heat isn‚Äôt really that great. But I have no complaints that would deter me from staying here at the Expedia prices  and it is a smooth walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Christianryann, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the staff was friendly and helpful.  Your feedback  is important to us.   On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.   We will see you soon.

Summary: Excellent very close walk to downtown Disney and the rooms are large and spacious. Front desk very nice Leticia. We did this for a family birthday trip for my daughter and I highly recommend staying at this hotel

Summary: This was my second time staying at Eden Roc for my anniversary vacation and it most definitely won't be my last! The room was super cozy and comfortable. Summary: On Nov 2 2022 I was with some family driving to Anaheim and we needed to stay somewhere for our week long trip. We found Eden Rock Inn & suites online and booked a room and when we got there it was nice, the person at the front desk was nice, The room was clean and it was a nice space. We had my grandmother with us and she is handicapped so when we asked for a handicap room they were more than willing to make a transition from our room to the other room. The beds were comfortable, The desk was nice especially for my online work. The tv worked nice and we were able to find some of our favorite movies on there. When we asked for toilet paper the employees were polite and brought us some and it was the same thing when we needed some towels. This motel also provided a great place
Manager Response: Dear Kittyarmyleader, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with. Room you stayed with was spacious and clean.  And the beds were comfortable . In addition, the front desk team was helpful  and nice. I will pass on these comments to my team. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: When you‚Äôre rolling 6 deep, the ability of everyone to share a suite and have a bed is something that is amazing. Bathrooms big enough for all, rooms big enough to not feel cramped, etc. fridge & microwave for leftovers and snacks. Space for 2 scooters in the room that we could charge overnight.   Pool is warm I like some other places we have stayed, staff all extremely accommodating, friendly, and helpful.   Asked the 10YO any pros and cons and she reiterated pros above and changes could be: More hangers and another suit case caddy.   If those are the cons, you‚Äôre gonna have a great trip!
Manager Response: Dear Pattapit, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the room was spacious and clean. I will surely pass on your good comments to my team-- extremely accommodating and friendly. Thank you for your good suggestions as well. Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Staff was rude when we arrived,  it was a late check in at nearly 10pm. We got our room,  in a corner of the hotel,  which is strip style, 2 stories outside entrances.  The headboard was the first thing my husband noticed,  nasty sex encounter smears. We had already unpacked enough that we decided to just sleep in the other bed and deal with it the next day.  When I told the manner in duty with photos about it,  he acted annoyed.  Wrote a note for housekeeping and said they would clean our room the next day.  So we continued to stay in our room,  and found that everytime we did anything we'd find long dark hair everywhere, particularly gross in the shower and bathroom floor.  Overall,  We found the property to be fairly run down,  motel 6 style,  no vending machines or other
Manager Response: Dear 143friggi, We are sorry to hear about your stay. We take your review seriously and we will do our best to  improve, so next time you stay with us , it will be a nice stay. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary Heading: Our hotel of choice when we visit Disneyland!
Summary: My family and I have been staying at Eden Roc for many years now and we won't stay anywhere else. It is a close walk to the park and the staff is always so friendly. Oscar has always treated us like family and because of this we continue to refer all of my family, friends, co-workers, and even my patients to this location. In fact, they have stayed here and had nothing but good things to say. The rooms are clean and tidy and the restrooms are large. Our stays are comfortable and I know we will be charged a fair price here every time.  ---Dr. Claudia Avilez, PharmD
Manager Response: Dear Q8890UBclaudia, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I  know that there are so many hotels for you  to choose from but you have continuously stayed with us. Thank you for  your loyalty and referring Eden Roc Inn and Suites to your family, friends, co-workers and patients. I will pass on your good comments to Oscar. You and  your family are part of the Eden Roc Inn and Suites family . My team and I will be waiting for your next visit.

Summary: First let me say I have used trip advisor for travel all over the US and parts of Europe and while I did not always agree 100% I have always had a good experience, until now. This trip included my wife and 3 grown kids. We arrived late in the evening. Our room was huge and upon entering looked and smelled clean but VERY sparsely furnished. There were 2 queen beds, a sofa bed in the back corner, 1 tiny night stand between the two beds, and a desk with a small TV that was very hard to see from the bed which was the only place to sit. That's it! There were ZERO lamps, only the extremely bright overhead lighting and no switches near the beds. The furniture was from, I'm guessing, the 70's. We thought maybe it was retro with the orange sofa bed but when we opened the sofa and saw the
Manager Response: Dear B8375YWmikeb, We are very sorry to hear about your stay with us. We take your review very seriously and we will do our best to make sure this will not happen again.  We appreciate your business and would like to see you and your family in the near future.   Respectfully Yours,

Summary Heading: You don‚Äôt get what you pay for
Summary: Trip Advisor reviews have never steered me wrong ‚Äî until now.  This place is close to Disneyland and the room is clean ‚Äî but, you certainly do NOT get what you pay for.  The beds are awful.  I thought - cool retro sofa bed; nope, it must actually be from the 70s, horribly sunk in the middle.  The one blanket on the bed is thread bare - we can actually see through it.  There are  tiny tiny pillows on the bed, one for each sleeper.  There is NO elevator and one of us cannot do stairs.  There are no lamps in the room - it‚Äôs all overhead lighting or nothing.  And the final straw - we got ‚Äòhousekeeping‚Äô which means we had to gather our dirty towels and give give them to a man who knocked on our door.  If I wanted a very low budget MOTEL (don‚Äôt know how you call this a inn and suites)
Manager Response: Dear MJB651, We are sorry to hear your unpleasant stay with us. We have brought  your concerns to all our team members so we can prevent this from happening again. Thank you for your feedback . We hope you can stay with us in the near future.

Summary Heading: Perfectly nice little place near Disneyland
Summary: This is wonderful place for families on a budget. It's about a block from the Paradise Pier Hotel, so it is a healthy walk to Disneyland Resort. It's clean, well maintained and staff were pleasant and helpful. I stayed there for D23 and rooms were 1/2 the price of any other hotels in the area. Nothing fancy, just a nice, solid, inexpensive place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear CCearthly,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the hotel is well maintained and staff were pleasant and helpful. On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: My family and I wanted a hotel close to Disneyland that was clean and a great price. The hotel was even more accommodating than I expected. I told Anthony at the front desk and online that we were there to celebrate my daughters birthday at Disneyland. When we came back to our room that night, there were balloons all over the room. My daughter loved it and  Eden Roc made her birthday very special! Thank you and I am sure we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Monicab5777DQ, Thank you  for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that your daughter enjoyed her birthday.    Anthony will be happy to hear that he made your daughters birthday special. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  The family at Eden Roc Inn and Suites will be waiting for you.

Summary: Had a lovely stay at Edenrock! Agnes and Anthony were fantastic. They were understanding and more than accommodating of our needs with two little ones and a  scatterbrained Mini! Thank you so much. We‚Äôll be back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear CaseygP88000Q, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you had a lovely stay with us here at Eden Roc. On your next visit here at Anaheim, CA , please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Due to a flight change, needed to book a single night in the area. Immediately after checking in and getting into our room, we found bugs all over the place! Transferred to a different room and it was evident that maintenance is a huge issue. Mold/mildew in the bathroom area and fixtures were falling apart. I won‚Äôt be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony, WE are sorry to read about your recent stay with us. We understand that the last thing you want during your stay is unwanted stress. We thank you for bringing these up to your attention. I will pass on your concerns to our pest control guy as well as to our maintenance man to prevent these from happening. Again, we appreciate your business and would like to see you sometime in the near future.

Summary Heading: Under rated for what this place has to offer.
Summary: Location to Anaheim Convention centre and Disneyland couldn‚Äôt be better. Driving from John Wayne airport is 20 minutes and easy to find. There is onsite parking for $15 a night unless you book directly with Eden Roc for which it is then included. Rooms are large and come with coffee maker, microwave and fridge as well as air conditioning. They have handicapped rooms which are very large. Bathroom has toilet and shower separate from sink and dispensers with shampoo, conditioner and body wash.  Pool is nice and doesn‚Äôt seem to be used much. Staff are accommodating, friendly and hard workers.
Manager Response: Dear Ljd4, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the rooms are large and has needed amenities. I will pass on your good comments to my front desk team. On your next visit ,please call us direct at 714-663-8700

Summary Heading: Affordable. Walking Distance to Theme Parks
Summary: This hotel is in a great location. Right across from Disney California Adventure and right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. About a 12 min walk from the property to Downtown Disney and the parks. We checked in around 4pm and were greeted by the kind staff. The room we stayed in was very nice and clean.  A comfortable king size bed.  No weird or musty smells.  Microwave and refrigerator included. The bathroom was clean. The grounds of this property are also clean and well maintained. Didn't have time to use the pool. But it did look rather inviting.  If you're like us, when you visit Disneyland, no need to spend a lot of money on a hotel since you're at the park all day. The Eden Roc Inn is the perfect place.  Reasonably priced for the area in which it is located.  We will
Manager Response: Dear Davyboy75, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I will pass on your good comments to my team members.  That Eden Roc is the perfect place to stay. That the room is clean, no musty smell and the bathroom is clean. The grounds of the property is well maintained. And the kind staff . On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Do not let the motel-look confuse you, this is a very nice, kept up hotel with spacious rooms, friendly management, and comfortable amenities. It is a very short walk from the Disneyland resort! Our first day we had no hot water in the shower but it was fixed afterward. Overall a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear KellysQ3489VU, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Yes we are very near Disneyland. Summary: Location to Disneyland was such a close walk.  They welcomed my husband and I on our honeymoon with a flower arrangement and bottle of wine. The room was clean, spacious and updated!  We would definitely stay here again due to it having everything we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Sunbun007, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I know that there are many hotels in Anaheim that you can choose from. Summary: Great room for the price.  Less than a mile walk from hotel room to Disneyland front gate.  Rooms clean and updated.  Only negative is noise when street is busy and loud families getting ready for Disneyland in the morning.

Summary: We had an amazing stay at Eden Roc. The Manager was very nice and accommodating to our needs! Comfortable , clean rooms and nice pool area!  Parking was convenient. They even made a big deal about my daughters birthday, so sweet! Will def stay here again!

Manager Response: Dear lisaI9264YQ,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found Eden Roc Inn and Suites. And now your new favorite place to stay. Summary: I saw enjoyed my stay and Eden Roc it was close to Disneyland the rooms were immaculately clean the service was phenomenal the manager as well was a blast to do service with the pool was clean and warm and the amenities were great and the grounds were clean Pleasant and quiet I will stay here again and refer friends and family to this wonderful establishment
Manager Response: Dear R4302XEmoniqueb,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you like the cleanliness of the room and the phenomenal service at the desk. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed two nights. The room was clean, the location was excellent, and the staff was friendly. It was a great choice. I had rented a scooter for the park and the front desk facilitated delivery to the hotel, overnight parking and charging for the scooter.
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline K., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We had a great stay. This is a fantastic hotel for anyone looking for a base close to the Disney parks and local restaurants. The staff were all very friendly and I'd recommend to anyone visiting the area.
Manager Response: Dear KilmarnockScotty, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: The room was clean and the space is great for families. I like how they provide shower gel, shampoo and conditioner in a dispenser in the bathroom. Manager Response: Dear Tjrubia, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. Here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we try to be eco-friendly. Summary: The room was nice and the AC worked great. Everything was clean. Walking distance from downtown Disney entrance. We would stay again. Fine print Incase you miss it when booking from another site they do charge $17.50 a day to park your car.
Manager Response: Dear  MrFord79, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you liked the room , clean and aircon worked great. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Our family has been staying at Eden Roc for years now and because of Oscar we won't be staying anywhere else! He is so kind, helpful and attentive to our needs. Manager Response: Dear Q8890UBclaudiaa, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to Oscar. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. Your family at Eden Roc Inn and Suites is waiting for you. Anytime.

Summary: Staff was super friendly, especially Oscar. Made my Disneyland trip super easy to plan out with the park not being far. Prices were super affordable! Rooms clean and comfortable. Definately will book here for my next Disney trip! Nothing like a comfy room to come back to after hours of walking through Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Anngie D, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I will let my front desk team, especially Oscar, and clean team your good comments. Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable hotel a short distance from Disneyland and surrounding area.
Summary: We stayed here for A Sunday-Friday visit. Booking directly on the Eden Roc website gave us free parking where other hotels were charging up to $22 a night. The rooms have no frills, but are clean and comfortable. While it‚Äôs true that housekeeping does not come to clean the rooms during short staffed COVID times, that‚Äôs the same pretty much everywhere. We had no trouble getting what we needed from the front desk. We were here for a trip to Disneyland, and while it is indeed within walking distance, we opted to drive and park in the Disneyland parking lot because it is a bit of a haul at the end of the day when you are exhausted. We would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Connector16303772348, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed the clean and comfortable room. Despite the  daily challenges we face because of Covid 19. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Great customer service. Mi family and I were really satisfied with the service provided. We came late at nite, just wanted to have a good sleep before the big day and the check in was pretty smooth and fast. I really appreciated it.
Manager Response: Dear karenrJ8272OJ, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. We  realized that most of our valued guest had a long and tiring trip. So, we try our very best to check in our guest as smooth and as fast as possible.  I am glad you had a nice sleep. On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary: Three day pass at the parks and we needed a room to basically just sleep and leave early each morning. LOVED the hard flooring (hotel carpets are gross) and beds were super comfy.  There was a very strong disinfectant smell when we arrived but considering Covid I didn't mind that at all. We opened the window and turned the AC on and that was gone in a few minutes. Plenty of very hot water for all four of us to shower. Main drawback...no daily   housekeeping so get plenty of towels from front desk at check-in.
Manager Response: Dear N5281TEkathleenc, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. That you loved the hard flooring and the super comfy beds. I will pass on your good comments to my team. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: One of our new favorite stays for Disney! Room was clean and spacious. Great location for Disney park goers, all you have to do is walk to downtown Disney and you‚Äôre already there. Our stay was without a hitch. It was also very quiet and we were able to sleep in peace and recharge for the following day.
Manager Response: Dear philippebui91, Thank you for the five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the room was clean and spacious. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  Your favorite stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites family is waiting for you.

Summary: We had fantastic service especially from Anthony and Brandon. We came for our anniversary and they gave us nothing but the best rates, and service. The hotel is right below Disneyland as well which gave us not too bad of a walk for getting to the parks. The rooms are clean and recently remodeled if I remember correctly.
Manager Response: Dear P5619CLmattm, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team was able to deliver excellent service and the rooms were clean. I will surely pass on your good comments to Anthony and Brandon. They would be  happy to know that they made you happy. Especially, your anniversary day. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary: Room was nice, not a bad area to stay. Very close to DCA and DTD. Make sure u have ur walking shoesüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ overall i'd stay here again for the price i payed. No breakfast due covid. Front desk help was great.
Manager Response: Dear  Ninerdad16, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are also a walking distance away from the Anaheim Convention Center. On your next visit , please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will wait for your next visit.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay a lot! The people at the desk were very friendly, especially oscar! They have a very good location  I have my own parking space, even though I had to pay for it, because it was only $17. 55 per night. The room was very spacious and clean! I would definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear NormanmP8940SF, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to Oscar and to my clean team.  That the room was spacious and clean. Yes we are walking distance from Disneyland, and right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary: This is the third time I've stayed here. All times were great. Clean, all the amenities I wanted and a (somewhat) short walk to Disney. No housekeeping because of covid but that's fine for a two day stay.
Manager Response: Dear K2373ZSricharde, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  My team and I are glad that every time that you stayed with us , all times were great.
