On your next visit,  please call us direct at 714-663-8700. You are part of the Eden Roc Inn and Suites family and we will be waiting for you.

Summary: Everything went well with check in. Room was very spacious for our 2 yr old to run around. Had mini fridge and microwave. Tv. Hot water worked very well. Parking was easy. Only deducted one star due to floors could be slightly cleaner. It‚Äôs nice not having carpet but you could see spots where dirt accumulated on a wet area and dried. Nice closet area with iron and ironing board. Hair dryer. Safe. Everything was good. We walked to the Disney parks and downtown Disney the two days we were here. Not a bad walk even after walking 12+ hours through out the day. Overall, would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Travel52207726956, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the hot water worked very well. And that parking was easy.  And that everything worked good. My team and I are thankful that you feel that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is good choice , knowing that there are many hotels to choose from. I  will pass on your suggestion to my clean team. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA , please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will  be waiting for you and your family.

Summary: Good value....don't like paying for parking.What else are they going to do with their parking lot. They wanted to charge an extra day of parking on the check out day so we couldn't leave our car until 5 while we were at the parks.I never had to pay before to do this.
Manager Response: Dear  262angeliquea, Thank you for your feedback . We appreciate you bringing this up to our attention. At Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we strive to make all of our guest have a great stay. We are sorry to hear you encountered some set backs. Again, we appreciate your business and would love to see you sometime in the near future. Call us direct at 714-663-8700

Summary: My brother and I paid $600 for a room, the room was very spacious and clean. Everything worked including the fridge! The beds were not the most comfy but I can honestly say any bed after walking all day is a good bed. We were probably a 10 minute walk from downtown Disney. The location wasn't the greatest or where all the other hotels/motels but it was still great!  I will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Jboogy2288, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found the room very spacious and clean. I will pass on your good comments to my team. We are also very near Anaheim Convention Center and  restaurants . Please call us at 1-714-663-8700 on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary: I booked the Eden Roc Inn & Suites on Hotels.com. We're spending time with our family at Disneyland, check-in It's a little late. Checked in around 10pm. But! We couldn't stay at the hotel. „Öú„Öú Because one of the windows in the hotel room saw a strange warehouse, and there There was a lot of garbage. And keep thumping upstairs people moved Also, several facilities were very dirty. We were a family of 2 adults/2 children, and the children were so tired. already asleep in the car Nevertheless, we only checked the room after checking in this hotel. In just a few minutes, we had no choice but to check out and leave the hotel. Because I couldn't stay. I have to book another hotel again, the kids are too tired to sleep Can you guess how much it was that you couldn't stay in the
Manager Response: Dear X3648REkellyk, Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. I am sorry that we fell short of your expectation. Our records indicate that one  of our front desk team member immediately offered you to move to another room. Once you brought it up to his attention. However, you declined. In addition, you wanted a room with a  kitchen. Unfortunately, all our rooms do not have kitchens.  If you  can call us back at 714-663-8700 and  would like to know which warehouse did you see from the window as there is no nearby warehouse in our hotel.  We appreciate your business  and would  like to see you sometime in the near future.

Summary: Great place walk to Disneyland (through Downtown Disney) within 20 min.  We‚Äôre a family of 4 and it was easy to come and go to the parks.  the rooms were comfortable and clean.  If you want to walk to Disney it‚Äôs a good spot.
Manager Response: Dear Molinasm811, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you found your room comfortable and clean. Not only are we near Disneyland but we are also a walking distance from (less than 5 minutes) to the Anaheim Convention Center. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700 . We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Look for Eden Roc Inn when visting Disney Anahiem.
Summary: A choice decision I made when I visited Anaheim Disneyland.  Quiet, clean, & roomy!  A wonderful, caring & prideful staff that accompanied your Inn.. A little jem amoung scripted & uncaring mega-resorts that fill the landscape.. You are the real deal who provided me with that human & caring experience.  Thank You, Kenny
Manager Response: Dear W2707GWkennyl, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you liked the quiet, clean and roomy room.  And that my team members  took care of you.  On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Brandon went above and beyond helping me with my reservation, he was able to answer all of my questions about the surrounding area. Very professional, patient, and enthusiastic. THANK YOU BRANDON!  -Denise W.
Manager Response: Dear  DNW_0987, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that Brandon was able to help you and answer all your questions. I will pass on your good comments to Brandon. I am sure that he would be very happy to hear your good comments.  On your next visit to the area, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will be waiting for you.

Summary: Wonderfully remodeled with a great location. It was an easy walk through DTD to Disneyland and Disney‚Äôs California Adventure. Convenient and quiet location made this a great find! Coco‚Äôs Kitchen Restaurant was less than a 3 minute walk which was a excellent for a meal before or after hitting the parks.  The hosts were so kind from check in to the very last minute of our stay. They even had a beverage selection in the lobby which was so refreshing during our stay in August.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear 1532masu, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.   Yes they are all walking distance from us -- Downtown Disney, Disneyland and California Adventure. In addition, we are also a walking distance from the Anaheim Convention  Center.  I will pass on your good comments to my staff.  On your next visit , please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will see you soon.

Summary Heading: 100% recommended, near Disney and super clean
Summary: The hotel room was super clean, so close to Disney you can even see the fireworks at night! , all the staff was super friendly and helpful, 100% we will stay here again   El hotel estaba limpio , muy cercano a Disney, tan cerca que puedes ver los fuegos artificiales en las noches , todos los trabajadores fueron muy serviciales y amables , muy recomendable:)
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will pass on your good comments to my team. Super friendly and helpful staff. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you. Anytime !

Summary: We had upgraded to this hotel from a cheaper one for our final day and regretted it.  Before checking in, I had called the hotel with a question and had already received a rude response. Check in felt very cold and we definitely did not feel welcome No smiles and barely acknowledged me standing there for a good few minutes. When they finally did, they checked me in and just listed all the many fees they have (parking $17, not returning room key $2.50, etc) and sent me on my not so merry way.  The room was also out of necessities.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Always a great stay. Have only used this place for my lodging for the past 3 years. I won't be staying at any other property's because other than the great service, they are located right in the middle of everything.  Food, the convention center and Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Eden Roc Is a great place to stay, we have been staying here for close to 5 years, and we have had nothing but great service, and friendly staff. The employees treat us like family, not to mention it is very close to Disneyland. I would highly recommend this place!!!!
Manager Response: Dear 908noelleb, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  My team and I know that you have many hotels to choose from  but you have been loyal to  Eden Roc Inn and Suites and we thank you. It is like you, our valued guest, that my team and I strive hard daily  to do our best to give the best service , value and cleanliness. Your  family at Eden Roc Inn and Suites is waiting for your next visit.  See you soon.

Summary: This was my family's 3rd time staying here, and we have nothing but great things to say about this place and the staff.  Very clean rooms, and a very affordable rate. Property management does a wonderful job of keeping the property safe from any sketchy characters so we feel safe staying here with the baby. Beds are very comfortable, good sized rooms, if you need more towels or toilet paper it's as simple as asking. Maintenance keeps the property very clean and always presentable. Agnes and Oscar are always very pleasant to work with. I will absolutely be coming back and will tell friends and family about the wonderful stay!!
Manager Response: Dear: JjayWar, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to my team. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. Thank you for being part of the Eden Roc Inn and Suites family. We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed here on a Monday night after a trip to the food festival at California Adventure. We payed extra for a newly-renovated room, but I‚Äôm not sure it was worth it. The bathroom in the first room we were assigned was dirty. There was urine on the toilet seat, hair in the shower, and the bathroom fan/light was falling off the ceiling.  However, Oscar the manager at the front desk was amazing. He was very friendly and helpful, while also being efficient and a hard worker. He was doing laundry when arrived and was willing to clean our room when we called about the dirtiness. We chose to move rooms because of the safety hazard of the fan. The new room was clean enough (it also had some hair in the shower and the room smelled like weed), but the bed was comfortable and I brought
Manager Response: none

Summary: Always a pleasant stay at the Eden Roc Hotel. The manager is always super friendly and accommodating and parking is not a problem. The room is always clean and works for what we need it for. It‚Äôs also a short walk to the back of Downtown Disney. I will definitely be visiting again soon!  We love staying here!
Manager Response: Dear Pattirod12, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the room is always clean and staff is friendly.  My team and I love having you here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Fabulous stay and friendly customer service
Summary: Hotel and room is cleaned and sanitized. The staff especially the manager Agnes was friendly and accommodating. Shanell made sure my checkout was fast and easy. The location is closed to Disneyland which makes it easier to go around. If I ever come back to visit California I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Chanmonicam,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. And that the hotel and room is cleaned and sanitized. I will pass on your good comments to my team. On your next visit at Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you. Be safe.

Summary: Cleanliness is probably my biggest concern when it comes to hotels. This place exceeded every expectation of what I expected to see for the price. My room was immaculate. Whoever cleaned it did deserves a raise. Every nook and cranny was clean. I even added a day to my stay. Oscar was the guy at the front who helped me add a day at the last minute and you can tell he takes pride in this place, super cool dude. He even gave me a menu from his favorite spot when I asked about food places. I‚Äôll definitely come back. Thanks Guys.
Manager Response: Dear HoneyBruh, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I will  pass on your excellent comments to our clean team. That " we exceeded every expectation in cleanliness of the room."  And  every nook and corner of the room was clean." And I will  also pass on your good comments to Oscar. My team and I work hard on a daily basis   to provide excellent service and cleanliness. On your next visit at Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting on your next visit. We will see you soon.

Summary: I was impressed of how decent the rooms are. I felt like i was at an apartment complex. Very nice and friendly. I enjoyed my stay it is a calm area and great place to stay. It could have been wiped down a little better but i take my own lysol wipes just in case. I really appreciate how they are 24 hr lobby for all you necessities
Manager Response: Dear PaulinetA1780EZ, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That it was calm and great place to stay. I will surely pass on your good comments about  the team. Very nice and friendly. On your next visit in Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. Be safe and hope to see you soon.

Summary: Every interaction i had with staff has been perfect from me initially calling to have to cut the stay short by 1 night. Then calling to request 2 old sheets for a fort and inform the hotel that we may arrive early. The female agent was awesome letting us know we can park. What was around us and about the fee for early check (which was great considering i may of been checking in before checkout). We arrived only 2 hours early. The room was amazing and the extra sheets folded on the bed. We requested towels the housekeeper who brought them also was joy. I recommend this hotel to all. Sorry to your staff i am horrible with names.
Manager Response: Dear Gel619, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will let my team know that the "staff has been perfect" . From the front desk team to the housekeeping team. On your next visit with us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Always a great place to stay
Summary: Me and my boyfriend have stayed at this hotel many times before and have always liked this spot. The rooms have always been very clean with nice blacked out curtains and the ac works like a champ for those hot days. It always smells fresh. The customer service has here always been great. Lupe has always treated us nicely and always try to accommodate us. Definitely worth giving this place a try, afforable prices with modern style rooms. Looks like an under estimated place from the outside but it's nice on the inside.
Manager Response: Dear Tinyteaa,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. The room is clean and smells fresh. I will pass on your good comments to Lupe.  I know that you have many hotels to choose from for your lodging needs and my team and I are grateful that you always come back and stay with us. Thank you for your loyalty. On your next visit,  please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary: I'm by far impressed with the experience & customer service with the front desk agent Christian he was so attentive as well as provided helpful information, I will definitely book again on my next stay in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear razoj714,   Thank you for giving us a  five star rating. I am glad that you were impressed with the customer service of Cristian. I will surely pass on your good comments to him. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will wait for you .

Summary Heading: Happy to stay in Eden Roc
Summary: I again stayed to Eden Roc while attending the Religious Education Congress feb 20-33. The hotel staff continued to be very respectful to me and my companions. The staff guided us to our rooms. When we needed to go out to eat, the front desk was so helpful in indicating to us where to eat. My room is so clean. The lobby and the sorounding neat, clean and attractive. The hotel is always improving its service every time I come to stay. I congratulate, the manager and staff for making my stay in Eden Roc memorable and making me feel at home and relaxing after the days activities in the Congress. I will surely promote this hotel to my other friends
Manager Response: Dear Renatop396,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  My team and I  work hard  to give our valued guest, like you,  excellent service.  I am glad that  you enjoyed your stay with us. Especially, clean room and lobby. I will surely pass on your good comments to my team. My team and I  know that you have many hotels that you can choose from and we are glad that you selected us again. Thank you for your loyalty. On your next visit at Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you. Any time.

Summary: Great place, great walking distance to Disneyland. Clean, affordable, amazing price for the amenities. The staff was amazingly helpful, any request I had they quite literally jumped up to help me. 10/10 would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Stuart R., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my staff was amazingly helpful to any request you had and the room was clean . Yes, we are not only a walking distance to Disneyland. But, we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center and across us is a restaurant. On your next visit with us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: This location was perfect for one night. We attended the Disneyland After Dark 80‚Äôs night and it was a perfect spot for getting to the Downtown Disney monorail. We were super tired after and used a Lyft for safety but we could have easily walked. I really appreciated the hardwood floors as they just seem so much more sanitary than carpet. We all slept well and I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Christinaofcali, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you liked the hardwood floors in the room. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel... Close to Disney Parks
Summary: First time staying here and would recommend this place for anyone wanting a hotel close to Disneyland.  Floors are hard floor no carpets.  That was a plus for us and we didn't have to worry about black feet that others have posted from carpet floors at other hotels.  Rooms come with a refrigerator and microwave.  There is a $7 a nite resort fee that basically covers for parking.  There is no security deposit but they do require a credit card to have on file.  Front desk staff were very friendly and answered any questions I had.  We timed ourselves walking to Disneyland and it's about a 15 minute walk.  You get to Downtown Disney in half that time.  We stayed Thursday night until Sunday and there was no construction noises next door on the new hotel being built, but just in case
Manager Response: Dear  999cruzs, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you like the hard floors and not carpet in the room. I will pass on your good comments to my team. Yes, we are not only near Disneyland. But, we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center and  restaurants. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: very helpful staff and clean and organized rooms we had a problem where we left something and the issue was resolved smoothly thanks to the workers great location close to disney and multiple restaurants
Manager Response: Dear johnsancandi, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team was able to solve your problem. And the room was clean and organized. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: This was one of the cleanest motels I've ever stayed in. Freshly redone with hard surface floors and new tile in the bathrooms, new looking and feeling linens.  Mattress was comfortable to us.  New construction going on right behind them, but construction crew seemed to be respectful of quiet hours.  Perfect spot to be close to Disneyland but not in the traffic of Harbor Blvd. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Alpelton, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I are very happy about your comments with the hotel. That it is one of the cleanest motels that you ever stayed in. That the floors are freshly done and tiles in the bathroom. And that the mattress was very comfortable. We will continue to work hard  to give excellent service at the front desk as well as the cleanliness of the room and  the property. We would like to maintain Eden Roc Inn and Suites as the spotless property. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: The location near Disney parks is great.  It is a 25 minute walk to park entrance and 12 minute walk to Downtown Disney entrance.  It is also very convenient to the convention center.  We were a family of five (3 young adult children) sharing a suite.  The room was spacious and I found bed to be reasonably comfortable.  We had 2nd floor room so luggage was carried up the stairs.  We stayed 4 nights and had no problem with noise.  There is a quiet space with tables near reception my daughter used to work.  The WiFi was so slow I didn‚Äôt use it.  There was a pool but weather was cold so it was empty.  The reception staff were VERY helpful to provide extra pillows, a blanket or information.  The hotel does not sell Disneyland tickets.  There is a microwave and spacious mini
Manager Response: Dear  obdocSanJose, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay. That your room was clean and spacious and comfortable beds. And the staff was able to assist you in all your needs. I am glad that we were able to provide you good service, cleanliness and Of good value.  On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Great budget hotel near Disneyland. Staff was friendly and helpful. There was free parking right in front of our room, which was really convenient. It was about a 15-20 min. walk to Downtown Disney and the parks. If you're tired from walking at the end of the day, there are taxis outside the Disneyland entrance and it was about $8.00 to get back to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Windy_Keala,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for giving our other guests tip on other transportation available to and from Disneyland. There is also an ARTO transportation in front of Tiffy's Restaurant. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary: It was really nice time there, close to Disneyland park (20 min walking), staying was really good, the staff help us in all our concerns (thanks Cristian for all your support! You rock!).  I definitely will use the same hotel on my next trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Hector G Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.Yes,not only are we near the Disneyland area we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will pass on your good comments to Cristian. On your next visit please call us at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We arrived early in the area and was able to get a parking pass so we could park our car, then come back later to check in.  All staff we spoke with were very pleasant.  Proximity to Disneyland is great!  Though we stayed only a night and did not get to check out any other amenities,  accommodations were  good, comfortable and clean.    Only wished they had some type of breakfast offering.  There are several restaurants next door though.  We would most definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear lvblackie, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. The room is clean and pleasant staff. Yes, not only are we a walking distance to  Disneyland. We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center, Disney walk and  Garden Walk. On your next visit, call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Service was great.Room was nice and clean and parking was great. Thank you Omar for the warm greeting. The service desk went outoff their way to make sure my family and I had everything we needed. We are Disney annual pass holders we are definitely staying here again over and over again.
Manager Response: Dear jjj587 Thank you for giving us a four star rating.  I am glad to hear that you liked our rooms and that our team members did their best to make your stay more enjoyable.  I will relay this information to Omar and I am sure that he will be glad as well.  Next time you are in the area give us a call at 714-663-8700.  We will see you next time.

Summary: Eden Roc was a great stay for 1 week and do appreciate the friendly staff, cleanliness of hotel, and great location for walking. I will definitely stay here again if in the area again as was also convenient to the nearby highways.
Manager Response: Dear Iqsd Thank you for giving us a five star review.I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff did their best to make your stay more enjoyable. We are not only close to Disneyland but also adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center. Next time you are in the area give us a call at 714-663-8700.We will be more that happy to help you book your reservation.We will see you soon.

Summary: This is our second time staying at Eden roc for our yearly Disneyland trip. Omar at the front desk was very helpful in checking us in and storing our luggage upon arrival.   Rooms appear very clean and neat.   The best part is location. From our room to the entrance of Disneyland was. A brisk 15 minute walk. Hard to get much closer without staying at Disney. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear codyc511 Thank you for giving us a five star rating and staying with us again.I am glad to hear that Our team member Omar was able to help you so you could enjoyed the rest of your day at Disneyland.  I will relay the information to him. Next time give us a a call at 714-663-8700 and We will help you book your reservation. We hope to hear from you again!!

Summary: Checked in during the peak period for SWE19 conference event. It was a inn with very clean, spacious and well organized room. As single traveler this round so I requested for level 2 for security concern but there is no lift hence I have to drag up/ down my luggages ... lucky the housekeeper came to help me. 10-15min Walking distance to Disney and convention hall. The restaurant Koko nearby offered 10% discount and served fresh yummy food the whole day .
Manager Response: Dear YeoS90 Thank you for giving us a four star rating and for choosing us during the conference. I am glad to hear that one of our housekeepers was able to help you during your stay. We are not only close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center but we are also 15-20 minutes away from Knott's Berry Farm. We will see soon.

Summary: Stayed here Oct 5-13 with my hubby, who is the Tour Director for Barrett Tours, Regina, Canada. Hotel very clean, rooms a good size, staff friendly and very helpful , nothing too much trouble for them. Lovely pool to relax by or enjoy a swim.  Excellent location to the parks , Anaheim Garden  Walk and there is a Walmart around a 12 min walk away . We used the restaurant opposite Eden Roc , Coco's Restaurant and Bakery , really good value, dessert pies are the best and added bonus you get 10% discount if you mention you are a guest at Eden Roc. I'm going again October 2020 and look forward to another great stay at this lovely hotel .
Manager Response: Dear Cymru1963,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that  you enjoyed your  8th day stay here with us. Yes, we are a 12-15 min. walk to Disneyland and we are right next to the Disneyland area. Your tips and suggestions will surely help our valued guests. We will see you in Oct. 2020.

Summary: My wife and I have made Eden Roc our "go to" place for our Disneyland trips.  It's almost like staying in the park but a fraction of the price.  Fantastic location and super friendly staff.  comfy beds, newly remolded and clean rooms, micro wave, fridge, wifi, everything you need.  Also, Omar is the best.  He has taken care of us on each trip.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear scott555555123,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you made Eden Roc as your go to place. Yes, not only are we near the Disneyland area, we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will pass on your good comments to Omar. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Best bang for your buck - nice rooms that are recently renovated, super close to the park, parking fees included, best rates around, etc. We're Disneyland annual passholders and have stayed here 4 times and counting because it really is the best option overall. Very affordable!
Manager Response: Dear baa6,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites give the best value--- rates, cleanliness of the room , friendliness of the staff and LOCATION, LOCATION. In behalf of my team, we thank you for being a loyal guest. We know that you have many hotels to choose from and we thank you for constantly selecting us. My team and I will continue to work hard to give you and other valued guest the best service. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary: We planned a trip to Disneyland and initially booked at the HoJo in Fullerton and had an aweful experience checking in as I had misplaced my ID in travel even though I had paid for the hotel in advance and had other forms of photo ID (Sams Club, work ID, Citibank Visa with pic). It took us over an hour to get checked in and we decided to leave the next morning. I had booked another hotel and due to the out of town charges my bank cancelled the credit card so that hotel cancelled our reservation and had no other availability when we arrived. So now we were hotel less and only had cash. We went to the Eden Roc and the girl was soooooooooo nice to let us do a cash deposit and payment.   The room was recently renovated and really nice. After walking to/from/around Disneyland (13
Manager Response: Dear Slpandbmp,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that one of my team members were able to help you in your stressful night. That the room was nice and the beds were very comfortable. Yes, we are a walking distance away from Disneyland and right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Lucky to have found this affordable gem while working in the area and really lucky that the general manager agnes allowed us to check in a little early as we were exhausted from work..lol..this hotel is located right by Disneyland and is very comfortable . Nice room set up and comfy beds..definitely will be back...
Manager Response: Dear Robert H., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. And you like the room and you found the beds very comfortable. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Eden Roc was suggested to me for a two day stay by a friend. I had a two day stay-over in OC and I found the Inn very convenient. It is I a central location just south of Katella and West Street. There are many convenient restaurants nearby, shopping and California Disney is just north of it. A young man named Oscar took my reaervations. He was very helpful and very courteous.  Once there, the amenities were impeccable. The rooms were extremely well appointed. The rooms and the complex was very clean. The staff was prompt, courteous and very professional. The beds are just the way I like them. . . Firm! I had a fantastic two days there. It  was very quiet. No loud noises from staff or guests. Security and parking is well guarded. You can consider it a home away from home. I
Manager Response: Dear chispar0,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you had two fantastic two days stay with us. I am glad that you like everything about the hotel, location, firmness of the bed and cleanliness of the room and the complex. In addition, the friendliness and professionalism  of the staff. I will surely pass on your good comments to Oscar.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  My team and I will be waiting for you. Your home away from home.

Summary: First off, the staff was very nice and accommodating. They allowed us to park our car and check our bags hours before we could check in, which I appreciated. The issues began when we got to the room and found the shower and bed linens covered in black hair, which I assumed was from a previous tenant and led me to believe that the linens had not been changed. I brought this to the attention of the hotel staff who were understanding and cleaned the tub and switched the linens, but honestly the damage had been done. The hotel room was decent, the floors were fake hardwood, which in my opinion is better than carpet but the beds were seriously hard as a board, even after a long day walking all over Disney i was still bummed out to have to lay in the bed. The noise level was not bad
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quick, clean, get-away, close to parks
Summary: Arrive early, get an upstairs room. A/AC worked great, everything was clean, and the beds were comfortable. Best part, was walking right up to the monorail entrance every day, 1/4 - 1/2 mile away. Easy parking if you have a car. Lots of people crowd around Harbor Ave, but Eden Roc was on the SW corner of the park, and was crowd free.
Manager Response: Dear 1fireguy,  Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you  enjoyed your stay here with us. That the aircon worked great, clean room and near Disneyland.  We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. Yes, Harbor Boulevard is a very crowded street.  I am sure that after reading this, our valued guest, will know the short cut way on going to Disneyland and avoid the crowd. Thank you for writing this review. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Room and amenities are to be expected for the price and star rating of the hotel. Kinda noisy/thin walls. But parking is free! Staff was super accommodating (male at front desk, especially). They stored my breastmilk all day while my daughter and I went to Disney even though I had already checked out.
Manager Response: Dear TammyFrie, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that my team was able to help you out. Yes, we are few hotels near the Disneyland area that offer the parking for free. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: From checking in to leaving the staff made our stay amazing.  Our room was very clean and easy walk to Disney.  There are many restaurants in the area.  Thank you Agnes and the staff at this hotel for making it amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Steven W., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. Aside from nearby restaurants and Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center is also a walking distance. I will pass on your good comments to my team.  On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will wait for you soon.

Summary: Clean and close to downtown disney. The west entrance to Disneyland.  We had late check in at 1am and slept in.  Low noise, it was very good!!  We went August 10!  Very friendly staff. Very close to two restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Mark9295, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. On your next visit to  Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay on a Budget
Summary: We stayed here last May (2018--didn't have a drop down option here to add that date), and were very happy with the staff and our room. Omar was at the desk, and he was super helpful and very nice. Room was clean and comfortable, and reasonably priced. We didn't use the pool--spent all our time at Disney :)
Manager Response: Dear Susane 226, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you were very happy with the staff and the room. I will pass on your good comments to Omar. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next visit. My team and I will wait for you.

Summary: No complains at all, the staff were extremely helpful and respectful even if they were busy on the phone or with others booking rooms, always greeted everyone who came in. The rooms were quite roomy and beds are excellent, I feel asleep with out tossing and turning. AC are in the rooms and dont take long to get cold either so dont fall asleep without blankets on. You will love your stay, Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear  thekellzshowttv, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the room was roomy and the beds were excellent. There are also 2 walking distance restaurants that will give additional  10% off on    breakfast, lunch or dinner to all our valued guests.  On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: My family of two adults and two kids stayed at Eden Roc for our trip to Disney and it was absolutely fantastic. The staff members were extremely friendly. The walk to Downtown Disney was nice and short.
Manager Response: Dear  Kalani K.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that your stay with us was absolutely fantastic and the staff members were extremely friendly. Aside from a short walk to  Disneyland or Downtown Disney, we are also next to the Anaheim Convention Center.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Eden Roc Inn is great. The location, rooms , staff are all very excellent. Anish was very welcoming and helpful especially when I had accidentally left my phone in the reception area. He promptly returned my phone to me before I had really realized I lost it. The rooms are always clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear 97Duck,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the rooms are always clean and comfortable. I will pass on your good comments to Anish. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your  next visit to Anaheim, CA.  WE will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Had high hopes, but did not meet expectations
Summary: As with most of the reviewers have said, I picked this place because it was close to Disneyland. Expedia does need to update their site since it is not a 3 minute walk to Disney at all. That's my bad, I could have done my research and verified the walking time myself.   The good about this location: price was great, staff was very friendly, and the rooms were remodeled and seemed clean.  The whole reason I booked this hotel was to have a short drive after being worn out from Disneyland and get a nice sleep before going home. That did not happen at all.   The bed was terrible. You could feel the dents in the bed where everyone has slept. It was lumpy, hard, and  squeaked every time you moved. My fianc√© thought the fitted looked like it hadn't been switched out for a new one. The
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second visit to Eden Roc and it was even better then the first. Very pleased with help from staff and they even have us complimentary late check out. What a great hotel and great group of employees. Thanks Anish!!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew P.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you like the second visit better than the first.  I am happy that you were very please with the help of my staff,especially Anish. We are right next to the Anaheim Convention Center,  and a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. There are two restaurants in the corner from us. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: The hotel is perfect if you're going to Disneyland. It's clean, quiet, and about a 10 or 15 minute walk to Disneyland. The front desk employee Anish was very friendly. I would easily stay there again when I go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Chris R., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found the perfect hotel --- Eden Roc Inn and Suites, to go to Disneyland. I will pass on your good comments to Anish. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We spent two nights here and it was great. Even though we arrived early, Anish was able to get us checked in quickly and even watched our stuff for us as we waited for our shuttle back to the airport on the day we left. Definitely planning to return when I come back to the area next time!
Manager Response: Dear Masterhorus,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that your 2 nights here at Eden Roc was great. I am glad that Anish was able to help you out. Thank you for your loyalty. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: This is a motel and not a hotel. It is not a resort and the only amenities was a pool in the parking lot.  Internet was awful and I mean awful.  Had a suite but the second room just a beat up pull out couch and that was it.  No table, not TV, nothing. The bathroom door barely clears the toilet if you want to use the shower.  AC was noisy and seemed to increase in temp during the night.  I will not stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for one night while my family was visiting and we went to Disneyland.  The hotel was clean, comfortable, and accommodating, and it was an easy walk to Disneyland. Anish helped us when we first arrived and got our parking pass all set up so we could park at the hotel (instead of paying for parking at Disneyland), even though it was too early to check in to our room! Anish was helpful and friendly in answering all our questions and getting us settled in our room!
Manager Response: Dear   LRH2232, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found the hotel, clean and comfortable. Not only are we a walking distance from Disneyland, we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center.  I will pass on your good comments to  Anish. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: There were some good and some eh' moments about Eden Roc Inn & Suites. To start off- Location was fine, rooms clean and price was decent. All very good points. However, when driving up to the Inn our very first thought was I hope it's better on the inside than the out. Ok, so apart from the overall outside look, the Desk Clerk was very nice and helpful and they "Upgraded" us to a Family Suite. That was very nice & unexpected, thank you!  However, my family and I were woken up not once, not twice, but several times throughout the night because of the excessive foot traffic and noise coming from above/outside. At times, it literally sounded like a herd of elephants were running back & forth.  Hey, we get it! Adults & Kids coming back from a day at the Happiest Place on Earth
Manager Response: Dear xxDangergirlxx,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. That you liked the room---clean and the price was decent. Yes, our location is a walking distance to Disneyland and we are right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. There are also 2 restaurants next to us which gives 10% off to our guests, breakfast, lunch or dinner.  I am sorry about the noise caused by the  guests on the second floor.  The front desk is 24 hours open and you can call anytime for any issues at night.  Thank you for your input and I will pass it on to our engineering department.  On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: This place will always be my home away from home. The comfort is one thing but the people are great. Virginia is always lovely even in the middle of the night. Oscar is always professional and Agnes the manager always makes you feel like family. Absolutely love staying here during my trips to Cali.
Manager Response: Dear  AntonioJ2217, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I always work hard daily to deliver excellent service and in room cleanliness to our valued guest, like you. I know that there are many hotels that you can choose from and my team and I thank you for your loyalty.  I will pas on your good comments to the team. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will wait for you.

Summary: The room was standard, but clean. The location is phenomenal for not staying on the Disney property itself (and paying those prices). But the front desk staff was helpful in every way. Omar - front desk - was especially super kind and helpful. We had a dinner mishap and when we told him the problem, he went above and beyond to make sure our kiddos were happy. It meant loads to us.
Manager Response: Dear  FarAway726524, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will surely pass on your good comments to Omar. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: You pay for what you get
Summary: Not a 3min walk to Disneyland as advertised on Expedia, in order to get to the park entrance, it's a 19min walk, this needs to be clarified Outside is misleading, the inside is nice If you're a light sleeper. Book another place Very thin walls  Air conditioning unit is loud Bring your ear plugs You pay for what you get Asked for towels and toilet paper and had to walk to the lobby to pick up, they refuse to deliver to your room
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amir at the front desk was very helpful. The bed was comfy and the price was great! Corners, ledges, and behind the bathroom door could use a good scrub. We felt that the distance was per for walking. Good place to crash after a long day at the park.
Manager Response: Dear heatherhH9609HD,  Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that Anish was able to help you with your needs. I will pass on your suggestions to our housekeeping team. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed four nights for s trip to Disneyland and we would definitely stay again. The room size was so nice. There was plenty of room and tou didn't feel like tou were crammed into the room. I loved the laminate floor rather than carpet. The room was clean and outside noise wasn't sn issue. The staff was very nice and helpful. Not a bad walk to Disneyland, about 15 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Amy M., Thank you for giving us  a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That the room size was big and room cleaned. Also, that the staff was nice and helpful. Aside from a 15 minute walk to Disneyland, we are also a walking distance from the Anaheim Convention Center and Garden Walk. We are also right next to 2 restaurants which give additional 10% off for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  Just present your guest room key while you order. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please give us a call at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: If you enjoy peace and quiet DO NOT STAY HERE!
Summary: Where do I even start?  First off they charge a $7 a day resort fee! For what I have no idea because the WiFi is unreliable and very slow, the pool is dirty, and they don't offer a continental breakfast.  We checked in, made it to the room and noticed a cockroach on the wall! We asked for a different room. Went to that room and noticed silver fish crawling in and out of a crack in the molding. After checking the room more thoroughly found a long dark hair in the ice bucket!  Again switched to another room.  If you enjoy quiet DO NOT STAY HERE! Walls are super thin, and plumbing is god awful. It is SO LOUD! I was woken up after midnight when a neighboring room decided to take a shower. (I posted a video on Yelp of the noise that the shower makes. It is almost unbearable!)  Then
Manager Response: none

Summary: I got a very good deal ($80/night) on Hotel Tonight. It's a motel right on a busy street. Normal rates are much higher.  THE GOOD: Very close to Disneyland, walking distance to Downtown Disney Coco's directly across the street Clean Modern Refrigerator and microwave in room Fair-sized flat-screen TV Free Parking Staff was friendly  THE NOT-SO-GOOD: Very loud street AC fan cannot be on continuously (so there's no "white noise" to mask the loud traffic) AC is SUPER LOUD when it turns on (think "jet engine"), then dead quiet when it turns off. You WILL need earplugs. Took a good three minutes of shower running full blast to get hot water. I thought maybe there was no hot water. (3 minutes is a long time to be standing there, and wastes a lot of water.) Took a VERY long time to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cute place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Don't let the motel style dissuade you from booking. The place is extremely modern, rooms completely renovated. You can park your car right outside your room which is great. 10 minute walk from downtown Disney. Safe area!
Manager Response: Dear Cristina I., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, you can park the car outside your room. And parking is free. We are one of the few hotels near Disneyland area that we do not charge parking. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: The rooms are really nice and clean. The smell of the room is also fantastic. Daisy from the reception made our check in really quick and nice. She was very friendly and we felt like home immediately. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Natascha M.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found our room really nice and clean. And also smelled  fantastic. I will pass on your good comment to Daisy. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next visit to Anaheim, CA. We will see you soon.

Summary: Arrived today with my young son after a really long journey, check in was made to be easy and simple by Daisy who helped out so much. She really helped ease our stress. Rooms are lovely and clean. Smells in reception are calming
Manager Response: Dear  jemis29,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that Daisy made your check in simple, easy and fast. Most of all, she made it stress free for you. Yes, our team worked hard to make sure the rooms are clean. Thank you for noticing the calming smell in the lobby area. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: This place is perfect for me and my family. It has really big and comfortable beds, the rooms are really clean, the location is great you can walk to Dianeyland if you want!! also Daisy at the front desk is very nice and helpful !!:)
Manager Response: Dear Halamadridoc,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is the perfect place for you and your family. I will pass on your good comments to my clean team and to Daisy. Thank you for recommending this place. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: This is a nice hotel that is very very close to Disneyland- you pass right behind California Adventure to get to it! Daisy at the front desk was really helpful and super friendly! Also have to love the free parking!
Manager Response: Dear CaliforniaDork,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, we are few hotels near the Disneyland Area that offer free parking to our guests. We are a 10-15 min. walk to Disneyland. And right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. To name  a few,we  are also near grocery stores, pharmacy store and the Downtown Disney and Garden Walk.  On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Hotel was clean, spacious, recently remodeled and there were no odors in our room. The laminate flooring was great. The entrance to Downtown Disney is about a 10-15 minute walk. We felt safe and walked home multiple nights after midnight. Wifi was very slow. There were two restaurants within a block, Tiffys and Cocos, but we didnt eat at either of them.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer K,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, all of our rooms do not have carpets which our valued guests prefer. Not only are we a 10-15 minute  walk to  the Disneyland area but we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. Yes, Tiffy's and Coco's restaurants give 15% off  to our guests for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Just present your guest key before you order. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Had never stayed here before so I gave it a try. After the first stay I knew this would be my place to stay during a Disneyland trip.   Fast forward another Disneyland trip and instead of driving home we decided to extend our stay. The customer service is great! Thanks so much to Daisy for making checking in so easy and quick. My little guy is always excited to stay here. We definitely got a great view this time and in case we come back before the fireworks I‚Äôm sure we might be able to see them from our room! Thanks so much to Daisy and the staff at Eden Roc for making our stay great.
Manager Response: Dear PereidaJaz,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay the first time and the second time. Most of our rooms can view the fireworks from Disneyland. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you and your little guy.

Summary: Daisy was so helpful at the front desk! Rooms were very clean, remodeled, and spacious. Great walking distance to the park. Open 24 hours so you don‚Äôt have to worry about checking in after visiting the park. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Kelly B.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Aside from 8-15 min. walk to Disneyland. we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. There are 2 nearby walking distance restaurants, Garden Walk. Downtown Disney and grocery stores. I will relay your good comments to Daisy. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: This place is super close, cute, and has such a friendly staff!  Shout out to Daisy at the front desk for giving some great customer service! Definitely going to recommend this spot again! It was a great experience and made our trip even better!
Manager Response: Dear  2257Mad,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you had a great experience and your trip even better. I am going to pass on your good comments to Daisy. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at Eden Roc. Daisy was very friendly and professional. It is a great location and is very clean. Easy walk to Disneyland only half a mile. I‚Äôm also very happy with the free parking!
Manager Response: Dear  Rosalind910,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, we are the very few hotels  that gives free parking. Additional savings of  around $25.00 parking / day if you park at Disneyland. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Eden Roc Inn & Suites
Summary: Thank you to Oscar at the front desk for helping us out with a travel situation. He went above and beyond. This hotel is always clean, comfortable, perfectly located and love the shampoo/conditioner/body wash scent and dispenser. We will definitely return in the future for our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear sheryls733,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Eden Roc Inn and Suites  is big on go green. And one of the changes we made is the shampoo, body wash and conditioner with dispensers mounted on the wall. We are also a walking distance from restaurants and next to the Anaheim Convention Center. I am glad that Oscar went above and beyond to help you. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. See you on your next visit.

Summary: Absolutely great service. After a painful 14 hr flight and contending with LA traffic, Oscar was kind enough to check us in earlier. The room was great and the location is perfect for Disneyland  Thank you again!
Manager Response: Dear AndrewGen29,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that Oscar was able to check you in earlier after a 14 hour flight and you liked the room. Yes, our location is perfect for Disneyland. As well as we are also next to the Anaheim Convention Center. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: 2019 Disney California Adventure Park vacation! Eden Roc was the most convince motel to Disney downtown. We will definitely come back here for 2019 Family Christmas this year!!! Daisy was very helpful for our check in process.
Manager Response: Dear EvrenBaskaya,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. My team and I will be waiting for you this Christmas.

Summary Heading: Great Facility, Service, Location and Price
Summary: Stayed for three nights to visit Disney with the family.  Rooms are newly renovated. Close walk to Dowtown Disney park entrance. Daisy made checking a breeze. Food for less and a number of great eateries are less than a minute drive away!  Would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear  Ladellerby,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you liked how the rooms looked like. Yes, we are a close walk to Disney park entrance and we are right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. There are also two walking distance restaurants from us. Tiffy's and Coco's restaurant.  Guests from Eden Roc Inn and Suites are given 10% off breakfast, lunch or dinner. Just present the guest room key when you place the order. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: The go to hotel for Disney trips!
Summary: I've stayed at Eden Roc 3 times now - it's become my go to for all of my Disney trips! The location is great, as it's within close walking distance of the parks and Downtown Disney. Hotel staff is always friendly and very accomodating as well (Daisy helped us out immensely during our most recent visit). The grounds and rooms are clean and quiet, with a pool to boot. Definitely will continue to stay here!
Manager Response: Dear Roxsabo,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I appreciate your loyalty to Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am glad that we were able to give an excellent service to you ---- cleanliness of the room and the front desk. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. My team and I will be waiting for  you on your next visit. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on  your next stay. We will see you soon.

Summary: This hotel is great, close to the park and nice room. Daisy at the front was extremely helpful and friendly, went out of her way to ensure that everything with my stay was the way it was suppose to be.
Manager Response: Dear markie_marko,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. That she went out of her way to make sure that everything was fine with your stay. On your next trip to Eden Roc Inn and Suites, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Stayed for a week here to visit Disneyland left the room is very clean and organize. lots of attention to detail at the facility. so excited for Star Wars. Eden Roc has Star Wars employees.. Daisy always has forks available upon request as well and a great person at the front desk very professional! This will be my new to go hotel anytime we are back in town !
Manager Response: Dear marioa127,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us for a week. My team and I work hard to give our valued guests, like you, excellent service and excellent in room cleanliness.  I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. My team and I know that there are many hotels in Anaheim, CA that you can choose from and we are grateful that you chose Eden Roc Inn and Suites. On your next visit , please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I and my star wars team members  will be waiting for you, SOON!

Summary: This is now my third stay at this hotel. I love the location, within close walking distance to the Disneyland Resort. The rooms are spacious and updated. Daisy at the front desk was especially friendly and helpful. This is our favorite hotel for our family Disneyland vacations.
Manager Response: Dear  mrs_megathor, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you liked the room , spacious and updated. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you  at your favorite hotel, Eden Roc Inn and Suites.

Summary: We stayed over Spring break Eden roc is always been a great place.  Staff is always friendly always helpful rooms are always cleaned. Downtown Disney only about an 8 minute walk away.  Hotel is always quiet which is great for long day at Disneyland and you just want to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear gary148, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. ---Friendly staff and cleaned rooms. We are right next to the Anaheim Convention Center, Disney Walk, Garden Walk, and outlet mall. On your next visit, call us directly at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Staff and place was amazing!!! Nice big rooms and comfortable. Short walk to Disneyland. Special thanks to Daisy for her wonderful customer service. Will definitely be coming back for our next trip. Thank you Eden Roc
Manager Response: Dear Babeelee77, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you find the staff and place amazing. We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will surely pass on your good comments to Daisy. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: perfect Location to walk to both Disney & CA ADVENTURE with free parking! very nice clean modern rooms with refrigerators and microwave, welcoming friendly staff especially Daisy! pool for warm afternoon break from the park! we wilL BE back!
Manager Response: Dear 577jesse,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you liked the room .  Since we are a walking distance from Disneyland, it is very convenient for our  guests  to come back in the afternoon for a quick nap from the park. We are also next to the Anaheim Convention Center, grocery stores and restaurants. I will share your  good comments to Daisy. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary: Hotel is close to the Disneyland, affordable, room was great. Room was all newly remodeled, and only 8 minutes walk to the Expedia, A big thanks for Omar for his great customer service, will be back for future stay for sure.
Manager Response: Dear 300semc,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you liked the room. I know that Omar will be happy to know that he made your stay a good one. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc for three nights and loved it! The room was clean, the parking was free and accessible, and it‚Äôs a short drive or walk to Disneyland! It was nice being close enough to be able to take a break to rest midday! We would definitely recommend this place! Thanks Daisy for your help!
Manager Response: Dear 566stefaniec,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes ,we are a walking distance away from Disneyland and we are right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. Thank you for your loyalty. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next stay. We will see you soon.

Summary: Just down the street from Downtown Disney, we found this hotel to be convenient for our plans. We got a superior queen, and received room 126 which had an unusual offset floor plan that resulted in a lot of space - which was nice and also not right next to the street. The room is kind of sparse but met our needs for a weekend stay. Be aware that while overnight parking is free, you may not be able to leave your car at the hotel on check-out day due to threat of towing.
Manager Response: Dear JHinSD,  Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that room 126 fit your needs. We are very few of the hotels near Disneyland that offer free parking. Unfortunately, since we have very limited number of parking spaces we are not able to let the car parked here after the guest checked out. My gut is to rate this as "average" instead of "very good", but that is in comparison to higher quality hotels 3-star hotels.  When considering that this is a 2-star hotel, it is pretty good.  The hotel has been updated with modern finishes, but you do get what you pay for - there was limited amenities in the room (cheap hairdryer, coffee, no toiletries), the beds were not super comfortable, and the linens were light.  The pictures of the property are true to what you get, but they do have an extra

We traveled with a child who has severe peanut allergy, we checked in on Tuesday there were peanuts on stairs, on Thursday when we checked out they were still there which made us uneasy about the cleanliness. Heater kept shutting off and it was extremely cold outside.  For a quick weekend and $111 I would stay again.  No elevators but only 2 floors..

Summary Heading: Very good place for the price
Summary: I am writing this as a SOLO business traveler. I did not have kids or anyone else with me. Keep that in mind -  I stayed here February 10-13 2019 in room 204. I had a meeting at the Disneyland Hotel which was $250+ a night. I got the Eden Roc on Hotels.com for $86 a night. The room was very big, clean and the bed was comfortable. So, all I needed.  The one odd thing about the room is that the TV is wayyyy across the room from the beds. It was hard to watch TV laying in bed and there is not a couch or anything to sit and watch TV. Not that I really needed to but just saying. The reason I am not giving this hotel a full 5 is that they charge a "resort fee" of $7 a day. Upon check in, I asked what that fee was for and the lady said "Um, it's just something we charge". Not cool.

Summary: The property is a two story,  newly remodeled and has no elevator. You will need manual  assistance with large luggage and strollers up & down stairs.  Property is  approximately half mile to Downtown Disney which is a pleasant walk with well lit pathways.
Manager Response: Dear  Pioneer48803498798,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that it was a pleasant walk for you to go Downtown Disney.   I hope you were given a first floor room. If not, I apologize. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. And let us know in advance that you need a first floor room. We will surely accommodate your request.

Summary: We found out about Eden Roc online a few months ago and after reading reviews decided to try it out for the first time last month. The hotels on Harbor have gotten too expensive for us, and we had never stayed on the other side of the park before. We got a family suite and the room was huge. The room was clean, the staff was friendly - thanks Oscar! - and the walk is short to the park. Plus, the lines at security were much shorter on the back end of Downtown Disney than the other side. Our room was upstairs and was very quiet and comfortable. Oscar made our stay enjoyable and we are already staying at Eden Roc again this month. We have annual passes to Disneyland and we have found ourselves a new hotel to stay at each time!
Manager Response: Dear OnMy11Six,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you decided to try the other side of Harbor Boulevard. Yes, we pride ourselves of having a huge suite bedroom. I will pass on your good comments to my team-- clean room and friendly staff. Oscar, will be happy to know that your stay was enjoyable because of his help. Thank you for your loyalty and my team and I will see  you soon.

Summary Heading: The place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: Eden Roc was the perfect place to stay for our three day trip to Disneyland.  The room was very clean and the staff; friendly as you could want. Oscar marked out maps and told us not to forget the 10% discount at Coco's Restaurant.  You are within 15 minutes walking distance from the park and right across the street from the restaurant for a good breakfast. If want to drive, the Disneyland Toy Story parking lot is close by.  Lastly, we saved at least 75% in lodging cost.
Manager Response: Dear D7532SRichardj, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Aside from being near the Disneyland Area, we also are right next to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will pass on your good comments to my team, especially Oscar. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA and you need a place to stay, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Hey guys! I have been coming to Eden Roc for the past 2 years. The staff are truly helpful, especially Agnus and Lupe! The location is close to the Incredicoaster, easily walkable to the park! Every time I come to Eden Roc, the staff are so welcoming and manage to work with my request! Every time I come here, I liked specific rooms due to the layout and always request! They manage to always accommodate that request. The parking is included in the price which is a BIG win, from most hotels around the area always charging for parking. If you book their rooms, they also give you a 15% off code for the next time you book!  Stay at Eden Roc, you won‚Äôt regret!
Manager Response: Dear Chucky4821, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team was able to accommodate your request every time you come and stay with us. My team and I know that there are so many lodging places that you can go to in Anaheim , CA and I am glad that you always stay with us. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Just Got remodeled. They didn't think it through.
Summary: I now know why hotels don't have hard wood floors.  When this hotel was built the walls were thin. They didn't do anything to change that when they remodeled, and instead took out the only thing that dampens sound between rooms (Carpet).  Not only could we hear EVERY noise from the stairwell, but full conversations from the room next door, and every step to the room above.  Sleep was already hard to get because the mattresses were hard as a rock, the pillows actually lumpy, and the blanket so thin you could tell it was from "before"  They rooms look nice, but blankets, pillows, mattresses and towels missed the upgrade and we spent our trip with neck and back aches so bad we couldn't go on any rides.   Absolute nightmare.   The staff was nice and when we requested more blankets
Manager Response: none

Summary: I arrived late at night and the hostess was warm & welcoming.  The location from Disneyland was amazingly close and a shorter walk to the park than I planned. My room was spotless and more than I thought possible for the price!
Manager Response: Dear  Curious47552069879,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I will pass on your good comments to my welcome team and clean team. Not only are we close to Disneyland. We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center, Garden Walk, and Disney Walk. Please call us direct on your next visit to Anaheim, CA. Phone number is 714-663-8700.  See you soon.

Summary Heading: Our ‚Äúgo to‚Äù hotel when we are in Anaheim!
Summary: We have stayed here a couple times when we come to visit Disneyland. The staff is beyond kind! They held our bags for us before we could check in and on the last day after we checked out so that we could go to Disney without all of our things. The rooms are always spacious, clean and a great price for being only a 15 min walk to Disneyland. We will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Carissa E.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that every time you come and stay with us, we never disappoint you. Helpful staff and always a clean room. My team and I know that there are many hotels that you can choose from and I am glad that you selected Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Thank you for your loyalty. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. See you soon.

Summary: Nice over sized rooms, walk distance from the park, and restaurants. Thank you so much for taking care of us. Easy for us to come back and know we'd be taken care of.  You can see Disneyland fireworks close by.   Attention to details for sure.
Manager Response: Dear happytravel1630, Thank you for your five star rating.  My team and I work hard to make sure that our valued guest, like you , are given the best service and cleanliness. Yes, we are 10-15 min. walk to Disneyland and right next to the Convention Center. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: I stayed at Eden Roc for one night and I cannot say enough good things about the place. My room was clean, spacious, had lots of amenities (fridge, microwave, coffee maker) and looked brand new. The best part was the welcome though. Jinah at reception is an absolute gem! She was ever so gracious and helpful in accommodating my requests (I have allergies to strongly scented cleaning products and cannot have that in my room). I‚Äôll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear   F5482LLelisam,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will pass on your good comments to  Jinah.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: My daughter and I just had a 3 night stay. All the positive reviews are spot on. They basically took a Motel 6 type of property and modernized it with Hyatt styling. All new flooring, paint, trim and fixtures. Well lit and free parking too. The location to Disney could not be better without staying within Disney itself. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear 644Brad, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad you like the style of the room. My team and I work hard to keep and maintain the room. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will be waiting for you.

Summary Heading: Nice rooms and reasonable walk to Disney but...
Summary: Ten minute walk to downtown Disney at a good pace. Short security lines. Coco's restaurant is across the street.But horrible WiFi. Nearest convenience store is a long walk away. New construction next door can get noisy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked for our recent trip to Disneyland.  The rooms were updated and very clean.  Within walking distance to Disneyland.  Hotel was quiet, safe atmosphere, conveniently located by the parks and restaurants, accommodating to have rooms by other family.
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces576725, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Aside from Disneyland, we are also right next to the Anaheim convention Center. Garden Walk ,  etc. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: We love Eden Roc, the rooms are very clean and spacious and it's close to Disneyland.The staff are all very nice. This was our 4th time staying there within 3 years, we will only use this hotel when going to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Navigate02570433010,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Thank you for your loyalty. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will be waiting for  you.

Summary: Have stayed here at least 9 times and this time I was disappointed.  Arrived an hour early and there was a charge.  Phone in room didn't work.  Downstairs walls seem thinner.  Marijuana smell from outside.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel. Wonderful Staff!!! The location is ideal for any trip. I was able to walk to a wonderful restaurant very close only .2 miles away. I was also able to wake-up and take a swim in the pool before I had to leave for my meetings. I plan to return with my family next month. I would rec commend this hotel to my family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear HermanW253, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.
