My team and I will be waiting for you and your family.

Summary: Hotel was remodeled nicely. When we first walked into the room, you can smell (& see) how clean it was. It‚Äôs about a 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney (quicker pace). Staff was friendly & helpful. I‚Äôd definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Happiness31375736731, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. I will  pass on your good  comments to my clean team and greet team. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next visit to Anaheim, CA. We will see you soon.

Summary: The Eden Roc Inn accommodated our family of 4 perfectly.  The room was very clean and it was a very close and easy walk to the parks.  Having a refrigerator and microwave came in very handy for having snacks for the kids.  The parking was great and so nice not having to deal with the expensive parking and large parking lots.
Manager Response: Dear Carol I., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found the room clean. yes, we are close to the Disney park. And also five minutes away from the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disney walk. Next time you visit  Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Its literally right across the street from Disneyland, and walking distance to pretty much anything else you may need. To top it off, the manager Oscar is awesome. Very friendly informative and helpful. Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Aeroflight12, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, we are near Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center and Disney Walk. My staff and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: we happened to be there when a pipe was being fixed in the street right by the window so pretty noisy but we were at Disney most of day so not too much of a problem - created an early wake up -but very pleasant staff and i would go back again
Manager Response: Dear Roxy G., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay even though there was noise in  the street due to construction. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Loved that the floor was laminate and not carpet. My 4 year old son can‚Äôt walk, he is in a wheel chair and crawls. It was very well lit up and only about a 15 minute walk to Disney. I will definitely book here again.

Summary: The room was very nice, a lot better than the pictures. The staff was absolutely amazing! Very accommodating, wonderful service, Daisy made our stay so much better, definitely will be coming back! Excited for our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Guide39049810871, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you liked our room, better than the pictures. I will pass on your good comments to my team, especially to Daisy. On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: This was a great place to stay after a long day a Disneyland. All the hotels right next to the entrance of Disneyland were very expensive. The walk to the main gate was about 25 minutes to the hotel and since i was going to walk all day at Disney i just UBER and was less than $7. Luckily they still had rooms at this location, the price was reasonable and the rooms were very clean. I had the chance to see the room before i paid for it and i was impressed since it is a small hotel and you would think they do not have much to offer. They had a microwave, mini fridge, hair dryer, coffee maker and even a safe in the room that we could use for free! I definitely recommend this hotel. Plus the front desk rep help me with my language to the second floor since they do not have elevator
Manager Response: Dear  Mobile60121971794,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that  you not only found the price at Eden Roc Inn and Suites reasonable but it also Delivers excellence in service and in cleanliness. I will pass on your good comments to Guadalupe. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Edon Roc inn & Suites front desk representative Daisy Neri was so helpful, courteous & professional throughout my parties stay for the BlizzCON weekend. Great hotel which is reasonably priced & very close to the Anaheim convention center Daisy made our stay extra warm & welcoming. Thank you for everything.
Manager Response: Dear Flyer31151471560, Thank you for your five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am glad that Daisy was able to help you throughout your stay. I will pass on your good comments to Daisy. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Best place to hang with family or friends. Very chill clean and relaxing. I will come back again. Also they provide extra towels blankets and everything else I would ask for. Also I'm just writing now to fill the 200 characters
Manager Response: Dear Yit C, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you find Eden Roc Inn and Suites a place to hang out with family or friends. And that is a clean hotel . Yes, we try to accommodate our valued guests, like you, on things that will make their stay more comfortable. Please call us direct on your next viist to Anaheim, CA. Our phone number is 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Dank place. Staff was friendly and accommodated everything we asked including extra blankets, coffee, towels, pillows
Summary: Dank place. Staff was friendly and accommodated everything we asked including extra blankets, coffee, towels, pillows, parking, coffee creamer, tea. Would come back again. Super close to the Anaheim convention center for blizzcon as well.
Manager Response: Dear Justin P., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Yes, our team tries very hard  to make our guest feel comfortable  and feel at home until the duration of their stay. We will see you on the next Blizzcon or earlier. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We are twenty four hours open.

Summary: Great service, gave us everything we needed to enjoy the weekend.  100% recommendation. The parking really helped us get back and forth from the Anaheim convention center and not have it be a constant worry, thanks alot.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip46003372376, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, we are the very few hotels near Anaheim Convention Center or Disneyland area that offer the  Parking lot  for free. And very convenient in terms of location. There are also two nearby restaurants that offer 10% off  to all of our guests for breakfast, lunch or dinner . Just show the guest room keys before ordering. Next time you visit us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Stayed for a couple of days. It was great. Staff offic were friendly. Emmanuel, in particular, was the one who checked us in. The rooms were clean and spacious. However,the noise from a construction site ruins the mood as it starts as early as 7am. Nevertheless, it was not a bother as we woke up around 5am to prepare for disneyland. Despite the dismay coming from the noise, I would definitely  give them 5 stars still, as they had no fault or whatever. Great stay! we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Xia S., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that  you enjoyed your stay with us.  That you found our rooms clean and spacious.Unfortunately, the City of Anaheim, allows the construction of  the hotel to start at 7:00 A.M. I will surely pass on your good comments to Emmanuel. Next time you stay with us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will be waiting for you.

Summary: We stayed here for our disneyland trip and it was great! The staff were friendly! Thank you Emmanuel!! Only downside about our stay was the construction. They start exactly at 7 but not on the weekends.
Manager Response: Dear Kristelle R., Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. My apologies about the the noise from our neighboring hotel. Unfortunately, City of Anaheim, allows the construction to start at 7 in the morning. I will pass on your good comment to Emmanuel. Next time you stay with us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My staff and I will be waiting for you.

Summary Heading: Great choice for a Disneyland adventure
Summary: Planning a Disneyland trip from Nebraska can be a daunting task, needing to do everything remotely. However, our choice of the Eden Roc Inn and Suites was perfect. The hotel is very near Disneyland and the entrance to Downtown Disney. An easy walk.   The staff is friendly, efficient and professional. The rooms have been recently renovated, with all vinyl flooring, new fixtures and case goods. The guest rooms are far enough off the street that noise isn't a problem. There is a pool (you do pay a "resort fee"), which we didn't use - no time, plus the October temps were a little cool. The beds are comfortable, though the linens are showing some wear. A bit more attention could be made to cleaning, but it was acceptable.  Overall, this hotel is a great value for Disneyland or events
Manager Response: Dear Nebraska O., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you find your hotel, Eden Roc Inn and Suites, perfect. I will surely pass on your good comments to my clean team and the front desk team.  Thank you for your suggestions to better improve our service to our valued guest, like you.  My team and I know that there are many hotels to choose from in Anaheim, CA. And we are glad that you selected us. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will be waiting for you anytime.

Summary Heading: Basic hotel with a good location
Summary: Close to Disneyland - about a 15 minute walk through downtown Disney.    I really enjoyed my stay - yes, you can hear some road noise, but that was the loudest when I was not in the room.   Rooms are remodeled and for those that are paranoid about bed bugs (like me), very stark and streamlined, so there‚Äôs nowhere for the critters to hide.   Bed was comfy and each room had a small fridge and microwave.   I‚Äôd say this is a motel - you enter the room from the outside and there is no elevator to the second floor rooms.   There are no duvets, just a blanket and bed spread.   The hotel does not provide moisturizer, so bring your own. The toiletries supplied are 2 in 1 shampoo (so I had to go to target to get real shampoo and conditioner) and body wash which are in dispensers on the
Manager Response: Dear Sarah C. Thank you for giving us a four star rating.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. That you found the bed very comfortable. And the microwave and refrigerator helpful.  I will surely pass on your comments to my clean team  and to the front desk team so we can improve better.  Next time you visit  Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We are twenty four hours open. We will see you soon.,

Summary Heading: Disneyland Vacation a Bit of a Mess
Summary: We rented 3 rooms for 5 nights at Eden Roc. I reserved the rooms 5 months in advance and about a week after reservations were made decided to add an additional night. That went fine until I got to the 3rd room and there was sn error and it was giving me a much higher rate for the 3rd room. I emailed and called and was assured it was noted and would be fine. I‚Äôm going to start with the good: The rooms are clean and updated. Good water pressure comfortable beds and pillows. I have read complaints about the noise. That was not an issue at all. You do hear people outside occasionally but it‚Äôs not bad. The walk to Disneyland is great about 10 to 15 minutes in a safe and scenic area. We were traveling with 6 adults and 6 kids, 3 of the kids in strollers. You can see fireworks from the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place for a quick Disney trip
Summary: We were here for a 2 day disneyland trip and just needed a place to sleep basically. We arrived early and were able to leave our bags with staff until check in time while we went to the park. Easy, 15 minute walk to Disneyland going through downtown disney.   Looks like your standard motel style hotel from the outside. Parking spots are small but we were able to park our large truck with no problem.The room was nicely updated and very clean. We had a room near the street and could hear the traffic which didn't bother me at night but when we came back from Disneyland to nap during the day, it did. So I recommend a room away from the street. We enjoyed having coffee in our room in the morning and having a microwave to heat up the breakfast we brought with us.    2 complaints- both
Manager Response: Dear Coffeeluvinmom, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you liked the room in cleanliness and how it looked like.  Yes, we just recently changed our coffee maker and added more choices for  coffee and tea. I am glad that you enjoyed your coffee in your room. My apologies about the vending machines. Unfortunately, we need to close the vending machines until the vendors came to replace the products.  Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.  We will see you soon.

Summary: Arrived at the hotel 15 mins before check in and room wasn't ready. Had no place to store my baby's milk and had to change everyone in the car to go to Disneyland. Came back around 11 and room was barely ready. There was a stain on one of the sheets that looked like blood and the corners of the bed were sharp and hidden. Only good thing was that it was walking distance to Disneyland
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time staying here and was extremely impressed. The rooms are newly remodeled and very clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful as well. Special thank you to Oscar for making us feel welcomed upon arrival and making our stay here more enjoyable. Convenient location, short walk to Disneyland or about a $6 uber drive there.
Manager Response: Dear Char M., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you liked our room and that it was very clean. And the front desk team was friendly. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: The hotel states that it is across the street from California Adventure, which it is but to get into the park is probably about a mile walk from the hotel. So kind of deceiving. It looks a little sketchy from the outside but the inside of the rooms were surprisingly nice. There is no elevator that I saw to get us to our room and we had 2 kids in a stroller that we had to carry up stairs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a great value & convenient location. Within walking distance to Disneyland & several restaurants. One parking place included. Friendly staff.  Housekeeping did a great job. Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Regal1257,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Aside from Disneyland, we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center and two nearby restaurants, grocery stores and fitness center. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will be waiting for you.

Summary: My recent stay Eden Roc was effortless. I have stayed at several hotels in Anaheim for business trips and convention functions - few have been this simple. I was also pleased to find out that the hotel rooms had been recently renovated. Very nice property that I will be visiting again soon!  Thank you Oscar, Agnes, and Emmanuel for a great stay.

Summary: Most basic room one can get. Definitely get what was paid for. I enjoyed the room, but it was basic. Very thin walls, but that wasnt too much of an issue. Staff was friendly, hotel was easy to find off the freeway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came to vacation with a bunch of friends, and when got to the hotel was greeted with such kindness and attention! Will most definitely come again in the near future.

Summary: I recently stayed one night in this property for a conference at the Convention Center.It was clean and easy to access. Summary: I travel every month from Texas to California to visit family and this place will now be my home away from home while I am there. Summary: I stay here with my friends for disney. We love the clean rooms and and the great service! Shout out to emmanuel for making our stay great! üòò you‚Äôre the best. It was so near to disney and we would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Ellane G., Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team had given you great service and clean rooms. I will pass along to Emmanuel your good comments. On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Great service and it was very clean! Close to disney too. We went for a quick disney trip before summer ends and we stayed here and was surprised how clean it was. We were caught off guard especially from the person who checked us in his name is emmanuel. He was nice and very helpful. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Ellane G., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. I will mention your good comments to Emmanuel and to my clean team as well. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: I stayed there for business the last 2 nights. Rooms seemed new from the floors to the furniture etc. The staff was great and most importantly the Wi-Fi was amazing. The staff was very helpful in finding me a place to get my haircut as well. Will be back soon!!
Manager Response: Dear Crawford4141, Thank you for your nice comments about my staff. We renovated the rooms three years ago.My team and I work hard to maintain its "brand new" look.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Clean, comfortable room.  BUT - there is a HUGE construction site right next door, and it looks like that will be true for quite a long time to come.  I think the hotel owes its potential customers knowledge of this BEFORE we show up.  A small discount for the inconvenience would also be a fair expectation.  I was up early in the morning and not around during the day, so it didn't affect me a lot.  BUT - heavy construction work started by 7:00 and went on, I'm told, until at least 4:00.  This seems like a big deal to me.

I feel that I no longer can trust all the reviews here anymore.  For the sake of other travelers like me, I feel compelled to share my own experience so others can make more educated decisions.]  1. Eden Roc is sitting right in front of another hotel that is going through a MAJOR construction. Summary: I loved the price and was so excited for the proximity and all the reviews promised. It IS NOT a short walk to Disneyland. Plan 25 mins. The hotel is NOT across from an entrance. Big disappointment. Little pool with no lounge chairs. No breakfast of any kind. Has 2 restaurants really close within 50 yards. (Cocos & Tiffys) Very, very noisy hotel. Banging, cars beeping, construction nearby, fireworks, etc. Room was amazing but floor was filthy. Little parking and small spaces. All doors face outside and 2 levels high. Decent hotel, but if you‚Äôre picky, be careful.

Summary: We are a family of 6 and stayed in room 110 for our Disney trip. Great large closet and TV too, as well as a small fridge and microwave. May seem insignificant, but there were lots of lighting options - both beds had their own lights as well as two separate main room lights. Summary Heading: Comfortable, Clean Accommodations Close to Disney

Oscar, in particular, made a real effort to help make our stay enjoyable and pleasant.  The price was reasonable for the Disneyland neighborhood and was a very easy  walk to Downtown Disney and the monorail ride/entrance to the park; about .4 mile.  The hotel is next door to Tillys restaurant which is acceptable, and Coco's, which we thought was better.  There is no breakfast at the hotel, but there is a fridge in the room and a Target about a mile away if you want to stock up on breakfasty things on your own.  There is a $4 "resort" fee, which is a bit silly, since it is definitely not a "resort" by any stretch, but since they don't charge for

A lot of hotels charge $15-40 a night and if u decide to drive and park at Disney it‚Äôs another $20 so u could save $35+ a day. Summary Heading: Perfect for a quick Disney trip with kids!

Summary: Affordable clean room that looked nice.  Beds (including the hide a way bed) were comfortable.  Walking distance to Disney land.  Bathroom was standard shower/tub but very clean.   Everything worked well refrigerator, television and coffee maker. Most of our time was spent with Mickey Mouse but this was a nice room to come back to and sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Darkiris74, Thank you very much for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. Room , especially the  shower/tub, was very clean. My team and I work hard to give you the best in service and cleanliness. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA , call us direct. (714-663-8700). We will see you soon.

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel and we diffenitly stay again. Rooms are very clean a little loud upstairs but we managed. Although we had a great time at Disney our son was not feeling so well. Around 3am our son threw up on the bed, I called the front desk for fresh sheets and blankets. Virginia was very kind of bringing them to our room and taking the dirty ones out. Staff was very friendly checking in and checking out. There is no breakfast which would be very convenient.At check in we where informed that cocos and tiffys would give us 10% off our meal which was nice . Thanks for the pleasant stay we will be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Shortyy1989, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you chose Eden Roc Inn and Suites among the many hotels you can choose from In Anaheim, CA.  I will surely pass on your good comments to my welcome team and especially to Virginia. Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct. Our telephone number is 714-663-8700. My team and I will wait for you soon.

Summary Heading: Incredible location, great price, easy peasy
Summary: The property has been given a nice update (cosmetic at the least) so it looks and feels great. Beds are comfy, staff is friendly and helpful, and one thing that has really stuck out is they want you to enjoy your stay and come back. They offer a discount if you book directly through their site (instead of on Orbitz or whatever,) they offer a promo code for you to use on your second visit, and they are generous with their parking (unlike other, more expensive hotels nearby that are charging $25+ per night!) They even helped us out by letting us leave our car in the lot until the afternoon, since we were unsure whether we'd be heading home that night or booking another night at the hotel. That sounds like a small thing, but with two small children in tow (a 1 y/o and a 3 y/o) who
Manager Response: Dear  Jwinskowski, Wonderful to hear that my team was able to help you in all your needs. Yes, we are one of the few hotels that do not charge parking space until you checked out. I am glad that you found the beds comfortable and staff is friendly and helpful. Yes, my team and I work hard to deliver  excellence  in service and cleanliness.  We would like you to come back again and again as  you and your family is part of Eden Roc Inn and Suites family. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.  We will see you soon. Thank you for your nice review.

Summary Heading: poor service and didn't honor online reservation
Summary: I made a reservation for a family suite on the companies own website, complete with confirmed reservation number, then drove 9 hours only to be told that "we are oversold and don't have a room for you".  There was no apology or anything done to try to make it right, just a "you'll have to find somewhere else to stay".  I spent over an hour calling different hotels until I finally found a place over 6 miles away that had a room.  Very disappointing in their service.  If I had just not shown up, I can guarantee they would have charged my credit card - yet I can do nothing that they did not hold up their end of that agreement.  I wrote the manager the next day and never even received a response.  Will never be booking here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our second time to stay here but not our last.  The staff is always friendly and professional and the location makes it a great place to stay for any number of events in Anaheim, including Disneyland, the Convention Center and the House of Blues!
Manager Response: Dear Roxy A., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that every time you stay with us we do not disappoint you. We will work harder so we will maintain it this way.  We appreciate your loyalty. Please call us direct (714-663-8700) on your next visit.

Summary: I have been coming to this hotel for the past few years I do not like to stay anywhere else when I am in the Area of Anaheim. They have free parking but only for one car max. They have a coffee maker, micro and mini fridge which helps he a lot with the snacks and food I bring. I wish their pool was heated though that would make it even better. The staff is great Oscar and Lupe are always nice to me. They already know what rooms I prefer away from street noise. Prices are very fair compared to what they offer I cannot complain. What I love the most is that they are a non smoking hotel since I hate the smoke smell and no pet allowed because I am allergic.
Manager Response: Dear SantosFamily2016, Thank you for  your loyalty and for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that the amenities we have in the room worked for you. In addition, there is a safe installed in each room. I will surely pass on your good comments to Oscar and Lupe.  Nice time you booked with us, call us directly at 714-663-8700.  We will be waiting for your next visit.

Summary: This place was very clean. It had a refrigerator and a microwave in the room. It is located on the corner near the Convention Center so no need to pay for parking. It is a 6 minute walk not having to cross any streets. It is also very close to Disney parks and restaurants. Very affordable as well. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear MelaniehI7929UG, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I will pass on your good comments to my clean team. Yes, Parking is free .  Please call us direct next time you visit   Anaheim, CA.  Our telephone number is 714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary: I was amazed of how clean the rooms was. The wood floor was very clean and shiny. Very confortable beds and pillows I definitely recommended it. I booked a family suite for 6 people and was very specious they gave me extra blankets and pillows and were very nice to me. Lupe the front desk girl was very attentive with us. It is also very convenient place to stay if you are going to Disney. Nice area and very safe. Loved it.
Manager Response: Dear  Hernandez_R, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that you loved  your stay with us. Clean and spacious room and attentive staff. WE are not only near Disneyland but we  are also next  the Anaheim Convention Center. There are also walking distance restaurants. Coco's and Tiffy's give 10% off , breakfast, lunch or dinner. Just  show your guest room key.  There are also nearby groceries, laundromat, car wash, etc.  I will relay your good  comments to Lupe.   Next time you visit Anaheim, CA,  please call us direct. (714-663-8700). We will see you soon.

Summary: I checked in for a 4-day stay.  At check-in on Thursday I said I didn't want maid service for my stay.  Friday morning I put the Do Not Disturb sign on my door.  Friday night I came back and the sign was gone and my room had been cleaned.  I called the front desk and they said they would take care of it.  I was never given a new Do Not Disturb sign.  Sunday I came back to my room just before 5pm and within minutes I had a knock on the door from Housekeeping.  I spoke to the desk clerk about this when I checked out on Monday.  He said he would note it for the manager and gave me a business card.  It's been over a week now and no one has called and I've sent 3 emails with no reply.  Otherwise my stay was fine, but this was frustrating and annoying.
Manager Response: none

Summary: All the hotels near the area are a lot more expensive than Eden Roc and even though they do not offer breakfast options, they have in room microwave and mini fridge that fulfilled our traveling needs.  It was recently renovated, very clean and a 10 minute walk to the parks. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Martha Gaxiola, Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found Eden Roc Inn and Suites as the best value hotel. Price is right and  clean room. Next time that you visit Anaheim, please call us direct 714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: I enjoyed once again EDEN ROC's Service
Summary: I stayed again in Eden Roc Hotel to attend this year's RELIGIOUS EDUCATION CONGRESS. For me this hotel has a strategic location. It is so near the Anaheim Convention Center, near restaurants and the famous disneyland. This year since I am in charge of our booth in the Congress, I needed to transport many materials to our booth site. The hotel is just beside the entrance of the Convention back, where you can transport. It was so easy for me and besides you can even just carry the boxes to the booth without paying entrance of $16 per car. As, always, the room I am in room 109 is a suite. It is good for 3 persons. I wanted to stay alone but at the last moment some of my friends wanted to join the congress and helped me in the booth, I needed another room. No need of another room,
Manager Response: Dear Rene P. Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team has  consistently delivered excellent service each year you spent your nights with us  at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, our suites are big and spacious. It has 2 queen beds and a sofa bed. And It can accommodate up to 6 people.  I am glad that my welcome team was very helpful and accommodating. It is like you , our valued guest, that we constantly strive to work harder to deliver excellent service and clean room. Thank you for your loyalty.  We will see you soon. Eden Roc Inn and Suites, your second home, is waiting for you. ANYTIME!!!!

Summary: Our family stayed here from March 18 to 24, 2018 and it was the best experience ever as it was clean, modern, fast check-in service, good and friendly staff.  What you see in their online pictures is what you get.  For people with any breathing health problems this is the best place to stay because no carpets and clean!  Means a lot to our family.  Plus, it is just across the street from the Disneyland and on days we attended other theme parks we could always watch the fireworks from the parking lot.  There are two really nice places to eat right behind the Inn and across the street also.  There is a big grocery store just a few blocks down the street and a laundry mat too which came in handy for our trip.  We truly enjoyed staying at this Inn and so appreciated how we were
Manager Response: Dear Patricia M., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I always work hard to strive Excellent in cleanliness and Excellent in service. I am glad that you have experiencede both during your stay with us. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites are near in everything. Walking distance to Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland Areas. Parking here is free. Unlike, in other nearby hotels, they charge parking fee.  We are also near Knott's Berry Farm and the Angel Stadium, to name a few. Yes, there are 2 nearby restaurants and they give you 10% off for breakfast, lunch and dinner if you mentioned that you are a guest at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. My team and I are glad that we are part of your awesome memories. Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct (714-663-8700). We cannot wait to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Thanks for the beautiful stay.... staff was excellent !!!! Will definitely come back to same hotel üòÅüòÅüòÅ
Summary: Was an AMAZING experience and was super close to Disney land.  Me and my family will definitely return over and over again!  Wanna do a special shout out to Emmanuel was always there to take care of me answered the phone and was super nice and courteous
Manager Response: Dear Bruceleeroy187, Thank you for your kind remarks and for the five star rating. I will surely pass on your good comments to Emmanuel. I am glad that Emmanuel took good care of you and your family.  Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. Thank you for your loyalty.  We will see you soon.

Summary: stayed for a convention and it was the best place to stay and closest to the convention center.   Prices are much better than the big hotels and we were MUCH closer to the center.   Nice rooms, great staff,  but note, there is no restaurant on site   other than that wonderful
Manager Response: Dear Raymond S.  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. My team and I work hard to ensure that you have a pleasant and comfortable stay. And a great staff. Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  See you soon.

Summary: This may not be the typical review because we ended up not staying because of a mistake i had made in not reading all of the fine print while booking. We drove 2 cars and the manager said they only allow 1 car to park at their hotel. He said if they were not sold out he would have let me park another car. I was immediately irrerated but he was very helpful and nice and though it was passed the timeline to recieve a refund he offered without even being asked. He gave us a full refund and was so nice. We would stay here again and fully try this location out again purely for the fact that he handled our little misshap so professionally. The part i did see was a nice clean lobby, clean pool area, and clean lobby bathroom! Thank you Oscar for helping us that day! We will be back with
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient, clean, and family friendly!!! Perfect!!!
Summary: We love our weekend stay here. Their rooms are big, beautiful and so clean. No carpet, which I love for my kids with asthma. Close to Disneyland and Anaheim convention center. Food places are very close.
Manager Response: Dear Rochelle, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to my clean team. Next time you visit us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Great family friendly hotel!!! Loved it!!! Friendly service!! Clean and comfortable .. I would definitely recommend it to friends and family and walking distance to Disney land and so close to the restaurant in the area..üëçüèºüëçüèº
Manager Response: Dear Karen H. Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. Next time you are ready to visit Eden Roc Inn and Suites, please call us directly at 714-663-8700. My team and I will be waiting for you.

Summary: Friendly and very nice people. The rooms are really nice. Right next to Disneyland so very convenient, walking distance from convention center as well. I would stay here again and it's very family friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa R., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. It is nice to hear from a valued guest , like you, that you enjoyed your stay here. The friendliness of our staff and that we are very family friendly. Please call us direct at 714-663-8700 on your next stay.

Summary: Very good service love it will come back soon.. service amazing  very close to convention and Disneyland üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç Will recommended to all my friends and family.  See you next year or maybe earlier.üòçüòçüëçüëçüëç
Manager Response: Dear Alba H. Thank you for your five star rating. I am glad that you are happy with the service from my team members. We cannot wait for you and your family to visit us. On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: Perfect accommodation recently refurbished, beautiful rooms. Just a 10 minute stroll to the Disney parks. Easy to find just off the main road, with free parking. Would highly recommend and it is  reasonably priced as well.
Manager Response: Dear John P. Thank you for giving us a five star rating. We are glad that you were happy with your accommodation and the beautiful room you had. Thank you for recommending Eden Roc  Inn & Suites. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Close to Downtown Disney, lots of traffic and neighbor noise
Summary: Eden Roc worked well enough for us because we were rarely in the room and brought earplugs so we could sleep.  Our room was nicely upgraded and comfortable, and there was a fridge and microwave as promised.  But the property is an old style motel and it looks like it.  It is right on a busy street and the room would shake slightly when a big truck went by.  Neighbors dragging rolling suitcases down the cement walkways at hours created a lot of noise.  The parking was narrow and difficult to get in and out of.  The WiFi was an exercise in frustration, with the gateway resetting every 10 to 20 minutes - could barely check email let alone watch a movie.  Despite a resort fee, there are absolutely no amenities - no breakfast, no hot tub, no exercise equipment.  The biggest positive
Manager Response: none

Summary: Eden Roc was a great hotel to stay in, we have four small children and stayed in their spacious suite. We had a 4-day stay over spring break. The room was very large and was able to accommodate all 6 of us. The room was also extremely clean and the rooms looked exactly like they are pictured. The proximity to Disneyland is great! It is within walking distance to Downtown Disney where the security lines are shorter and used the monorail to get in and out of the park. I would definitely stay here again, we had a great overall experience and we were pleased with our stay.   -The Clark Family
Manager Response: Dear Ivetteclark1110, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you and your family  enjoyed your stay with us. I am glad that you enjoyed the clean and spacious suite. Yes, we are a walking distance to Disneyland and to the Anaheim Convention Center. Next time, you stay with us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for three nights during spring break and couldn't be happier with everything this hotel had to offer. The hotel's location can't be beat. Just walking distance from Disney's parks entrances and has plenty of restaurants nearby. The rooms were clean and look just like the pictures. Will recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear A9613BCcarlosm, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. Yes, we are walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. In addition, there are many restaurants. laundrymat and grocery stores nearby. Coco's and Tiffy's Restaurant which are right next to us offer 10% off for breakfast, lunch and dinner to all our valued guests here.  Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.

Summary Heading: Best hotel anywhere!! We will definitely come back!
Summary: Wow! Just wow! The rooms were beautiful and the people were so amazing! We have a family of 6 and most hotels require us to rent their most expensive room, but this hotel fit us perfectly! The rooms are also big enough for your strollers and car seats and all the other fun things that come when traveling with children. If you‚Äôre heading to Disneyland, this is probably the closest non-Disney hotel. We could walk there in about 10 minutes.   My only complaint would be the noise. It is very near to a busy road and you will hear the road noise. I would also recommend requesting an upper floor room. Our upstairs neighbors were pretty loud all night and we could hear everything. All that said though, this will be where we stay when we come to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Justinandlindseyk, Wow!! what a great review. Yes, our suite is big and spacious. And of Good Value. I will surely pass on your good comments to my team. My team and I know that there are many hotels in Anaheim that you can choose from and we are glad that you selected us. Thank you for your loyalty and making us the Best  Hotel anywhere. Next time you stay with us, please call us direct at 714-663-8700. See you soon.

Summary: Stayed at Eden roc for 2 days.  The front desk was incompetent.  It took about 1 hour to check in.  We were charged "resort fees" and there is nothing.  No food.  No exercise area.  Not even a coffee machine.  The rooms are like a motel with doors opening outside.  Lots of road noise and outside noise.  Several other rooms had similiar experiences.  The Eden roc price gouged and charged $500/night for $69 room just because of the natural foods expowest conference.  The owners should be ashamed.  My group will not be staying there again due to the horrible experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We area a family of 4, my kids have 12 and 9 yo. Perfect distance to walk to Disney Parks. The rooms are clean and comfortable.  Close to convenience stores so you can manage your breakfast or late snacks.Good choice!!
Manager Response: Dear Melissa C. Thank you for your five star rating. Yes we are near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. In addition, there are also nearby restaurants and grocery stores. Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct at 714-663-8700.We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and SO close Disneyland Resort
Summary: We spent two nights at the Eden Roc recently with our 3 year old twins.  The hotel isn't fancy, but it's clean, comfortable and everything was in great condition.  The staff was very friendly and helpful as well.  The only drawback was that we heard traffic noise from the busy intersection once in a while.  Perhaps the rooms farther from the intersection are quieter.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Eden Roc Inn & Suites was perfect for our weekend stay and visit to Disneyland.  There were six of us (3 adults, 1 teenager, a 3yr old and a 1 yr old).  It was close enough to easily walk to the park without having to pay for parking and waiting in line for the tram.  The rooms were clean and recently updated.  We will absolutely stay at the Eden Roc again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved our stay at Eden Roc, walking distance to Disneyland is a plus. The room was big and clean. We never heard our neighbors or anything for that matter. We will be coming back next year. Prices are great. This hotel room is must if your are traveling to Disneyland!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our only compliant would be the "queen" beds felt more like a full.  Other than that the room was comfortable and very clean.  When we pulled up to check in there was a guy outside sanitizing and wiping down all the railings.  Love a clean hotel!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Eden Roc is located very close to Disneyland and there is a great restaurant right at the corner of the property.  The staff helped us with a downstairs room, which was very important to us because of walking problems.  The tram to Disneyland entrances pickup spot is at the corner of the property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed her before it became Eden Roc and it was a real dive. They have done an amazing job on their remodel. The family size room is HUGE. But even the 2q is good size. They offer free parking when most don't. It is a bit of a walk to park though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the second time we stayed here. I like the close proximity to the Disneyland Resort. The cool thing is you can get through security at Downtown Disney which is A LOT faster than the Harbor entrance. Also, if you go through Downtown Disney, you can take the Monorail and bypass the main entrance gates.   The rooms are pretty nice but the bed felt like I was sleeping on a slab of granite. The good thing is I was so tired on the second night that I was able to sleep better.   The walls are pretty thin and it sounded like the people upstairs were bowling. I actually though about going up there to see what it was.   The front desk was very nice and they have a decent size room that could be used for breakfast someday. Also, parking was $4, so that is a great deal.   I will
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a great time taking our five grandchildren ages 6-15 yrs to Disneyland. We stayed from Wednesday through Saturday. On our short fifteen minute walk to Disney each day we stopped at Cocos for breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was conveniently located near everything I needed; business, food, entertainment. The people were great and the room was clean and comfortable! When I needed any help, it was provided. I would recommend The Rock Eden in Anaheim!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great for families and easy access to downtown Disneyland. Really clean and updated rooms. We stayed in the family suite and was very spacious.. lots of room for my 16 month old to run around. And the floors are not carpeted!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The room was nice and clean.
Summary: The room was nice and clean. The only problem I think it's the noise for the second floor. If you stay in ground floor, it's better that you are not afraid of the noise from the upper floor. I think that this is the only drawback.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked the family suite, which was very spacious and looked amazing. Very clean, affordable, friendly. Had no complaints. Everything you need and close to Disneyland. If you decide to walk it's about 15mins.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: it was ok no frills newly remodeled
Summary: overall had a good stay with the family for two nights...10-15min walk downtown disney...close to food and chinese delivery food until 2am,,,$2 delivery charge and $20 minimum order..good stuff after a long day at disneyland...bed was ok and the only downside is its facing the street...so if you are light sleeper, this is not for you...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Large room, great home base for Disneyland holiday
Summary: The room we were in was huge. It was also very clean. There was definitely a lot of room for our kids. The location was also perfect as it is just across the south end of the Disney California Adventure park. There is stricter security now going in to the Grand California, so the walk to the park entrance is now longer. It is still quite a reasonable and leisurely walk, though. This is a great value accommodation.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Emmanuel - Great property even better employee
Summary: We have stayed at the Eden Roc since the 70s and have always enjoyed it. It is always clean and accomodating. The past couple of times Emmanuel has assisted us with our reservations and stay. This morning I was in the office for an hour or so (writing and meditating) and I was able to observe his interactions with customers and other employees. He was outstanding! It was a joy to watch someone so caring and compassionate and with such a great work ethic (whenever he had a spare moment he was cleaning the office). With the care he took with everyone and everything you would think he was the owner! If the Eden Roc can continue to get employees like Emmanuel they will continue to be a success. Emmanuel will be a success in everything that he does. Thank you so much, Emmanuel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Close to Anaheim Concention center otherwise not please
Summary: The place looks like a motel from the outside which is fine. The inside was decent but The AC was difficult to figure out and keep alternately blowing cold and hot air all day/night. I might have been able to get staff to fix it but I was in and out all the time with my conference. My biggest complaint is that I could hear EVERYTHING that was going on outside (including conversations in the parking lot). I don't need to hear which ride everyone wants to ride first. Also, the staff when I checked in was incredibly unhelpful. Apparently I needed a parking permit which they did not tell me or provide to me so a couple of days later I got a note on my car threatening to tow. My anxiety could have been avoided had they given me the permit upon check-in. The positives are that its a
Manager Response: none

Summary: Redone. They could have replaced the beds for something more comfortable and insulated the windows for less noice. For the price it was ok. We won‚Äôt be staying there again but if you‚Äôre on a budget or less sensitive to a soft bed it wasn‚Äôt bad.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great if you like lumpy beds and dirty floors
Summary: This was the worst hotel I've ever stayed in. Felt like a Motel 8. Don't let the cheap remodel fool you. Everything was DIRTY and uncomfortable! The bathtub had dirt coming up from the drain and the bathroom smelled.  My bed actually was tilted from the sagging...my 13 year old had such a hard time sleeping he was exhausted when we got to Disneyland (which is about a 20 minute walk.) His back hurt, too.  If you want to get this hotel because of the convenience, just forget it. Get a hotel with free breakfast and a shuttle to the park and you won't regret it.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room for a great price!
Summary: I‚Äôve stayed here twice since the fantastic renovation, and love the place.  I‚Äôll be back for sure.  They let me park early so I could head over to Disneyland.   I was disappointed that they wanted the full $19.99 early check-in price even though I was only about 45 mins early (2:15pm).  I think as a returning customer they should have ‚Äúcomped‚Äù the 45 mins.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Checked in 12/11 for 1 night stay and gentleman was extremely nice, knowledgeable and efficient. Room was clean and spotless and as a housekeeping manager this doesn‚Äôt happen to me much. Went to FD to request a few items and the young lady at the Front desk was extremely nice and made you feel at home!! Cuddos to the frat staff and these people should be recognized!
Manager Response: Dear  hotel504, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Compliments coming from you  and also, is a part of the hotel industry is very much appreciated. I will pass them on to my team especially to the cleaning team. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA, please call us direct. The tel. number here is 714-663-8700. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Need To Clean Up Your Act
Summary: Had to Clean my guest room with Clorox wipes. Floors dirty. Door jams, knobs, and coffee maker, filthy. No shampoo, etc. only soap. Thin walls. Parking issues. Staff friendly, but not always at the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear julster2017, On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. We are going green so we had two dispensers mounted on the wall by the bath tub. One for the conditioning shampoo and the other for the body wash. In addition to the soap provided  in the room. Thank you for your feedback and we will surely use them to improve. I hope you will give us another chance to stay with us on your next visit to Anaheim, CA. We will see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here many years ago on our first trip to Disney. Horrible Hotel.... glad we gave Eden Roc a second chance, the upgrades are perfect, clean and roomy. Great spot near Disney, Downtown Disney and restaurants. Unfortunately, besides WiFi and pool there isn‚Äôt much else to offer. For longer stays consider a hotel with breakfast & maybe exercise and laundry room.
Manager Response: Dear  Mamatp2017, Thank you for giving us a four star rating.  After so many years,  I am glad that you gave us a second chance to stay with us and you  liked the upgrades in the room. Thank you for your suggestions as well. Next time you decide to come back and visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct. (714-663-8700). We will see you soon.

Summary: We arrived at around 10 and eager to get into Disneyland park, luckily for us the hotel is only about a fifteen minute walk to the front gates of the park itself and offered us a bathroom to freshen up in and to hold our luggage until we got back and our room was ready. This motel is very close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. The room was very clean and I loved the renovated rooms and how there was no carpet! The bathroom was maybe a little small, but I had no complaints. A very good, simple hotel for families wanting their hotel to be a place just to sleep at night.
Manager Response: Dear 255HC26, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and that you loved the renovated room and the cleanliness as well.  Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct 714-663-8700. We will see you soon.

Summary: Hotel room was very spacious and clean, the only reason we are giving it an average rating rather than above average is that we stayed for a week and there are no laundry facilities making it inconvenient when traveling as a family, also the kids were disappointed that the  pool was not very clean, no coffee in the lobby and only tiny cheap coffee packet with the room, so you have to go out for a cup if you want one. Not deal breakers just a bit inconvenient for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 3 star rating on our hotel and all of the compliments. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: This is the fourth year in a row that I have stayed at the Eden Roc Inn, each year I am glad that I chose it. Over these four years they have been making upgrades and it really shows. It is really close to not only Disneyland but also the convention center. Only issue that I have is that I can't book my room for next November yet.
Manager Response: Thank you shinomu16 for the 4 star rating and all of the nice comments. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are a repeat guest. We are looking forward to you staying with us a fifth time.

Summary: If you‚Äôre looking for a budget friendly fun little motel, then this is the place. My wife and I wanted to try this place based on the photos and reviews and it met all our expectations. Nice little lobby, always parking available, updated comfortable rooms and close proximity to not only Disneyland but lots of dining options. I would recommend and definitely stay again.
Manager Response: JoshMedina, thank you for the 5 star rating and all of the nice comments. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests as we want you to enjoy your stay and come back. We are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: This is my go to hotel for Disneyland always.  We take a trip to Disneyland roughly 5 times a year and will only stay here!  Clean rooms, free parking, nice staff, great room rates and perfect location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating estyro and all of the nice comments. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests as we want you to enjoy your stay with us and want to stay with us again. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel was absolutely perfect for our little family Disney trip! It took us about 10 minutes to walk to the park from the hotel, it was super clean and accommodating, and it was dirt cheap! I was so impressed! This will definitely be where we stay for all our trips to Disney!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and all of the nice comments. we are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very noisy hotel and not very clean. For the price I paid for this room, I expected a little more. The air conditioner smelled like there was mildew in it, and was hair all over the bathroom floor (not mine). The only good thing about this hotel is that it‚Äôs right across the street from Disneyland.
Manager Response: First let us apologize for your room not being clean. This is not something we accept at our hotels and has been brought to the attention of the appropriate department. I hope you will give us another chance as we strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests.

Summary: Nicely remodeled.  Extremely clean and comfortable.  Walking distance to Disneyland.  Would stay again. Coco's across st. great family place to eat.  Get 10 percent discount when staying at hotel Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and all of the wonderful compliments. we are very glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This hotel is a short walk to the Disneyland Downtown Disney entrance, and then into the parks. Maybe about 15 minutes max. Nice newly refurbed rooms! Good value for money. The bedding was a bit thin and low quality on the bed, but apart from that - great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments. We arte so glad you enjoyed your trip and time staying with us. We are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: We've been going here for the last ten years. All I can say is-WOW.  Nice update. The staff was very helpful. While the rooms have been nicely remodeled, the parking is still very tight. On two nights we returned after the park closed and wound up parking in the driveway! Made me nervous but worked out fine. As a side note, a small table would be a nice addition to the family suites. Disney has closed off the FREE parking sites and we had trouble accessing the Mickey & Friend parking structure from Katella so we just went up to Ball via Walnut.
Manager Response: Thank you for all of the wonderful comments and the 4 star rating on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are very glad you liked the upgrades we did and we are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Close enough to walk to the parks
Summary: Great stay at Eden Roc at a very affordable price. Rooms are beautiful, nicely renovated. Nice mini fridge and plenty of space to store luggage and food items. 10-12 minute walk through downtown Disney to the parks - our kids didn‚Äôt mind the walk (until it was time to go back at the end of a long day). Free parking was a huge bonus!   Didn‚Äôt like that there was only one ice machine for the entire complex - it was far away and often empty. Only other complaint was that housekeeping wouldn‚Äôt get to our room until late afternoon (2-4pm) when we wanted to be napping on our break from Disney. This meant one day we didn‚Äôt get service or fresh towels. Minor complaints really.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the wonderful compliments. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Decided to go last minute to Disneyland. I am very picky on where I stay, even if it just for a few hours for 1 night. I researched and read reviews and settled on this one. The price was decent. We called ahead to ask if we could check in early. They didn't have anything, but we were able to use their lobby bathroom to freshen up. Then they allowed us to park there while we went to the park. The rooms were surprisingly big and updated. Everything was clean and they had a microwave and mini fridge in it. The walk to Downtown Disney was quick and easy. They also were nice enough to let us stay parked there after we checked out, while we went to the park. It is probably one of the nicer hotels that we have ever stayed at, that was a decent price and within walking distance. Will
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and all of the wonderful compliments about our hotel and staff. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Overnight for DL and DCA visit
Summary: The room we had we fine for our needs, clean, up to date, space was good.  What wasn't good was the family above us who came in very late, woke up very early and must have been playing football up there as I don't understand why anyone needs to walk and run so much in a hotel room!  Where the heck are you going?  Do yourself a favor and get a 2nd room floor if you can!  Also with the new security at the parks the walk while not awful, isn't as short as it used to be so be prepared for a bit of a "hike" having to go down the street then away from the parks entering Downtown Disneyland by their hotels in order to get in.  It didn't appear you can enter the park from The Grand Californian, unless you're a guest there, as you used to be able to a few years ago, but someone correct
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and all of the nice things you had to say. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to you staying with us gain.

Summary: This was the second time we stayed at Eden Roc and it was just as good as the first time! The hotel staff is amazing, they are quick to help and incredibly polite. The room and surrounding areas were clean and tidy. Its within a few minute walk from Downtown Disney and the gates, this is a great hotel and you really get a bang for your buck. We will for sure stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you love staying at our hotel tiffanychambers86 and we want to thank you for the compliments on our hotel and our staff. We are looking forward to you staying with just again.

Summary: It's been a few years since we have stayed here. Before the remodel it was ok, just a place to stay. But wow, this place has changed. It's  awesome,  very inviting and a total night and day transformation. The staff is awesome and very helpful.
Manager Response: gary148, I want to thank you for the great compliments on our hotel and staff. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Great hotel. Great price. Super clean. You get free coffee, no tea. hair dryer. shower had good water pressure, but no detachable water thing. They have a place that will deliver food beer and wine for free which is cool, you pay for food. Floors were wood or composite no carpet. The rooms were huge. Feel like they should have had more stuff in the room or something.   Anyways loved it...
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel Craig M. and the compliments on our hotel. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: We had a wonderful time staying at the Eden Roc Inn & Suites!  It nicely centralize in Anaheim and the staff is AMAZING : ) Oscar provided excellent customer service during our stay and carefully ensured that my family's visit was perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and all of the great compliments about our hotel and staff. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and we are looking to you staying with us again.

Summary: Lovely hotel to stay in for a short time, I stayed here for 3 nights whilst visiting disneyland. It is in a good, safe location about 10-15 mins walk to disney or 5 mins drive away! 5 mins walk away from a denny too, yum yum! We had a good size room with a king sized bed (really comfy), in the room there was a tv (lots of channels), microwave, fridge, charging ports, desk, wardrobe, iron and ironing board, bathroom with a shower bath, toilet and then sink and mirror, there is a hairdryer included. Very good AC machine. Room was very clean and cleaned every day! The only issue was that the AC machine was quite loud but apart from that everything was perfect! Would stay here again and definitely recommend to anyone coming to disney or the convention centre.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and compliments on our hotel and staff. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Clean room, friendly and helpful staff, quiet accommodations, close to Disneyland and California Adventure. We have stayed here for the past 4 years each time we go to Disneyland, and we have always been satisfied.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the compliments on our hotel and staff. It is always a pleasure to hear someone enjoyed their stay and we are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Shh dont let everyone except those that write great reviews return so we can have this hotel when we return. Amazing quality for small hotel with wonderful staff. Apprecited the discount to local restaurant but that beautiful dining area is being wasted by not serving at least a continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you Marge D for the wonderful compliments on our hotel and staff plus the 5 star rating. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation pleas call us directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Great budget hotel overall. The thermostat was a little bit funky - it took too long to respond to temperature changes and the beds were killer hard.  BUT it was roomy, clean and the staff were very responsive and polite.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us ChristinelD3418TV. I apologize about the issue you had with the thermostat and the beds being extremely hard. Both of these issues have been brought to the attention of the appropriate department and are being handled. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Our family room was large and nicely decorated. Only problem was the maid service. They never showed one day. Had a similar experience on another stay there. The pool wasn't always available too.Front desk was very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the compliments on our staff and hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: I loved the remodeled rooms.  They are very nice!  The beds were incredibly comfortable and the staff was very nice.  I really wish that they would have had more than one ice machine in the location.  It was very far from our room, and kind of a pain.  I also wish they had an option for some type of breakfast. If they had a breakfast along with all the new remodeling it would be the perfect spot!  I love that it was off the main drag so there wasn't nearly as much traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you carissab271 for all of the wonderful compliments on our hotel and staff. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Room was clean. Beds were comfortable. Super short walk to downtown Disney. If you are taking a vacation anytime soon, you won't find a hotel as affordable and as close to Disney as Eden Roc. The staff is very friendly and the rooms are great.
Manager Response: Jeremy W, thank you for all of the nice things you had to say about our staff and hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary Heading: NIce Place Within Walking Distance of Disneyland
Summary: This place was very close to Disneyland and had convenient amenities such as a refrigerator and microwave.  The bathroom was spotless, and there was a nice-size closet.  With hardwood-type floors, it seemed very clean.  The pool was not open for very long hours, and there was no jacuzzi.  Also many places offer free breakfast, and Eden Roc did not. But overall, this was a good stay, and I'd stay again.  (There is a strict one-car-per-room policy.)
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and compliments on our hotel. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. I understand the disappointment in us not serving breakfast but with the various restaurants near us there are numerous places to eat. We look forward to you staying with again.

Summary: Fantastic helpful staff, the room was large and easily accommodated 4 people, all the amenities were well kept in the room with fridge available for drinks.  Very affordable and close to Disney for families on a budget.  I recommend to all that are looking for a very clean, well maintained place to stay.  John Carabatsakis
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and all of the wonderful compliments. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: We always stay at eden roc, it's about a 7 min walk to downtown Disney. It's clean with large rooms and ample outlets! The staff is friendly and always there to help. We stayed here at least 4 times in the last year!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the compliments on our hotel and staff. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are lookign forward to your next visit.

Summary: This was a great place to start stay! It was super clean and no problems what so ever with anything! It was a really easy and fast walk to Disneyland park and downtown where the store were, not to far from a breakfast place which was fantastic!
Manager Response: joserJ6295YO, thank you for the great rating and all of the wonderful comments. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: I travelled to Disneyland with my son, daughter-in-law and 2 1/2 year old grandson. We stayed in one of their rooms that has a second tiny bedroom space, great for putting little ones to bed. The beds are comfortable and the pillows are good. Everything was nice and clean. Nice shower with good water pressure and consistent temperature. Bathroom vanity area was way too small for more than one person to get ready at the same time. The staff is very nice and super helpful. Closets are roomy and I had no trouble getting extra hangers from the front desk. The A/C unit was noisy and did not have a continuous "fan only" setting so every time it cycled on it woke us up through the night. They've changed their system since we stayed their last time, it would be nice to have the "fan
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and the compliments on our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We were greeted by friendly and helpful staff upon arrival.  Our room was spacious and nicely updated.  Being within walking distance to Disneyland was our top priority.  This location was the perfect pick!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the wonderful compliments about our staff and hotel. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: They are close enough that it's an easy walk to Disneyland. You can tell by the style of the room that it's an older hotel but it's been nicely remodeled. They also have a ticket broker that gets you a discount on Disneyland tickets.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This was my first stay here. It is on S. West St, off of Katella. It was very clean. My wife booked the family room which has 2 queen beds, a sofa sleeper, and plenty of room left over. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The walk to Downtown Disney is just across the street and only about 10 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the wonderful compliments about our hotel and staff. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a great stay here. The staff was very helpful. The renovated rooms are very nice, clean, the beds are comfortable, and the location is so close to Disneyland. We could hear the fireworks and see the Ferris Wheel from California Adventure.  We took uber and it was $7 bucks ride but it is easily walk-able. We cut our visit short and  we were refunded the difference. Hector in the front desk was so helpful. We enjoyed our stay and I would highly recommend this hotel for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and our looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, and close to Disney!
Summary: The rooms are very clean! I stay here every time I go to Disney every couple months! The staff is friendly and willing to help you with whatever you need. Very close to Disney, about a 15 minute walk. The rooms seemed to be updated... nice floors, beds, bathrooms, tv, cabinets, etc. Beds are comfortable! Definitely worth my money! The only thing I would say is to have the housekeeping come earlier. When I go back to my room to relax for a bit before going back to the parks, housekeeping hasn't even touched my room and it's about 3pm!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the great compliments. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary Heading: We have used the place a few times - Really good BUT
Summary: We have been here a few times.  We like the location, it is clean, we always find parking and there is only one issue we have is that the room as large as it is completely lacks drawers. For the one nigh stay person this is not an issue but we typically stay multiple nights and with a few people and there are only 2 draws, almost too small for one person. I would definitely suggest using some wall space for a dresser which would provide counter top space(really missing also) and storage for clothes so you are not living out of a suitcase. If they changed this I would give it a 4.  Making it a 5 would have to have it include some sort of continental breakfast.  So if you are looking for clean and safe - definitely this is a great place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 3 star rating and compliments on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests at and affordable price. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We could hear the people upstairs walking it was terrible the beds were super noisy. And it seem like the house keeping would only do the beds but never mop or broom the floors. It was a bad experience.
Manager Response: Please accept our apology on the condition of your room and the noise. The issue of your room has been brought to the attention of the appropriate department and has been addressed. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests.

Summary: As a family of 4 we found this hotel close to Disney to stay in during our stay. From start to finish it was a good stay. We initially booked 2 nights on accident and when we explained to the staff they were extremely helpful and managed to book us in another night in the same rooms! We booked 2 rooms and had connected rooms which was very helpful. The room was big with a large closet and bathroom. The beds were extremely comfy and very clean. There was an ice machine and the possibility of breakfast but we never tried it so can't comment. However the walls were very thin. We could hear small children running past our room at 7 in the morning and the traffic passing by. Although, we were getting up early for Disney in the morning and we were that tired on a night it really
Manager Response: Jasminhay98, thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and staying extra days. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us minus the noise. we strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to book your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: I found an ad online for this hotel, and I was in a pinch to find a hotel. The ad said 15% off if you call. So I called and spoke with Tony and explained I needed a room with at least a queen for 2 nights. He explains that it is available. So I asked about the 15% off, and he goes on to say that I have to do that online. Odd the ad said call, so i explain what I had read online. He says fine I can it. I also explained that we wouldn't be arriving until about 2 am because of flying in from Michigan. So after a long plane ride, we arrived. To walk into the Lobby to find NOBODY! My husband said "Hello" over and over until he gave up, came out to the car to tell me. He then walks inside as I start to call the number I was given. My husband had to literally yell to get someone to
Manager Response: Ms. Robertob, please accept our apology on the issue you had with booking your room. This issue has been addressed with the appropriate department and has been handled. We would also like to apologize for the issue you had when you arrived. That has also been addressed and handled. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests at an affordable price. We hope you will give our hotel another chance and you will see what we really do have to offer. If you do please please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly and knowledgeable Guest Service Representatives will gladly assist you.

Summary: Rooms were clean, had all the necessities and within walking distance to the convention center. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Pool looked lovely although I didn't get a chance to use because of schedule. Would definitely return for business or with family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel.. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Such a great hotel. Beautiful removated, conveniently located and very clean. The staff was very welcoming and accommodating. Highly recommend staying at the Eden Roc while you are in Anaheim. Whether go are visiting Disney or the convention center, this location cannot be beat.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and all of the compliments. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Very clean and close to Disneyland
