Summary: We stayed in a double king room as a family of 4. The staff was very nice and accommodating for parking in the morning even though we would not check in until that afternoon. We walked a few blocks to Downtown Disney and entered Disneyland from there. We will definitely stay at Eden Roc again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc for the first time the beginning of July. The room was nice and I believe newly renovated, with wood/laminate flooring. Not having carpet is always a plus in my book. The room also had a microwave and fridge, which was nice since there was no free breakfast.     We were able to find parking no problems, though I could see it being tight parking if the hotel is full. The downside to the room for me was that it was one of the smaller rooms we have stayed in, and we have stayed at quite a few in the Disneyland area. We have a double wide stroller for our kiddos and normally can push it in to the room and not have to collapse it. But in this room, it was a narrow walk way between the bed and dresser, and there wasn't enough space. I always find no breakfast at
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The motel has been nicely renovated and updated. However, its still a motel. Thin walls, noisy neighbors. No safe! But, there are plenty of plugs for charging! And a refrigerator and microwave. Nice flat screen TV and clean remote.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests and are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stay here every time we go to Disneyland, we are annual pass holders about a 5 hour drive away so that's quite frequent. The rooms are clean and if you keep an eye on prices you can snag some incredible deals. My only complaint is last time when we stayed in the family suite in 90 degree weather the air conditioning couldn't quite keep up-the ones sleeping in beds next to unit were freezing and the ones sleeping further away were burning up. We've never had that problem in a regular double occupancy room, however. All in all such a good value it's hard to complain!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is a newly renovated hotel with out carpets which is nice. Somehow we got a very large handicap room so I cannot say how large the normal rooms are.  The noise level is very high because it is an older hotel so the noise from above and outside was quite loud. I just gave this hotel at three because we found fleas in our room. I'm sure that is not the fault of the hotel but the fault of them allowing pets in the hotel. We found a couple so I opted not to change rooms. We were already settled. The fleas were on our beds. I am sure there are more but we chose not to keep searching. Also there was no free breakfast. I try to not stay at hotels that don't have breakfast but somehow didn't check this one because the price was right for one night.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We have been staying here for the last 4 years. The staff is always cordial, helpful and responsive. Hotel is reasonably priced. The location has been safe and easy walking distance to Disneyland. Rooms are very spacious and updated nicely.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel Kim and the wonderful compliments We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Rooms nice and clean üëçüèºIs a plus
Summary: Everything was great except parking not enough spaces to park !!  Also wifi didn't work in the rooms super slow and with kids they want tablets working .. besides that everything was great . Room was nice and clean .
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments I apologize about the parking issue. We are addressing that now. we strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests at an affordable price. We are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Enjoyed the large spacious room. Convenient refrigerator. Wall AC didn't circulate air. Wifi never worked. Beds were great, toiletries cheap. Parking sucked! Customer service was excellent, accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is our favorite spot when we stay overnight for Disney. There's free parking and it's within walking distance, which is a huge plus. The rooms are updated and seem very clean. The people at the front desk have always been very nice and accommodating and they're open 24 hours, which is nice if you're coming back from Disney late. Overall, I have no complaints, I'll be coming back next time I'm staying overnight for Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the wonderful compliments on our hotel and staff. We re very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and are looking forward to you staying with us again. Please call our hotel directly when you are ready to make your next reservation and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: five of us friends got together to go to Disneyland you wanted hotel that was easy to get to Disneyland from. So tell was only a 15-minute walk to Disneyland which was great.Is newly remodeled look nice very clean comfortable beds nice to have a mini fridge and a microwave it was nice to have free parking
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to your next visit. Please call our hotel directly when you are ready to make your next reservation and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: This hotel is a fairly short walk to Disneyland.   Parking was free and there were plenty of spaces.  Rooms were clean and modern. A no-frills type of place but perfect for our needs as we spent the whole day at the park.  Friendly guest services.    As others have mentioned, you can hear some noise from the other rooms.  Our room was on the first floor, and I could hear the people walking above us.  But, I've experienced this at many other hotels.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone planning to stay in the area.  The price is a lot lower than other hotels (some may seem to compare but then charge for parking) and I feel like I got a good value for what I paid.
Manager Response: First let me thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests at an affordable price. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Within walking distance of Disneyland, this hotel is always our first choice. The staff members are friendly and efficient. The rooms are minimalistic, clean and have all the necessities, including discounts to a couple local restaurants and future stays at the hotel. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and great compliments about our hotel and staff. we are very glad to hear that we are your first choice and are looking forward to your next stay.

Summary: We had a wonderful time staying at Eden Roc. The rooms were spotless and and very well kept. The staff at the front desk were very helpful and always friendly. It was a short walk (about a mile) to Downtown Disney and hotel parking was free. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed your staff with us and all of the wonderful things you had to say will be shared with the staff. We are looking forward to your next visit with us. Please call our hotel directly when you want to make your next reservation and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Eden roc Inn was a great place to stay I would definitely be choosing this hotel when I come back into Anaheim. Location is great only about 15 min walk to Disneyland and 5 min from convention center. Front desk staff was very helpful and Stephanie accomadeted all request made. Free parking is always a plus when going to Disney because most places charge parking fees per day plus tax. Overall eden roc Inn was a nice and pleasant stay with rooms that have been newly remodeled!  Thank you Eden Roc Inn and hope to see you soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our staff. We are very glad to hear that Stephanie was very helpful and your compliments will be forwarded to her and the rest of the staff. We are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Excellent stay. Well taken care of and this place was convenient to everything I wanted to do. Beds were comfortable, room was very big and well arranged. There was a good selection of dining places within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and all of the compliments on our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guest. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: I love Eden Roc! Great location, great services, and clean rooms. We stay here every year when we make our annual trip to Disneyland and it has never let us down! The rooms are affordable and the staff are awesome! Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for the glowing recommendation of our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to you staying with us again. Please call our hotel directly when you are ready to make another reservation and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights. 2 adults, 1 toddler, and 1 infant. The room was super clean. Best of all is the location! 10-15 minute walk to downtown disney, same as taking the tram. Free parking, free wifi!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and compliments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to you staying with us again. Please call us directly when you are ready to book your next stay and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Room was clean and beds were comfortable. Walking Distance to Downtown Disney and Parks. Hotel is nicely remodeled. We had complementary water in room when we arrived. Also received discounts at local restaurants by the hotel. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments about our hotel and staff. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us as we strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: I've stayed here before,i got the suite before and loved it,  unfortunately or second stay was not the same. We had a suite next to the main street and it was awful loud all night. I wasn't able to sleep all night long
Manager Response: First let me thank you for staying with us again and apologize about the noise. I wish you would have spoken with the front desk as they would have gladly given you another room if it was available. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests as we want you to enjoy your stay with us and want to come back. Please give us another chance and call the hotel directly as one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: The hotel is walking distance from the park if you go in through downtown Disney. Took us about 20-25 minutes to actually get there into the park. The hotel allowed us to park there before the check in time at 3 PM on the day we arrived. The parking spaces feel kinda small so if you have a larger vehicle it would probably be best to park it in by a corner. We ended up checking in around 5 PM after being at Disney since the morning and they had a room ready for us. The single room looked recently renovated with wooden floors, closet, wall AC, desk, TV, microwave with USB ports for charging, coffee maker, hairdryer, ironing board, small refrigerator, and a queen sized bed. Bring an extra blanket if you like some weight to your covers. The restaurant on the corner, Coco's Bakery,
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments on our hotel and staff. I apologize about the parking as that is something we are addressing. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests and are looking forward to your next stay with us. Please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: We had to ask everyday for our room to be cleaned at least by 1:00 pm . If you don't they will not automatic get cleaned . The priority rooms are the ones when you first get checked in . Then your on your own to clean your room after the first night . Our first nigth we return back to our room at 6:00 pm and our room was still not cleaned . We found out that housekeeping hours are from 8:00 to 5:00 . So your chances of not getting your room clean by 5:00 pm is very lickely .
Manager Response: First let me apologize for the fact your room was not cleaned and was dirty. That is not something we expect or accept at our hotels. This issue has been brought to the attention of the appropriate department and has been addressed. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We hope this has discouraged you from staying with us again as we can assure you this was an unfortunate incident and will not happen again. Please give our hotel another try and you will see what we really have to offer and you will see what an exceptional staff we have. Please call our hotel directly if you stay with us again and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: My friend and I booked this hotel last minute for the Tinker Bell half marathon and it was perfect for what we needed. We were able to walk just a short distance to and from the race. Our room was very nice and we did not encounter any problems. I wish the parking wasn't so cramped, but that isn't the fault of the property. There was even a security officer in the parking lot making sure everything was secure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments on our staff and hotel. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to you staying with us again. Please call our hotel directly when you are ready to make your next reservation and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: The Parking lot was full and I was repeatedly woken up by noise.   You can hear the whole neighborhood through the paper thin walls.   Also there was a lot of traffic going past even at night.  Is basically a motel 6 at ritz prices.
Manager Response: First let me apologize for all of the noise you put up with. Certain areas of the hotel that happens to. we are currently addressing that issue and will have it resolved shortly. we strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. I hope you will our hotel another chance and you will see what we really have to offer.

Summary Heading: Perfect location with everything we needed
Summary: We stayed here for the Tinker Bell half-marathon weekend. Our plans changed at the last minute, and we were able to find a great room at a great rate at Eden Roc, and you can't beat the location! It is so close to the Disneyland Drive side of the resort, which is right where the race started. The staff was friendly and helpful with all our questions and needs. Would definitely recommend, and I hope to stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the great compliments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: We are local to Disneyland and normally drive in whenever we please however this was mother's day weekend and my daughter was running the Tinkerbell 1/2 Marathon.  Marathon weekend around the Disneyland area is a nightmare so we decided to stay over night so we wouldn't encounter a problem driving in.  Eden Roc was perfect! Right across the street from the parks which made it easy for my daughter to walk to the race and come back without a problem. Room was clean and spacious, only reason I am not rating it a 5 is because parking is a nightmare not everyone had the little permit on their windows so i'm sure some of those cars didn't belong there and the handicap parking was taken up by a non handicap plated car.  Other than parking and me personally thinking the bed was to hard
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments on our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and best rooms to all of our guests. We try to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guest.

Summary: It is not that this place is so terrible. It is that it is basically a Motel 6 at Marriott prices. Actually I have never spent this much money even at a Marriott. Yes, it is a holiday weekend. But because my son plays a sport that almost always has tournaments over memorial day weekend, we have frequently stayed in this area over the same time period. Everywhere else we have ever stayed has been far nicer at a far lower price. I would never, ever have booked this room at this rate had I known what I was getting. The reviews made it sound worth it. It is not not not worth it! If you get a rate for $70 a night, do it. But no way would I pay more than $100 for this room, had it not been a prepaid situation.
Manager Response: I apologize for any inconveniences you may have suffered. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests.

Summary: I purchased Disneyland tickets through the hotel. i left the park mid-day and planned to return with the intention of riding a few more rides and wanting to see the lights parade. Upon re-entering the park, the park manager pulled us aside and told us the tickets had been returned and refunded to a travel agent. It was an embarrassing experience and I felt totally scammed by the guy the hotel referred.       I returned to the hotel but the manager was not in and I  was told she would be in the next morning by 10am.I waited to check out the next day around 10am, but still no manager. I emailed her and heard back a few days later because she was investigating. she told me that Disneyland would only turn me away for 2 reasons and that was not one of them. I emailed her back with
Manager Response: I apologize for the issue you had with the tickets. This has been brought to the attention of the appropriate department and has been handled.

Summary: I had a great time with the family it was my first time going to Disneyland  It's really close by Disneyland you could park and go walking the room was great I would recommend it the I would definitely  get a room again the price was not bad at all I love it
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments on our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guest. We look forward to you staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Location to Disneyland is great, if it were not so close it would be a 3
Summary: This motel is average.  It if were located anywhere other than a few blocks from Disneyland it would be a 3-circle rating.  The decor of the room is updated, though the materials are a bit on the cheap/flimsy side.  The bathroom in the room we stayed in was awkwardly situated (the door was very awkward, opening up right up against the toilet). They do provide toiletries - a bar of soap for the sink and a shampoo and conditioner dispenser on the shower wall.  The shampoo and conditioner are on the cheap side - we ended up buying some at Target.  The cleaning crew could have done better - they left empty bottles in the room (they did not fit in the garbage and were left right next to the garbage) and forgot to replenish towels a couple of days.   The front desk staff was friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Great place for a Disneyland stay!
Summary: Very clean, comfortable room with a great mattress on the bed. The rooms have been recently remodeled with a very clean, modern feel to them. Easy walking distance to Disneyland with free parking at the hotel! The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Kate M., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Cleanliness of the room and excellent customer service have always been the priority at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am glad that we deliver. We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center and near a Garden Walk. There are also many restaurants nearby.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Great place for a visit to Disneyland. No breakfast here but free parking and not having to take a shuttle to Disney or pay for their parking also made it worth the price. It's clean, staff is friendly and it was really quiet. The parking lot is really compact and some spaces are awkward, obviously not a huge deal but I checked my car every night for scratches because it was almost impossible for others not to park close, especially an SUV or big truck. Otherwise, this was a great place at a reasonable price.
Manager Response: Dear Heather T., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. We do have restaurants next to us that gives 10% off for breakfast, lunch or dinner for all of our guests who stay with us. Just present your guest keys. We are one of  the few hotels in Anaheim, CA that give one parking space for free for every room reserved.  Please call us direct when you are ready to make your reservation. (714-663-8700) or visit us on our website.  We will see you soon.

Summary: I recently stayed at Eden Roc. this was my 5th time. Rooms are always clean and spacious.  Easy walk to Downtown Disney and both parks.  Staff at Eden Roc are always nice.  Will stay again on my next visit. THANK YOU!!!
Manager Response: Dear 530annetted, Thank you for choosing Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your go to hotel. My team and I know that there are many hotels to choose from at Anaheim, CA and we are glad that you have selected us not only once but five times.  It is like you , our valued guest that we continue to strive hard to give excellent customer service. On your next visit, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit us at our website.  Once again, THANK YOU FOR YOUR LOYALTY!  My team and I cannot wait to see you soon.

Summary: Eden Roc was a great hotel which was clean and spacious. It was so close im distance to Disneyland which we could walk to and the staff were friendly .Our room was always cleaned well  which made our stay very comfortable. . Thanks Eden Roc
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer P., Thank you for your five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. Excellent customer service and cleanliness of the room are our top priorities.  On your next visit, please call us direct at 714-663-8700 or visit us at our website.  We cannot wait to see you soon.

Summary: We decided to stay in Anaheim a night earlier than planned, our other hotel was full for this night so I decided to look around else ware.  I found the Eden Roc online very close to Disney which is where we were headed the next morning. Our room was great clean quiet and affordable.  Actually nicer than the room we spent the next few days in.  Live and learn.  The staff at the front desk was very friendly as well!
Manager Response: Dear bbqgrill99, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I know that there are many hotels to choose from at Anaheim, CA and I am glad that you decided to choose us. Our team and I strives hard to give excellent service. I am glad that WE DELIVERED.  And we are thrilled to know that our room was nicer and cleaner than the other hotel that you stayed the next few days. Not to forget, the friendly service of our front desk team. We are next to the Anaheim Convention Center and many walking distance restaurants to choose from as well. My team and I will be waiting for you on your next visit to Anaheim, CA. Please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website.

Summary: Great hotel. We stay here every time we go to Disneyland. It's within Walking distance from Disneyland. Friendly service and the room was clean and restocked every night when we got back. I would suggest to reserve a top floor if you have young children who go to bed early. Otherwise people coming in late are noisy above you and may wake your little ones up.
Manager Response: Dear Renas935, Thank you, Renas935, for being loyal guest.  We are so happy that you  always stay with us every time you go to Disneyland. And it is like you, our valued guest, that we always strive hard to deliver friendly service and clean room every time you are here.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website.  We cannot wait to see you, in your hotel, Eden Roc Inn and Suites.

Summary: Our room at Eden Roc Inn & Suites was in the perfect location to Disneyland. It was a short walk to the Parks and there was plenty of places to eat quite close by too. The room was clean & serviced daily with fresh towels & our beds made. Wifi wasn't that great so make sure you don't just rely on that. Otherwise a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Stacey P., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. Aside from Disneyland, we are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center, walking distance restaurants and Garden Walk. We are also one of the few hotels, that do not charge parking.  When you are ready to reserve your room, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or go to our website.   We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for Convention Center and/or Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is conveniently located for Convention Center and Disneyland. Reasonably priced and the rooms are clean and modern compared to others in that area. I've stayed here 4 times now and usually for Disneyland. They stopped letting people cut through Grand Californian so the walk to Disney is longer but still better than Disney's parking which takes way too long.
Manager Response: Dear JessicadM335MH, Thank  you for giving us a four star rating. My team always strives hard  to give excellent customer service and clean room. And I am glad that every time you come here we always deliver. Thank you for your loyalty, JessicadM335MH.  On your next visit, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website.  We will see you soon.

Summary: The Inn was really simple, and the staff were very friendly. Although English is my first language, most of the staff are bilingual, which shows to me that they care about accommodations. The location is prime! I was there on business with meetings at Marriott and the convention center which are both just a 10 minute walk. Disney land is right across the street and the garden walk (a small mall) is also a 10 minute walk. Tons of places to eat close by.
Manager Response: Dear JoshuagF4415EN, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  We work hard to make sure our guests receive superior guest service. Thank you for your compliments on the cleanliness of our rooms and the friendliness of our front desk. Thank you for giving tips to our other valued guests.  On your next visit to Anaheim, CA  please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Spacious clean rooms close to Disneyland
Summary: We booked the family suite for 5 people and the room was so spacious and clean. We had two queens and a pull out bed which was perfect for our family. It was a short walk to Disneyland and if you want to purchase park hopper tickets, you can get a discount through the hotel when you check in! We will most definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Walkersvolcano, Thank you for your nice review of Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am glad that you and your family enjoyed the clean and spacious suite. We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center, Garden Walk, and next to family restaurants. We also offer free parking space for every room reserved. We cannot wait to see you soon. Please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website to make the reservation.

Summary: Very clean and fresh! Queen size beds which are a plus when so many in the area seem to be going to full size. Lots of room in the rooms, so you're not tripping over everyone's things. No breakfast though, but Coco's and Denny's are both close by. Easy walk to the park, but for those who need to save every step for inside the park, the Art bus stops at the corner!
Manager Response: Dear BREAKERCINDY, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, we offer queen size beds or king size beds in our rooms. Yes, our rooms are spacious.  We are one of the few hotels that offer free parking space for every room reserved.  Next time you visit us, please call us direct , (714-663-8700) or go to our website. We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Remodeled modern-style with amazing wood floor!
Summary: I stayed there for five days and absolute love it. It is clean and comfortable. I love the wood floor and know it is allergy-free. The service and front desk are way exceeded my expectation, very friendly, and easy to communicate with. Free parking is the best thing! Most of the hotels nearby do charge for parking. To order to get free parking, need to reserve a room on their website, I believe.
Manager Response: Dear  Mdn555, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. We are always happy when a guest has a great stay with us. I will pass on your good comments to my team, especially to Parth, Guest Service Representative. Please call us back direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website on your next stay with us. We offer discounts. We will see you soon.

Summary: This hotel and the rooms have been recently renovated.  For a family of four we had a comfortable stay.  The room was clean, stocked and quiet.  The AC system was a bit loud though.  The hotel has free parking and is walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney, Anaheim Convention Center.  There are local eateries close by such as Carrows.  I recommend the family suite for extra room.
Manager Response: Dear TheresaZ_11, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you had a comfortable stay with us. Yes we provide free parking where other hotels charge. When you are ready to visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct, 714-663-8700, or visit our website. We offer discounts  and packages..   We will see you soon.

Summary: Staffs are very friendly and accommodating specially Emmanuel. Rooms are clean and comfortable plus, it's very close to Disneyland!My kids loved our stay at Eden Roc Inn & Suites, and we'll definitely come back
Manager Response: Dear Briella1013,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. Yes, we are close to Disneyland as well as the Anaheim Convention Center and Knott's Berry Farm, Medieval Times. (to name a few).  On your next visit, please call us direct 714-663-8700 or visit our website.  We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed here this week because the hotel was close to Disneyland and had fairly decent reviews. Our first night we had some neighbors who were up all night partying on the balcony and in the room next to us. We got no sleep to start our vacation. I reported this to the staff and nothing was done. The people were only there for one night was the response that I got. The hotel also has no amenities. If you just want a place to sleep and nothing else this might do. I would not recommend this hotel. I believe for the price range you can do much better. We will not be back.
Manager Response: Please accept my apology for the experience you had during your stay. The issues you brought up will be brought to the attention of the appropriate department and will be addressed. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests as we want you to be happy and return. We offer free WiFi, free on site parking and we are near various restaurants and amusement parks and as you stated within walking distance to Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Dont stay here unless you want your STOLEN PROPERTY
Summary: Stayed here for three nights to hang out at Disneyland, only to have personal items stolen out of our room within a three hour window of time on our last night here. I asked to review the cameras and they would not. Didn't want to push the situation, but they completely ruined my trip and my stay. Won't ever come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my third stay at the Eden Roc, having previously come in 2009 and 2013. It is a convenient place to stay when going to Disneyland without paying Disney hotel prices. The rooms have been majorly renovated since I was here before and are in great shape. It isn't a fancy place by any means but is a solid value for the price. I had minimal contact with the staff except for check in and check out but they were friendly and conversational. Free parking is important. There is a pool out front but we didn't use it. There is a mini fridge and a microwave in the room, plus an iron. There was wifi but I didn't really use it. We were in an upstairs room and had no issues with noise. There are two restaurants nearby, I'd definitely recommend the Coco's over the Tiffy's.   Just to
Manager Response: Dear  Robb H, Thank you for taking the time to give us a five star rating. My team and I know that there are many hotels in Anaheim that you can choose from  and I am glad that you selected us again. Please call us direct on your next visit to Anaheim. (714-663-8700).Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon.

Summary: We recently stayed at this hotel. Rooms are comfortable,clean but I could hear my next door neighbor. It was not that big of inconvenience since I have kids myself so I understand but some might have an issue.
Manager Response: Dear Archana P.., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. My team and I are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are also near Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward to seeing  you soon.  Please call us direct 714-663-8700 or visit our website.

Summary: Close to Disneyland and California Adventure and downtown Disney. We walked every day to the parks. The room was clean and the beds were comfortable. Having a mini fridge was great to keep our drinks nice and cold. The price was great being so close to the parks. The staff were friendly and nice.
Manager Response: Dear elainetr27,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am happy that you liked the room and our proximity to Disneyland. We are also next to the Anaheim Convention center. On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct. (714-663-8700) or visit our website.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Close to the Park and Free Parking!
Summary: We stayed one night and it served it purpose. After a long day at the park, we came in and the staff was friendly and got us to our room quick. Room was clean and had a microwave and mini fridge. Would return!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We look forward to you staying with us again. Please call our hotel directly when you are ready to make your next reservation and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary Heading: Excellent Low-Cost Hotel for Disneyland or Convention Center
Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc Inn for 3 nights while attending WonderCon at the Convention Center. For a low-cost hotel, we found it to be excellent. The beds were comfortable, the rooms were super-clean, the front desk clerks were always friendly, the parking was free, and the location was ideal. The Convention Center is right around the corner, and Disneyland starts half a block away. There is also a small outdoor pool. This is not a luxurious hotel, but it met our needs perfectly at a price that was very reasonable. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear kathysjourneys:  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you found Eden Roc Inn and Suites of excellent value, beds are comfortable and the room was super clean  and friendly staff. There are also two right next to us restaurants which will give you 10% off for breakfast. lunch and dinner. (Just show the guest key).   On your next visit , please call us direct at 714-663-8700.  Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon.

Summary: Walls are very thin. Pictures on website are deceiving. Room is average. Not impressed on the pool. Room was clean. You have to get back early to get a parking spot. The soap dispenser did not work and some outlets there was no power. Bed was okay but the couch in the family suite appeared very old.
Manager Response: Dear espinoza8184, Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the issues you encountered. I will bring this up to our maintenance man and the clean team so we won't have these issues again. Thank you again and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights here on a family trip to Disneyland. I had read the reviews here and decided to give it a shot, so glad I did! There were 4 of us and we got a room with a separate bedroom so we had 3 beds. The one separate was a pull out couch that a couple of the girls grabbed. The place has gone through a recent remodeling and it was tastefully done. The housekeeping staff were meticulous and our room was so well kept, much appreciated when traveling with 3 teenagers! Front desk staff was friendly and accommodating, they even hooked me up with a ticket seller that saved me 40 bucks off walk in price and they delivered the next morning to the hotel!     We were about a 15 minutes walk from downtown Disney, had two restaurants right next door, Cocos being great, the other over
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here twice while attending the Scrapbook Expo @ Anaheim Conv Ctr. Once 4 of us in a 2 full beds; this time 4 in a family suite (2 fulls + sofa sleeper). The rooms look modern & the beds are comfortable. The staff is always friendly. Keep in mind only 1 car per room no matter how many people are in the room. Also 2 stories but no elevator. So for these 1 give it a 3.   Why risky tho? Becuz late @ nite they allow cars to double park across the entrance & exits & in the lanes. I know they encourage it becuz they provide & put cones behind the cars. This is dangerous becuz paramedics & fire dept can't get into the parking lot-so better not have an emergency!  So for this reason we decided we won't stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had visitors from IL who came to stay with us & wanted to go to Disneyland.  Although it is only apx 53 miles from us, 55 min....that's without our wonderful SoCal traffic.  No one wants to get up that early to drive an hour to miss the traffic or sit in it.  Did some research and found Eden Roc.  Was pleased with the distance, room size, cleanliness and parking.  Made things alot easier!  Thanks Eden Roc
Manager Response: Dear Colleen L.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that among all hotels in Anaheim you researched for you and  your visitors, you selected us.Next time you are ready to book your reservation, please call us direct. (714-663-8700) or you can visit our website.

Summary: I attend Expo West every year in March with my company from Colorado.  We discovered Eden Roc 2 years ago and booked it for the next year through booking.com. Luckily, we decided to double-check the reservations and discovered that there was a mess up and Eden Roc didn't have the reservations!  (this was a HUGE problem if you know Expo time - on top of Disney, the closest place to get a hotel is San Diego! ha. Eden Roc was amazing and worked on it to get our reservations back in time for Expo! Oscar and his staff was great!  We now book through them and love the convenience of the location - basically right behind the conference center - perfect location!
Manager Response: Dear  Ms_Traveler113, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that my team, Oscar, was able to assist you in your reservation problem.  Yes, Ms._Traveler 113, it is best to book directly with us. (714-663-8700) My  team will always  take care of you and your group. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: This is the second time I have stayed here and can't wait to stay again! It is just across the street from Disneyland park, and that is just what we needed. We encouraged our relatives to stay here too and they loved it as well. The room was great and spacious.
Manager Response: Dear CentrlValleyTraveler, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  Thank you for your loyalty and recommending Eden Roc Inn and Suites to your relatives. I am glad that my team and I did not disappoint you on your second visit nor your relatives as well. We cannot wait to see you soon. On your next visit, please call us direct (714-663-8700).

Summary: Nice room... bathroom needed some work drain was broken and base boards dirty. The doors could of been cleaned lots of little kid finger prints. Couldn't find a soda vending machine. But great location
Manager Response: Dear mandahayes2hayes, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am sorry that you did not locate the soda vending machine. WE do have it in the hotel. Thank you for your suggestions and  I will pass on your comments to my  clean team and maintenance team. On your next visit, please call us direct 714-663-8700. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: We've recently just returned from a stay in Anaheim at the Eden Roc Inn & Suites and it was great. The room (222) was large, clean and very quiet, and the staff were very helpful, even helping us to pre-book our Disneyland tickets (which were then delivered to our door!). The hotel is nothing fancy, but for the price you pay, it's excellent value and has everything you could need for a short stay in Anaheim. I would definitely recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Dear  Patrice2686, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you find Eden Roc Inn Suites of excellent value. I will pass on your good comments to my team. Thank you for your loyalty and for recommending your hotel to others. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website. We will see you soon.

Summary: Clean room, newly renovated, definitely would stay again. Close to Disneyland (walking distance) which makes a very good deal out of it (parking at Disneyland would be 20 per day). Internet ok for normal browsing.
Manager Response: Dear 284sorind,  Thank you for giving us a perfect score. We are also right next to the Anaheim Convention Center and two restaurants. On your next visit, please call us direct. (714-663-8700) or visit our website. My team and I cannot wait to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed in a family suite which was spacious, updated, and clean. The free parking makes a huge difference. The girl working front desk was very friendly and helpful. The walk to the Disney park is short. We will be staying again!
Manager Response: Dear S1757NQkellya, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Yes, our parking is free (one room reserved , one free parking space). Not all hotels give it for free. I will pass on your good comments to Stephanie. Please call us direct (714-663-8700) or go to our website on your next visit with us. We cannot wait to see you soon.

Summary: Clean value. Easy access to Disney a couple of blocks away. We paid like $119/ night in March. Staff hooked us up with some guy with discount tickets. Free Parking. Pool. We slept well after travelling across California
Manager Response: Dear Kevin K, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and you slept well. Next time you visit Anaheim please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website. We will see you soon.

Summary: I have no complaints about this hotel at all. In fact I look forward to staying there in the future. Price was definitely a factor, but I love the idea that it had hard wood floor. It's about a ten minute walk to Disney Downtown. About fifteen minutes to the parks. Walking through Downtown Disney after leaving the park has it benefits. Last minute shopping, or grabbing a quick bite before heading back to the hotel. I must say the in room advertisement of a Chinese restaurant that delivers truly helped out.  Check in and check out was easy. Look forward to staying there next time, especially if the prices stay around  the same.
Manager Response: Dear 886Roses, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. That you did not have any complaints from the front desk to the cleanliness of the room. And  you found the guest directory helpful.  Please call us direct when you want to make reservation. (714-663-8700) Or visit our website.  We are looking forward to your next stay with us.Thank you for being part of the Eden Roc Inn and Suites family.

Summary: We've stayed here twice and it's great. We get checked in earlier then the check in time. The only thing is there is only one ice machine and it's pretty far from some rooms. I wish they'd put one more so it's convenient for all rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle E, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that the front desk was able to check you in earlier than the normal check in time. (3 pm).  We try our very best to accommodate guest request.  Thank you for sharing your suggestion. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Loud very loud. Ask for upstairs or you will hear everything the neighbors do. Staff were not engaging and not very helpful. Cameras everywhere however; that did not stop the screaming and bounding up stairs at around 2am without repercussion.
Manager Response: Thank you, Shellyc123, for taking the time to write a review about Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I apologized that the room you had was not as quiet as you preferred. I hope you will return in the future so we can reserve a second floor for you.  Thank you again and best  regards.

Summary: Great customer service. Love the hard surface flooring. Spacious rooms. The location was fantastic, walking distance to Disneyland.  Our group had a room on the second floor in the room on the first floor, would recommend the second floor because of noise from the upper floor .
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda B. Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you love the hardwood flooring and the big  space in the room. Next time you visit Anaheim, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website.  See you soon.

Summary: The only thing I didn't like was that when i checked out I asked if I could leave my car there til we got back from disnyland they said no so I had to go park my car and pay an extra $20.00 to park at the park.I've done this in the past so was surprised when i was told no
Manager Response: Dear dinorahn2017, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am sorry that we are not able to let you leave your car when you checked out. Unlike other hotels, parking here is free. For one reservation made, there is one free parking space until guest checks out. We try to accommodate guest request of extending their car after their check out. However, in certain instances when there is an event going on we are not able to. Due to limited parking space.   Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Good clean place, very close one block  to the Disney Land, 10 min walk. Early check in was available and staff is very froendly. Highly recommending. Swiming pool is clean, kids and all family have a great time.
Manager Response: Dear Value Guest, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.I will pass on your good comments to my team.  On your next visit , please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website.  My team and I will be waiting for you soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a Disneyland visit
Summary: We stayed at the Eden Roc for 4 nights in March 2017.  The receptionist was friendly and helpful checking us in, making sure we had everything we needed and told us the best way to walk to Disneyland. We were provided with 2 room keys and a parking permit and had the last room of the block which meant we had nobody above us which was great. There is a sign on the receptionists desk to say that they are a eco friendly hotel and that the key cards and parking permit should be returned to them or you will be charged.  The room was really big with lots of storage space. There were good sized drawers and a full sized closet which easily held our suitcases and carry on luggage and we could still hang up plenty of clothes. There was a microwave if you wanted to prepare food yourself
Manager Response: Dear Tink1987, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. And also detailed description of how your stay was. I am glad that you were given excellent service at the front desk. And that your room  is not only huge but was very clean.  I will pass on your good comments to my team.  The tips you have written regarding the short cut walk to Disney will surely benefit the other guests.  However, our records indicate that all mattresses in the rooms are new.  Thank you for your comments and we will surely check on these.  On your next visit to Anaheim, please call us direct (714-663-8700) or visit our website.  We will see you soon.

Summary: Nice clean property, staff is wonderful, great way to start your magical trip. This property has always been a nice way to start our trip into the parks in a fun , simple and exciting way. I always stay at this property and low prices.
Manager Response: Dear garciag136, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I am glad that your stay with us was part of your magical trip. Thank you for your loyalty. On your next visit, please call us direct.  (714-663-8700)  We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great place and great location for the Convention Center
Summary: We booked three rooms and stayed for four nights to attend an expo at the Convention Center. Very happy with the stay! Room is spacious, fresh and very clean. Good amenities. Parking is convenient. Definitely will book again.  The front desk staff, Parth, who looked after our reservation was very helpful. All our requests were met. Thank you very much!
Manager Response: Dear Pia K., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you and your group enjoyed your stay with us. And my team and I are very happy as you were very happy with your stay with us. I will surely pass on your good comments to Parth. We will see you soon.

Summary: Check in was easy. Rooms were clean and nicely remodeled. Came with a big group from work and we were all nicely accommodated. Walking distance to Disneyland, Downtown Disney  and near by restaurants. Would recommend your hotel to others.
Manager Response: Dear Dawnaf314, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you and your group were all nicely accommodated. Aside from walking distance to Disneyland, we are also next to the Anaheim Convention Center. Two restaurants nearby, Coco's and Tiffy's provide 10% off breakfast, lunch or dinner as long as you present your guest key.   Next time you come by Anaheim, CA, consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your go to destination. Please call us direct.  (714-663-8700)

Summary: Overall, I enjoyed my stay here. The front desk staff is topnotch. They are real friendly, professional. The property and room was nice and clean. We were joined by a large group of about 60 friends and the Eden Roc property was able to make accommodations for our large group. They even placed a welcome sign for us see in the lobby. It was a really nice touch.   Eden Roc is within walking distance to the Disney parks and nearby restaurants and Convention Center. That is certainly a nice perk. Overall, we enjoyed our time here.
Manager Response: Dear SeanhG9197GN, Thank you very much for your nice review of Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am glad that you and your group enjoyed your stay with us. I will pass on your good comments to the team. Hope to see you and your group soon.

Summary: We stayed 5 nights while going to Disneyland. The room was clean and updated nicely!  Beds were comfortable and pool was clean. Located between 2 places to eat if needed and about a 15min walk to the main gate of Disneyland. Staff was friendly and helpful. We will be back!! Only negatives were smoking guests while we were in the pool and you can hear street noise and noise from other guests. But we were so tired every night it didn't keep us up.
Manager Response: Dear  Lexieloops, Thank you for writing a review on trip advisor and giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your five night stay with us.  My team and I strive hard to deliver excellent customer service in cleanliness and friendly staff. I am glad that we did not disappoint you.   My team and I will be waiting for you on your next visit in Anaheim, CA. Please call us direct 714-663-8700.

Summary: The is one of the cleanest rooms i have been in.Its only a block away from Disneyland and California Adventure.The staff was very nice and friendly.The room has a microwave and fridge.I was very pleased.
Manager Response: Dear Jflores2017: Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you are very pleased  and you  felt that our hotel is one of the cleanest rooms that you have been. We take pride in giving the best quality in cleanliness and excellent customer service at the desk. We also provide free parking for our guests which not all hotels offer. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA , consider us in your next lodging needs. You can call direct at 714-663-8700. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: My kids and I decided last minute to drive to Disneyland for 1 1/2 days. The front desk at Eden Roc was very helpful and super accommodating! They allowed me to park my car early in the day, way before check-in and they allowed me to leave it a few hours later on the day we checked out all without an additional charge.  When we did get into our room it was absolutely beautiful, they had given us a large corner unit and it was simply way beyond our expectations :) Not only was the room updated and modern but it was super clean! They even had dispensers of shampoo and body wash in the shower. I would recommend this hotel to anyone with families traveling to Disneyland, you won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Melbell876, Thank you for giving us a five star review. I know that there are many hotels to choose from at Anaheim, CA and my team and I are delighted that you have selected us. And we exceeded your expectations.  I will pass on your good comments to my team.   Next time you decide to visit Anaheim, CA, please call us direct (714-663-8700). Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon.

Summary: Clean, very nice hotel. Read past reviews to ask for the top floor and glad I did. The walls are thin and you can hear the noise from other rooms and the cars. So tired from the park, it didn't bother us much. Very clean, nice staff, free parking and walking distance to Disney. Will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear ccrawford1432,  Thank you for your review and giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We also offer free wifi and there are two restaurants right next to us that offer 10% off breakfast, lunch or dinner. (show your guest key) Next time you want to make a reservation, please call us direct. (714-663-8700). Or you can log on to our website. We also offer Disney packages.  We will see you soon.

Summary: Totally new Inn built with existing structure. What it lacks in "theme park" touches it more than makes up for in convenience to the park and conveniences in the room....fridge, micro, easily and fairly well cleaned surfaces. Nice tile work, flooring and lighting. Bathroom is great - has an actual tub (not plastic insert) and is the design where the sink/vanity area are outside the bath/toilet area. Good towels, too. Nicely kept grounds with topiary elephants! A steal for being almost the closest hotel to Downtown Disney entrance. Our housekeeper -especially the second day of our stay(Mar. 1st) - was outstanding. Only thing that could use an upgrade is linens and those little plastic deflectors that guide air/heat into the room instead of up into the draperies. A nearly perfect
Manager Response: Dear Joe S., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will surely pass on your good comments to my team and  to the room attendant that cleaned your room. She would be happy to hear that she was outstanding in cleaning your room. Thank you for your compliments of our landscaping and our "green" animals.   Next time you visit Anaheim, CA please call us direct. (714-663-8700). We will see you soon.

Summary: Front staff is very friendly and welcoming. This hotel was very clean the room was stylish, comfortable, well equipped and extremely clean. Facilitate early check in. Free parking I was very pleased with my stay 3 days, very close to the Conention Center.                    I hope to be back in the near future
Manager Response: Dear  nmontes2010, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you are very pleased with your 3 day stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Cleanliness of the room and friendly, courteous staff are always our priority.  Next time you visit us, please call us direct. (714-663-8700) We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: back to my home with an excellent friendly and homely service
Summary: I was able to go back to Eden Roc Hotel to participate in the recently concluded Religious Education Congress last FEB 24 -26. Coming back to this hotel, I felt once again welcomed by all. It was a surprise to see our group name and other groups lodging in this hotel written in the lobby with a WELCOME NOTE. What was special this time in my stay is that the receptionists all of them including the Manager, they were smiling, very accommodating and understand of our situation that they gave us the possibility to give in to our requests. They truly are at the service of their guests. As always, the room that I occupied was very clean, orderly and quiet inspite that it is just beside the walk way. I also recommended to my companion friends to stay in this hotel during the religious
Manager Response: Dear Renato P., Thank you Renato P. for your terrific review of Eden Roc Inn and Suites in Anaheim. My team and I appreciate your wonderful comments. It always feels really  good when our valued guests like you, provide us with great feedback because it always motivate us to work harder. To give excellent customer service ( which is always our Priority). My team and I are very happy that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is your home away from home. I will surely pass on your good comments. And rest assured, my team will be smiling.   Thank you for your loyalty. YOUR FAMILY AT EDEN ROC INN AND SUITES  will be waiting for you on your next visit Soon.

Summary: Checking in took longer than I expected. After traveling for 7 hours that was annoying.  The room was clean and no strange smells. Internet worked ok for 4+ devices. We usually stay here; short walk to Disneyland and free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and compliments on our hotel. I apologize for the delay in checking in as normally that does not happen. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Friends and I stayed here for a quick overnight on a trip to Disneyland. They didn't want to spend much for just a single night but wanted something nice-ish and close to the park.  One companion remembered seeing this property had just gone through a remodel from the last time she stayed here. I can only say its very clear someone put lots of money and love into refreshing this place.   I would absolutely recommend this hotel and would stay back here again. They offer return deals for people coming back.  Not sure how the regular rooms look - but if its anything like the suite - it's pretty nice for this price point.  Pros:  Lobby is modern and service at the desk is friendly and professional.  Access to laundry facilities next to lobby Adventurer Suite is a corner room with
Manager Response: Dear Meerkat92101, Thank you for your terrific comments and compliments in the room.  Yes, all our rooms are renovated and all decor in the room are the same. The differences are the room type and the suite is more spacious than the 2 queen bed and king bed room. I will pass on your good comments to my team.   On your next visit please call us direct (714-663-8700). Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon on your next visit.

Summary: Service was great! Employees very professional. Rooms were clean and super close to everything. Walking distance to Disneyland. We were able to purchase discounted park tickets through the hotel. Not a huge place but well worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests as we want them to leave happy and want to return. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Lovely contemporary motel within easy walking distance to Disneyland. Large room, very clean, courteous staff, free parking and wifi. They were also able to get us discounted day off Disney tickets. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the wonderful compliments on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We look forward to your next stay with us. When you are ready to stay with us again please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Eden Roc was better than expected. Although the lobby was really busy with people registering, I was greeted with an organized process. While we waited (10 minutes) we enjoyed the ice water and fresh popcorn. The manager Agnes was very courteous and quick. I loved the laminate floors in the room. The room looked and smelled squeaky clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: The hotel was nicely remodeled. Love the laminate floor much more sanitary than carpet. The room was clean, the staff was very friendly. Although we didn't use the pool it was clean. Only a 20 minute walk to Downtown Disney and the parks. Hotel doesn't have breakfast but there are two restaurants on the corner. Or choices Downtown Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel and the compliments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We look forward to you staying with us again. when you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary Heading: Still a great place to stay for a few days.
Summary: Although I couldn't get a early check in, the stay was enjoyable.  The location is ideal when attending the RE Congesss at the convention center.  Proximity to 2 restaurants are also a plus, as is Downtown Disney. The only drawback to this stay was that it took a very long time to get hot water in the shower. Had to let the water run at least five minutes before getting "hot" water.  Even at that, the water was not hot.  However the room was large and clean; obviously one of the remodeled rooms.  I will, however book at this facility again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly GUest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: The room we were given was larger and appointed well. There were two major problems. First, there were only two small drawers to place clothing. That is fine if you are staying overnight, but for multiple nights, not so much. Second, it took five minutes to get hot water to the faucets. Once there the pressure was low. The water stayed hot, but the time and pressure were negative factors.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating on our hotel. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Didn't want to dump over a couple hundred in a room for an overnighter to Disney. So looking around the area for short walking distance to Disney and I found Eden Roc. I was expecting junk for the price since most of the other places were twice the cost. I was pleasantly surprised when we got to the room. Nothing fancy, but I have stayed in way worse places for more than double the cost of this room. Beds were good, shower wasn't rotten. The hot water took a bit to get going, but not a big deal. I had read a review complaining about the WIFI and we had no trouble with it. We got a discount to a neighboring restaurant which was cool. Took about 10min to walk to the security point going into Downtown Disney with a little one in tow, so that was just what we were looking for. The
Manager Response: Dear d10de, Thank you for your compliments about Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We know that there are many hotels that you can choose from in Anaheim, CA. And we thank you for selecting us. I am glad that you were pleasantly surprised with the room. Clean and comfortable beds, free wifi, refrigerator, hairdryer, iron and board, 39" flat panel tv and one cup coffee maker. I am happy that we were able to extend your parking time with us. As you know, most hotels charge parking fee and at Eden Roc Inn and Suites is free.  My team and I cannot wait for your next visit with us.

Summary: Room was clean and bed was comfy. Upstairs guest were a bit loud and running around at 2 am so if possible request an upstairs room. Location is good. Check in was easy. A great value for your money. Would stay again
Manager Response: Dear mlobos12, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. And thank you for your compliments. Next time  that you stay with us, please call us direct. Our telephone number is 714-663-8700. Or go through our website. We also offer Disneyland packages.  We will see you soon.

Summary: We have gone to Disneyland 3 times within the last 6 months and we have stayed at this hotel each time, we love it! Clean, remodeled, near Disney parks, restaurants, and can't go wrong with the price for a comfortable stay!
Manager Response: Dear starluv8, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. And for being loyal to Eden Roc Inn and Suites. It is like you, our valued guest,that my team and I consistently work hard to deliver excellent service and clean and comfortable room.  On your next visit, please call us direct (714-663-8700). Or visit our website.   Thank you again and hope to see you again very soon.

Summary: I was going to Anaheim for Disneyland and a tattoo appointment. I was on a budget and Eden Roc fit that budget. It's a great price for what they offer. Clean, updated rooms with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. I got in late and the front desk person, placed me in a quiet room in the back. The floor was a little sticky but I think it is what they use to wash the floors. It was also a little stuffy but opening the window fixed that. These two things are little when looking overall for a place. I stayed three nights and the total was not quite $250.   It's across the street from Disneyland and about a mile walk in the other direction to cheap food options. I'm a vegan so this was important and two of the options are Vegan Pizza (great pizzas!!) and Loving Hut.
Manager Response: Dear Maria M., Thank you for giving us a four star rating.I am glad that you found the room clean and with the amenities that you need. And you were able to find restaurants that serve vegan food. Next time you come to visit us, please call us direct. (714-663-8700.)  Hoping to see you soon.

Summary: I recently attended the Monster Jam at Angels stadium and knew I wasn't going to be in the mood to drive back home. In search of a reasonably priced hotel close by with minimal amenities but clean, I came across the Eden Roc. This place is 6 minutes from the stadium, 3 from Disney theme parks. As for the room...modern, clean, basic and best of all parking is free. We asked to stay on the back end as it is less populated and more likely to have parking. In short, if your looking for a clean place to spend the night/weekend, you can't go wrong.
Manager Response: Dear  Angel V., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. We know that there are many hotels in Anaheim and I am glad that you selected Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your lodging need. Aside from it's value, the room is clean and modern. Unlike other hotels, our parking is FREE.   Please call us direct (714-663-8700) on your next visit.  See you soon.

Summary: We booked at the Eden Roc because the hotel we usually stay at when we go to Disneyland was full for one of the nights we were there.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The room was clean yet basic, and the staff very friendly.  It's an easy walk to Disneyland.  We stayed on the first floor and the ceiling was very thin.  It sounded like the kids upstairs were going to fall through to our room any minute.  They were so loud.  The only complaint I had (and it isn't even a big deal) was the lighting.  There was no way to turn off some of the ceiling lights without turning them all off.  The lights over the bed were too bright and it was hard to make it dark enough for my daughter to sleep yet still see what I was doing.  it would have been nicer to have a bed side lamp.
Manager Response: Dear flyingjen, Thank you for taking the time to write your experience with us. I am glad that you were pleasantly surprised. That my team delivered friendly service and clean and nice room.  We value your comments  and we will work on it.  Please call us direct 714-663-8700 on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Best Place to Stay in Anaheim
Summary: We love staying here! The rooms are very clean and very large! The staff is so nice and helpful! I needed some extra things in our room for my smaller son and the front desk was right on it!  It's very close to Disneyland! You can walk there in 10-15 minutes through downtown Disney. We have stayed here many times and always been very happy!
Manager Response: Dear family7323, Thank you for making Eden Roc Inn and Suites as the "Best place to stay in Anaheim." I am so thrilled that every time you stay with us, we always deliver excellent customer service and consistently clean room. As cleanliness of the room is our priority. I am glad that my team was able to help your son.   I will pass on your good comments to my team.  We can't wait to see you and your son soon.

Summary: Excellent hotel 1/2 block from Downtown Disney.    Rooms are spotless, have all appliances - microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker.  Great beds and pillows, free WiFi - nice big LCD TV and very close to Disneyland.  They provide free extended parking
Manager Response: Dear SanDiegoWayne, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to my team. I am sure they will be happy as we made you happy.  We cannot wait to see you on your next visit.

Summary: It's a nice walk to Disneyland. We spent 2 nights there. Parking was free. Stayed in a family suite with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed in a different room within our hotel room. They also had a mini fridge and microwave. The room had laminate flooring which is good. I used to stay there last year and they served continental breakfast like pastries but this time they didn't have them...kinda bummed about that. You would walk from the hotel into Downtown Disney to get to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Lynn630,  Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you liked the room just like the last time that you stayed here with us. Unfortunately, we do not serve breakfast almost three years ago. However, there are two walking distance restaurants from us that give 10% off either breakfast, lunch or dinner.   On your next visit, call us direct. (714-663-8700)  We will see you soon.

Summary: I was very happy with my experience here. The staff are professional, friendly and helpful. My room was immaculate, with fresh crisp sheets and fluffy towels. Modern updated furnishings and hard flooring make it more like a hotel than a motel. The entire premises are brightly lit for safety and the security guard made frequent rounds. There are 2 family restaurants on the corner and it's an easy walk to the parks.
Manager Response: Dear PL0, Thank you for your very good comments about your experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. My team and I are very happy because you were very happy with your stay. Aside from excellent customer service and immaculate room, safety and security of our guests is also our priority.  Please call us direct (714-663-8700) on your next visit here at Anaheim, CA.  My team and I will be waiting for you. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Definitely affordable, best deal in town, front desk was very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable, rooms were very clean, they look like new, and the location right in front of Disneyland, I would totally recommend this place :)
Manager Response: Dear Djaztecamix, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Aside from the value, I am glad that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is not only affordable and the best deal in town. But we also deliver an excellent customer service and the room is clean. Yes, I am glad that you noticed that the room still looked brand new. We would like to maintain it that way.   I will pass on your good comments to my team.  Thank you for recommending this place and we cannot wait to see you again.

Summary: The hotel is great: clean, spacious rooms and walking distance to Disney parks. The ammenities were very useful (hair dryer, microwave and fridge) and the staff was helpful; they recommended several restaurants and routes to get to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Cecilia T., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team gave an excellent customer service at the desk and that your room was clean. Aside from the amenities you mentioned above, we also offer free wifi and free parking. We are also a 5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. On your next visit to Anaheim, CA, please call us direct to book your reservation. On our website, we also offer Disney Packages and special promotion.  My team and I will see you soon.

Summary: We always stay here when we come to Disney. It's a quick walk! The rooms are always clean, plenty of space for my family of 4. We love Eden Roc! It was better when you could walk through Grand Californian, now they veer you though downtown, but it's still very convenient and affordable.
Manager Response: Dear joylise, Thank you for taking the time to give us a four star rating. It is always refreshing to know that our valued guest like you always comes back to stay with us. My team will be happy to know that. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA, call us directly. (714-663-8700). Thank you for your loyalty.

Summary: The room was beautifully updated. The women at the desk took a long time to check us in. She didn't seem to know what she was doing.  The corners in the floor of the bathroom were very dirty. The hotel was very loud until one in the morning I
Manager Response: Dear Kathy O., Thank you for taking the time in writing your experience with us. I am glad that  you found the room was beautifully updated. Thank you for sharing your concerns with us. I will make sure to talk to the team members concerned so they will not happen again. Next time you visit Anaheim, CA, please call us direct. (714-663-8700)

Summary: It was nice but the service desk needs help not very customer friendly could use some help. Got there to check in they didn't greet you welcome you say hi to you guy was on the phone making a reservation so unprofessional waited at least 15 minutes to get helped waited at least 10 minutes for a plain hi! Not very good experience
Manager Response: Dear  jfrivera90, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am saddened that you did not feel a warm  and friendly welcome when you checked in. I will talk to the team member involved and if it is a retraining issue, I will do so. I hope you will give us a chance on your next visit to Anaheim, CA to stay with us. We also offer Disney packages and specials on our website. Please call us direct when booking a reservation. Our telephone number is 714-663-8700.

Summary: We were able to get a nicely updated room to sleep our family of 6 for only $109 a night.
