We were within walking distance to Disneyland, and grocery store was less than a mile away to grab lunches and snacks for the kids.... instead of paying Disneyland prices. The free parking and pool was also nice. .... a few negatives. 1- a sock was left in the bathtub from a previous guest...kinda gross. 2- it would have been nice if they had coffee available in the lobby area. 3-our daughter had set her souvenir $ on a shelf and it disappeared (in open sight...lesson learned for her)  :(  ...the rest of the nearby hotels to sleep 6 people generally started around $170 a night, we were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear BethNicW, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am happy that you liked our  remodeled Suite. And the value. Yes, parking here is free. While other hotels charge. We are also a  5 minute walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. Aside from the free parking we offer, we also offer free wifi, newly remodeled room with refrigerator, microwave and 39" flat panel TV. Guests also love our hard wood floors.  Thank you for letting us know your concerns. I will let my team know so it will not happen again.   On your next visit to Anaheim, CA please consider us on your lodging need. Call us direct when you make your reservation. (714-663-8700).   We will see you soon.

Summary: I stayed here with my friend for two nights to celebrate my 30th birthday at Disneyland. The thing that sold me online was it was walking distance to the park. The things that sold me to not look for another hotel got all my Disneyland trips, well, everything combined! It doesn't take a whole lot to please me, but this place exceeded my expectations. It's not fancy, so if you are looking for bells and whistles this may not be your place. But for me, I'm just going to sleep here and spend the rest of my days at the park. The room was so spacious and clean!!! I've spent twice the amount on other hotels for rooms almost a quarter of the size. The parking was easy to get and free, I didn't have to get blocked in like some hotels around here, for me that's a big deal. The room was
Manager Response: Dear  lanniefiennes007, Thank you for taking the time for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you followed your instinct and stayed with us. I am happy that my team did not disappoint you. That you had the best time celebrating your 30th birthday. I will share your good comments with my team and I know that they will be happy to read them.  The best kept secret in Anaheim is no longer a secret (Eden Roc Inn and Suites). Thank you Lanniefiennes007 and we will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Convenient, quiet, modern interior, great staff
Summary: Stayed at the Eden Roc for the NAMM show at the Convention Center. Great location, 5 minute walk to the Convention Center. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Interior of the rooms are newly refurbished  and very modern and comfortable. Room was quiet, clean and very spacious. Will stay there again next year.
Manager Response: Dear H2687NMdanb, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us.A friendly staff and a clean room. Aside from the Anaheim Convention Center being  a five minute walk from the hotel you did not have to pay parking. As we offer free parking. In addition,  you did not need to worry about the heavy traffic during the NAMM Week.   Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you next NAMM week.

Summary: My company always gets rooms here for our annual trade show and we couldn't be happier.  Easy access to the convention center and food and Downtown Disney, not to mention probably my Favorite Hotel Staff that I've encountered!  We'll be at the Eden Roc next year for sure!  Agnes, Oscar...  expect a call from me soon. :)  Thanks for making us feel like part of the family!
Manager Response: Dear dcKMI,   Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that every time you come to visit us during the NAMM week, you always come to stay with us. And my team and I do not disappoint you. Agnes and Oscar will be waiting for your call anytime.  Your family at Eden Roc Inn and Suites in Anaheim is waiting for you.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and updated, but thin walls.
Summary: Very friendly staff and front desk, clean rooms, but I thought the walls were very thin - I could hear everything outside, from neighboring rooms, upstairs.   Fantastic location though for both the Convention Center and Disneyland.  The room had most amenities one would want, but no safe.
Manager Response: Dear 59burst,  Thank you for taking the time to write your experience with us. I am glad that the staff at the desk was friendly and you were happy with your room. We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback. Next time that  you will be in the Anaheim, CA,  area, call us directly. Our phone number is 714-663-8700.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a fantastic price and location!
Summary: After we chose to stay at the Eden Roc, it's safe to say that we found our new go-to hotel for Disneyland trips! The recent remodel offers beautiful new rooms with a great modern feel. The rooms feel clean (perhaps in part to the new flooring vs typical hotel carpet) and comfortable. The proximity to the Disney parks adds so much value to this place, but they continue to offer amazingly affordable prices.  The only things holding back from a full five-star rating in my opinion are the lack of a breakfast offering and the fact that the walls seemed a bit thin in the mornings. We often heard the families around us getting ready for their daily trips to the parks.   All in all, I would recommend the Eden Roc to anybody who is looking for a reasonably-priced, comfortable, safe hotel
Manager Response: Dear  ianthompson08, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. And making us your go to hotel in Anaheim, CA. I am glad that you like the clean room and especially the hard wood floor. Thank you for your feedback. Next time you decide to come and visit us, please call us direct. (tel. number 714-663-8700). We also offer Disney packages  and discount on our own website.  We will see you soon.

Summary: Very clean, good smeling, and comfortable hotel. This is always our first choice. Very helpful staff from front desk to housekeeping. Parth and Manny took care of us really well. Book directly for nice discount. The Pimentel's favorite Anaheim Hotel!
Manager Response: Dear JazPaulPimentel, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will pass on your good comments to Parth and Manny. Thank you for making us your favorite Anaheim hotel. Looking forward on your next visit.

Summary: Recently stayed here for our visit to Disneyland. It's a smaller hotel with completely updated rooms. Service was excellent upon check in and the grounds were very clean. The rooms themselves were very comfortable and clean with a mini fridge and microwave. Unless you stay at a Disney hotel you won't get any closer. There's a restaurant right next door that offers a 10% discount with your room key that we ate breakfast at each morning. We'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Crazycraftymom, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Service was excellent and the rooms were clean and comfortable. Next time you come book with us directly. 1-714-663-8700.  We will see you soon.

Summary: Eden Roc is a wonderful, clean, quiet place to stay when visiting Disneyland.  The walk to the park is not too bad.  I have stayed here twice and both times we have had a beautiful, quiet room.  With so many families going to Disneyland, quiet is not experienced in most hotels in the area.  The front desk service is excellent and the maids do a wonderful job taking care of the rooms.  This is the ONLY place I will stay from now on.  I am an annual pass holder and visit 3-4 times a year minimum.
Manager Response: Dear  Michelle O, Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you experienced an excellent service. Clean room  and excellent customer service at the desk. My team and I know that there are many hotels in Anaheim, CA that you can choose from as your lodging needs and we are happy that you have selected us. It is like you, our valued guest, that we strive hard to deliver excellent customer service.  Next time you visit Anaheim, call us direct. 714-663-8700.  Again, thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon.

Summary Heading: WHAT A DIFFERENCE!  Great price and great staff
Summary: We use to come down all the time when my kids were little and it was a rough place but a great price and location.  We now have a new little one and decided to do trip.  After years of not coming we were completely blown away by the make over.  So cool that when I walked in, the manager remembered me from years ago!  He was so kind to walk me around and show me the new changes.  The rooms are AMAZING inside.  I can not believe the difference.  No smoking was a huge plus and even when a guest was smoking on the property they went and addressed it.  Microwave and fridge in the room. Comfy beds and we get to enjoy the same great location. They don't have breakfast but you get a discount at Cocos and Tiffany's next door.  There is  Best Western across the street but get this....YOU
Manager Response: Dear isaeli1,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that after so many years of not staying with us you decided to stay with us. Thank you for your loyalty. I am also delighted that you not only  liked the renovation we did in the room. But,  in addition, you experienced an excellent customer service. That my team went above and beyond to make you and your family's stay here a happy and memorable one. I will share  the good comments you wrote to my team, especially to Oscar. We cannot wait to see on your next visit to Anaheim, CA. Please do not hesitate to call us directly on your stay with us.

Summary: We were very happy at the hotel for the excellent customer service we had at the front desk, and the hotel remodeling was very nice. It is a very convenient walking distance to Disney Parks and it is a really nice area too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and compliments on our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We are located within walking distance to Disneyland the the Convention Center along with being near other attractions. We look forward to you staying with us again.When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly Guest Service Agents will be glad to assist you.

Summary: The overall service appearance and comfort of the Roc Inn was very pleasing and very satisfying we will definitely used The Roc Inn as Our to go spot for travel in Anaheim California stores shops and gas are readily available in distance
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and compliments on our hotel. We strive to give of our guests the best service and the best rooms at an affordable price. All of our rooms come with complimentary hd television with free on demand channels. You get free wi-fi, microwave and refrigerator along with numerous other amenities. We are located near Disneyland, the Convention Center and other attractions. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to book your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service agents will gladly assist you.

Summary: Eden roc is one block from disney property but about a quick 10 min walk to downtown disney to access park. Property looks just likes photos, recently renovated. Clean rooms and bathroom. Front desk very welcoming.  Small pool in front of property which can be used in warmer seasons. No frills, affordable place to stay since disney is quite expensive
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and the compliments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service to all of our guests and the best rooms. We offer California King Beds, premium HD television and free on demand channels. All of our rooms come with a coffee/tea maker, microwave and refrigerator, direct dial telephone and numerous other amenities. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and speak with one of our friendly guest service agents who will gladly assist you in making your reservation, and please check out our specials and vacation packages.

Summary: Nice Motel.  Close walking distance to Disney. Great value.   Pros: Great Price            Location            Clean Room (see cons for one warning)            Friendly staff.            The bigger room has a lot of space, family of four had more than enough room to do whatever we needed.             Mini fridge and microwave worked perfectly.             Lots of outlets located everywhere in the room to keep devices charged. Nice desk area also.             Shower worked perfect. Good water pressure and plenty of hot water.             Heater worked great and room held temp very well. Heat only kicked on once or twice an hour for about 5 minutes to keep room at 74. Cons:            Can get noisy. Between cars driving by, loud wood floors, and the occasional loud family in the
Manager Response: Thank you for the 3 star rating and compliments about our hotel and staff. I apologize about the dust on the floors of your room. This will be taken care of immediately and the appropriate department will be made aware of this issue. We strive to give the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests at an affordable price. All of our rooms come with free wi-fi, premium hd television and complimentary on demand channels. We also offer numerous other amenities. We are located within walking distance to Disneyland. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service agents will gladly assist you in making your reservation and while you are at it please ask about our specials and vacation packages.

Summary: Worst hotel that I have EVER stayed at.  There were hairs, EVERYWHERE - embedded in the towels, the sheets, the pillowcases.   The hardwood floors were filthy. Asked to get the floors cleaned the following day. Got back to the room, still not done. Asked to get them cleaned again for the following day.   The following day, the Assistant Manager (Oscar?) calls me and says, "I heard you're complaining again." As if that wasn't bad enough, the General manager (Agnes?) decided to mock me, while cleaning some spilled water on the lobby floor. She said in a sing song voice (as she cleaned) "Oh no! The floors are dirty! I have a problem!!"   If you don't mind staying somewhere that has hair everywhere, dirty floors, and horrible service, then this is the place for you!   My advice...
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wouldn't mine giving a 5 star but we had an issue with finding a bug in our room and before that we found that my daughter got some bites but we weren't sure why until next day we found this bug other than that front desk was very good and friendly
Manager Response: First let me thank you for the 4 star rating and compliments about our staff. Second, let me apologize for the insect that was in your room and the insect bites your daughter received. We will immediately check into this and the appropriate action will be taken so this does not happen again. We strive to give all of our guests the best service and the best rooms to all of our guests. We offer free parking and are conveniently located near Disneyland  and Knotts Berry Farm. We offer free HD tv with free on demand channels. We offer complimentary wi-fi and our rooms come with a microwave, refrigerator, direct dial phone and other amenities. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representatives will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: My credit card was missing when we arrived and I had already paid for the entire stay weeks before so the payment had cleared our account. So since I didn‚Äôt have the credit card with me. They made us pay again and then refunded the other payment which took a few days. It just didn‚Äôt make sense why I had to go thru all that when my ID matched the credit card used even down to the address. I felt this was unnecessary and caused our trip to start out stressful after driving there 5  on Christmas day. Felt that they could have made an exception since they had all the funds. This would have been really awful for someone who would not be able to pay for 4 night stay twice. I
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and I apologize about the inconvenience you had to go through when checking in. Unfortunately that is the policy and procedure the hotel had to do when you checked in. I know it is a pain but it is beneficial for both parties to do it that way. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to you staying with us again. We strive to give all of our guests the best service and the best rooms. When you are ready to stay with us again please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representatives will gladly assist you in making your reservation. And please check our our hotel specials and vacation packages.

Summary: Nice hotel, clean, quiet, stayed there a night after spending all day and Disney and my family was very pleased to have such nice rooms. It have all we needed, we're looking forward to stay there on our next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and compliments on our hotel. We strive to give all of our guests the best service and the best rooms. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready please call our hotel directly and speak with one of our friendly guest service representative and ask about our hotel specials and vacation packages. They will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: Pros & Cons! Over-all a clean, comfortable motel to stay at, in a safe location. We stayed in the Family Suite on the 2nd floor that featured two queen beds and a pull out sofa. We were here during New Years Eve. The Pros: Nice sized clean room, no carpet, good water pressure, comfortable beds(very important to me), Microwave & fridge, 15-20 minute walk to Disney. Front desk was very friendly and check in easy. 10% off at Coco's & Tiffany's Restaurant. Free Wi-Fi. The Cons: No breakfast(10% off at the two close restaurants does not make up for no breakfast), maid service was lacking(they did not re-stock washcloths and beds poorly made), no heated pool, no hot tub. Bathroom kinda small. No longer can you access Disneyland/CA Adventure through the Grand California Hotel. You have
Manager Response: First let me thank you for staying with us and apologize for the housekeeping service you received. That should not have happened and we will look into that immediately and the appropriate action will be taken. We strive to give the best service to all of our customers and the best rooms. We want you to enjoy your stay with us and come back. I hope you will give our hotel another chance. If you do please call our hotel directly and speak with one of our friendly guest service representative and ask them about our hotel specials and vacation packages. They will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: Great location in Anaheim, a very close walk to Downtown Disney, only a few blocks, so we didn't need to pay for parking! We were able to walk through The California Grand Hotel and go straight into the park from there! Loved the updated and modern feel of the room and comfortable beds. The working staff was very polite and professional. All around convenient location, and safe neighboring businesses for this hotel. Will be returning again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the compliments on our hotel about our staff. We strive to give the best service to all of our guests and the best rooms.

Summary Heading: Most economical place to stay close to Disney
Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc for 4 days. We found our stay most convenient and comfortable. Near by Anaheim hotels are charging for parking, wifi per device and  microwave and refrigerator. But this hotel is the best  - as far as charges / additional fees are concerned. No additional charges and no surprises from Eden Roc. Check-in and check out was very smooth.  Parking was is sufficient for small SUV or Midsize  sedan. Room is super modern with mini-Microwave and mini-refrigerator.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and the great comments about our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service to all of our guests. We look forward to you staying with us again. Please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representatives will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: A little noisy, there was some construction of some sort happening on the street and you could hear water running very loudly when adjacent rooms turned on water but overall an awesome place with quick and convienient access to Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and compliments on our hotel. We will look into the issue of you hearing the water running in the adjoining rooms. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representatives will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: Great place for a great price. Close to Disneyland we were able to walk!! We will definitely come back and stay next time we go to Disneyland. The front desk workers were very nice as well! The rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and wonderful compliments about our staff. We look forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: Love it.  Room was clean.  Front desk employees were very friendly & helpful.  The only complaint I have about the room is the lighting.  There are too many overhead lights (too bright) and no lamps.  It made it hard for reading or if one person woke up earlier than the other person.  Other than that we really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and compliments about our hotel and staff. We will look into the lighting issue. We look forward to you staying with us again.

Summary: This was my second stay here and I will probably continue to stay here whenever I'm in Anaheim for Disney and Knott's.  The rooms are a nice size and offer a mini fridge and micro - great if you have kids.  I also like the laminate floors - much better than gross carpet and if you are a total clean freak you could lug your own little Swiffer to clean if you really want. The location is great and parking was free (as it should be for ALL hotels near Disney).    My only complaint is that housekeeping takes fooooooorever to make up rooms.  I've been coming to Anaheim/Disneyland since I was a kid and have stayed at various hotels/motels.  We've NEVER come back to an unmade room until staying here.  We have a 2 year old and, like most families, we trek back to our hotel for nap time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful compliments on our hotel. We strive to give all of guests the best service and the best rooms. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make your reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representative will gladly assist you.

Summary: Rooms are renovated! Well thought out with all of the necessary ammenities. Hairdryer, microwave, storage, electrical outlets etc. Rooms are large enough for 2 adults 2 children. The clincher is the location of this hotel! It is a short walk down the road to the Disney parks...but is a fraction of the cost. Would I stay here again? ABSOLUTELY! Hotel staff are very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating of our hotel and staff. We strive to give the best service and best rooms to all of our guests. As you stated our rooms come with all of the necessary amenities, hair dryer, microwave, storage and etc. As noted we are also only a short walk to the Disney parks. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representatives will gladly assist you in making your reservation. Merry Christmas and Happy New Year.

Summary: This hotel is honestly really great. The personnel there is fantastic and you even get a complementary bag of goodies. This is the best option to a close hotel to the theme park without paying a hefty price. The staff went above and beyond to make sure our stay was pleasant. We will definitely be back. Thanks again !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and wonderful compliments about our staff and hotel. This is what we strive to provide to all of our guests. We also offer free WiFi, premium hd tv, free on demand channels, air conditioning, study desk, coffee/tea maker and other amenities. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service representatives will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary Heading: Not a bad place for a trip to Disney
Summary: The place have been renovated and looks good. Staff are friendly. Very close to Disney, you can walk. Parking is free BUT, very limited. You may not find a spot when busy. The only issue i noticed is the cleaning crew do not clean the top shelf int he closet. Very dusty. i would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 4 star rating of our hotel. It was great to hear that our staff was friendly and you enjoyed your stay. We will immediately check into the closet being dusty as we pride ourselves on making sure all of our guests are happy with their accommodations. We offer direct dial telephones, air conditioning, coffee/tea maker, iron and ironing board, premium hd tv, free on demand channels, free WiFi and other amenities. When you are ready to stay at our hotel again please call our hotel directly and someone in our guest services will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is conveniently located a short and easy walk from the parks and Downtown Disney.  The rooms were spacious, clean and very comfortable. Overall a great stay and great value for money!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and wonderful comments. We strive to give our guests the best service at an affordable price. we offer free WiFi, premium hd tv, free on demand channels along with other amenities. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you are ready to make another reservation please call our hotel directly and our friendly guest service representatives will glad assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: A clean room with comfortable beds.  Quiet for the most part.  For the price and the location, we will stay here again.  Being able to walk to and from the park makes this a prime location for exhausted families.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and good review of our hotel. We pride ourselves on making sure all of guests needs are met and their stay is enjoyable. We look forward to you staying with us again. We are conveniently located Disneyland and Adventureland. We offer free WiFi, premium hd tv, complimentary on demand channels and other amenities. When you are ready to stay at our hotel again please call us directly and someone in our guest services will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: This little gem is located on the backside of DCA.  Very comfortable walk to the resort.  Safe, clean and ample parking.  Hardwood floors, newly remodeled, TONS of power outlets throughout the room.  Extremely helpful and superbly friendly staff!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and your great review of our hotel. We strive to give all of our guests the best service and accommodations. Our hotel has been newly renovated and all of our rooms include premium hd tv, complimentary on demand channels, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, air conditioning, coffee/tea maker and other amenities. we are within walking distance of Disneyland and located near amusement parks. When you are ready to stay with us again please call our hotel directly and speak with one of our friendly guest service agents and they will gladly assist you in making your reservation and be sure to ask about our hotel specials and vacation packages.

Summary: Our room was clean except for the bed spread.  I guess I watch too much TV.  Vanity in the bathroom was very small.  I would prefer if the coffee maker was in a different location.  We heard lots of footsteps from up above and kids outside.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your Thanksgiving vacation. We apologize about your bedspread being dirty. We strive to provide our guests with clean rooms and excellent service and we will immediately check into this. We are conveniently located to all the major theme parks along with Ripley's Believe It Or Not. Our hotel offers free parking to all of guests. The next time you are ready to stay with us please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service agents will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay for Disneyland attendees
Summary: Friendly employees. The room was clean.  Loved the gift bag of waters and chips.  The ten percent off at Coco's  and Tiffy's was an extra surprise    The walk to Disneyland was relatively short for a senior.  Really short for the younger ones.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star rating and wonderful review. We take pride in providing all of our guests with great accommodations and service. All of our rooms include free WiFi, premium HD tv channels, complimentary on Demand channels, air conditioning and direct dial phone. We look forward to you staying with us again. When you ready to make your next reservation please call our hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service agents will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: I'd recommend Eden Roc to travelers who plan to spend a lot of time in the parks. The rooms are clean and comfortable, and have modern amenities like USB charging. Not many frills with the hotel itself, like continental breakfast, but it's also close to restaurants and stores. Fridge and microwave in room allowed us to keep snacks and drinks cool and to make quick bites.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star rating and great review. We strive to give all of our guests the best service and accommodations. We are centrally located to all of the amusement parks, museums, Ripley's Believe It Or Not and offer free parking to all of our guests. We offer hotel specials and vacation packages. When you are ready to make your next reservation please call or hotel directly and one of our friendly guest service agents will gladly assist you in making your reservation.

Summary: Clean rooms, staff was awesome. Room were  a good size. Best part it was walking distance to Disneyland.  Would definitely stay there again .  Some rooms big enough which would accommodate a family. Great family reunion.
Manager Response: Dear Rosie P.,  Thank you very much for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay and had a great family reunion.  Thank you for your patronage and we will see you soon.

Summary: Huge recent remodel done with excellent results. No breakfast but fridge and microwave in each room. About as close to Disneyland as you can get with extremely well lit walk. Rooms quiet on busy street. Rooms open to outside but very well lit parking lot with loads of security cameras.
Manager Response: Dear B7969WUcharlesm:  Thank you for giving us a four star rating.  I am glad that you like the remodelled rooms, with hardwood floors, 39 inch flat panel tv, refrigerator and microwave in the room. In addition, we have free wi-fi and free parking for every room reserved.  We will see you soon.

Summary Heading: Newly remodeled and a very friendly staff. Our new go
Summary: Have tried several places around Anaheim and this is by far our favorite. It is a very short (7) minute walk to Downtown Disney through the Grand Californian. Restaurants directly across the street. Have stayed twice this year and will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear tigle3,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am thrilled that your stay with us, not once, but twice, this year, were what you expected.   My team and I realize that there are many hotels to choose from in Anaheim, and we are delighted that you chose us.  We will continue to work hard so Eden Roc Inn and Suites will always be your favorite place to stay.  Thank you for your loyalty and hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: One nights rest before the big day
Summary: Came down from Oregon to visit family during the thanksgiving weekend. Spent nights in hotels that meet our expectations, and other that fell very short of a good night's sleep. We had two more days in California. Disneyland was a must. We wanted to arrive the night before venturing into the park the following morning so we opted for a reasonably price hotel within walking distance to Disney. We arrived to extremely courteous service and the opportunity to purchase discounted park tickets at the office rather than wait at the gate in the morning. The room was clean and plenty big for my husband, our teenage boy and myself. Mini refrigerator and microwave are in the room. Free wifi. An outdoor pool, which stood lonely, it being end November. The hotel is right off Katella, the
Manager Response: Dear jackdawg55, Thank you for taking the time to write your good comments about your stay with us. I am glad that in all your many stays in different hotels, we met your expectations. Front desk was extremely courteous and welcoming. And you enjoyed the room --- clean and very spacious room. I am glad that you had a great night sleep as well.  I am glad that Eden Roc Inn and Suites was able to help in accomplishing your mission. Thank you for your patronage and we will see you soon.

Summary: I stayed here with a friend for our trip to Disney Land and its only 10-15 minutes walk away. The hotel had been completely refurbished and was beautifully done. Very clean and comfortable and staff were very helpful. Close to a choice of restaurants and good us routes too.
Manager Response: Dear karensO3861SV, Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am happy that we delivered an excellent service --- in cleanliness  of the room and friendliness of the staff.   We will see you soon.

Summary: Eden Roc was exactly what we needed in a hotel: Spacious, clean, and a walk from Disneyland. It was perfect for a family vacation and we will stay here again without hesitation. Thank you to the staff for their friendliness and accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear pksengjunk, Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that your family vacation was perfect. That your room was what you needed, clean and spacious room. In addition,staff is very friendly and was able to accommodate your needs.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Our family runs all four Disney races and this is the hotel we prefer to stay at.  Great staff, very close to start line, reasonably priced and the rooms are updated and always clean!!  We wouldn't stay anywhere else!
Manager Response: Dear  Susan I,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your nice comments to my team especially to the welcome team and clean team.   Thank you for your loyalty and hope to see you soon the next time you visit Anaheim, CA.

Summary Heading: Clean and super close to Disneyland
Summary: We just returned from our stay here. I was pleased with how clean the room was. We stayed in the family suite. I was expecting the large open room that is in the hotel pictures, but actually got a very small room with 2 queen beds with the sleeper sofa in a small separate room. It was nice to be able to shut the door while kids slept on the sofa bed, but the main room was much too tight to fit us all while watching tv, eating breakfast and getting ready for the day.  I would have requested the larger room if I had known there were two different kinds of family suites.  I appreciated the hard flooring. That's one main reason I chose this hotel. It's hard to keep a 2 year old from crawling and rolling all over hotel dirty carpet. I only wished they would have swiffered those
Manager Response: Dear  emand2, Thank you for your four star rating. I am glad that you enjoy the hardwood floor and the property is clean. Majority of our suites are one large room. However, some guests prefer to stay in a suite with separate rooms,especially if they have kids with them. Our pool is open daily from 10 am -9 pm. Unfortunately, it is not heated. Thank you for letting us know your experience with us and I will pass your suggestions to my team members.  I hope you will consider us on your next visit in Anaheim, CA.

Summary: This was a great hotel and very conveniently located.  It was an easy 10 minute walk to the front gate at Disney and the free parking is right next to the room.  I would highly recommend this excellent hotel!  Our family of 6 was able to stay comfortably on the 2 queen beds and the pull out sofa.
Manager Response: Dear robert_stoner,  Thank you for your very nice comments and giving us a five star rating. I am thrilled that you and your family enjoyed your stay here with us. We know that there are many hotels to choose from in Anaheim, CA and I am glad that you selected Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Thank you for recommending us.  We cannot wait to see you and your family soon.

Summary: Eden Roc Inn & Suites was a lovely hotel. You can tell that it had been recently updated. It was simple and sleek. Nice and quiet. Great security. Very close to Disneyland Resort. The parking lot was small but overall the hotel was great. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Trychel G., Thank You for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. We will continue to work hard so on your next visit with us it will be a five star rating.  We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed here for a night while visiting the Disneyland Resort. The staff was very pleasant, the accommodations were clean, the TV was nice and air conditioner worked great. The rooms had hardwood floors, so there was a bit of noise from the rooms above us. Though the hotel does not have any food, you get a 10% discount if you show your room key at Tiffys or Cocos across the street. Don't lose the room key though; the hotel charges a fee for each lost key. Great value for the money.
Manager Response: Dear  John A., Thank you for your nice review at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay,  friendly staff, room clean and has hardwood floor. In addition, you were able to get a 10% off from the neighboring restaurant just by mentioning that you stayed here with us and showing your guest room key.  Thank you for giving us a four star rating. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc Nov 5 - Nov 7 since we are newly passholders at Disneyland.  What initially brought me to look into staying here was a co-worker stated she had stayed here previous prior to the renovations BUT the prices were reasonable and the free parking was offered.  So obviously I did my research, discussed with my husband and we decided to go ahead and book.  We arrived at the hotel early since we drove in from the Bay Area.  Unfortunately, our room wasn't ready but as previously reviews state, we were allow to park, handed out parking pass and returned at 3pm sharp to find that our room was ready.  Room is very spacious and cozy.  Bathroom is huge which I LOVED. My husband thought that a good swifter on the floor would of been beneficial, which I agree but it was
Manager Response: Dear  Queenie_0001, Thank you for your nice review at Eden Roc Inn and Suites in Anaheim. Thank you for giving us a four star rating.   I know that there are so many hotels that you can stay in Anaheim and I am glad that you listen to the request of your co-worker.  We are always happy when a guest has a great stay with us. It is nice to hear that you enjoyed the spacious bathroom and the  cozy room, air conditioner that worked well, bathroom and showers were clean, etc.  Thank you for your valuable suggestion.  Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward on your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Our go to place to stay
Summary: This has been our go to spot for Disneyland it's walking distance for downtown Disney. And we always appreciate how clean and nice our room Always is! We will stay here again as long it is the best value that we have enjoyed!
Manager Response: Dear Mariela P.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. It is like you, our valued guest, that my team and I will continue to work hard to deliver an excellent service in cleanliness and friendly and warm front desk.   Thank you for your loyalty and patronage. And thank you for being part of the Eden Roc Inn and Suites family and your "go to place to stay."  My team and I cannot wait to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here before..Liked that it was close to Disney and clean..very disappointed this year..They took away the cont. breakfast..That's the only reason why I rebooked...next time I'll look somewhere else..Had to go ask for towels and toilet paper. The maids didn't clean our room the second night.
Manager Response: Dear  Pauli B., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. Your comments are very important to me. Please be assured that I will talk to my team member so we will prevent this from happening again.   We no longer serve breakfast more than a year ago. However, there are two restaurants nearby that when you present your guest room key and mention that you are a guest at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, they will give you 10% off not only for breakfast. But also for lunch and dinner.  I hope you consider us in your next visit in Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel is a convenient location to Disneyland.  It's about a 15 minute walk to Downtown Disney and parks. The room was clean and spacious. Very minimal amenities. Staff was pleasant. We would stay here again. It's a pretty basic motel but great for a quick trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear MelD603: Thank you for taking the time and giving us good comments about your stay. And thank you for giving us a four star rating.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your patronage. And we will see you soon on your visit.

Summary: Great location within 10 minute walk to Disneyland and California adventure park. Can cut through the Disneyland property to get to Disney way a lot quicker.   Room was clean and comfortable however new pillows could be purchased and the sofa bed is in need of replacing due to staining.    We were on the ground floor and it sounded like there were elephants living Above us as every move that was made we heard.   What you need from 11-12 hour days at Disneyland clean room shower and bed. Possibly a little overpriced though.
Manager Response: Dear  kvsc:  Thank You for giving us a four star rating. Your comments are valuable to us. We will continue to work hard so next time you stay with us it will be a five star rating.   We are looking forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel & close to the convention centre
Summary: Great hotel with really helpful staff.  The room was huge & the Wifi was strong. The hotel doesn't include breakfast but it's great value due to the proximity to the convention centre. The hotel is right on the road so there is a lot of traffic noise, and like anywhere else in Anaheim you're going to hear the Disneyland fireworks shows at 09:30-10:00 every evening. I would definitely stay here again :)
Manager Response: Dear Titanstasis, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. I am also glad that you enjoyed watching the fireworks from Disneyland. We will see you soon

Summary: The property was clean. The room that we got has 2 queen size bed. The room was super spacious! It was clean too! The staffs were friendly. Free parking and it was close to Disneyland. Overall it was a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear celle717, Thank you for giving us a 4 star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us ---- friendly staff and room was super spacious and clean.   We will work hard so next time you come visit us,  it will be a five star rating.

Summary: This was my first time staying at Eden Roc, and I'm happy to say it was very pleasant. We got a pretty good deal because I booked ahead of time. We frequent the Disneyland area and have stayed at some good and terrible places. We'll likely stay here on our next visit. Eden Roc was clean and didn't have carpet, which makes it feel cleaner. The room had a microwave and fridge which was super convenient for leftovers. We had a view of the fireworks which was a huge plus. The hotel was about a 15 minute walk to downtown disney (if you walk through Grand Californian). Loved not having to spend money on parking. It's also located right near 2 restaurants. Overall, pretty good place to stay. Staff was friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Theresa A., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. Knowing that you have stayed in different hotels, it was very nice to hear that you were happy and you had a very pleasant stay.  And you enjoyed watching the fireworks from Disneyland.   My team and I cannot wait to see you on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary: One of the better places to stay around disneyland, it is close to park and very clean and quiet.  Beds are comfortable and  cozy. Rooms have a fridge and microwave.  Parking was free and good, lighted up.  We were able to watch Disneyland Fireworks from our front window!
Manager Response: Dear: Colbert767,  Welcome back !!! And thank you for giving us a rating of 5 stars.I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. And you had a comfortable stay. I will pass on the good comments to my team.   We know that you have  other hotels to stay and we are honored that you decided to stay with us again. Thank you for your loyalty. My team and I cannot wait to welcome you back to our hotel next time you visit Anaheim, CA.

Summary: A really great location, near all the main attractions California has to offer. At the front desk Stefanie was very kind and helpful in getting our room and making the entire process so simple. The room was very nice and modern with plenty of space. There housekeeping must do an excellent job because our room was spotless and they were very responsive when we needed something. This is a great place to stay and I would definitely recommend it, you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Mario U.  Thank You very much for giving us a five star rating. I will pass on your good comments to my team, especially to Stefanie. And that your room was spotless. Thank You for recommending Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We will see you soon.

Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc while visiting Disneyland. For the price we paid, we could not have been happier! Easy 10-15 minute walk to the parks, free parking, free WiFi and a well appointed room. Our room felt clean and fresh thanks to the recent refurbishment and even included a microwave.  We would recommend this modern motel for anyone looking for a good value place to sleep whilst spending their days in the Disney parks!
Manager Response: Dear Emily M. I would like to thank you for a very good review and rating us five stars. I am happy that my team delivered an excellent service and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for your loyalty and recommending Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: This was our first hotel of a 4 week across the States. The room was large, clean and the least expensive place were stayed in. The staff we pleasant and helpful. It was very close to Disneyland and place to eat. I would consider this the best place we stayed in. Not the fanciest, just the best all round
Manager Response: Dear Chris P.,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am very happy that among the hotels you stayed in your 4 week across the States. you found Eden Roc Inn and Suites the best. I will surely pass on the compliments to my entire team. My team and I will continue to work hard so next time you stay with us, you will have the five star experience.  Hope to see you soon on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary: Excellent value. Great location - walk to parks. Free parking. Clean, big room. Very friendly staff. No extra charge for two extra people to join us in the room. They were even able to accommodate extra car for free in neighboring lot. It's nice to stay in a hotel where you don't feel ripped off. No resort fee either.
Manager Response: Dear skyejaxon5,  I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. That aside from the excellent value, my staff was able to deliver an excellent service .  Friendly staff and a clean , spacious room. Unlike the other hotels, parking is for free. And we were able to accommodate one additional car to park at Tiffy's.  We hope to see you soon, Skyejaxon5.

Summary: This is the kind of hotel that's great if you pay no more than $75.  We paid over $140 so I consider it a complete rip-off!  The rooms are fine...hardwood floors only.  However, it is not that close to Disneyland, 1/2 block from the Disney property line but more like 5-6 blocks by the time you get into the park.  The hotels on Harbor Blvd. are much closer.  Only 1 ice machine for the entire complex which spreads over 2 lots, no breakfast, no newspaper, no HBO/Showtime/Starz, no elevator (although only 2 stories), no clock. Very skimpy on the towels, exactly two per person.  The internet is the absolute worst I have every had in a hotel.  Even switching to the cellular the signal is bad.  They do not put that sign on the bed/bedside table asking if you want your sheets changed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you're visiting Disneyland, this is definitely your best option! You can also have a discount in some of the restaurants near, I will definitely come back! The room is perfect, very clean and comfortable
Manager Response: Dear  Ligia M., My staff and I would like to thank you for your five star rating. That your room was perfect, very clean and comfortable.   Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon.

Summary: ask for oscar...at the front desk...very helpful.. resort very clean ..friendly staff.. anything you need they will get it for you.. definetely wold stay there again..and so close to disney...excellent restaurants across the street
Manager Response: Dear Russell W.  Thank you for your five star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here. That my staff went all the way to assist you. I will pass on your good comments to my team, especially, Oscar, the Asst. Manager.  Looking forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: I was drawn to the contemporary look of the rooms, and the great location adjacent to the Disney theme parks.  It's just a few minutes walk from the Eden Roc to Downtown Disney, California Adventure, and Disneyland.  The check-in experience was pleasant and efficient.  I stayed in a king room on the second floor.  Although it was close to a busy intersection, there was very little noise.  The room looked just like the pictures on the website.  I appreciated the ample electrical outlets for charging my devices.  The wifi however was slow and insufficient for streaming videos.  Some areas for improvement are:  the quality of the bed and bath linens, towels are woefully small, even for an average sized person, some have permanent stains or discolorations.  The bedding was thin and
Manager Response: Dear MysteryBell,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am sorry that your expectations for the cleanliness of the room and the linen did not meet your expectation. I will talk to my housekeeping team so we will prevent this from happening again.  Thank you again and I hope you will give us a chance to serve you.

Summary: Location is great. Rooms look like the advertisement. Rooms are clean, and the staff is very nice. However, the walls are too thin that other noises come in. Over all the location is the best part, it's about a 10 minute walk to Downtown Disney and a 15 minute walk to the Disney Parks.
Manager Response: Dear Adigabrielaa, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad to know that you felt that everything is great and that you enjoyed your 3 day vacation.  I cannot wait to welcome you back at the hotel next time you visit Anaheim, CA.

Summary: My stay was great. The room was spacious and newly remodeled. Staff were helpful and friendly. Very close to disneyland. Will definitely stay there again in the future. The beds were comfy and the room was completely clean
Manager Response: Dear  Estelac183, Thank you for giving us a five star rating.  I will pass on your good comments to my team. I am thrilled that your stay here with us was great and my team gave an excellent service ---- helpful and friendly. And most of all, your room was very clean and beds were very comfortable. My team and I will continue to work hard so next time you stay with us it will still be a five star rating.  We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Disney weekend for four adults and one child. The rooms were clean and front desk manager was nice and helpful.The one problem I had was that I ordered Disney tickets from California fun tickets that the hotel recommended to me and were to be dropped off at the hotel lobby and I would pay for them when checking in but they never showed up so we had to wait in a long line at Disney to purchase our tickets. Other than that it was a nice stay nothing fancy just a clean room to rest.
Manager Response: Dear  Joe E., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I will pass on your good comments to Oscar, Asst. Manager. I am sorry that the Disney tickets that you ordered were not delivered. I will personally call the person in charge from California fun tickets regarding your incident so this will not happen again.  I hope to see you and your family soon.

Summary: The hotel was clean, and the staff were very nice. We stayed for two nights and everything went by smoothly. my family and I had a pleasant time staying at Eden Roc. We will definitely be coming back to book here again.
Manager Response: Dear Rawliei, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team gave an excellent service -- from the welcome team to the clean team. Thank you for your loyalty and we will see you soon.

Summary: This place is great! I brought my wife and twin daughter's to Disneyland for the kids' 3rd birthday and our request for a room with a fireworks view was accomodated. We were able to check in relatively early and really enjoyed our stay. The only thing I think I would change is that their website did not have a king bed option available and durring our stay there were probably 2 king rooms that were vacant the whole time. Had one been offered, we would have jumped on the opportunity, but other than that, we had a great time. Staff was nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Adamooney90, Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. As we were able to heed to your requests such as checking in very early and a room that can view the fireworks from Disneyland. Unfortunately, our king room can only accommodate up to 2 people . We look forward to celebrating your twin daughters 4th year Birthday with us!!!!

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. Are room was the Newly Remodeled Deluxe King NS it was very clean and it was really nice. Great location about a 10 min walk to down town Disneyland and where you can enter into the park. I would definitely stay here again and I would recommend it to a friend.
Manager Response: Dear Classiczoo: Thank you very much for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team gave you an excellent service---- friendly and helpful staff. And room was very clean and you liked the room. Thank you very much for recommending Eden Roc Inn and Suites to your friends as the place to stay at Anaheim, CA. We will see you soon.

Summary: Stayed for a week for the theme parks. If you want to save your money for the parks this is a great place to stay. Worked out about 85 US dollars a night - a fraction of the price of the Disney Hotels close by and it is walking distance to both the Disney theme parks. Rooms are basic but look like they have been decorated recently - they aren't large but to be frank at that price and you only spend your time sleeping in them it didn't matter.  There are plenty of good restaurants in walking distance and a super market a short drive away. The front desk are also able to get theme park tickets at a good rate for all the major parks. Would stay again at the rate we got.
Manager Response: Dear SkyblueWellington, Thank You for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us for a week. My team and I will continue to work hard to deliver excellent service so as on your next visit we will earn your 5 star rating.  Looking forward on your next visit with us.

Summary: My son and I stayed for 5 nights we received room 129 huge room on the ground floor It was very clean and comfortable. Every morning we ate a great brakfest at cocos which is very close.if you show your key to the room you get 10% reduction :-) It is walking distance from the convention center and Disney although we were lazy ant took a taxi that costs between 8-10$ between the hotel and Disney I highly recommend Eden ROC.
Manager Response: Dear susegal1, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. My team and I are thrilled that you felt that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is "home away from home". I am confident that the tips you wrote  such as where to go to eat, and how much a cab cost from the hotel to Disney will be of great help to our other valued guests. I look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary: The hotel itself is great, brilliant location to walk into Disney, free parking and lovely modern clean rooms. The thing that lets it down is that the hotel also let their rooms out to drug addicts who we clearly witnessed getting deliveries in broad daylight! When you are travelling with young kids this is far from ideal! Didn't spoil the holiday but it's put me off from booking there again!
Manager Response: Dear Lou K., Thank You for taking your time to tell us about your experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We value your comment and thank you for bringing this up to our attention.We assure you that this will not happen again. I hope you give us a chance to serve you on your next visit.

Summary: We've stayed at various budget motels in Anaheim throughout the years. #1 priority is always cleanliness. This motel was subpar in cleanliness. The outer bedding was stained, the bathroom floors behind the door were dirty and the room had one of those AC units that either freeze you/and are terribly loud or you turn it off and suffer the heat.  But most unforgivable of all is the beds/pillows. All of us- adults and children under the age of 8 slept poorly on-no exaggeration- the WORST pillows I have ever experienced. Laughably bad pillows- I ended up sleeping on my sweatshirt. Clean and comfortable- that's the extent of my expectations for a budget motel. This place fails to deliver. 2 stars because the staff are courteous and customer oriented. Prompt and professional. Burn
Manager Response: Dear Sunnywaite, Thank you for taking the time to tell us your experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations. Please accept our sincere apologies for the issues you encountered during your stay. Rest assured that I will be talking to the Housekeeping team to make sure these issues don't happen again. Thank you again and we hope you give us another opportunity to serve you.

Summary: Can recommend this hotel if you are looking for somewhere that is good value and located within 10-15 minutes walk of Disneyland.  Rooms were clean and comfortable and have everything you need.  Only downside was the a/c unit that was right next to one of the beds making it impossible to use comfortably at night when sleeping.  Young lady on reception was very helpful when we arrived early off a 12 hour flight and gave us an early check in which was most appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Christine P., Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I want to thank you for recognizing my team. We all worked hard to make your stay an enjoyable one. I am glad that your room was clean and comfortable. And even though , check in time is at 3 p.m., my front desk staff, was able to check you in earlier than 3 pm. I will pass on your good comments to my team.  Looking forward to seeing you soon and your family.

Summary: Super clean, cheap, close to Disneyland! Would definitely stay again üòä front desk was friendly and helpful as well, wish the shuttle stopped there though but it does stop at a nearby hotel. Good, safe parking as well.
Manager Response: Dear Karalee G., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I want to thank you for recognizing my entire team. We all work hard to make your stay a great stay. Thank you for your loyalty.  My team and I cannot wait to see you and your family the next time you are here in Anaheim, California.

Summary: Great location - 7-10 min walk to Disneyland via California Adventure Hotel.  Stayed in a double queen bed room on second floor. Room very clean and spacious. Beds and pillows comfortable. Pretty basic room but good value. Pool small. Heard some noise but not enough to bother us. Recommend second floor to avoid overhead noise.  We spent 10 hours or more at parks and out to dinner so really only used room to sleep and rest feet for an hour or so in afternoon.  Would stay here again if Disneyland was all I was doing as you only need room to sleep at night and sometimes rest in afternoon before going out again. If I had a few extra days I would choose a hotel with more facilities and better pool. Good value for $$.
Manager Response: Dear  Kath R., Thank you for taking your time to share your experience with us. I am glad that you felt the beds and pillows were comfortable. And the room was clean and spacious. Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Great value here, the place is not on a "main road" into the Disney complex so traffic noise was pretty low, at least in our room.  The remodel was done pretty well and the room was big enough.  It was very nice having the microwave and small fridge to store b-fast foods during the week.  The beds were very comfy and they include lots of pillows! My only gripe would be that I'd love a hot tub on site.  After a week in the parks that would've taken the edge off.
Manager Response: Dear johnbL2806OR,  Thank you for giving us a four star rating. I am glad that the microwave and the small fridge worked well for you. And the beds were comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you next time you visit Anaheim, CA.

Summary Heading: Great Place for the price and being next to Disneyland
Summary: It was a very nice stay for 2 nights. Great price and greeted by a nice fellow behind the counter that checked us in. Rooms were really nice and equipped with everything. To microwave, Fridge and even a nice size television. Iron board, iron and even hairdryer. Again they had every essential thing you needed there. Booking direct with them got us free parking pass to park there. Very nice location to everything. Again great for the buck. Definitely recommend it for everyone and looking forward to doing business in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Ray N, Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am very happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. And you felt that the amenities and the service were all you expected and deserved. I will pass on your good comments to our front desk team. Thank you for recommending Eden Roc Inn and Suites, in Anaheim, CA. My team and I are looking forward in meeting you soon.

Summary Heading: Clean and newly remodeled basic loging.
Summary: It was exactly what I needed and at the right price and location. Clean, comfortable, and close to the convention center and across from Disney if that's where you are headed. Also, checkin and checkout was a breeze and they offered to watch my bags on the day I checked out so I could carry on with my activities without lugging everything around,
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan L., Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that my team were able to deliver an excellent service in cleanliness and at the front desk. Even went above and beyond by keeping your luggage so you can enjoy the rest of your day.  I hope to see you soon.

Summary: The hotel is recently remodeled and looks great. Love the wood floors . Love the location  very close to where we needed to be. All front desk members were super nice and helpful.  Only thing that would make it better is if they provided a breakfast .
Manager Response: Dear julielU8531BL, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad aside from a clean room, and the amenities we provided in the room, you love the hardwood floors.Thank You for your nice remarks about my front desk team.  We value your suggestion and we look forward to meeting you soon.

Summary Heading: Quick and easy check in, and close to Disneyland
Summary: I booked through hotels.com and their website said check out was 9am, but when I arrived check out time was 11am. My check in process was very quick and easy. My room was nice and spacious, and the beds were comfortable. This was my first time here and it's near the parking structure towards the back of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Ruth T., Thank You for giving us a five star rating .  I will pass on your nice remarks to my welcome team and clean team. We know that you have many hotels to choose from in Anaheim, CA.  And we are happy that you have selected us. I look forward to welcoming you back next time you visit this area.

Summary Heading: Walking distance from Disneyland Theme Park
Summary: If you're looking for a basic, one-night stay near the theme parks, Eden Roc Anaheim is the perfect place to stay.  It's very cost efficient and clean.   Party (front desk) was very friendly and allowed me to park my car during the day while my family visited CA Adventures.  It's very centralized and walking distance from downtown Disney, parks and restaurants.  Eden Roc is more like an upgraded, cleaner motel than a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear  Jeffrey K, Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am happy that my  clean team delivered a clean room during your stay with us. And my  friendly front desk team was able to assist you in terms of parking your car here after you checked out. I will pass on your good comments to Parth.   Hoping to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disneyland but dirty floors and found bugs in bathroom!
Summary: At first glance our room seemed nice and  clean.  Then I walked in the room without any shoes on.  My feet were filthy...ick!!  We wore our sandals the rest of our stay there.  We killed 5 Silverfish (gross nasty little bugs) in the bathroom over our 4 night stay.  I only hope they weren't crawling in bed with us on the comfortable beds.  No alarm clocks but the microwave had a clock on it.  Our friends in another room asked for a wake up call which they got but an hour late. The guy who checked us in was very nice and helpful.  However, we stopped in the office to get more towels late one night when we got back from the park, and the guy there acted like we were bothering him (he wasn't the guy that checked us in).  Not sure what his name was.  You definitely can hear the
Manager Response: Dear  tjssadie, Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience with us here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectation. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the issues you brought up during your stay. We thank you for bringing these to our attention and I can assure you that I will be speaking to my front desk and housekeeping team to make sure these issues will not happen again. Thank you again and I hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you during your next visit here in Anaheim, CA.

Summary: This is a simple motel, but clean. I was there for three nights and was glad to have found it. Staff is very friendly and helpful. It is in a great location for walking and easy access to Disney. Walked quite a bit. Recommend walking to the corner of Harbor and Katella for food selection. Target is about 15 minute walk for incidentals. Ten minutes to Ruth's Chris or Morton's for steak, or simple fast food. Near Target is Red Robin, or other chains. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Denise L., Thank You for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you have found us. Thank you for writing an excellent review. I am thrilled to know that my team delivered , friendly and helpful staff and a clean room. I am glad that you enjoyed your three night stay with us. I am sure that your tips on where to go and where to eat will be helpful to our valued guests. My team and I cannot wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary: The staff has always been accommodating and courteous. The hotel, since the renovations, is a comfortable place to stay, and we enjoy coming back every year. We know that we will be taken care of when we stay.
Manager Response: Dear homeonthestage, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay here every year. We thank you for your loyalty. My team and I will continue to work hard to deliver an excellent customer service and clean room.    My team and I cannot wait to see you on your next visit.

Summary: We were very pleased with our stay at Eden Roc, rooms were exactly as expected, staff was friendly and helpful, quick 10 min walk to Disney land and great restaurants nearby! We would definitely stay here again great price for a great location!
Manager Response: Dear nguerrero2009, Thank you for your 5 star rating. We are happy to hear that you felt the room was exactly what you expected, great price and a great location. And that our front desk team was friendly and helpful.We look forward to meeting you soon.

Summary: From the St. Didacus team, we would like to thank you for your excellent customer service, nice clean rooms and facilities and the attention to the needs of our large youth team. It made our trip less stressful and more enjoyable. Thanks again!
Manager Response: Dear ornelasangie13, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I understand how hard it is to travel with a group of young people. And I am glad to know that we were able to make your stay a less stressful and enjoyable one. I will share with my team members the good comments you have given us. My team and I cannot wait to welcome you and St. Didacus team back to our hotel the next time you visit Anaheim, CA.

Summary: First time staying at Eden Roc. Recently remodeled and is like new.  Nice and clean family suite on bottom floor with lots of extra room for baby beds, luggage and seating. We traveled with adult children with 2 year old and 5 month old. Their room on 2nd floor was also clean and neat. Front desk staff was professional and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear klinatravelcom, Welcome to Eden Roc Inn and Suites in Anaheim, CA. We thank you for choosing us as we know you have a variety of hotels to choose from. I am glad that you enjoyed the clean and spacious family suite. And my friendly team at the front desk. Looking forward to see you and your family soon.

Summary: We've stayed at the Eden Roc Inn and Suites for 2 trips to Disneyland this year.  It's a clean, affordable place to stay with friendly staff and we haven't been disappointed.  There is road noise, but we travel with a white noise machine so it hasn't been an issue for us.  You can see the fireworks from the 2nd floor but unfortunately you do need to leave your room to view them.  I'm a bit torn on the hard floors.. I prefer carpet with my 2 little girls, but I do appreciate that you are able to tell how clean the floors are.
Manager Response: Dear  JuniperTree, Thank you for giving us a four star rating I am glad that we have not disappointed you on your 2 visits with us. We will continue to work hard to give you excellent customer service at the front desk and clean room. And to all our valued guests.  Thank you for your continued loyalty.  Hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent property close to Disney!  Second stay in 6 months.
Summary: Beautiful rooms, newly remodeled, with easy access to Disney and Convention Center.  Great staff that were friendly and professional with each and every interaction. Clean pool with perfect hours. Nice restaurant options: All within walking distance.
Manager Response: Dear Jodibrad,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I want to thank you for recognizing my entire team. We all work hard to make everyone's stay a great stay. ------ twenty-four hour friendly and professional service and beautiful and clean room. I am glad that you were able to use the pool.  Thank you again and hope to see you soon.

Summary: The Hotel was really clean and the staff members were greeted my family well. They allowed to have a comfortable stay that is right next to disneyland. Since we went to disneyland, we were able to leave our car at the hotel and walk to disneyland (since it was so close).
Manager Response: Dear MarioBacca,  Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am glad that you and your family had a comfortable stay. I will pass on your good comments to my team. We are looking forward on your next visit with us.

Summary: It was a great place to stay at friendly service great room walking distance to Disneyland.  The rooms a big and comfortable and very clean.  Price was reasonable I would recommend this hotel to friends and family
Manager Response: Dear Q7609VQelenam, Thank you for taking the time to give us a five star review. It's great to hear that my team was able to make your stay an enjoyable one.---- Friendly Service and a Very Clean Room. Thank you for your loyalty. And thank you for recommending this hotel, Eden Roc Inn and Suites, to your family and friends, as a place to stay in Anaheim, CA.

Summary: Stayed for three nights with family.  Could be really good with a few changes.  Would have rated slightly lower but for the price paid compared to other hotels in the area, you do get a bargain. The rooms are newly refurbished to a modern style with hard flooring which would be nice if they were clean, did find the bottom of our feet black after walking on, also the hard floor was noticeable for noise from the room above.  Did find the odd stray hair in the beds on inspection but otherwise clean. Pool is small but we did not plan on spending time in it, so not a problem for us. This is no frills accommodation but if you are not spending time around the hotel then the price you pay is good.   The main pro for this hotel is its location to Disney, around 20 minutes‚Äô walk to the
Manager Response: Dear Kiddy Boy, Thank you for taking your time to give us a four star rating.  I will pass on to my clean team the issues you have encountered during your stay so these will not happen again.  Thank you for your suggestions and we hope that on your next visit to Anaheim, CA, you will consider us on your next lodging needs.

Summary: The renovated rooms were really well put together! I'm always a little sketchy with carpets in hotels but was surprised the rooms didn't have carpet. No carpet should be the standard. It's walking distance to Disneyland and there is a diner extremely close.
Manager Response: Dear Jesus152, Thank you for giving us a five star rating. It's nice to hear from you that aside from the amenities in the room, you like the hardwood floors  We thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you back to our property the next time you visit Anaheim, CA.

Summary Heading: Close enough to walk to Disney / saves you a TON of money
Summary: This is my second stay here. Booked direct to save 15% , it was a bargain for the proximity to Disneyland. A 2 day stay. Check-in was painless and quick. Room was nice and clean. There was a small glitch with the sink faucet - it only worked with hot water. A quick call to front desk, had someone looking at it very fast, and it was fixed. I really enjoy there is no carpet in the room. Doesn't turn your socks black. Room had microwave, coffee maker, fridge, large LCD TV, power ports on desk. Beds were comfy. I especially like the RF ID proximity card for door. It doesn't need to be swiped. You can keep it in the same lanyard badge holder as your Disney pass, and it still works.  You walk straight north to the Grand Californian hotel, cut thru the lobby to Downtown Disney, and you
Manager Response: Dear Sept.1967, Thank you for giving us a five star rating and sharing your experience with us. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will pass on your good comments to my team! Welcome, Clean and Maintenance team.  We will continue to strive hard to give excellent service to our guests. I know for sure that your tips and suggestions, especially, the short cut way on going to Disneyland from Eden Roc Inn and Suites will be very helpful to our other valued guests. We cannot wait to see you on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary Heading: Stellar Customer Service and Great Accommodations!
Summary: My family and I are season pass holders to Disneyland and we have stayed at many motels in the area. To date, Eden Roc has given us the best experience. The room was spacious, modern, comfortable and clean and the housekeeping and front desk staff were very attentive and friendly. You can't beat the location and the discounts received because we were Eden Roc customers at the local restaurants is just icing on the cake.   Aside from the aforementioned, the manager went above and beyond to return a very special blanket that belongs to our son. he has had it since infancy and it was accidentally left behind in one of our beds. The manager not only located the blanket but mailed it back to us at no cost.   We highly recommend this motel and will be visiting them again in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Anthony, Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am so thrilled that my team delivered a stellar customer service ---- clean room and very attentive and friendly staff. I am glad that Oscar, Mgr., gave an exceptional service to you and your family. I am glad that your son has his favorite blanket with him again.
