Thank you very much for highly recommending Eden Roc Inn and Suites in Anaheim. We will see you soon and your family.

Summary: The hotel looks like it was recently remodeled. It's very clean and quiet. Only about a 10 minute walk to the park. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We will most definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear CKgomes, Thank you for taking your time to give us a five star rating , Yes, we renovated the entire hotel. Room has new furniture,  39" flat panel TV, ref., microwave, hardwood floors, one cup coffeemaker, hair dryer, Iron and board, etc.) We also have free WIFI and free parking pass (one room reserved, one free parking space) I am happy, that you, our valued guest, were happy with us. I am proud that my team was able to help you and deliver an excellent service and a clean room.  My team and I are looking forward on seeing you soon.

Summary: Wonderful hotel with clean and spacious rooms and very friendly staff! The hotel is also located at a walking distance from Disneyland which is great. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Vicky K., Thank you for giving us a five star rating. I am very happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. And that our front desk staff gave you an  excellent service. I will pass your good comments to my team. I look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future.

Summary: Positives: 1. Walking distance to Disneyland/downtown Disney 2. Quiet hotel area, not congested like the area where all the hotels are near the harbor entrance to the park.  3. Good customer service. Manager was very helpful 4. Rooms are not fancy, but have everything you need & for the most part clean.  5. No parking fees 6. We got it for under $100, which is where I would value it. I would not pay more than that.   Cons:  1. The floors were a little dirty. Since they have what looks like to be pergo and then tile floors, they hold a lot of dirt. I watched the maids clean & they spray the floor with a spray bottle and then use a swiffer stick that they attach a regular towel too to go over the floors. This does not do enough & leaves the floors still with dirt. If they would
Manager Response: Dear Aninem, Thank you for your 4 star rating and sharing your detailed review of your experience with us. I am glad that you felt the service, cleanliness and the VALUE for the money were what you expected and deserved. We welcome your suggestions and will work on improving them.   I hope to see you soon.

Summary: My husband and I jumped in the car this morning,  and searched for reasonably priced hotels near disneyland.  We saw this one listed at $99 and closer than some of the others that were more expensive.  We figured it would be shady,  but we needed it for a quick overnight.  We got here and we're impressed.  The hotel is closer to California adventure,  and we entered the park through Grand Californian. It's very clean and the staff were great.  We'll definitely stay here again.  I feel like we found a little gem. The down side,  no real amenities.  It's a great place to sleep,  not vacation.
Manager Response: Dear AnnaMoC, Thank you for your time in  sharing your experience with us. I am glad that you selected us that morning when you were looking for a place to stay. I am happy that you enjoyed your stay ---from our friendly staff and a very clean room.  Your "little gem hotel" is waiting for you next time you visit Anaheim, CA.  Anytime.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay - close to everything
Summary: I stay at Eden Roc every year when I bring my daughter over from Australia. I have never had any issues with the place. Clean tidy and super close to everything. Once I am there, I rarely use my car. I walk to disneyland, gardenwalk and downtown disney. I highly recommend this place  to stay. Friendly staff and a safe place to stay. The only thing I wish they would improve on is their Wifi - I can never get on it.
Manager Response: Dear KatieImogen, Thank you for giving us a 5 star rating. I am elated that Eden Roc Inn and Suites has become your "go to hotel" every year with your daughter. I will pass on your good comments to my team.  Thank you for your loyalty and continued patronage. We will continue to strive hard, give the best service and cleanliness to our valued guest, like you. Thank you for highly recommending us for hotel accommodation in Anaheim, CA. See you next year.

Summary: First of all the hotel is located within walking distance of Disneyland. The rooms were very clean and spacious. The family suite has plenty of room and the beds are comfortable. The staff were very friendly and helpful. We were even able to stay parked after our check out time. You can request this as long as there are spots available. I would definitely return and stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Darin H., Thank you for writing a great review and a 5 star rating. I am thrilled that you felt everything was great -- from a very clean and spacious room to a friendly and helpful staff. I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. My team and I cannot wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Anaheim, CA.

Summary Heading: Clean, no frills motel close to Disney
Summary: My family and I booked a night at the Eden Roc I'm so we could have a stress-free, early start to our day at Disneyland.   The hotel was recently renovated, so the rooms were clean and relatively attractive, but we're missing a few little amenities, especially considering on the price.  Our room had two double beds (I'm pretty sure it was advertised as two queens), a refrigerator and microwave, television, desk and chair, hairdryer and coffee maker, but no extra pillows or blankets, no body lotion or hair conditioner, no lamps (only bright overhead lighting), tiny towels and the wifi was spotty/slow (I had to turn my hot spot on for an early morning video conference for work). The bed was decent, though not the most comfortable I've slept on.   There was a 15% discount offered
Manager Response: Dear Kristin L.,  Thank You very much for letting us know your experience with us. We appreciate your feedback and will work on improving to give a better service. Our records indicate that we do not have double beds. We only have either queen size beds or king size beds. Unlike, other hotels which charge parking, our parking is free for our valued guest. (one room reserved is one free parking space until check out time). Unfortunately, due to limited parking space especially during high season we are not able to extend parking privileges of our guest. I hope you will consider us in your next lodging needs.

Summary: We stayed there again before the remodel during the remodel and after the remodel, if you can't say that then you don't know what changes and improvements this establishment has gone through.  We had several more family members staying with us and the room Oscar gave us for early check inn was great.  We used the room just for sleep and shower.We visited Lego land, sea world, and Disneyland and visited several family members inn the area, eden roc provides a central locations to access all the family and entertainment for a reasonable price.  Eden Roc continues to provide us the best price inn the area and also closest place to sleep and access Disneyland and other resorts.  Free parking, Wifi, and access to other restaurants and groceries were done of the things we enjoy while
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Samoan husband with family, My staff and I are very happy to see you again. I am glad that every time you stay with us it is always a pleasant stay.  I will pass your good comments to my team,especially to Oscar. It is like you and your family, our valued guests, that we strive hard to give our very best --- in cleanliness and service.  Thank you for your loyalty and being part of the Eden Roc Inn family.  I cannot wait to see you and your family soon.

Summary Heading: Our "go to" hotel at the Disneyland Resort now.
Summary: Long ago I looked at this place and thought it was a dump.  I'm glad I tired it again! It was great!    The whole place is remodeled and it was terrific. We stayed last Mon-Wed nights and really enjoyed our stay. The rooms were nice and new and clean. The beds were comfy, A/C worked great. We had a corner/upstairs room and didn't hear any noises, ( I always have the A/C fan running at night).   It was maybe a 15 minute pleasant walk to the Disneyland front gates. As soon as you cross the street you are on Disney property.   No complaints at all about the Eden Roc.  This is now the first place I'll check for rooms when we go back to Disneyland. (I hope the prices don't skyrocket like other hotels around Disney have in the last few years).
Manager Response: Dear Bhob, Thank you for giving us another chance and tried Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your go to hotel.  We are happy that on your last visit, we made you happy.  We pride ourselves in giving the best service at the desk and cleanliness of the room. Again, Welcome back and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed for a trip to Disneyland which came in handy because it was within walking distance. Great room service, the room was clean I personally did not like the AC unit next to one of the beds but it's manageable, reasonable prices would have it mind next time we decide to come back to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located approximately ten minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. It is a fairly new property that offers all guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. Our customer services is exceptional, as well as our housekeeping service. Many restaurants and stores are also within walking distance. And as many guests have stated, our room rates are very affordable. Thank you for the wonderful feedback and we look forward to having you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites in the near future.   Kind Regards, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed in September 2015 for 8 nights we had a great time in a newly renovated room so close to Disneyland and the pick up stop was on the corner near the diner. Very close to the Disneyland hotels why stay there when you can stay here for less then half the price
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback during your stay back in September of 2015. Please note that ever since your last stay, our rooms are still as impeccable as when you first stayed with us. The work that our amazing team performs is the reason why our rooms are immaculate and well appointed. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is conveniently located within walking distance to Disneyland. We provide free Wi-Fi and parking to all our guests. And there are also many restaurants and stores within walking distance. We look forward to providing you with another amazing stay during your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My go to!! Home away from home! Hidden gem!!! The cleanest hotel ever! Very nice and helpful staff! Beautiful custom flooring and crown molding :) GREAT room size! This is my new and one and only favorite place to stay when going to Disney! I have NO complaints with this wonderful and great priced place!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such a wonderful review on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. As we have previously stated, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property that offers all guest very affordable rates, when compared to other properties of the same quality and service as our Anaheim property. Thank you for great compliments you have regarding the very nice and helpful staff. We look forward to providing you with another amazing stay.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: After reading a few reviews prior to my trip, I requested a family room on the 2nd level. The room is smaller than in the picture though we were out all day, didn't really hang out in our room, so for us it didn't matter. The hotel is newly renovated but if not maintained to high standards it has the potential to look grubby a few years down the line. Hotel is in a great location for Disneyland visitors, it's a 10 minute walk to the park. Disneyland fireworks can also be viewed from the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your current trip to the city of Anaheim/Disneyland. We greatly value your feedback and we will take into great consideration your advice about maintaining the immaculate conditions of the entire property. Please know that every single room is inspected on a daily basis and whenever a fault is found in a room, that issue is quickly fixed.   Eden Roc is located, just like you said, ten minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. The property offers all guests free Wi-Fi and parking and best of all, most guests are able to see the spectacular fireworks that are displayed every night at Disneyland from the comfort of their rooms.   We hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel is cute and quaint. I actually loved the newly remodeled family suite. I'm super sad to say tho that it was filthy... The floors were not only not mopped , but had to have not been mopped a few stays. There was dripped food in several places that came up with a washcloth. After a "towel mopping" the beautiful floors shined so then I was positive they had not been cleaned in some time. In addition to the floors there were food chunks along the side of the mattress in the wood base, and mascara on the counter and mirror that also came up with a towel. There was also mold growing on the beautiful shower tiles and an overwhelming mold smell coming from the vanity sink. The pool was nice and warm, but was over-run with crickets and roaches... There were 6 crickets in my
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us an opportunity and staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to the city of Anaheim/Disneyland. Thank you also for the detailed review you have for us, and please accept our most sincerely apologies for the issues you found with the room that was given to you. You will be pleased to know that we have showed your review to our housekeeping department. Your feedback has helped tremendously as now they double check a room before declaring in available. We hope the entire family was able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi and parking, as well as the walk to Disney's main entrance. We truly hope you will be able to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed at Eden Roc this summer. I saw the rooms online and that's what sold me. The rooms were spacious, clean, and very well decorated. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. We were able to walk to Disney which saved on parking. Would definitely stay there again. Rate was fantastic. Discount when booking directly through them.
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled property. As you just stated in you feedback, Eden Roc is the ideal hotel for several reasons:  1. It is a newly remodeled hotel.  2. Eden Roc offers affordable and discounted rates.  3. It is within walking distance to Disneyland, and adjacent to the Convention Center.  4. When other hotels charge for Wi-Fi, Eden Roc offers it free of charge.  Thank you for the wonderful words you have regarding the friendly and helpful service from our front desk team members. We look forward to having you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: I was better the last time
Summary: It was good but not as good as it was. We got a probably used to be a smokers room and it made our cloths smell, guy at the desk was rude when I asked about checking in early which he said no. Done it before.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. Please accept our apologies for not having exceeded your expectations from the previous time you stayed with us. Please call us and let us know were we failed so this does not happen again. We truly hope you will give Eden Roc Inn and Suites another change at staying with us.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: 4 night stay  Pros: Was able to check in early, room was nice, aprox. 20 minutes fast walking to disney park entrance, cold a/c. Cons: One day housekeeping said she needed to come in to  replace towels which she did. she also cleaned restroom and took out the trash, "nice".  However, another day different lady came but she only took towels, didn't take out trash or replace our towels or toiletries until several hours later.   Suggestions: hire more help, add ice machine to rooms behind lobby, offer breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are pleased to hear that our team members were able to accommodate you for an early check-in, and that our newly remodeled rooms were to your pleasure. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located within walking distance to Disneyland and adjacent to the Convention Center. Your comments and suggestions will be taken into great consideration, and we will inform our housekeeping department how to property clean and stock a room. We look forward to having you stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites in the near future.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean and short walking distance to Disneyland!
Summary: The front desk staff was very friendly. The new remodeled rooms are amazing!!! Love the hardwood floors and the decor. The room was clean!  Short walking distance to Disneyland. I will definitely be staying here again!  The only problem I had was parking, not a lot of parking spaces.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing Eden Roc Inn and Suites with a four-star review. We are happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay and that you loved our newly remodeled rooms. We are especially happy to hear that you liked our hardwood floors and the short walking distance to Disneyland. Thank you for already thinking about coming back to stay at our Anaheim property.   Kind Regards, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed in room 124 which was an accessible room and so the bathroom was HUGE. Recently remodelled so everything was looking very new. Would be nice to have lamps by the bed. The ceiling light was very bright.  Excellent TV quality in HD. You don't see that in a lot of motels.  Free parking.  Downtown Disney is a 10 minute walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites in a newly remodeled property located within walking distance to Disneyland. As you were able to see during your stay, our newly remodeled rooms come with hardwood floor, flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Free parking and Wi-Fi is also offered. We will take care of the issues you found with the room according. We hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim/Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Cons- - The new style made us feel we were in a studio rather than a hotel. - Way too much echo in the room. - The people above us were so noisy. It sounded like a dance studio above us. - The floors were filthy. My 1 year old niece had dirty hands, feet and knees after only being in the room for an hour. We later realized they don't mop, only sweep when cleaning the rooms. - The sound of crickets every single night - Crickets were in our room 2 out of 4 nights (that we know of). - Didn't get new towels or toilet paper one of the days. - Closet space and drawers are limited (only 2 drawers in family suite). - Free parking but family suite only allows one parking space. - Prices are substantially lower for the same room next month. - No breakfast or coffee. - Not many
Manager Response: Thank you for breaking down your feedback on our property into two different categories. It is really helpful the way you have broken down your review. Please know that we are open 24 hours and our team members could have taken care of any issue you encountered during your stay; we are always one phone call away. Also, when compared to other properties of the same quality as Eden Roc, we offer the most reasonable rates. Eden Roc is also consider by many an ideal location, as it takes a family approximately 10 minutes to walk to the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. We are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. We hope that you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on future visits to the Anaheim/Disneyland area.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Quick night stop over for business
Summary: Eden Roc is a great little place to stay for either Business or a family trip to Disneyland which is very close by. Seems like the lobby and lounge was recently re done with a modern theme. Rooms were clean and tidy with modern touches great to see in a mid range hotel. I will definitely be making a trip back to this hotel if I am ever around Anaheim again.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located a few minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. Yes, our Anaheim property was remodeled about a year ago. All rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker, and hair dryer. Even though it is a newly remodeled property, our room rates are affordable. Our customer service is extraordinary, and our housekeeper department is amazing. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback and please consider us on you next trip to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, Very Close to everything
Summary: This hotel is Fantastic I stayed for 5 days in October, Very close to Disneyland. Short walk to many restaurants. Room was clean, Free parking and free wifi was a great bonus,  The only issue i have was no in-room safe and having previous experience in Anaheim where all things were stolen from my hotel room that put me off abit
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to the city of Anaheim/Disneyland. Eden Roc Inn is located just a couple of blocks from Disneyland and is adjacent to the Convention Center. As a newly remodeled property, we offer our guest immaculate and spacious rooms, which come fully furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, and hair dryer. The room rates cannot be beaten, as we have the most affordable rates for a brand new property. We look forward to having you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I really liked the Eden Roc and will definitely stay there again! The beds were comfortable and I personally like the wood floors (felt much cleaner than carpet). We didn't have much interaction with the staff, but the few times we did they were always friendly and helpful The location is really convenient too! Close enough to Disney that the morning drive was short and sweet, but far enough away that you get a break from the craziness at the end of the day.  The only downside was the parking... The lot is sort of small. We were always able to find a spot at the end of the night, so that wasn't the issue.... The drive areas just felt narrow and I was paranoid about backing into someone else's car.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Your compliments regarding our newly remodeled property are greatly appreciated. Eden's location is ideal for those families visiting Disneyland or for those people who are in Anaheim on business, as Disneyland is only a ten minute walk, and the Convention Center is adjacent to our property. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: this is my fifth time to stay in this hotel the remodeling is very good, but more training cleaning staff probably missing, I really like the service they offer in front desk and recommend it every time and experiences of relatives been very good thanks for everything delgadillo family
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. It gives us so a pleasure to hear that this is your 5th stay at our newly remodeled property. We are glad to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay, and thank you for informing us about the housekeeping department and how more training is needed in this department. We hope that you are taking advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. We look forward to your 6th stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Room was nice and spacious for the price, pool was clean. We checked in at 3 like we were told however our room was not ready until after 4. Front office called around 11 and told us to keep it down even tho we had been asleep since about 10 so that was annoying since it woke us up,  also a drunk crazy man was walking around asking for money but management was on top of it and called the police. Other than that it was ok.
Manager Response: Please accept our most sincere apologies for waking you and your family when one of our front desk agents mistakenly placed a call to your room. And also, we would like to apologize for the inconvenience you saw with the person that was asking for money from our guests; we assure you that this is not what you will typically see at our newly remodeled property. We hope that you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi as well as the short walk to Disneyland, and we look forward to having you again at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel to stay at , staff is always friendly and willing to help if you need anything.. Have stayed here many times , even before the remodel. It is a very short walk to get from hotel to Downtown Disney and parks .. Love staying here !!!!!
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you are a repeat guest and that you stayed here before the renovations started. Just as you have stated on your review, we are located about a ten minute walk to the main entrance to Disneyland, and are located adjacent to the Convention Center. Our newly remodeled property offers all guests, free Wi-Fi and parking and a small pool to enjoy during these hot summer days. Thank you for your repeated business.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I just left after a 4 night stay with 3 days at Disneyland.  This was my first stay here but will not be last!  Was already impressed by the great service I received from Parth over the phone before my visit and he continued that great service when we arrived.  I had a great corner room on 2nd floor that was very spacious. I never heard any outside noise. Love the way the room was decorated and laid out. It was not a bad walk to Disney if you cut through Grand Californian.  Great stay for a very reasonable price. I will definitely stay again next time I come to Disneyland!  Thanks Parth and management (and thanks for finding the sunglasses!!).
Manager Response: We are very happy to read of the amazing stay you had at our newly remodeled property and are also glad to hear about the great customer service that was presented to you by one of our highly trained team members. Yes, even though Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, our room rates are very affordable. We offer all guests free Wi-Fi and parking, and we are also located within walking distance to many restaurants, stores and especially Disneyland (10 mins). Thank you for the great feedback and please consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Not too Bad - Close to Disneyland
Summary: We were here a few weeks back.  We checked in late at night, right after Disney California Adventure was closed.  This hotel is very close to the theme parks. Next time, I would park at the hotel and walk to the park.  Room - The room is very clean and modern.  I mean don't expect it to be like the Four Seasons but for this type of hotel and the price, its really not too bad.  We got a suite, right above the main office.  I believe it was room 201.  One thing I do have to say is I can hear the next door tenant talking.  And I mean talking at regular tone.    Check-in - Checking in was painless.  As I  have stated, we check-in around 10pm-ish.  The lady that works there was very friendly and easy-going.  Took about 2-3 minutes and we were in our room.  Parking - Checking in at
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at one of our newly remodeled suite rooms. As you were able to see, it only takes about a ten minute walk to reach the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. And as a newly remodeled property, the rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, hair dryer and free Wi-Fi. For you convenience their is a Coco's restaurant a few feet from our property. There are also many shops and stores also within walking distance. We thank you for your feedback and we hope you see you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good value for what you get
Summary: This is a no frills hotel within walking distance to Disneyland. Room was clean and there was air conditioning. The rooms have been recently updated. The wifi is very spotty. The staff was nice but not overly helpful. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment out of your time to provide us and future travelers with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. First of all, we would like to apologized because our team members did not shined for you during your stay. Please do not let this experience prevent you from coming back to Eden Roc Inn and Suites, because our team members always providing an excellent customer service. We are glad to hear that you liked our newly remodeled property, and that you had a working A/C unit. We will take care of the Wi-Fi problem you experience accordingly, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The "hotel" description was a little misleading, so let's start with the positives: 1. The room was extremely large, which was a bonus. 2. The location is extremely convenient to Disneyland! 3. The staff were extremely friendly. 4. The room was quiet -- we didn't hear anyone and I'm praying no one heard us (noisy kids...). 5. Super close to Target, in case you forgot anything (like we did).  Now for the negatives: 1. This is a MOTEL (you know, like Motel 6), not an "inn and suites," although, I guess calling it an Inn could be deemed appropriate, too. 2. The "Family Suite" is just an extra large motel room. There is no "one bedroom" -- it is a STUDIO! 3. The pool does not look like the picture -- it is small and looks dirty.  Overall, this motel served it's purpose for our 1
Manager Response: Thank you of the kind feedback you have on our newly remodeled Anaheim property. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites and that you found our location extremely convenient to Disneyland (10 min. away). We are glad to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay, and that you also found many shops and stores within walking distance of our Downey property. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I go to Disneyland 5 times a year and we always stay at this hotel.  The location is easy to walk to and from Disneyland, the parking is free, the wifi is free, the rooms are always very clean and the staff is incredibly nice.  It would take a lot to pull me away from this hotel!  Plus, the rooms are updated and modern.  You wont regret staying here!
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located a couple of minutes to the main entrance that leads to Disneyland, for that reason, Eden Roc is the ideal hotel for those families who are visiting such theme park. And just as you have stated, our Anaheim property offers free Wi-Fi and parking to all guests. The newly remodeled rooms come have a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and a hair dryer. Thank you so much for stating that it will take a lot for you to book elsewhere.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Suite was big enough and right next to Disneyland. We liked that the floors were vinyl but they had not been mopped, only swept so the kid‚Äôs bare feet were filthy. We tried several times to login to the WIFI but at a speed of .05 it was worthless. Had to go to Starbucks to use theirs.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites and thank you for providing us with your feedback during such stay. After reading your feedback, we have already spoken with the housekeeping department and have made sure to inform them about the proper procedure when cleaning our vinyl floors ( sweep then mop). The Wi-Fi issue had been fixed accordingly; please apologize us for not having a working Wi-Fi during your stay. We greatly hope that you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff members were helpful and friendly and the location was great.  The room was nice and modern, but keep in mind it is a 2 star motel.  We stayed in the family suite, and it was very large.  The price was affordable for that area.  I have already recommended it to others.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay. And we are also happy to know that the location of our property is what brought you to Eden Roc Inn and Suites as we are located within walking distance to Disneyland. Please note that our newly remodeled property offer all its guest free Wi-Fi, and parking. All our newly remodeled rooms come with vinyl flooring, flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and a hair dryer. Thank you for already recommending us to others and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good location and the price is right.
Summary: The staff was great.   My granddaughter was sick and they let us check in early. The room was spacious and overall clean.  The housekeeping staff could pay a bit more attention to the corners, especially in the bathroom.
Manager Response: We hope all went well with your granddaughter and that she was able to have a speedy recovery during your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Thank you for the comments you have regarding our team members and how they were able to check you in early due to your sick granddaughter. Thank you also for the feedback regarding the housekeeper's cleaning habit; we will inform them to be more careful when cleaning the corners of the rooms so that no small debris of trash is left at the corners of the rooms. We hope you will be able to stay with us on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to stay while visiting Disney
Summary: Great location to Disney & convention center.  Free parking.  Rooms are clean, spacious and comfortable.  Pool was a little small but very clean.  Staff was friendly.  For the price, this place can't be beat.
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc is located adjacent to the Convention Center and about ten (10) minutes away from Disneyland. It is a newly remodeled property, which offers free Wi-Fi and parking to all its guests. The rooms are spacious, come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker and hair dryer. Our team members offer great customer service and the price cannot be beaten when compared to other properties of the same quality and service as Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Eden Roc!
Summary: The proximity of this location to the Convention Center is ideal for us. It's just a short walk from the Convention Center to the rooms, separated only by the Convention Center parking lot. Prices are incredibly affordable and the staff is friendly. Rooms are clean, comfortable, and well-equipped. Couldn't ask for more for the price. If you dine at the Coco's on the corner, remember to ask for the discount for staying here - 10% off!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located adjacent to the Convention Center, which is approximately 5 minutes away. This means that you can save money by leaving your car at our property and by walking to the Convention Center. And as a newly remodeled property, our room rates are very affordable. As you were able to see, the rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker, and hair dryer. Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding our team members and we look forward to your upcoming visit to the city of Anaheim.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice place. Newer, contemporary furnishings. Hotel staff friendly and knowledgable. Would be nicer if they served a continental breakfast. My stay was unpleasant because of people in the next room partying until 2:30am.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that our team members and our newly updated rooms shined for you during your stay. Please do apologize us for the inconvenience you encountered during your stay. We assure you that this is not something typical of our property. We would have loved for your to call the front desk so the issue could be resolved promptly. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Me and my family were extremely in the room and how nice they were. We were all very comfortable there after a long day in Disneyland. All the staff were nice and very helpful in whatever I needed. Thank Eden Roc!!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you and your family had a great experience, both while visiting Disneyland and during your stay at our newly remodeled property. We hope that you and your family were able to enjoy our free wireless internet, as well as our refreshing pool. We look forward to providing you with another amazing stay during your return visit to the city of Anaheim.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The room was huge and super modern . Very clean. I diffently recommend this place to anyone. And within a 10 minutes walk from Disney. I will diffently stay there again next time I Visit. Everything was new and we'll designed
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. As you were able to see during your stay, our Anaheim property is located approximately ten to fifteen minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. Our property is also conveniently located adjacent to the Convention Center, and just as you have stated in your review, all our rooms are modern, up-to-date and immaculate. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking, as well as an exceptional customer service. We look forward to your upcoming at stay Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Its a basic room. It was clean and maintained. It looked to be updated. We had an upstairs room facing Disney park. This was great cause we could see the fireworks display from the balcany at night. There didnt seem to be a lot of parking but we parked the day we got there and didnt move till we left.  Easy walking distance to the park. There is a pool but we didnt use it. Free wifi, refrigerator and safe in room.
Manager Response: Thank for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our newly renovated Anaheim property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the view from the room that was given to you was great, as you and your family were able to enjoy the nightly Disneyland fireworks. Yes, the walk to Disneyland from our hotel is only about 10 to 15 so it behooves our guests to save money on parking at Disney and just enjoy the walk to the park. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Close to Convention Center and Disney
Summary: I was attending a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center, the Eden Roc is super close to the Convention Center and they offer free parking. This is a motel style hotel however the rooms are very modern, extremely clean and the property is well maintained. If you're looking for a 5 Star hotel, stay somewhere else but expect to pay a lot. The Eden Roc is a 4 Star Motel and a great value.  You couldn't ask for a better location!
Manager Response: Eden Roc is located in the ideal location for those families who are visiting Disneyland and the Convention Center. As you were able to see, the Convention Center is located adjacent to our property, which is less than 5 minutes away. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. The newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Thank you for the great comments you have regarding our newly renovated property. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Value Motel Close to Disney.
Summary: Recently returned after a 6 night stay at this hotel.  Cannot be beaten for value/location.  The room was very large (2 queen beds) with comfortable beds, fridge and microwave. Walking distance to Disney Parks via Disney California Hotel/Downtown Disney - approximately 10-15 minutes. Upon check-in requested an upstairs room (quieter due to wooden floors) with Disney view if possible, this was not a problem, in fact they'd already allocated this room (224) for me. Also all staff very friendly/helpful. Returning in December and have requested the same room.
Manager Response: We are extremely happy to hear that your 6-night stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property was greatly enjoyed. As you were able to discovered while staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we offer immaculate and spacious rooms, our room rates are affordable and best of all, we are located just minutes from the main entrance to Disneyland. We provide free Wi-Fi and parking and our team members also provide amiable customer service. Thank you for the kind feedback and we will be awaiting your return stay this December.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We love this hotel! The rooms are really clean, they have great service and I love the modern look but most of all I love that there isn't ANY carpet! All laminate flooring! We're annual pass holders for the last 3 years so we've seen our fair share of hotels and this one by far is the best. Also not a far walk from the parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments you have regarding your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are extremely happy to hear you liked our laminated flooring as well as our spacious and always immaculate rooms. As always, we provide free Wi-Fi and parking to all guests and the room come furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker and hair dryer. The location of our property is ideal for those families who are visiting Disneyland, as we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disney. Thank you for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Did not like this hotel at all.  I felt that the online photos and write ups were very deceiving, and I would not stay at this hotel again.  I had to park in a HC spot - per the manager, since it was the only one left when I checked in.  Staff was few and far between and clientele did not seem that great either.  Stay away if you have young people with you.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us. We appreciate all positive and negative feedback from our valued guests. Our team members are highly trained to provide an excellent customer service and we apologize if we did not delivered. All our rooms are newly renovated. We would appreciate if you can call us at 1-800-714-8700 so we can get more information on how your stay was, in particular the condition of the room was given to you. I hope you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next lodging needs.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The short walk to Disneyland made this hotel so convenient. The rooms are large, clean and beautifully decorated. The bed was very comfortable. We have stayed here 3 times in the last year. I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for been a loyal guest of Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We appreciate to hear that you already have stayed at our newly remodeled property three time over the past year. And that you decide to stay at our Anaheim property based on its close proximity to Disneyland; we are just about ten minutes away! Yes, our rooms are always kept immaculate and are spacious, which come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Eden Roc Inn and Suites also provide free Wi-Fi and parking. Thank you once more for the kind feedback.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Close to Disneyland, great food avail nearby, well equipped rooms, clean & comfortable . Could not fault the staff or facilities . Great Value.. Was beyond my expectations for the cost. Exactly per images on website. Bargain. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback you have on our newly remodeled property. As you might have seen during your stay, Eden Roc is located approximately ten minutes from Disneyland. Our property, yes it is immaculate and does offer free Wi-Fi and parking to all guests. The rooms just as you have stated are well equipped with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, mini fridge and hair dryer. We are happy to hear that our property and team members shined during your stay and we look forward to having you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Eden Roc is a remodeled hotel, featuring a pool, great rooms, some rather large. We had room 228 and it was very spacious. The location is a little walk to the parks, about 15-20 minutes, not too bad. Coco's and Tiffany's are within the block. Rooms have a mini fridge and microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located to Disneyland, as it is only about a ten minute walk to the main entrance to leads to Disneyland. There are also many restaurants within walking distance to our property, as well as many stores. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. And all rooms have a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker and hair dryer. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed 2 nights and it was great. We were able to check in and park the morning we got there . It is an easy walk and you can cut through the Grand Californian to get into California adventure or Downtown Disney. Saved us big bucks on parking. The rooms were very large, very clean, very quiet and comfy beds. The staff was very nice and helpful. We plan on staying here again.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that your stay at our Anaheim property was a pleasurable one and that you had an enjoyable experience during the check in process. As you were able to see, we are located in the ideal location for those families who are visiting Disneyland. And as a way to help our valued guests out, we provide free parking for them. Please know that we also offer free Wi-Fi, and our rooms are newly remodeled, very spacious and immaculate. Thank you for your kind review and we look forward to your next stay.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My family of six stayed in one of the updated family suites.  The rooms were very clean and very spacious.  The TV's are small but we were not in the room much at all.  The hotel is very close walking distance to Disney gates, took us about 10 minutes to walk there.  The grounds were very clean and kept, the front desk staff was friendly and helpful.  Parking was not an issue and it was free.  I do wish they had a breakfast it would definitely be a 5 star rating hotel.  Without it it's a 4. We saw the pool, it was small but nice and clean and we never had time to use it.  Another major point is there are no laundry facilities.  That is something I forgot to check for prior to staying.  My husband had to drive around looking for a 24 hour laundry mat one night because the kids
Manager Response: Eden Roc is located in the ideal location for those families who are visiting Disneyland and the Convention Center. As you were able to see, Disneyland is located about a ten minute walk, and the Convention Center is located adjacent to the property, which is about less than 5 minutes away. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. The newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Thank you for the great comments you have regarding our team members and how friendly their service was. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: For the amazing rate I found on the website for Eden Roc Inn & Suites, this hotel could not be beat! I booked a room with two beds.  The room was very large for a standard hotel, the mattresses were comfortable, an outdoor pool with no one else there (ask front desk for pool towels), and the Paradise Pier hotel was across the closest intersection, along with Disney California.  We walked each day, including for a break in the late afternoon, to and from the hotel and Disney parks entrances and Downtown Disney - about a 1/2 mile each way.  The rooms are updated with new flooring (no carpet), and furnishing, and include a small frig and microwave.  Hotel staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located to Disneyland, as it is only about a ten minute walk to the main entrance to leads to Disneyland. There are also many restaurants within walking distance to our property, as well as many stores. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. And all rooms have a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker and hair dryer. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We had 2 double queen beds rooms next to eachother. The rooms were very spacious and clean with all the amentities that you would expect. It had a swimming pool that was a little exposed to the roadway, but that didn't stop me using it. Disneyland was only a 10 minute walk away through The Grand California Resort. A supermarket was about a 15 minute walk away (or a short bus ride) that had an extensive range of prepaid meals if you are on a budget. There was also a few restaurants nearby, but we never had a chance to use one as we had 3 full days at Disney. The rooms had a microwave and coffee maker. There is no safe in the room and no safety deposit box available at reception. All in all, this was a very nice affordable motel/hotel and I would recommend it to anyone who are
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our team members were able to accommodate your request of putting your rooms next to eachother. And as you were able to see from your recent visit, all our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and are kept in optimal conditions. All our rooms are fully furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. Our property has a pool and we offer all our guest free Wi-Fi and parking. Disneyland is only a 10 minute walk and there are many shops and restaurants nearby. Thank you again for your visit to Eden Roc Inn and Suites and we look forward to your upcoming stay.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very clean , very close to both theme parks. WiFi not so good, this is my #1 chose when coming to Disneyland & California Adventure. Also the pool was very clean, I was able to check in early . This was my 3rd time staying at Eden Roc
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very happy to hear that this is already your third stay at our Anaheim property. And that you always choose to stay at our property due to its close proximity to Disneyland. Thank you for informing us about the Wi-Fi issues you had during your stay. This issue has been fixed accordingly. Thank you for your feedback and we are looking forward your fourth of many more stays.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was my second time staying here and I enjoyed each time I stayed here. The people at the front desk are helpful and kind. The rooms are huge and clean. Nothing to complain about and I'd love to stay there every time I come to visit the area.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your continued stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very happy to read that you enjoy your stays at our newly remodeled property. And we are also glad to hear that our team members always shine for you during your stays. Our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and are kept in immaculate conditions. And as you have seen, our rooms do come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, fridge, hair dryer and personal coffee maker. Please consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your upcoming visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is our second time staying here. The first, 6 nights and the second, three. The rooms are nice and clean enough but the front desk staff is unfriendly at each interaction. The walls are paper thin and our upstairs neighbors kept us up all night. It's close to Disney and that's about the best I can say about the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a couple of minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are happy to hear that this was your second stay at our Anaheim property. And please accept our most sincere apologies for the unacceptable demeanor our team members showed during your stay. Please know that our team members are trained to provide the best and most professional customer service they can. We will talk to them so this issue do not happen again; an issue that should have not happened in the first place. We hope that you will be able to reconsider Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your next visit to Anaheim.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Very clean and 5 minute walk to Disney
Summary: I stayed here for 5 nights and it was a great place to stay for a solo traveller. Room is spacious with all the amenities required and clean towels changed daily.  It's literally a 5 minute walk to Disney and a convienant pick up location for some of the tour bus companies. Fast wifi and friendly customer services. It's also only about 30 mins from Long Beach airport!
Manager Response: Thank you taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located to Disneyland, as located a couple of minutes from the main entrance to  Disneyland. There are also many restaurants within walking distance to our property, as well as many stores. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. And all rooms have a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker and hair dryer. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Decent place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: The Eden Roc is a clean, modern convenient hotel, that is within walking distance to Disneyland. The front staff were helpful and pleasant. The room was a good size. The room has a fridge and microwave which is handy. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Eden Roc is a newly remodeled property located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We are happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay and that you found our newly remodeled rooms to your liking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was a little worried when we first pulled in since this place looks a little tired on the outside, but he rooms look to be newly redone and are quite nice for the price.  The rooms are large, have completely updated bathrooms and were very comfortable.  As others have noted the walls are a little thin, so we could occasionally hear our neighbors.  The Eden Roc is very convenient to Disney once you learn that you can walk through the Disney Grand Californian to get into Downtown Disney and straight into the parks.  It's maybe a 15 minute walk and you only have to cross one street.  Parking is free too which is a big plus when you compare it to other properties in the area.  You can get a decent breakfast at Coco's right across the street too (or grab something on your way
Manager Response: Eden Roc is conveniently located for those families who are visiting Disneyland and the Convention Center. As you were able to see, Disneyland is located about a ten minute walk, and the Convention Center is located adjacent to the property, which is about less than 5 minutes away. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. The newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. And yes, there are many restaurants and shops nearby. Thank you for the great comments you have regarding our newly remodeled rooms and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good price for being so close to Disney
Summary: Great location if you are going to Disneyland.  Overall the this hotel is suitable, if your wanting a reasonably priced hotel. Our room showed some wear and tear.    Our toilet seat broke the first day and wasn't fixed until two days after, even though the housekeeper had cleaned the room and would have noticed it.  It was after I mentioned it to the front desk two days later, then it was fixed.      The room was clean, the bathroom seemed dirty along the baseboards, but the rest of the room was fine.  The linens were worn, but seemed clean.   When I checked in at around 9:00 pm the front desk clerk was not friendly at all. He  seemed annoyed that I was checking in. Our room was tucked away in a dark corner on the ground floor.  We had people stay in the room above us and we
Manager Response: 5.	Yes, location, location, location is what those families who are visiting Disneyland look for when booking a room near such tourist attraction; Eden Roc is located in just the perfect distance. It is only a ten minute walk to the main Disneyland entrance, and the rates are super affordable. The property, as you already know, is a newly remodeled property. The rooms are nicely appointed with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Wi-Fi and parking are also offer at Eden Roc Inn and Suites free of charge. Thank you for informing us of the issues you encountered when you initially checked in and regarding the issues you found in the room. Those issues have been fixed and we just hope your will be able to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I stayed two nights for a Disney Run event.  Although it was completely affordable and clean, I had an unpleasant experience.  First of all they have hardwood floors and I was given a room on the first floor.   I could hear every move the people above me were making.  My first night's stay, the people above me were moving a chair and playing loud music until 2 in the morning.  I called the front desk but nothing was ever done.  The second night was not as bad as the person above me went to bed early.  I could still hear him/her every footstep.  I would suggest getting a room on the second floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during the Disney Run event. We are happy to hear that you decided to stay at our property due to is cleanliness and room rate. Please note that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Please apologize us for the inconvenience your encountered during your first night's stay. The issue should have been taken care off the moment you called the front desk. We will speak to the person in charge so this does not happen again. We hope you will be able to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites in the near future.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Like the fact that there's no carpet and it's actually tile floor. The only complaint is had was the parking spaces. It was a struggle to find parking and trying to move in and out. Other than that friendly staff and the beds were comfortable to lay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed and liked the fact that our room do not have carpeted floors, but instead have vinyl wooden floors. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi, and that the 10 minute walk was also enjoyed. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a quiet place to stay. The front desk was very nice. The inside of the room was very nice. It's the perfect location for run Disney. I would recommend this to my friends. Parking was tight. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to Disneyland. Our Anaheim property is located about a ten minute walk to the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. Our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and immaculate. They are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Thank you so much for your feedback once more and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean hotel at a  reasonable price.
Summary: Hubby and I spent four days at the  Eden Roc and had a wonderful stay. The king room was perfect for 2 people and was impeccably clean. Oscar at the  front desk was friendly and helpful. Even better was the 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Plus, we got a glimpse of the fireworks from the park. One minor drawback was the street noise,  but that was to be expected.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your recent stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. Just as previous reviews state, Eden Roc Inn and Suites has been remodeled completely. The rooms are fully furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. The hotel also offers free Wi-Fi, and parking to all its guests. And yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a short distance away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Our customer service, as you personally found out, is exceptional, as they are very helpful and knowledgeable about areas of interest surrounding our property. Thank you once more for the wonderful feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My sister & I went here for the first time!! It looked liked the picture on the website! Very clean!  No charge for parking- which I love! 5 minute walk to Disneyland!! Has a big room where you can make & have your breakfast or even bring a dinner in to eat!  We plan on staying here in October!!  I love that it doesn't have carpeting!!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such a detailed review on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Just as you mentioned, all our rooms have been recently remodeled, the rooms are spacious, have vinyl floors and come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee/tea maker and hair dryer. Eden Roc is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. By staying at Eden Roc, our guests save money on Wi-Fi, as it is free of charge, and parking (its also free). We hope you have already booked your second stay, if not, we encourage you to do it.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: So helpful, clean, nice people, we loved our stay as much as we loved Disney land. My kids were so happy in the area, they didn't wanna leave. We have a large family but still fit well in our room. Can't wait till next time we come back.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that our newly remodeled property was loved so much by your kids that during check out time, they did not want to check out. At the same time, we are happy to hear that our newly remodeled room was large enough for the entire family, and that they entire family enjoyed our room. As you were able to explore during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. The property offers all its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. And as a newly remodeled property, the room rates are very affordable. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for your Disney trip
Summary: This wonderful property is only a short 10 minute walk directly into the heart of Downtown Disney with easy access to either park.  Very safe and well lite. Be sure to cut through the Grand Californian Hotel. It saves time. The rooms have been recently renovated. I really liked the clean carpetless floors and fresh updating to the rooms. It had a comfortable boutique feel. The beds were really comfortable too. Our room had a refrigerator, micro and flat screen TV as well. The staff were helpful, especially Agnes and Emmanuel. My sister needed a scooter rental (Deckart) and it was delivered to the hotel in plenty of time and picked up when we were done. They didn't have a continental breakfast at the time we were there, but there is a wonderful restaurant called Coco's across the
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you and your family really enjoyed your recent visit to our Anaheim property. Thank you for the wonderful comments you have regarding our property and our team members. As you already know, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. The property offer all guest free Wi-Fi (compared to others hotels who charge for Wi-Fi), and parking. Our property is also located in close proximity to restaurants, stores, and bus stops. We hope you will make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your to-go hotel when visiting the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel but floors could be cleaner
Summary: Love the fact they have no carpet but the floors need to be cleaned better.  Gave my daughter a bath before bed and by bed time her feet were black. Also after house keeping cleaned our room they forgot to restock towels.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent family visit to Disneyland. We are glad to hear that the rooms were better than expected, and that the ten minute walk to Disneyland was enjoyed. We hope you took advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. Please accept our apologies for the lack of towels. We will bring the issue you had with the vinyl floor to our housekeeping supervisor. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Second stay was as good as the first!
Summary: Our first stay here back in December was wonderful so we decided to stay here again for our spring trip. The only thing I wish this hotel offered was a continental breakfast, but other than that is great. They have comfy beds, mini fridge, and a microwave.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent to the city of Anaheim. Our Anaheim property is located about a ten minute walk to the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. Our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and immaculate. They are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Since we are located so close to Disneyland, our guests are offered free parking (money saver), and just to let you know that Coco's restaurants, which is across the street from the property provide 10% discount to guests who are staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites-make sure to present your room key to get such discount. Thank you so much for your feedback once more and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is only mine and my wife's second time staying at the Eden Rock Hotel. Both times the staff have always been very friendly and great us with a smile.  I love how close it is to Disneyland.  Parking can be a little tight but I will be re-booking here
Manager Response: Eden Roc is located in the ideal location for those families who are visiting Disneyland and the Convention Center. As you were able to see, Disneyland is located about a ten minute walk, and the Convention Center is located adjacent to the property, which is about less than 5 minutes away. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. The newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Thank you for the great comments you have regarding our team members and how friendly their service was. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great location by the parks. The rooms were in great condition, the fridge was nice to have, the only thing is there is no safe for valuables which would be nice since we were at the parks all day. The wifi wasn't that great but we were rarely in the room anyways. If wifi isn't a must-have and being near the parks is, then this hotel is perfect.
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. And we are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. All our rooms have been recently remodeled and come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee/tea maker, and hair dryer. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to having you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Having only see this place online , I was not disappointed the photos were spot on the rooms have all been recently refurbished and were clean and fresh, my kids enjoyed the pool and we walked to Disneyland which was close. We were not far from a main road but the traffic noise was no issue. The staff were helpful and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay here
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at our Anaheim property. As you were able to see, we are located just a ten minute walk from the main entrance that leads you to Disneyland. Our newly remodeled property offers free parking and fast Wi-Fi service. Even though Eden Roc Inn and Suites does not offer breakfast at the moment, Coco's restaurant provide 10% off breakfast, lunch or dinner as long as guests present their room key. And just as you have stated, all rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee/tea maker. The property also offers a pool and many stores and shops are also within walking distance. We would love to be your place of stay during your trips to Disneyland.  Kind Regards, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I booked this for my husband, 3 kids (ages 11, 9 & 5) and myself. It was right next to the Disneyland resort, which saved us on parking fees there. The room was clean and quaint. It was extremely nice to have a microwave and refrigerator so we can save money on eating out, however we were given a 10% discount across the street at CoCo's Restaurant because we were guests at Eden Roc which was a nice bonus. Overall, this is an excellent value for the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to Disneyland. Our Anaheim property is located about a ten minute walk to the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. Our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and immaculate. They are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Since we are located so close to Disneyland, our guests are offered free parking (money saver), and just like you said get 10% when dining at Coco's restaurants, which is across the street from the property. Thank you so much for your feedback once more and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We've stayed in many 'budget' motels, either because they are in the right spot to break up a long road trip, or because my kids have a soccer game at the crack of dawn somewhere two hours from our house. Eden Roc is by far the best one we have found - we chose it because we were taking a quick, cheap trip to Anaheim (as you do). Super clean and well maintained, every staff member we encountered was friendly and helpful. We had a room on the second floor, very spacious (except the bathroom, but kudos for having the basin outside of the tub/shower/wc area.) Great to have a microwave/fridge in the room so we could prepare some snacks and breakfasts (a money saver!) But the key thing here is location, location, location. You can walk out of your room and into downtown Disney in
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you and your family really enjoyed your recent visit to our Anaheim property. Thank you for the wonderful comments you have regarding our property and our team members. As you already now, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Summary: The room was huge, clean, and comfortable! Parking was free and the hotel was close to everything Anaheim has to offer. For the price, you really can't beat what you get at this hotel. I would highly recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent family visit to Disneyland. We are glad to hear that the rooms were better than expected, and that the ten minute walk to Disneyland was enjoyed. We hope you took advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. And we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I recently stayed for four nights in a two queen room on the ground floor. I arrived before check-in and, fortunately, my room was available. I was happy to see a clean, well-decorated room with a mini fridge and microwave. In town for a conference at the convention center plus some family time, I was able to walk not only to the conference, but a few restaurants and Disneyland within 15 minutes. Wi fi was reliable. I only have a few negatives. It was noisy staying on the ground floor; I could hear people above me. It didn't keep me awake, but it was noticeable. The shower was slow to drain although I wasn't standing in water. Thanks to a good location, friendly staff like Stephanie and Emmanuel, and a nice room (I saw a room at The Annabella and knew I made the better choice),
Manager Response: Eden Roc is located in the ideal location for those families who are visiting Disneyland and the Convention Center. As you were able to see, Disneyland is located about a ten minute walk, and the Convention Center is located adjacent to the property, which is about less than 5 minutes away. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. The newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer.
