Summary: The location was perfect for access to Disney, which was only a 5-10 minute walk away.  The room was fine, exactly what we expected for the price.  I would suggest requesting a room on the top floor as we could easily hear the people above us, but besides that the bed was comfortable and the bathroom was nice.  There is a couple of great diners only a few minutes walk away.
Manager Response: Yes, location, location, location is what those families who are visiting Disneyland look for when booking a room near such tourist attraction; Eden Roc is located in just the perfect distance. It is only a ten minute walk to the main Disneyland entrance, and the rates are super affordable. The property, as you already know, is a newly remodeled property. The rooms are appointed with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dyer. Wi-Fi and parking are also offer at Eden Roc Inn and Suites-free of charge. Thank you for the review, and please consider us on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very convenient to everything we were doing.  Disneyland is a very short walk excellent corner store for food.  The accommodation itself was comfortable 2 double beds - cleaned well and staff very friendly.  I would recommend it to anyone wishing to travel to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes to inform us about your recent experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are extremely happy to hear that your experience was comfortable and of easy access to Disneyland. As you already know, we are located about ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. All of our rooms have been completely remodeled and they are furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. Thank you for the wonderful comments you have regarding our property and team members and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Convenient location within easy walking distance to Disneyland. Also can walk to coffee shop and restaurants. Rooms are basic with little in the way of amenities. Clean and has been recently remodeled. Staff was only adequate. Placed a birthday card in the main outbox at the front desk on Sunday and was assured they had mail pick up daily. Checked out Wednesday and the card was still sitting in the outbox. Mailed it myself.
Manager Response: Thank you taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located to Disneyland, as it is only about a ten minute walk to the main entrance to leads to Disneyland. There are also many restaurants within walking distance to our property, as well as many stores. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. And all rooms have a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, coffee maker and hair dyer. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Huge, clean room, in a great location
Summary: The room we got was much bigger than we expected. There was a lot of room for our kids to move around. It was clean when we arrived. The 2 Queen beds were comfortable, which is very important after long days at the theme parks. The bathroom was a bit small and in need of updating but it was functional and clean.  We couldn't ask for more in terms of the location. We just cross the road and we start to get the Disney feel. A short cut through the Disney Grand Californian Hotel and you're suddenly in the middle of everything Disney. It is still a fair walk to the gates but it's a fun walk.  The staff were always courteous and accommodating. We brought frozen food because our younger daughter is always hard to feed when we travel and the staff agreed to hold the frozen food in
Manager Response: 1.	Thank you taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Summary: This is about a block away from down town Disney . If you are going to any of the parks this is well within walking range. They have good size rooms that are clean and parking and a pool ( it out side so a little cold )
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent family visit to Disneyland. We are glad to hear that the rooms were better than expected, and that the ten minute walk to Disneyland was enjoyed. We hope you took advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. And we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Thin walls, but nice rooms and a great deal otherwise!
Summary: What a find this place is! It is adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center's parking lot. So it was a great place to stay for a tournament at the Convention Center. We quickly and easily walked back and forth between matches.   The rooms are quite large and very clean, with very friendly staff. There is a mini fridge, a microwave, a desk and desk chair, a large coffee table with storage beneath, and a coffee maker.   My only complaint... People checked in during the middle of the night to the room directly upstairs from us. It was as if they were pounding on the floor - even though they likely weren't. We could hear EVERYTHING they were saying. I could tell you their children's names and repeat their conversation verbatim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love love love this hotel. We stayed back in November and we are staying again next week. The newly re-modeled rooms are stunning and up to date. The floors make it seem cleaner and updated. Don't really have much to say about service since we didn't really need anything special. Check in was quick and efficient. 8 minute walk to the park when you go through Grand Californian which makes it so quick. I tell everyone about this hotel but I really don't want them to stay because the prices are AMAZING.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel fit the bill for a Disneyland visit.  The price was right, and the reviews were good, so we booked it.  It's clean, newly renovated, beds are comfortable although a bit firm, but I like a soft bed.  Lots of room for rollaways, you could fit two into our queen double.  Has a fridge.  Also, if you have Disney tickets in hand, it's a 5 minute walk to the grand Californian, and you can actually enter the California side of the park through that hotel. Skipping the morning line!!  Location excellent.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Location, location, location is what those families who are visiting Disneyland look for when booking a room near such tourist attraction; Eden Roc is located in just the perfect distance. It is only a ten minute walk to the main Disneyland entrance, and the rates are super affordable. The property, as you already know, is a newly remodeled property. The rooms are appointed with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Wi-Fi and parking are also offer at Eden Roc Inn and Suites-free of charge. Thank you for the review, and please consider us on your next visit to the Anaheim area.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice rooms; next door to the Anaheim Convention Center; one thing we really liked was the hardwood floors versus carpeting--much more sanitary for a hotel.  There is a great family restaurant right next door called Tiffy's that serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are extremely happy to hear that you loved our newly remodeled rooms, especially the hardwood floors as they do in fact make the appearance of the rooms immaculate.  We hope you also liked the flat screen television, microwave, fridge, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker that come with the room. Thank you again for the wonderful review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: If you are going to be in the park the majority of your stay, this is your hotel. Our room was a corner room on the ground floor and was very large, clean, and perfect for sleeping in- which is all we needed! We have stayed at several other hotels in the area and we all agree this is a perfect location for Disney. You just walk down to the Grand Californian to Downtown Disney and you are there. Before you hit the park you can stop at Jamba juice, Starbucks, or La Brea Bakery for breakfast- if you are worried about no breakfast. If you are wanting to save money, but still have a clean and close option, this is your best choice.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is glad to hear that you and your family had an enjoyable experienced while staying at our Anaheim property. As previously stated, all our rooms are newly remodeled and come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, hair dyer, and mini fridge. We also offer free Wi-Fi and parking to all guests, which means a bit of a savings when you walk to Disneyland (10 minute walk) and leave your car at the property. Thank you again for the wonderful review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location. Family room nice and roomy
Summary: Family room (2 beds plus sofa bed ) nice and roomy. Very clean. Reception extremely extremely helpful. Great location to Disneyland. About 10 minute walk.  Only downside - no laundry. Great little store on corner for breakfast And tea (Tiffy's) They also sell apples and bananas for quick breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our spacious and very clean newly remodeled rooms. Just as you have stated, we are located approximately ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and are also adjacent to the Convention Center. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers all guests free Wi-Fi, parking and all rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee/tea maker. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stefanie Thank you for the attention you gave us on our family vacation, tranquility and comfort distinguishes, cleanliness and efficiency unmatched staff, the hotel is very close to Disney park, recommend them widely.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review you have on our Anaheim property. We are trilled to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay and that our location was ideal to you and your family as we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. We will greatly appreciate if you can stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: You need a family suite if you have a family of five
Summary: Over the years, we have stayed at many of the hotels in the Disneyland area and you can see most of my reviews on them.  We finally signed up for season passes and were looking for a hotel for our family that we could visit on last minute trips to the other area, especially since the room costs have increased like they have.  We stayed at this hotel twice.  Our tripe in October  we booked a family suite.  This room was basic but spacious and was perfect for our family.    Our trip in December was less than perfect.  I had booked a room that was supposed to sleep five on Travelocity; however, there were only enough beds for 4.  I had to upgrade to a family suite for $50.  When we moved to the room, I found the night security eating in the room and the room was not very clean (we
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback regarding the few times you have stayed at our newly remodeled property. As you already know, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is situated in the perfect location for those families who are visiting Disneyland, as we are a mere ten (10) minutes from the main entrance to the theme park.  And as a newly remodeled property, all our rooms are fully furnished with amenities such as flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, upon others.  Please let me take this moment to address what you have written on your review regarding your second stay and the room that was give to you: There are several issues that could have occurred during the booking of your room through Travelocity (3rd party company) as such company only get certain amount of rooms to sell to its clients. Some of these issues might be getting the number of people wrong or not informing you of how many people a certain room could accommodate. We will call Travelocity and clarify this up .  Thank you for bringing up the other issues to our attention. We hope that these  inconveniences do not prevent you from coming back and staying at our Anaheim property.     Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stefanie was very helpful and she has great customer service. They stay was wonderful. Perfect location, steps from Disneyland.  Room was comfortable and updated. Would stay here again. Book through their website to get a discount.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to Disneyland. We are happy to hear that our customer service shined for you on your stay and that you found our property to your liking. Yes, Eden Roc is located about a ten minute walk to the main entrance to Disneyland and all our rooms have fully furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Thank you for the great comments about our team members are we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and excellent value
Summary: We stayed 3 nights in a family room (3 adults, 3 kids) while we spent 2 days at Disney. The spacious room had 2 queen beds and a double sofa bed, fridge, coffee maker and microwave. Free parking right out the front of your room and good, free wifi.  It was a 10min walk to downtown Disney when cutting through Disney's Californian Hotel.  I can recommend this hotel if you need a convenient, clean place to rest/refresh while at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very happy to hear that you and your family had an enjoyable time at one of our newly remodeled rooms. As you were able to see, we offer free Wi-Fi, and parking to all our guests. As for the rooms, the rooms do come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Thank you again for the wonderful review and see you soon.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Incredible end to our road trip
Summary: After two weeks of travelling in a variety of motels during our road trip of SoCal we ended up here for four nights as a base for our Disney adventures.  And we couldn't have been more pleased as it provided the perfect end to a perfect holiday.    The hotel is great value for money and a perfect location for Disney or the Convention Center.  It's a 10 minute walk to the Disney parks - we chose to get an Uber cab each morning (which worked out around $4-7, depending on demand) and walk back in the evening.  Anyone who complains the hotel is too far from the parks is going to have considerable trouble walking around the parks to be honest ...  The rooms are spacious, comfortable, clean, and modern and have everything you could need - very comfy beds, air con / heating, coffee
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for providing us with your feedback on your most recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. And thank for such wonderful words you have regarding our Anaheim property, its rooms and our team members. We are glad to hear that Eden Roc Inn and Suites provided that perfect location for the grand finale of your perfect family vacation. Many people just like yourself choose Eden Roc Inn and Suites due to its proximity to Disneyland. As you have personally stated, we are located about a ten minute walk to the main entrance to Disneyland; and are also within a few feet of the Convention Center. There are also many shops and restaurants within walking distance to our property. When remodeling our property we made sure that it was fully equipped with a flat screen television (HD channels included), microwave, fridge, Iron, Ironing board, coffee/tea maker and hair dryer, upon others. And yes, for a newly remodeled property that is located within walking distance to Disneyland, we offer the most affordable room rates, when compared to other hotel of the same quality and service as Eden Roc. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback and we are extremely happy to hear that were a part of the amazing vacation you and your family had.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Fantastic place to stay. Less than 10 mins walk to Disneyland, downtown Disney and California adventure park. Large rooms, extremely helpful at reception and good value for money. Room was clean and modern. Easy walk to food places. Why stay anywhere else!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review you have regarding our newly remodeled Anaheim property. And just as you have stated in your review, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located to Disneyland (10 minute walk) and adjacent to the Convention Center. As a newly remodeled property, all our guests are offered free Wi-Fi and parking. The spacious and immaculate rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, hair dryer and personal coffee maker. And all our team members are highly trained at providing an extraordinary customer service to all our guests. Thank you once more for the kind review, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Love the location, staff, and rooms!
Summary: This place is lovely! They have great management and hospitality! They made my cheer squad feel welcome! When we arrived they had a sign that welcomed us. They also allowed us to use all the amenities to  the fullest!
Manager Response: We are extremely happy to hear that you and the entire cheer team enjoyed your stay at our Anaheim property. We are also happy to hear of how the entire team was welcomed to the property. As you were able to see during your stay, the entire property has been completely remodeled, and the rooms have flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. Eden Roc also offer Wi-Fi (free of charge), and parking as well. We hope that your first stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites will bring you back on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel rooms looked like they just had a cosmetic makeover.   Very clean,  comfy beds, and large room.  A couple of negatives is that you can hear people in the rooms next to us and in the breezeway, no freezer section in the refrigerators and biggest negative is that there is no breakfast!  Coffee, juice, fruit and danish would be a huge plus!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property that is located within walking distance to Disneyland (10 minute walk); the Convention Center is located adjacent to the our property. Although Eden Roc Inn and Suites does not provide breakfast, there are a few restaurants nearby that offer discounts for those people staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We hope that you will be able to stay with us next time you are visiting the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Best place to stay for a Disney Trip
Summary: I agree with another reviewer about wanting to keep this place a secret lol. We are annual passholders so we have stayed there 5 times since December. The rooms are nice and very modern. The staff is always accommodating whether it's extra parking, future discounts, or price matching. The rooms are affordable and the walk to the parks is only about 10 minutes. We love it there! When it comes to our Disney trips we wont ever book with another hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your loyalty to Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are glad to hear that all our hard efforts to completely remodeled our Anaheim property are paying off, as we are beginning to build a loyal fan base. It is amazing to hear that ever since December of last year, you and your family have already stayed at our property five times; and that our customer service is exceptional when it comes to providing extra parking, price matching or allowing just enough time to make your stay more enjoyable. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback you have on our Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Room was nice but unfortunately there is no shuttle to Disney and the walk is very long. So this hotel will not work for our future trips to Disney. Also, we had a bottom floor room and we could hear everything from the room above. Very thin walls so we got very little sleep.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property located just a short distance (10 minute walk) to the main entrance to Disneyland. Even though there is no shuttle service from Eden Roc to Disneyland, there is a bus stop close by that will take a short distance closer to the Disneyland park. We hope you will be able to reconsider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on future trips to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stay here every time we visit. The rooms are excellent. The only issue we experience this trip was we had to wait past check in about an hour for our room. Other then this I would recommend this place over the Disney properties anytime!
Manager Response: Thank you for been a loyal guest to Eden Roc Inn and Suites and thank you for providing us with your feedback on your most recent stay at our Anaheim property. Your kind comments about the excellent condition of our rooms makes our day. Please apologize us for the wait you had to endure during your most recent visit. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The most affordable hotel with 5 star characteristics and the closest to disney parks after the disney resorts. Only 10 mn walk (10mn not 15, not 30mn). Nice and helpful staff. Could book tours from the hotel and get picked up from there too. We highly recommend it. Don't waist your money and pay for more. It's all you need.
Manager Response: You are correct when you say that Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just 10 minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. It is a newly remodeled property in Anaheim, again with very close proximity to the Disneyland park. The room rates are very affordable, when compared to other properties of the same quality and service. Please know that at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, free Wi-Fi and parking in offered. The rooms are equipped with a flat screen television (HD channels included), microwave, fridge, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. We are not only close to Disneyland but are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. Thank you for the great feedback.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: If you plan on spending all your time at the park and just need a clean and inexpensive place to rest...Eden Roc is for you! We really enjoyed our stay here. It's a budget friendly hotel within a reasonable walking distance from the park. It's actually a pleasant and pretty walk to the park. It was clean with modern updated finishes. The rooms were a nice size. The pool area is very basic but would probably make my kid happy. We weren't there to swim and did not swim in the pool. The location and price were perfect for us. This is our Disneyland-area go-to motel.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us and future guests with your review on our newly remodeled property. We are extremely happy to hear that you and that your family had a pleasant stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc is a newly remodeled property, that is just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. All rooms are spacious and immaculate. The rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. The property offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. Many of our guests leave their cars parked at the hotel (just like you did!) and walk to Disneyland; this is a small saving as the prices for parking at Disneyland and are bit pricey. We would love if you can make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your hotel of choice on your future travels to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: A Gem of a find! Fabulous Motel!!!
Summary: Beautiful, clean rooms  and friendly staff. Closer to Disney than the most of the  "Big Name" hotels, much more reasonable. 10 minute walk to the gate of Disneyland.   Great experience. Loved this motel! Was able to watch the nightly fireworks from our window.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. As you were able to see during your stay, the entire property has been recently remodeled. All rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and all the rooms have wireless internet. Yes, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and yes, we do not charge our guest a parking fee. Just as you have stated, most guest do leave there vehicle at the property and walk (about ten-fifteen minutes) to Disneyland. Thank you again for the wonderful review, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location , Great rooms , highly recommend.
Summary: We have already booked our next Disneyland trip here. Rooms are newly remodeled and have plenty of room four our family of four. You can't beat the location right across the street from Disneyland and we could watch the fireworks from the rooms.
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and always have that immaculate feeling since instead of a carpet, the room have vinyl floors. The property also offers its guest free Wi-Fi and parking, which is a plus for those families visiting Disneyland, as they can leave their car at the hotel and walk to Disneyland. The Convention center is on the same lot as the hotel so walking to the center is just a few feet away.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I rated it a 3 because it was clean, BUT missing a few thing that I love to have in a Motel .A  Lamp by the bed,  Shower Curten, a small table with a couple  chairs, A  Mirror,  TV was to far from the bed to watch.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the way the room you booked was given to you; not finished. Your feedback will give us an opportunity to have a meeting with our housekeeping department so rooms are not left incomplete before they are given to a guest. This will also help us improve the communication between our front desk team members and our housekeeping department, and it will help us improve were improvement is needed in such rooms. We hope that your first stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites does not deter your from returning to our Anaheim property in the near future.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I have stayed here for years.  One year ago the hotel was completely refurbished which I loved, and one year later it is as chic, clean, comfortable and as wonderful as last year.  Everyone is so nice and accomadating.  They want that you are satisfied and happy.  The Eden Roc is just across the street from Disneyland and a short walk to the convention center.  What more could you ask for...convenience and a lovely hotel.  I look forward to returning to the Eden Roc Inn next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for the loyal support for provide Eden Roc Inn and Suites on a yearly basis, and thank you for talking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. As you have stated on your review, Eden Roc Inn and Suites was recently remodeled and ever since that renovation, we have kept the property and all its rooms in the same immaculate position as it was when it was fully remodeled. Eden Roc in conveniently located to Disneyland (ten minute walk), and is adjacent to the Convention Center (less than a five minute walk); it also offers free Wi-Fi and parking to all its guest, and like you said we like to provide great customer service to all our guests. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback, and we look forward to your upcoming stay next year.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel was perfect for us. In walking distance to the parks, clean, and safe. We even had a view of the fireworks from our room! (Not many rooms have that - if you want to try and get it, you will probably have to call and request it.) We had a 2nd floor room, so I can't say whether the hard floors cause a noise issue for the lower level, but I sure enjoyed knowing the floor was CLEAN!
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites, just as you have stated, is located within walking distance to Disneyland, which means one can leave their vehicle at the hotel, walk to Disneyland, and save a few dollars on parking expenses one will acquire at such park. The hotel has been completely remodeled and instead of carpeted floors, the rooms have hard vinyl floors, which in fact makes the rooms feel even cleaner. Thank you for your feedback and please consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was about 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland so it's a great location. The price was really affordable and the rooms were newly renovated and clean. The only downside is that you can hear the neighbours and the traffic.  If noise bothers you then I would suggest bringing earplugs. We didn't have any issues as no one was up late being loud but you could hear the neighbours tv, coughing, conversations, etc. Overall we were very happy with the Eden Roc.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay during your recent family visit to Disneyland. Just as you said, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is in the perfect location and has the perfect, most affordable rate of any newly remodeled property near Disneyland. The hotel offers spacious and immaculate rooms, as well as free Wi-Fi and parking to all its guests. The Anaheim Convention center is located adjacent to the property, and Disneyland is located within walking distance. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is my second stay at Eden Roc.  The location is convenient. It is an easy 8 minute walk to Downtown Disney. The room was clean and updated. I will book again the next time we plan a trip to Disneyland
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback you have regarding Eden Roc Inn and Suites. And thank you for returning for your second stay at our Anaheim property. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is conveniently located just ten (10) minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. All our rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee/tea maker and free Wi-Fi. We look forward to you third and many more stays at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I want to keep this spot hidden from people because it was that great! The flooring eased my germaphobia issue and when it came to changing the bedding while we stayed there it was so prompt. I had absolutely no issues. I wish there was a freezer area but that was the only thing besides no continental breakfast and small parking area.
Manager Response: We are extremely happy to hear that Eden Roc Inn and Suites exceeded you expectations. Please do not keep Eden Roc a secret and please let all of your friends and family members know about our newly remodeled property, which is located within walking distance to Disneyland and adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center. During the remodeling process, we decided to get rid of carpeted rooms, and instead opted for a cleaner type of flooring. Thank you for the comments you have regarding our team members and their quick response to your need. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, and please let all your friends and family members know about our newly remodeled Anaheim property.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was the first time I stayed at the Eden Roc Inn.  The  room was comfortable if you are planning on visiting the park or Convention center and not a lot of time in the motel.  There are very few extras, but the prices are reasonable.  There isn't a breakfast but Coco's has a very tasty menu and offer ERI guest a 10% discount.  Also the hotel doesn't have a shuttle to the Disneyland park but you can go to the Annabella hotel around the corner and buy a ARTS bus pass for $5. a day that will take you right to the park
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to Disneyland. As you experience during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten (10) minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. Although, Eden Roc Inn and Suites does not offer continental breakfast, we do offer free Wi-Fi and parking, which is very convenient for those families visiting Disneyland as they can leave the car parked at the hotel and walk to Disneyland, which will save a few dollars. The room at Eden Roc are spacious and are always kept in immaculate conditions thanks to all the hard work our team members perform every day. We hope you can make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your place of stay on future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed here on a trip to Disneyland and felt that it was a very good price for the cleanliness and closeness to the park.  It was a far better value than anything we spent money on INSIDE the park.  One unexpected bonus was that we could see the fireworks from our room each night which was nice because we didn't have to keep our two year old out in the park late or have to worry about her freaking out from the noise.  The only downside I can think of is that parking can be a little tight especially if you get there later in the evening.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers the most reasonable rates when compared to other hotels in the area that are newly remodeled and that provided the same amenities as Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very happy to hear that your whole family was able to enjoy their stay at our Anaheim property and that all of you were able to enjoy the Disneyland fireworks from the comfort of the room that was given to you at Eden Roc. We hope that you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is our go to spot when visiting Disneyland. Very affordable & modern place to stay that's extremely clean. All rooms have hardwood floors...no disgusting carpets!! The staff is very friendly & professional. Great location with a short walk to theme parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment of your time to review our Anaheim hotel. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is in the perfect location for those families who want to explore the wonders that Disneyland has to offer, as we are located just a ten minute walk to such park. Our Anaheim property has just been fully renovated. All our spacious and immaculate rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and a personal coffee maker. The property also offers all its guest free Wi-Fi and parking, which is a saver when compared to the parking prices one has to pay for parking at the Disneyland park. Thank you for making Eden Roc Inn and Suites your to-go place when visiting the city of Anaheim, in particular Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a great place to reserve because it is very convenient. It's close to all hotels, restaurants, the convention center, and Disneyland! My experience at this hotel was very nice, my room was big and beautiful. I heard it was remodeled and it looks amazing! I was very happy to share my room with my family and spend time enjoying our stay at Eden Roc Inn.We were there for the Religious Congress and have found our stay and time spent there to be pleasant. However, I just did not like how I was treated over the phone and when I spoke to the same person when I checked in didn't seem nice. But, I am sure we all have our bad days. I am pretty sure that it gets so packed in this hotel that the clerk gets frustrated with so many calls coming in which is a good thing because it
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you and your family had an awesome stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you were able to see during your stay, our property is spacious, clean and within walking distance to Disneyland, adjacent to the convention center and a short distance away from many shops and restaurants. Please apologize us for the inconvenience you had with one of our team members while you were checking into our property. And thank you for having such a positive attitude towards that experience. Please be assured that we will train our team members on how to handle any work situation that might arise. Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you in the next few months.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location, A Little Lacking in Accomodations
Summary: I stayed at Eden Roc for a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center.  It was an excellent location-- a 5-7 minute walk, at most-- and the staff was very friendly.  I only wish that for the price, they would think about including breakfast.  Several other hotels in the area offer a continental breakfast, which would have been appreciated.  Other than that, it was a nice spot for a weekend trip!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for telling us of your recent experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes (walking distance) to Disneyland, and about five minutes from the Convention Center. The room rates are of a very affordable rate, when compare to other hotels of the same quality and customer service as the one that is offered at our Anaheim property. Thank you once more for the feedback and we look forward to having you at Eden Roc Inn and Suites for your next conference at the Anaheim convention center.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great place for a few days
Summary: Check in was a breeze.  The desk attendant Oscar was very personable and pleasant.  I flew all night, drove from LAX and was hoping for early check in. Oscar was very apologetic and kind when he explained that the hotel had been overbooked the night before and rooms were not ready.  Eden Rock was very convenient to the convention center and Disney Land as well as restaurants just steps away.  The room was awesome!!!  Clean and huge!!!  My only issue was that there was no early check in available.  Having to "wander" around looking for something to do while feeling tired was not pleasant.  Suggest that a few rooms be available for early check in.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to the city of Anaheim. We are happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay and that our team members did everything possible to check you in early. Just as our team member said, due to been fully booked the prior night, there was no possible early check in option. Early check-in is possible, depending on room availability from the previous night.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled and spacious rooms. Yes, we are located adjacent to the convention center, and a few minutes to the main entrance to Disneyland. Eden Roc Inn and Suites also offers free Wi-Fi and parking.  Thank you for the wonderful words you have regarding our team members and property and thank you again for your feedback.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing Location, shame about the facilities.
Summary: The location of the hotel was amazing. The room was large. Hotel staff were at times rude and dismissive. The bed was not the best, and they use old school single sheet and blanket combo rather than a quilt. The blanket was smaller than the bed which meant two people could not easily utilise it's warmth. Upon asking for a second blanket it was as I was asking for something out of the ordinary. I was told I would have to wait and see if one was available (which of course there was but another reason the staff need to work on their customer service skills).   While no carpet is often a good idea, the room needed more cleaning and had not been vacuumed or swept on our arrival as it appeared there was some grit left over from the previous occupants.   For a location so close to
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback and the wonderful comments you have on our newly remodeled Anaheim property. Please apologize us for the inconvenience you have with our team members. Your feedback has helped us with the improvement of the demeanor that our team members presented during your stay. We have also talked with the housekeeping department so they can be more precise with their cleaning duties. We hope that the issues you encountered during your stay, do not prevent you from staying again at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Once again I was able to stay in Eden Roc Hotelin Anaheim during the Religious Education Congress last February 26-29. It was truly surprising because the hotel has changed a lot. A change for the Better. The hotel lobby is truly clean, nice furniture and the environment is very welcoming. There is even a written word: ENJOY. The front desk people are smiling, welcoming and helpful. The workers even will take time just to greet you. HELLO! GOOD MORNING! GOOD EVENING!You could already feel that you ARE WELCOME AND will enjoy your stay. In fact I truly enjoyed my stay this hotel. Together with me were some of my friends. They immediately said: VERY BEAUTIFUL! They immediately even notice the cleanliness of the place and the helpfulness of the people working in this hotel.In my
Manager Response: It is so great to read of the wonderful stay you experienced while staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you were able to see during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located in a very safe area in the city of Anaheim, the entire property has been completely remodeled, and we are located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. And we are also adjacent from the Anaheim Convention Center. Also, even though we do not offer breakfast, we do offer 10% discount coupons for Coco's restaurant, which is about a two minute walk from our property. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay at our lovely and immaculate Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Everyone was very nice and they gave me a parking pass to park there longer while we went to Disneyland. It was a great location to walk to the parks as well. Plus very affordable for a nice spacious room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your review on our Anaheim property. We are extremely happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay, and that you also enjoyed your visit to the parks. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi, and amenities we offer inside the rooms, such as coffee maker, hair dyer, microwave and mini fridge. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: From the moment we walked in we were greeted very friendly ,  we then when up to the room and realized there was no carpet but this beautiful wood like shiny floor that i love specially with kids! we were there for 3 nights and we enjoyed every bit of it We look forward to staying here next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are extremely happy to hear that our team members shined for you and your family during your stay, and we are also happy to hear that you loved our newly remodeled rooms, especially the wood-like floors. We hope you also liked the flat screen television, microwave, fridge, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker that come with the room. Thank you again for the wonderful review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great experience at Eden Roc. Staff was very courteous and helpful. An overall awesome experience. Would recommend to anyone staying in the area looking for a more affordable hotel. Rooms were very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are appreciate the great words you have about our newly remodeled property and regarding our team members. As you saw during your stay, the entire property has been completely remodeled. All the rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. The hotel offers its guests free Wi-Fi and parking. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is also located just ten minutes (walking) from the main entrance to Disneyland. Many guest save a couple of dollars when they stay at our property since they can walk to Disneyland and leave the car at Eden Roc. Thank you again for the review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great service! Nice rooms for the price and a pretty central location in Anaheim, near Disney and the conference center. Easy walk to everything that you need to get to. We didn't have any problems at all with Eden roc
Manager Response: Thank you for the review you have on our Anaheim property. We are very happy to hear that you had a satisfactory stay at our newly remodeled property. And as you were able to see, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located in the perfect place for those families visiting Disneyland or the Convention Center. Disneyland is just a ten minute walk, and the Convention Center is adjacent to the property. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers its guests spacious and immaculate rooms and an optimal customer service. Thank you again for the feedback and please consider us on your next visit to the Anaheim area.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very good value for the price paid. This is particularly true when compared to others in he area. Good location and very clean. Recently remodeled and larger rooms. Friendly service. I would stay again.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites was a satisfactory one. And we are also happy to hear that you found our room rates to be affordable. As you were able to see, all our newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. Thank you for the great comments you have regarding our team members and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: On the upside, Eden Rock Inn is very close to Disneyland, within walking distance. The staff was very kind and courteous, the rooms were clean with nice solid wood floors. There were plenty of electrical and USB outlets throughout the room. Also, while staying at Eden Rock Inn, they allow you to leave your car parked on the property while visiting Disneyland. Saves you about $20 a day.   On the downside, the beds were not exactly comfortable and the air-conditioner cycled on and off all night long, leaving the room somewhat uncomfortable. The walls were thin and you could hear the talking of the next door guests.   I would certainly stay here again, simply because of its location to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are extremely happy to hear that you found our location convenient, as you were able to leave your car at the hotel and walked about ten minutes to the main entrance to Disneyland. As you were able to see, all our rooms are modern and up-to-date as the rooms have many USB ports to charge all electric devices. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi and our pool. We will look into the issue you encountered with your A/C unit, and we hope to see you again soon.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed here for five nights in Feb.  Chose this motel for close proximity to Disneyland and budget-friendly rate + consistent reviews re cleanliness.  Our room was on 2nd floor and spacious - not all rooms are as spacious as my bro's room was much smaller.  You def want a room on 2nd floor or pray the ppl above you aren't loud bc as many reviews state, the walls are thin plus bc the floors aren't carpeted, don't have that noise buffer.  I didn't mind at all that the furnishings were very simple and spare - but I did feel that our room could have benefited from additional storage to put clothes (no dresser or shelf unit, only closet) + a lamp or two - the overhead lighting seemed harsh, room needed softer lighting when kids are asleep but you require a little light.  The room
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your first-hand experience at our newly remodeled property. We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at our Anaheim hotel and that the overall layout of the room was to your liking. We will take careful note to those issues you have kindly noted for us so that they can be fixed as soon as possible. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The room was nice, up until our fist night when we were awoken at around 1am by our upstairs neighbors noise carried easily, to the point where we could almost hear their conversations.  Staff was really nice and accommodating the stay would have been good if not for the morning we we were leaving when we spotted a cockroach scatter across the floor in the bathroom!! will not stay again
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you encountered during your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Please know that we have highly trained team members that could have moved you to a much quieter room. Our maintenance team has already been informed about the issue you found in the bathroom while you were checking out of the property, and it has been taken care off. We hope that you can give Eden Roc Inn and Suites one more change at showing you that our Anaheim property is truly a pleasant place to stay while visiting Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We took our whole family.  There were 37 of us and Eden Roc was great.  They let us use one of their big rooms behind the office for our continental breakfast that we had for the family every morning. We also had a talent show in the same room.  The rooms were clean and we liked the hardwood floors.  Beds were comfy. Being close to the parks was such a plus and eliminated  a charge for parking at the hotel and the parks.  They were able to help us out with a bit of a discount for 3 day hoppers. We felt safe and saw security out checking the cars making sure they were all valid and that there were no strangers lurking.  We will tell our friends about this little place and we will be back. Would have loved the pool to be open because the weather was so perfect but we didn't have
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your place of stay during your family gathering. We are extremely happy to learn that our team members went above and beyond to provide you with an exceptional service and a place for you and your family to be able to have breakfast, and the family talent show. Eden Roc Inn and Suites in a newly remodeled property. All rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. And just as you have mentioned, we offer free parking (which is a saver since parking can be a bit pricey at some places), and free Wi-Fi. By booking directly with Eden Roc, we make sure that our guests get the best value available. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: nice n spacious price was good only down fall was being charged twice for the security deposit and no morning breakfast offered. the location was fair n had two close by resteraunts that were good to eat at.
Manager Response: We appreciate your time in the writing of your review for our Anaheim property. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland and very close to many restaurants and shops. The property offers all its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. Thank you for the feedback again, and we look forward to your next visit to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed two nights with the family room was very clean and you can't beat the short walk to Disneyland. My wife left her Bulova watch at the room after check out received a call from the front desk within an hour telling me they found the watch.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our team members called you within an hour after having checked out from the room to inform you that your wife's Bulova watch had been found. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. The hotel offers all its guests free Wi-Fi and parking. Also, Eden Roc Inn and Suites has been recently remodeled; all rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. Thank you for choosing Eden Roc Inn and Suites and we look forward to your next stay at our Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Admittedly this hotel was book for a combination of it's low price and proximity to the park, plus parking was included.  Further it seemed as though other travelers on this site like it (it rated well).  We got there a little early and so - of course - the room wasn't ready.  They said it was alright to park and head to the park and check in later, which we did.  When we got back to the hotel (which was a long walk for a 6 year-old at the end of the night) and checked in, the first thing that hit us when we opened our room door was a foul chemical smell.  My son insisted it was making him nauseous and when I called the front desk they said the only other room they had available was a family suite at $50 more per night.  We went to check it out, and I found that that room also
Manager Response: Thank you for informing us about your recent experience at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. Please apologize us for the inconvenience of having you moved to a different room, than the one that was originally booked. We will surely take care of the issue you encountered with the smell in the room. We truly hope that you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. And we hope that our newly remodeled rooms were to your liking. Once again, accept our most sincerely apologies you had with the odor that the room had.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I chose to stay here just to try something different and new from our usual. :o). I gotta say that I LOVE that they don't have carpeted floors... it somehow seems "cleaner" in my head. The walk to Disneyland is enjoyable... not too far and you get to pass through the Grand Californian and Downtown Disney, which are total bonuses as the Grand Californian is absolutely beautiful!  Our room was perfect, nothing too big or fancy. Simple, clean, and comfortable... which is all we're looking for after adventuring all day in the parks! :o). However, if you're sensitive to noise you may want to ask for a second floor room as you can hear footsteps above you if you're on the first floor. And remember that it's not a hotel, so you WILL hear the hustle and bustle of cars (as
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to Disneyland. We are happy to hear that you found all rooms to your liking and that our vinyl wooden floors were especially to your liking. Yes, our room prices are of a very affordable rate, and the hotel offers it guests free Wi-Fi and parking. You will be happy to learn that the Convention Center is a few feet away from the property, and Disneyland is just a ten minutes walk. Thank you once more for the wonderful feedback.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: For the last several years my business partners and I have been lodging at the Eden Roc while attending trade shows held at the convention center.  Not only is this the closest hotel to the convention center (without being part of the crazy Hilton/Marriott party madness) but it's a rather lovely place to stay.  A couple years ago they renovated the entire hotel and Wow!  Comfort City!  Plus their staff is friendly, efficient, and just plain cool.  Get with it, kids.  Join the Eden Roc Club.
Manager Response: It brings us such joy to hear that you have been a loyal guest of Eden Roc Inn and Suites way before the property was remodeled. We thank you for that faithfulness and we thank you for appreciating the hard work we did to renovate the entire property. Yes, Eden Roc is the ideal place to book if you are visiting places such as the Convention Center or Disneyland, as we are located just five minutes away from the Convention Center and about ten-fifteen minutes away from Disneyland, this of course is walking distance time. All our rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. Eden Roc all offer its guest free Wi-Fi and free parking. Thank you once again for been a loyal Eden Roc Inn and Suites guest, and we greatly appreciate your feedback.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The staff were friendly and helpful, the room was spotless, it felt spacious, the bed was comfortable, and it was within walking distance to Disneyland. All you really need for your stay. No carpet on the floor (it was vinyl? with a wood grain pattern) was disconcerting, but also very practical. Not having a guest laundry on site was a bit annoying, but there was one a five minute walk away. All up - I liked it and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear of the amazing stay you had at our property while visiting Disneyland. We are also happy to hear that our team members and our immaculate property shined for you and for your family during your stay. As you were able to see, all our newly modeled rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker; free Wi-Fi and parking is also offered. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located ten minutes away (walking) from the main entrance to Disneyland, and also within a few feet from restaurants and stores. Once again, thank you for your kind review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The rooms are comfortable, and fairly new.  The proximity to Disneyland is fantastic.  (We were staying here to run the Star Wars half marathon.)  Housekeeping sometimes occurs pretty late.  The ground floor rooms can be a little bit noisy - we occasionally heard out upstairs neighbor - but overall it was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during the Star Wars half marathon. As you were able to see during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to leads to Disneyland. Eden Roc provides all its guest free Wi-Fi and parking. Our team members also offer great and attentive customer service. All the rooms at Eden Roc Inn and Suites have vinyl wooden floor, which makes for a cleaner room feeling. We hope you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Close to the convention center and to downtown Disney- price was right! Rooms were clean and quiet. The staff was very pleasant and helpful beyond expectations. I highly recommend tEden Roc and plan to stay there next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review you have on Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We to hear that our property and team members exceeded your expectations. As you may have noticed, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. The newly remodeled rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. The property also offer free Wi-Fi and parking to its guests. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Newly remodeled room. Clean property. Helpful friendly staff. Big convention weekend so there was some extra people inside and outside rooms.  Added a sort of nice ambience to the stay. I was also at the convention.  Will stay again next year if it is available.  Will stay again if I go to Disneyland.  Guaranteed free parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear of the amazing stay you had at our property while visiting Disneyland. We are also happy to hear that our team members and our immaculate property shined for you and for your family during your stay. As you were able to see, all our newly modeled rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker; free Wi-Fi and parking is also offered. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located ten minutes away (walking) from the main entrance to Disneyland, and also within a few feet from restaurants and stores. Once again, thank you for your kind review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great hotel! Close to Disney, quick simple walk and you're there! Much better then paying for Disney parking. Staff was friendly rooms were quiet. You also get a 10% discount to COCOS. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. As you were able to see during your stay, our newly remodeled property is just ten minutes away (walking), the hotel offers free Wi-Fi, parking and there is also a personal coffee maker inside the room. We are happy to hear that our team members shined for your during your stay and that you will be returning to Eden Roc Inn and Suites on future occasions.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Enjoyed a room with the family over the runDisney Star Wars weekend.   Pros: We had a great family-sized room. Everything was new and in great working order. Loved the hardwood/tile floors. Very modern renovation. We slept 3 adults and 3 kids and had plenty of room. Wished we had a little more counter space to spread our suitcases, snacks, bathroom supplies, etc but we managed just fine. Very nice location. Love that the hotel is so close to Disneyland - we parked once and never moved our van until checkout! Beds were one of the most comfortable I've ever had in a hotel.  Cons: Only one that I have is that because of the hardwood/tile floors we heard everything that was happening in the room above us.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us and future guests with your review on our newly remodeled property. We are extremely happy to hear that you and that your family had a pleasant stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc is a newly remodeled property, that is just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance that leads to Disneyland. All rooms are spacious and immaculate. The rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. The property offers its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. Many of our guests leave their cars parked at the hotel (just like you did!) and walk to Disneyland; this is a small saving as the prices for parking at Disneyland and are bit pricey. We would love if you can make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your hotel of choice on your future travels to Disneyland.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great Value, great location, Anaheim Conv. Center
Summary: Very clean, updated and modern.  Wonderful place to stay with very close proximity to the convention center and Disney Park.  Most impressed with the staff at Eden Roc, (especially Oscar) who all stopped at nothing to make our stay easy and problem free.  I will definitely try to book Eden Roc again next year and every year after that.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear of the amazing stay you had at our property while visiting Disneyland. We are also happy to hear that our team members and our immaculate property shined for you and for your family during your stay. As you were able to see, all our newly modeled rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker; free Wi-Fi and parking is also offered. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located ten minutes away (walking) from the main entrance to Disneyland, and also within a few feet from restaurants and stores. Once again, thank you for your kind review and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Location, location, location.... close to start and finish lines, close to parks and Downtown Disney, free parking, and loved the modern upgrades!  Loved having a fridge and microwave as this helps when you have little ones.  No elevator, but it's a small price to pay for considering the convenience of it's location and costs.  Overall, GREAT place to stay.  I stay here all the time. It's my go to hotel.  Front desk staff are ALWAYS helpful and accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc is the ideal place to stay at since we are located walking distance to both Disneyland and the Convention Center. We are also located very closed to the start and finish line of the Star Wars Run, just as you have stated. The property does offer its guest free Wi-Fi, daily housekeeping service, free parking and newly remodeled rooms, which are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee/tea maker. Thank you for the wonderful comments you have regarding our team members and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We had a decent stay at Eden Roc. It's about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland if you cut through the grand Californian hotel. The rooms are nice and updated. The only downfall was that the rooms were quite loud, you could hear all the outside noises as people walk passed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites and thank you for providing us with your experience. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland and a few feet away from the Convention Center (both walking distance). As you already saw, all rooms are equipped with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee/tea maker. We also offer free Wi-Fi and parking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The motel is completely remodeled.  The rooms are beautiful.   The staff at the front desk were so helpful.  They went out of there way to make our stay pleasant. We were able to walk  to Disney or the Convention Center.   I couldn't believe how inexpensive the rooms were! I It's the only place we stay when we go to Anaheim!
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. The rooms are spacious and always have that immaculate feeling since instead of a carpet, the room have vinyl floors. The property also offers its guest free Wi-Fi and parking, which is a plus for those families visiting Disneyland, as they can leave their car at the hotel and walk to Disneyland. The Convention center is on the same lot as the hotel so walking to the center is just a few feet away. We are very happy to read that you will be making Eden Roc Inn and Suites your to-go place whenever you and your family are visiting Disneyland.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I took other reviewers advice and asked for a room upstairs and not directly adjacent to the stairwell which seemed to help.  The renovations and construction appears to be complete and my shower was nice and toasty.  I found the rooms to be really nice for the price.  I went during an off peak season so I didn't have many issues with noise from my neighbors.  My only complaint was that being close to the street with the thin walls, occasionally big semi trucks sounded pretty loud going by.  They also only have two maids to clean all the rooms so at first I thought they skipped me, but then at 5:30 pm she came by to make my bed and empty my trash which worked fine for me.  For those staying here for a convention, it was a 8 to 10 minute walk.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. We are extremely happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you saw during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. As a newly remodeled property, all guests are offered fully furnished rooms that come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, and most importantly, free Wi-Fi service. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed for three days. Made the reservation over the phone. Happily went there for the stay, very clean rooms and nice and roomy. When it's time to check out, the person at the counter told me that the room shows it doesn't check out for 4 days. I said that I made the reservation over the phone for three days, not four days. He said that "Sorry, it's the hotel's policy that you have to notify us within 24 hours of the check out, so we can't do anything to give money back."  Because they want to stick with policy, I didn't even use the 4th day and paid for it. Horrible customer service, not understanding at all. As nice as the room is, won't be coming back here again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for bringing forward the recent experience you encountered at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Please know that whenever a guests checks out early, they must do so before 11am and the hotel happily refunds them the money for the nights they don't stay with us. While investigating the reason why our hotel was not able to provide you with a refund for the night you were not going to be staying with us, and upon checking our camera system, we found out that it was already too late to offer you an early check out option. Again, in order to receive any credit for those nights one won't be staying with us, one has to let us know before 11am. We apologize for any misunderstanding you might have had with our policy regarding checking out early. And we do hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites in the future.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Super close to coral and very clean and quiet. Beds were comfortable. One of the nicest places we have stayed down in Anaheim. Big bathroom. Hot water. Nice tv. Coffee in the room. Refrigerator, micro
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with a five-star review on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites and thank you choosing our Anaheim property Star Wars Marathon weekend. We are glad to hear you enjoyed our newly remodeled property and all the amenities the rooms contain. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi, as well as our free parking. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for a quick Disney stay
Summary: My wife and I recently got Disneyland Annual Passes and have been looking for a great hotel within walking distance of the parks at a great price. Eden Roc is now our go-to place when we come to use our passes. We never stayed in it pre-renovation, but we really like how clean and simple the rooms are.  Oscar (at the front desk) was very friendly. When our flight was cancelled and we called to see if there were any rooms left for the night, he got us the last room available.  Our first three nights were on the first floor, on the south side of the complex. We heard a few footsteps above us, but nothing too loud or obnoxious. Our fourth night (after the cancelled flight) was on the second floor on the north side of the complex. I don't have a preference between north and south,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review you have on our Anaheim property. We are extremely happy to hear that our team members were able to accommodate your last minute stay during the time your flight got cancelled. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland and we are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. As you were able to see, our newly remodeled property comes with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. Thank you for the wonderful review and for stating that you will make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your to-go place every time you visit Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed a newly renovated room on the second floor. There were 2 double size bed and a sofa bed. Lots of space and comfortable for 5 of us. 20min walk to Disney Downtown. They did have basic breakfast -pre packed muffins, coffee, tea and hot chocolate. It would been better if there was a coffee maker in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at our newly remodeled property during your recent visit to Disneyland. As you were able to see, our rooms are very spacious, and immaculate. Yes, many of the guests that stay at our property do so because of the close proximity to the main entrance to Disneyland (approximately 10 minute walking). Please know that all our rooms do come with a personal coffee maker. We would have loved to assist you with how to use the personal coffee maker that is inside the rooms. Please know, that ever since your last stay, we have discontinued serving continental breakfast, and Eden Roc Inn and Suites no longer offers continental breakfast to its guests. We hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It was everything that I expected at that price, no disappointment, economical,  room was clean and updated, and met our basic needs, which is all we wanted, so we were happy.  It was also very close to Disney Land, so can't beat this price for location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind feedback you have on our Anaheim property. Our newly renovated property is just a ten minute walk to the main entrance to Disneyland. When other hotels charge for parking, Eden Roc Inn and Suites does not because we like to help our guests save a few dollars. Our spacious rooms are kept in optimal cleaning conditions and our front desk team members are always eager to help our guests. All rooms do come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. We hope you can consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very pleased with our stay.  We booked three room for a family trip to Disneyland.  Rooms were sparse, but clean and newly remodeled.  I espically liked the wood laminate flooring instead of questionable carpet.  Walk to Downtown Disney and the Park entrances was 15-20 min. Tiffy's on the corner had a great breakfast menu.  I will definitely book again if the price is competitive.
Manager Response: We are extremely glad to hear of the wonderful experience you encountered during your recent visit to our Anaheim property. Thank you for the five-star review you have on our property. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and suites opted for the more sanitary laminated flooring instead of carpeting the room. Our room rates are always moderate and affordable. Eden Roc Inn and Suites provides all its guest with free Wi-Fi and parking. Again, thank you for the five star review, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We loved our stay at Eden Roc. For the money, we were expecting less. We stayed there for a volleyball tournament at the convention center. It was so nice walking to my son's games and leaving our car parked at Eden Roc. Parents from our team staying at neighboring, much more expensive hotels, saw our room and were upset that they had paid so much more for so much less. We have now found our new Disneyland/ convention center hotel.
