Manager Response: Thank you, for choosing Eden Roc Inn and Suites during the Volleyball tournament that your son had at the Convention Center. Just as you have stated on your review, we are located adjacent to the Convention Center, the entire property has been recently remodeled and we are also located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. As a newly remodeled property, we offer all our guests the following amenities: flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, free Wi-Fi and free parking. And, we also offer the most affordable rates when compared to other hotels of the same quality and service. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel was a great experience. The rooms have tile flooring which is so nice. The staff was helpful in putting all of our parties rooms near each other. We never had a problem here. The rooms are a pretty good size. We had a room on the second floor and it was huge! (226) the location is everything! So super close to Disney parks! You can see California screamin' and mickeys fun wheel from the hotel! So fun! The only thing is I wish they had breakfast! But with the in-room microwave and mini fridge, you can heat up your own food. Free parking is a huge plus too!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience at our Anaheim property and that our team members were able to accommodate your reservations accordingly. We are also very happy to learn that the layout of our spacious and immaculate rooms were to your liking. And yes, we like to help our valued guests out by providing free parking and Wi-Fi. As you were able to see, our room rates are affordable and we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Thank you once more for your feedback and we will be more than happy if you can consider us on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel, close to everything.  Quick easy walk to Disney.  Also, close to various restaurants.  Adequate parking.  The hotel was clean and well maintained.  Maid service was timely.  I have no complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment of your time to review our Anaheim hotel. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is in the perfect location for those families who want to explore the wonders that Disneyland has to offer, as we are located just a ten minute walk to such park. Our Anaheim property has just been fully renovated. All our spacious and immaculate rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and a personal coffee maker. The property also offers all its guest free Wi-Fi and parking, which is a saver when compared to the parking prices one has to pay for parking at the Disneyland park. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My mother and I had an absolutely lovely and comfortable stay here. We wanted a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay without breaking the bank for our Disneyland trip. This fit PERFECTLY. The rooms were incredibly clean, the beds were super comfortable, and the staff was absolutely stellar. If you're staying here for Disneyland, there's an ART shuttle at the corner that will take you to Disney's doorstep for just a few dollars a day. Overall, I would highly recommend the Eden Roc to anyone who is looking for a place to rest their head after a long day at the parks. I will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: It is so great to read of the wonderful stay you experienced while staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you were able to see during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located in a very safe area in the city of Anaheim, the entire property has been completely remodeled, and we are located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. Thank you for informing future guests about the bus shuttle that is located at the corner of the Katella Ave. and S. West St. Hope the free Wi-Fi, parking and personal coffee maker were put to good use by both you and your mom. We look forward to your next stay at our lovely and immaculate Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Stayed here New Year's Eve/day after spending a day at Disneyland. I must admit that I expected less do to the reviews. But I was proven wrong, the family suite was a nice open space, very clean and with this feel of fresh and clean. I applaud the people that work there for their excellent effort.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on New Year's day. From reading your review, it brings us great joy to hear that valued guests such as yourself appreciate and see the hard work our entire team members perform on a daily basis to maintain the great condition of our property. As stated on other reviews, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes from the main entrance to Disneyland. All our rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board, and personal coffee maker. You might be happy to know that we offer free parking. Thank you again for the wonderful comments, and we look forward your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Rooms was clean and customer service was great.  Room above the office needs more chairs and/or sofa with pillows.  Very nice, big room, but needs more furnishings.  Very close to the Disneyland parks for walking and nice location near restaurants.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  I will stay here again in the future.  Thanks.
Manager Response: You're welcome and thank you for the feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay at our newly remodeled and spacious Anaheim property; that our team members went above and beyond during your stay. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Eden Roc offers free Wi-Fi and parking to all its guests. Thank you for the helpful advice you given us. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: always clean, comfortable rooms. Oscar is extremely helpful. recently completely remodeled all the way down to the bare studs. Plus one of the few hotels in the area that do not charge for parking. Large flat screen T.V., microwave, fridge, ironing board, coffee, Wi-Fi, USB ports all in the room. We stay there every time we go to Disneyland since it is walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you been a loyal Eden Roc Inn and Suites guests. We are glad to hear that you choose to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites every time to come visit Disneyland. Yes, you are absolutely correct when you state that Eden Roc Inn and Suites does not charge its guests for parking. Eden Roc Inn and Suites also does not charge for Wi-Fi service. And yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located about a ten minute walk from the main entrance to Disneyland. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed our newly appointed rooms. We look forward to your upcoming visit to Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We made a reservation for a suite at this hotel, to stay here after our visit to disneyland, the reservation was made three weeks prior, they charged us a week before our visit.  And after a tiresome day in disney, we arrived to the hotel, to the news that apparently we didn't have a reservation and obviously they didn't have a suite available; so they ended up giving us a room with two beds, we tried other hotels but if course everything was booked. We stayed,  and it was awful, terrible service, asked for a hair dryer and extra towels and they never brought them. Horrible stay.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites takes pride in providing a comfortable and lasting positive experience to all its guests. But when our valued guests say otherwise, we know we are doing something wrong with our guests' accommodations. Please apologize us for the inconvenience you encountered at our Anaheim hotel. We would like to clarify a few things regarding our room charges. Per our hotel policy, we do not charge our guests credit card a week before their arrival date, instead, third party reservations are charged 3 days before the guest's arrival date. And, as you saw during your stay, every single of our newly remodeled rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and hair dryer. We would love for you to call us so we can discuss how we failed to properly accommodate your needs during your stay. Thank you for bringing this up to our attention, and we look forward to your call.  Kind Regards,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Don't take the car to Disney - stay here and walk. Very smart rooms, with premium furnishings, nice bathrooms, decent wifi etc. Parking was easy though you can only leave it here while you are a guest. Reception staff were friendly and helpful.   We enjoyed our time here. It's 15 mins to Disney - we even popped back during the day after the rain stopped to change clothes and could walk back again.  We arrived late and the reception recommended some take out places that deliver direct to your room, so you don't need to go out again. Though avoid the Chinese place they recommend, took over an hour and asked for a higher tip!  Overall, unless you want Disney themed rooms, don't waste the money, and stay here instead!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. As you were able to see during your stay, the entire property has been recently remodeled. All rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker and all the rooms have wireless internet. Yes, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and yes, we do not charge our guest a parking fee. Just has you have stated, most guest do leave this cars at the property and walk (about ten-fifteen minutes) to Disneyland. Thank you again for the wonderful review, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for walking to Disneyland!
Summary: We wanted a hotel close to Disneyland and didn't want to break the bank which is why we chose Eden Roc. We were extremely happy when we got into our room. The hotel is older and from the outside doesn't look as nice as the other resorts we drove by. The room was large, newly remodeled with tasteful furnishings, comfortable beds and one of the nicer rooms I've stayed in! Checking and checkout was quick and the staff wee very friendly and helpful.  Location was perfect for my husband and myself as we could walk to the park in the morning, come back and nap for a few hours and then walk back to the park and enjoy the night there!  There is a Coco's restaurant nearby which was great food and even better service! We will be coming back next year!  I had never tried a "boutique "
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. We are extremely happy to hear that you and your husband had a pleasant stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you saw during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. As a newly remodeled property, all guests are offered fully furnished rooms that come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, and most importantly, free Wi-Fi service. Thank you again for the wonderful feedback. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.

Summary Heading: Great for economical Disney family holiday!
Summary: We only booked this online the morning of  our stay but there were no issues at all. (Another hotel had left us in the lurch). Room was very large and clean. Plenty of room for all our luggage. Small fridge in room, coffee making facilities and vending machines. Beds were comfortable and linen clean.  Easy walking distance to Disney parks. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Parking was free. Plenty of options close by for meals, as breakfast not included.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our newly remodeled hotel was very much to your liking. We are also happy to know that we were the difference when compared to your last hotel experience. You might recall from your stay, that instead of carpet, our spacious rooms have vinyl floors; this makes for a cleaner ambiance. Yes, Eden Roc is just minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland (about a ten minute walk), our team members have been highly trained at providing an exceptional service to our guests. We hope you will be able to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on our next visit to the city of Anaheim.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Hotel was Nice and Clean however my Whole stay was charged to my debit card a day before I even arrived at the Hotel.  Then to top it all off I had to pony up an extra $100 for a room deposit.  Why should I even have a deposit since I technically pre paid.  Also when I called the Hotel about the charge the staff was not very helpful and no one would do anything about the charge which overdrew my account since I was going to use another credit card.  All of this was met with blank stares and unwillingness to help.  All I was looking for was for them to cover my NSF fee but nada.  All that was said is apparently it was stated somewhere in my Confirmation email about these charges and policy's.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your concern regarding your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. And please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused to you. Eden Roc Inn and Suites does pre-authorize all incoming reservations 24 hours prior to guest arrival. In case the credit card that was used to book the room declines, our highly trained team members call the guest and ask for a different credit card to charge the room. In this case, your credit card did go through and that is why our team members did not called you. We would have loved for you to call us once you found out that a charge was made to the credit card you had provided the hotel. We would have immediately cancel the charged on said credit card, and we would have gladly asked for a different credit card to charge. Eden Roc does require a one hundred dollar deposit for all reservations, and this money is refunded back on the check out day of the guest. We hope that this misunderstanding did not hampered you from staying with us in the future.  Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The first time I found this gem was on booking.com I was not let down. The hotel is perfectly in every way, from the perfect location, amazing/friendly staff. The staff goes over and beyond their call of duty. I am not the happiest person at 1am however Graceann (hope that was her name; checked in Dec 23rd) was amazing! Its always great to be called by your name and welcomed back each time I stay! I will continue to stay here because the service is the BEST!!!! Management is amazing!!!!
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is happy for the review you have provided for us to read. We are also glad to hear that you are a returning guest and that every time you check in to the hotel, our team members always greet you with a wonderful smile and great customer service. Just as you have stated on your review, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Thank you again for the wonderful review you have provided us with, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a good location
Summary: This hotel was in a great spot close to Downtown Disney and the park entrances. The rooms were modern and clean and a good size.  Our room was a little noisy but nothing dramatic however from what I could tell most rooms would be very quiet.   Check in was quick and easy and we were allowed to check in around an hour early which we appreciated.   Overall I enjoyed the stay here and would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites has completely been remodeled. All our rooms are nicely appointed with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, fridge, and personal coffee maker. You will be happy to know that instead of carpet, all rooms have vinyl flooring, which make the ambiance of the rooms feel a lot more cleaner. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located for those families visiting Disneyland due to its close proximity to Disneyland and due to its affordable room rate. We are happy to hear that you had a smooth check in and that you enjoyed your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Please consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We had a double queen, very modern & clean except for the bathroom door, lots of dirt film on the door itself around the door knob.  Need to take a closer look at cleanliness.  Able to park one vehicle for free, added bonus.  Try to stay on the top floow, bottom floor can hear the people above.  Its close to the street but couldn't hear the traffic as it past.  This hotel was recommended to me and I would stay here again.  Staff were nice.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites would like to thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Anaheim property. We are glad to hear that you found our property convenient, as it is located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. Thank you for the comments regarding the findings with the cleanliness of the door. We will take care of that issue immediately. Finally, we are glad to hear that our team members shined for you and that you will be staying with us on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay, close to the parks
Summary: We just finished a great stay at Eden Roc. Love the newly updated rooms, comfy beds, and great walkable location. It's right across the street from Coco's which is currently giving a 10% discount for hotel guests.  Walking to the parks is easy via Downtown Disney and the Grand Californian.  One really neat amenity is the charging unit on the desk, it has 3 wall outlets and 2 USB chargers which is helpful when traveling with teens and all their gadgets. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because the floors were dirty even though they are wood laminate. Still the overall cleanliness was great. The picture of the towel shows how dirty the floors were when we spilled some soda on the floor and used a towel to clean it up.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that your entire family enjoyed their stay at our Anaheim property. And just like you have stated in your review, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We are glad to hear that you liked the layout of the rooms, and that charging units near the table came in handy to the entire family. We will keep in mind the comments regarding the cleanliness of the rooms. We just hope you will be able to stay with us again on your next trip to the city of Anaheim.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Excellent money value -  very close to Disneyland, our room was very quiet beds were very comfortable.    Extremely friendly and helpful staff.  Surrounded by a lovely restaurant -   loved the stay will definitely stay again on our next trip to America.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the five-star review you have on our Anaheim property. We are delighted to hear that our room rates were to your liking, and that you chose Eden Roc Inn and Suites solely for its location, and because Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property. We are glad to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay, and thank you for already considering Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your future place of stay.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My BF and I stayed at Eden Roc during our trip to Disneyland. It is an incredibly convenient location and overall, the property is nice and the staff was friendly. My only complaint would be parking - the lots look too small to accommodate the number of rooms that were apart of the Inn.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your recent visit to Disneyland. We are happy to hear that you and your company enjoyed our newly remodeled property. And yes, we are conveniently located for those visiting Disneyland, as we are just ten minutes-walking distance from the main entrance to Disneyland. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites also offer free Wi-Fi, and parking. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suite on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disney
Summary: My husband, son, and I were really impressed with this hotel. The rooms are really modern and clean. The shower was great and the price was fantastic. The beds were also very comfy! It is listed as 2 stars which scared me but I think they just must not have been reviewed in awhile. We will definitely stay here again.   We drove out the night before we went to Disney so we could get an early start. The free parking was a huge bonus! We walked to Disney the next day, had a great time and walked back to the hotel and drove home that night. You save $20 on parking at Disney and it is a nice walk.   Be warned there are no elevators if you stay on the second floor.
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you, your husband and son had an enjoyable stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you were able to see during your stay, all our newly remodeled rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. Our guests are also offered free Wi-Fi, and parking, and just as you have stated in the above review, one will save about twenty dollars/ day when parking at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, and walking to Disneyland, which is only a ten minute walk. We hope you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Nice property close to park and restaurants, newly remodeled rooms, clean, walking distance to Disney! Bathroom area a little small for size of room Helpful staff, Nice large room for family members and baggage
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is situated just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. Our property, as you found out, has been completely remodeled; the rooms are spacious and immaculate. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites also offers all its guest free Wi-Fi. We are happy to learn that our team members shined for you during your stay, and we hope you will be able to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future visit to the wonderful city of Anaheim.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I want to thank Eden Roc Inn for doing what an airline couldn't. I was suppose to fly in on Wednesday night and stay 3 nights, but because of the fog, our plane couldn't land and we returned to SFO. I called the hotel right when we landed and let them know what was going on and we were not trying to be a no show. The lady that answered the phone wasn't sure what they can do for us but checked us in and took notes. When we finally flew in on Thursday and checked in, the manager was aware of our situation and the gentleman informed us we would be taken care of. The manager credit our account and wasn't charged for the night we couldn't be there. The staff was amazing and super helpful. I would defiantly stay here again! The room were huge and very affordable. We were right by
Manager Response: We are happy to read that the entire Eden Roc Inn and Suites team was able to accommodate your needs due to your flight been delayed because of the dense fog that prevented you from landing at the airport and staying at Eden Roc as it was the initial plan. Eden Roc Inn and Suites in a newly remodeled property, all our rooms are spacious and kept in optimal cleaning conditions thanks to the amazing work that our housekeeping department does every day. We offer all guest free Wi-Fi, parking and are also located near many restaurants and shops. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Eden Roc has been recently remodeled and the place is clean and fresh.  We found the bed comfortable and the room nicely appointed with refrigerator, microwave and a nice TV.  I appreciated the laminate flooring as I find that surface to be cleaner than carpet.  The bathroom space is small, but for the price of the room, it served us very well.  We were in room 407 and it was very quiet.  Other family members stayed in larger rooms to accommodate 4 children - and the room was very spacious with 2 queen beds and a sofa-sleeper.  I would call Eden Roc an excellent value for families - not very fancy, but clean, affordable and a short walk to Disneyland.  From the upstairs walkway we had a great view of the fireworks.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. As you have stated in your review, our spacious and immaculate rooms are nicely appointed with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. The property does offer its guests free Wi-Fi, and parking, and we are also located near many stores, restaurants, and shops. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice clean cost effective near Disney
Summary: Third time visit to this hotel. Rooms renovated two years ago. Clean and comfortable. 10 Min walk to the parks (via grand Californian). Nice free parking. Was allowed to leave my car at the parking after checkout as my flight was late at night.
Manager Response: Thank you providing us with your five star review on our Anaheim property. We assure you that the property does have ample parking space for every single room that the hotel has. And yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property. All rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. Also, as you have stated, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is perfectly located for those visiting Disneyland, as we are ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Our stay was the worst! The first room we checked into we had to change because the pillows had makeup and the bed sheets had urine stains and hairs.We were there for 10 minutes.They guy at front desk was nice enough to move us into a bigger room but it wouldn't be adjoined with the other 2 couples we traveled with. The second room we moved to was the same thing! The bed pads had urine stains and hairs but we weren't going to switch rooms AGAIN because it was 9:00 at night an we were tired of the drive and wanted to rest so we took our own blankets and pillows and slept on top of their done beds.  The 1st day when we got back to the room, housekeeping hadn't even done our room which meant diapers still in the trash cans and no towels.I called the from desk and no one even knew
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The Gym of affordable Anaheim hotels
Summary: We stayed here a year ago mid renovation and had a few small issues that resulted in mixed feelings and reviews, I have already reviewed Eden Roc once. Last year I spoke to the GM Agnes and expressed my concerns and which little things impacted our stay. I am so pleased to say that every single concern we had previously has been fixed. Eden Roc is a beautiful little hotel situated perfectly for Disneyland trips. The remodeled rooms are much nicer than most in the area including many of the 3-star hotels near Disney. The amazing thing is that with all of that they do not add "resort fees" and parking fees, they are the ONLY hotel in anna him that doesn't do that. It is so nice to book a room and know that the nightly rate is it not need to plan on an additional $15-$30 for
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent return stay to Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that we were able to take care of those issues you encountered during the time we were finishing the renovations here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, you are correct when you say that Eden Roc Inn and Suites charges its guest a flat room rate, without the usual hidden fees. We hope you will make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Eden Roc is a great choice for those seeking affordable accommodation close to Disneyland in Anaheim. The rooms are renovated & clean with the free parking a bonus. The only improvement to our room would have been a small table and chairs. We would stay here next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star review you have on our property. We are happy to hear that our newly remodeled hotel was to your liking. As you have found out, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is also located just a few feet away from the Convention Center. Ede. Roc offers its guest free Wi-Fi and parking; rooms are spacious and clean. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Suite good size for family of 5
Summary: Big enough for a family of 5!  But it was odd that the couch bed was in a separate room that just had a closet. The TV and frig were in the room with the two queen beds. We were in a room, but the sheets were not clean, so we were able to move to another room.  The checkout time was flexible which was helpful. For those going to Disneyland, the walk is about 15-30 minutes; it took the longest when we were tired and coming home after being at the park all day till late. We tried every route, going through Disney CA hotel, thru Downtown Disney and the walking path that goes by the tram.  It may be too long for little kids. Also, they were kind enough to let us park early before our check-in time. We checked in later.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback you have on our property. And please apologize us for the issue you encountered with the first room that was provided to you and your family; but we are happy to hear that the issue was rectified promptly. We are one of the most affordable hotels that is in close proximity to Disneyland, and we also recently remodeled the entire property. All rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, personal coffee maker, and best of all, free Wi-Fi. Thank you for the great comments you have regarding our property, and we hope to see you again at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Clean comfortable, minimal frills but cost was a driving force for choosing here, staff was responsive, close to Disney but a substantial walk just the same, Parking waasn't as bad as some previous reviews.
Manager Response: As a newly remodeled property, located in the city of Anaheim, just ten minutes (walking distance) away from the main entrance to Disneyland, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is proud to state that we have the most affordable rates around the area, when compared to hotels of the same quality and services. Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to having you back at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We chose Eden Roc for the price, and proximity to Disneyland. It was easy walking distance to there, and even closer to a few restaurants. We were on the second floor, which meant going up stairs, as there is no elevator, which was not ideal for our stroller, but manageable.  The room however was much bigger than we expected. We had a double queen, but it looked more like the picture of the family room. Lots of floor space. We ended up dining on takeaway on the floor, the 4 of us, on a tarp we brought with us since there was only one chair.  In fact the excess space in the room made me wonder why they don't put a dining table in there... It would easily fit.  Check-in and out was easy.  I was easily able to request another towel for my baby. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you, along with your entire family were able to enjoy our immaculate, spacious and newly remodeled rooms. Yes, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and we are also located on the same lot as the Convention Center; restaurants and stores are also within walking distance. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed in October 2015 and chose this hotel as it had recently been renovated. We travelled from the UK and were joined by my husband's parents a week into the trip. We emailed before arriving to request rooms next to each other that faced Disney. They accommodated this request and our rooms had a great view of Disney.  The hotel renovation was lovely, clean and modern. Staff extremely helpful and friendly. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review you have on our property. We are glad to hear that the whole family enjoyed their stay at our property, and that we were able to accommodate your request. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi, and parking. And we look forward to your next stay at Ede Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We  really enjoyed the room spacious and very clean. We went to Disney, so we loved the location. Very convenient.   Only problem we had, which disturbed put sleep was the wake up call. We did not request a wake up call, but youf system called us at 6 am on both days. I addressed it the first day and it occurred on the 2nd day as well.  We were very happy with the room, but disturbing our sleep made my fianc√© unhappy.   We will be coming back in April for a Disney visit and would like to stay in you hotel again. Just worried about the unwarranted wake up calls.  Just a small concern.  Thank you for a into this matter. Pls call or email. 702-374-1117
Manager Response: We are extremely glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled property. And please accept our most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you encountered with the wake up call that woke you up early in the morning. We assure you that the problem with the wake up call has been taken care of, and will not occur again on your return stay to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We've stayed at Eden Roc for the past few years to accommodate us for our Disney races. It's the perfect spot and within walking distance from the start line and the parks! We LOVE the renovation and the space of the rooms. It's such a big change from how it used to look and our stay is even more enjoyable. The gentleman at the front desk (I'm sorry, if you read this I am forgetting your name at the moment!! :/) is always very nice and remembers our faces for having been there for so long ;) We have yet to try the continental breakfast but the new space looks beautiful!
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located for those people visiting Disneyland, and/or the Convention Center. And thank you for choosing Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your destination during the Disney races. Thank you for having done for the past couple of years. We are glad to hear that you approve of the improvements we have made with the rooms, Wi-Fi, and customer service. Just a little note regarding the continental breakfast; our free continental breakfast was discontinued a couple of months ago, so currently, we do not offer such amenity at our property. We hope you can still consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites as your destination during more Disney races.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Clean, Close to Disneyland Resort, Friendly.  We had a wonderful time.  This is the place to stay if you're in town for Anaheim fun.  Close to everything.  The price is right.  The rooms are clean and desk help is friendly and willing to take care of any of your needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review you have on our newly remodeled Anaheim property. Eden Roc is ideally located to the main entrance to Disneyland (10 minute walking distance), and the Convention Center (a few feet away). The entire property has been completely remodeled, and yes, all rooms are immaculate and spacious. We provide a courteous, and prompt customer service. And yes, as a newly remodeled property, the room rates are modest, as we offer free Wi-Fi, parking and as you stated, are conveniently located many shops, restaurants and most importantly walking distance to Disneyland.    Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice and close to Disneyland without the Disney price
Summary: We stayed here 3 nights while we spent a weekend at Disneyland.  It is about as close as you can get without staying in a Disney hotel.  The prices at Eden Roc were good for the area.  The rooms were clean and it was nice having lots of outlets, a fridge and a microwave.  The wood floors also help make it feel a little cleaner.  We stayed in 2 different rooms due to how we booked them.  One room was adequate in size for 2 people and the 2nd room was much, much larger- almost too large for the one bed.  One of the rooms was on the 1st floor and I could hear a lot of sounds from the room upstairs.  The WiFi wasn't very good and I ended up not using it because it was so spotty (that was true about both rooms even though they were 2 very different parts of the hotel).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. And thank you for spending last weekend with us. As you were able to see for yourself, we offer our guest the best affordable rates for a newly remodeled property. We offer our guests free Wi-Fi, and parking. and best of all, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great hotel! No surprises. Clean and up to date. Make sure to stay on the top floor, as the walls are paper thin. All in all I give this place 4 stars and we will definitely be staying at Eden Roc again. kudos to the staff for delivering excellent customer service! (oh and did I mention it's walking distance to Disneyland!)
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. And Just as you have stated in your review, our property is immaculate and up-to-date. The property offers all its guest free Wi-Fi and parking. We are also located adjacent to the Convention center, and are located near many shops and restaurants, all within walking distance. We look forward to you next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice rooms for a good prices!!
Summary: Ever since I discovered this hotel, I always book a room for Disney race weekends. I am from So Cal, but I find it easier to stay close to the race, so I can sleep in longer for a race. The price is always good especially if you book in advance. The rooms are nice as they were remodeled more than a year ago. I already have a room booked for my Disney races in 2016. Bottom line...Nice rooms for a great price especially being so close to Disneyland and Downtown Disney!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to inform us about your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very glad to hear that you are a returning guest, and that you decided to stay at our Anaheim property due to its proximity to Disneyland, and its proximity to the start line of your race. Yes, we offer affordable rates to all our guests, and just as you have stated all room are newly remodeled, clean and spacious. We look forward to your next stay come next year.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Booked Eden Roc on recommendation from friend that it was cheap. Because of the price, I was not expecting much but the rooms are very recently remodeled and huge!  Even has a charging station at the desk in the room with two outlets and two USB ports.  Appreciate that they did not put carpet in the rooms - carpet at even high end hotels is gross!  Was nice to have a clean feeling!  Front desk was super friendly. They called after we checked out and told me the maid had found my purse I had forgotten in a drawer!  Only "negatives" are no free breakfast and a little bit of a walk to the entrance of Disneyland. Fine with older kids but for those just out of a stroller, probably farther than they can easily walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on a friend's recommendation. We are glad to hear that we exceeded your expectations, and that the spacious and immaculate rooms were to your liking. Eden Roc is ideally located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and adjacent to the Convention center. We like to provide the best affordable rate possible, and please know that as a newly remodeled property, we have the best affordable rates when compared with other properties of the same quality and service as Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We look forward to your next stay at our Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It was an amazing stay, really clean and not dirty at all. Great customer service and room service love how close it was to Disneyland and how the rooms have wood floors. Great pool and overall everything was fantastic
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic feedback you have on our newly remodeled Anaheim property. We are glad to hear that our customer service and room amenities, as well as room condition were to your delight. Yes, we are proud to state that we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and we are also located in the same lot as the Convention Center, so walking to such place will only take less than five minutes. We hope you will be able to make Eden Roc Inn and Suites your place of stay when visiting Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We spent three weeks at Eden Roc so had a good chance to assess all aspects of he Hotel. It really does tick all the boxes. The rooms are immaculate, the service friendly and amongst the best value in the whole of Anaheim. I would not hesitate to return on our next visit.
Manager Response: It is so great to hear that you enjoyed your three week vacation at our newly remodeled property. And we are happy to hear that all aspects of your stay were to your liking as the rooms are completely remodeled and they are kept in optimal cleaning conditions. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi and parking and that you were able to take a dip in our pool. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The remodel is beautiful!! The rooms are very large. Beautiful up to date decor. The beds were some of the most comfortable we have ever stayed in! Short walk to Disneyland made it the perfect place!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the beautiful review you have on our property. We are happy to hear that you liked all the renovation we did with the property and that you selected to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites due to its close proximity to Disneyland. As you have stated, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and as a newly remodeled property, we have the best available rates. We offer free Wi-Fi, parking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: To be honest, I was worried Eden Roc was going to be a low quality hotel for the price we were charged, but the room was beautiful and clean and the staff was very courteous. I plan on coming back to this hotel for my convention each year as long as the rates remain fair!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that your expectations about our property were exceeded by our great customer service and by the spotless condition of our newly remodeled rooms. As you have stated, our room rates are affordable, and we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We provide our guests with free Wi-Fi, and parking. We are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. People visiting the Convention Center or Disneyland will benefit from our free parking as they can park their cars in the hotel parking lot, and walk either to Disney or the Convention Center, as again, the are located very closed to Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are looking forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is the only place I stay when I go to Disneyland. Easy walk to the park, extremely comfortable beds, air conditioner is fantastic, very reasonably priced, and wonderful customer service. Always greeted with a friendly face every time we arrive.
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you have stayed at our property on several occasions and that you always choose Eden Roc Inn and Suites due to its proximity to Disneyland, as we are located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Our property, as you saw during your stay, has been completely remodeled, and all our rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, and Ironing board. The property itself offers free Wi-Fi and parking, and best of all, Eden Roc offers affordable rates to all its guest. We thank you again for the kind feedback, and we look forward to your next visit to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I recently booked a room here for the price.   The place has been updated.   It's a simple, clean and inexpensive place to stay.   We are year pass holders for Disneyland.   When we stayed some construction as still going on.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property on your recent visit to Disneyland. We are happy to hear that you selected to stay at Eden Roc, based on its proximity to Disneyland, affordable rates, and based on that the entire property has been completely remodeled. Please know that here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we offer free Wi-Fi, and parking. For those families visiting Disneyland, you can save a few dollars by leaving your car at our property and walking to Disneyland as it only takes about ten minutes to arrive at the Disneyland main entrance. We very much look forward to be your preferred hotel when visiting Disneyland.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Friendly staff, always clean, and walking distance to food and Disneyland. My children love staying at this hotel and feel at home. We have stayed at Eden Roc multiple times and will continue to stay for our trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you are a returning guest as you have stayed with us on previous occasions, and that your children feel at home when staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We look forward to your upcoming stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I will admit that when we drove up we were a bit sceptical.  This property is more of a motel rather than hotel and our first thought was they have a really good photographer. But our stay was perfect! The beds and pillows are comfortable, the rooms are very clean, nicely decorated and very spacious.  The free Wi-Fi is fast. The location is very close to the convention center. And the price was great. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others going to the convention center or Disney.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay during your visit to the Convention Center. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property. The entire property was completely remodeled and we offer free Wi-Fi, and parking to all our guests. We are happy to heat that you chose to stay at our property due to its proximity to the Convention Center (only a few feet away!!!) as we are adjacent to it. We are also located ten minutes to the main entrance to Disneyland. Once again, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our Anaheim property and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Really good hotel. Simple, cheap and clean. Walking distance to Disneyland. No carpet, bedroom for 6 persons. Parking. Few restaurants around and block away from downtown disney. Perfect for family. No breakfast, but it has a small refrigerator and coffee machine.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback you have on our Anaheim property. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and also adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center. Our newly remodeled property offers, all its guest free Wi-Fi, and parking, which is very beneficial to those families visiting Disneyland and who want to save on parking by leaving their car at our property and walking to Disneyland. The rooms do come with a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Fully remodeled and very nice. Comfy beds, clean rooms and the front desk was very nice. Antonio who works the front desk was always accommodating as our family had two rooms and wanted to be next door to each other on the second floor. The chilled pool was nice as the weather was in the high 80s. 10-12 minute walk to Disneyland and two restaurants next door to the hotel. The front desk says they should have breakfast setup in the coming months, which would be an added benefit. We will stay at Eden Roc again next year.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that our team members shined for your during your recent stay at Ede Roc Inn and Suites, and that they were able to accommodate your needs. Yes, you are absolutely correct when you state that the entire property is fully renovated, and that we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and well as adjacent to the Convention Center. Please know as a newly remodeled property, we kept our prices at an affordable rate. We will look forward to your return stay next year.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, reasonable, and close to Disneyland
Summary: The rooms are newly remodeled and look new.  They are spacious, clean, and comfortable. The employees at the front desk are very professional, friendly, and helpful.  They are willing to ask questions and know the area.  Off of the lobby there is a large area with tables and chairs that can be used for visiting with friends, eating a meal that you brought back with you, or whatever you wish.  It is just a short 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland.  Great place to stay!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. And we are also happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay. As you found during your stay, our team members are very knowledgeable regarding the best places to eat, shop, and explore. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi and parking. We look forward to your future stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at Eden Roc just last week. It's so close to Disneyland (cut throughly Grand Californian & follow the signs) Super close to Downtown Disney & Disney California Adventure. Be sure to eat Breakfast at Coco's across the street. Great food and Great service + 10% discount if you tell them you are staying at Eden Roc.   The room was a great size, well furnished. Clean linen and towels daily.  Always found a parking space. Fresh & clean. Reception were always so helpful. When we travel from Australia to Disney we will stay at Eden Roc again üòÉ
Manager Response: Thank you for your valued input on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, all our rooms are immaculate and spacious. We offer all our guest free Wi-Fi, and parking, and best of all, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Just in case you were not aware, we are also located adjacent to the Convention Center, and are also walking distance to many restaurants, and stores. We will be awaiting your return stay to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel/motel was perfect. We were walking distance to Disneyland. All of the rooms were newly renovated and super clean with comfortable beds. The only down fall is that we stayed on the first floor and got woken up by screaming children but that was our fault for choosing the first floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for the candid feedback you have on our newly remodeled Anaheim property. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is the perfect hotel to stay, as we are only ten minutes away (walking) from the main entrance to Disneyland, which means to can leave your car at our property, walk to Disneyland, and save a couple of dollars on parking. Please know that here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we offer free Wi-Fi, and just as you have stated, all rooms are spacious, and immaculate. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good room that is an easy walk to the parks
Summary: My partner and I stated at Eden Roc last week while visiting Disneyland.  The room is as advertised on the website.  I was happy to see that the room was very clean due to the fact that there is no carpet and the furnishings were also very up to date.  The hotel is an easy walk to the parks when you cut through the Grand Californian.  Since there are hard floors you can here the people above you walking if they are loud.  Overall, this is a good hotel with a good staff and I might stay here again on our next trip.  If they would add a bedside lamp or dimmers on the switches that control the can lights above the bed,  upgraded bedding to match the updated rooms, and nicer bathroom amenities this would be a five star rating.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are happy to hear that all our hard work on renovating the entire property is been noticed. As you stated, we got rid of having carpets inside the rooms and opted for a cleaner method with the installation of vinyl. Thank you for the suggestions, we will make sure to show them to higher management, and we look forward to your next stay at our Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Hotel is good location is great parking is tight. Also it's kind of strange for a room with 4 people they ONLY give you one key and to top it off it had to be returned at the end of your stay. Crazy..
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback you have on our newly remodeled property. Yes, the hotel is perfectly located for those families who are visiting Disneyland or for those people who need to attend the convention center. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers free Wi-Fi and parking, which is beneficial for those visiting Disneyland and or the convention center as money can be saved by leaving the car at the hotel and just walking to their destination. We very much look forward to your next visit to our Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I just recently stayed at the Eden Roc Inn & Suites over our last trip to Disneyland and loved it! I was beyond impressed by the undated rooms (we had a two queen bed standard room) very spacious and clean. The staff were quite nice and the walk to Disneyland was only about 10 min. Best nearby hotel we're stayed at in a long time. Better than Quality Inn, Super 8, and less expensive for about the same quality as Best Western. The only thing the I wasn't too pleased with was that fact that they don't do early check ins or late check outs (no exceptions).
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback you have on our newly remodeled Anaheim property. We are happy to hear that you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay, and that you guys enjoyed the ten minute walk to Disneyland. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi. We are looking forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disney California Adventure
Summary: The place is really clean, convenient and close to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  Left the car parked there and walked to Disney.   The receptionist were all very helpful in providing directions (and shortcuts) to reach Disneyland/Disney California Adventure.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. All our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and are kept in optimal orderly condition. By parking at our parking stalls, guests can save a few dollars by walking to Disneyland, as we offer free parking and Wi-Fi. Please let us know about any special accommodations you might need during your next stay with us, as we will be more then happy to honor those requests.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Enjoyable stay at the happiest place on earth
Summary: The hotel was so clean & comfortable. The staff at the front desk were very helpful, my international flight arrived 6 hours before check in & the lovely lady at the desk let me freshen up in the bathroom & store my luggage while I explored downtown Disney until I could check in at 2.30pm - half an hour early.  Thank goodness cause I was exhausted! The room was spacious & the bed very comfortable. I felt so safe walking to Disney by myself every day, a quick 20 minute walk to bag check through the grand C alifornian. Would definitely stay here again on a return visit & happily recommend to others.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the wonderful comments you have regarding our newly remodeled property, and regarding our great customer service from our team members. As you have seen, we are in the perfect location for those families who want to visit Disneyland, and for those people who need to go to the Convention Center, as we are just a few feet away from such place. Please know that we offer free Wi-Fi and parking and all our newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. We are looking forward to your next stay, which is fast approaching.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I was flat out amazed that this hotel was as nice as it was for the price I paid.  Whatever recent renovation they have done has paid off, as the room was fantastic.  It's location is perfect as well, as it's only a short walk up Disneyland drive until you're in Downtown Disney. Staff was very friendly and efficient, and the room had a great clean smell to it. To those who give it a lower rating because "I saw a bug" or "I bumped my shin on the bed" or "I had to ask for more towels" grow up and be an adult.  This place is so great, I immediately booked again for travel next year.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the wonderful comments you have regarding our newly remodeled property, and regarding our great customer service from our team members. As you have seen, we are in the perfect location for those families who want to visit Disneyland, and for those people who need to go to the Convention Center, as we are just a few feet away from such place. Please know that we offer free Wi-Fi and parking and all our newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. We are looking forward to your next stay, which is fast approaching.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very satisfied with our stay at Eden Roc & Suites. Went in July, again in August, and now for our 3rd time, going on October 30, 2015. Beautiful staff and management, especially Oscar. Very clean, and a very comfort stay. I do recommend this place for your vacation stay. Thank you very much Oscar, Stephanie, and rest of the staff. Oscar, you're wonderful. Thank you for the beautiful service you render us.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for the wonderful comments you have regarding our newly remodeled property, and regarding our great customer service from our team members. As you have seen, we are in the perfect location for those families who want to visit Disneyland, and for those people who need to go to the Convention Center, as we are just a few feet away from such place. Please know that we offer free Wi-Fi and parking and all our newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board and personal coffee maker. We are looking forward to your next stay, which is fast approaching.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have stayed here twice now and find it is a great deal for visiting the Disneyland resort. It is clean and comfortable. The only downside to this hotel is the mini-fridge does not have a freezer compartment which I require for my ice packs. I have food allergies and have to travel with all my food into the parks each day.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback you have provided us. We are happy to learn that you have previously stayed with us and that you find our newly remodeled rooms to be clean and comfortable. We hope you are taking advance of our free Wi-Fi and parking. It is always a pleasure to assist our valued guest with any request they might need. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It was good from the on line reservations to the check-in and check-out. They were able to place our two rooms next to each other. Any request I had was quickly addressed and all staff was very positive.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the five star review you have on our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear that you had a smooth check-in and check-out process, and that we were able to accommodate your needs. As you saw during your first stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We are also located adjacent to the Convention Center (2 minutes walk), and about the same distance from restaurants and shops. We are very much looking forward to your upcoming stay with us.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a nice distance from the park. At just 1/2 mile it's an easy walk. You can even cut through hotel at California Adventure to get in and out. Just beware in order to get fast passes, your tickets must be scanned at the door. The room are nicely remodeled, and huge! The staff was nice and accommodating. The only thing was that they advertise having Disney tickets, but they actually have a service that that comes to your room and sells them. So depending on when you get there (we got there at 5:30pm on Saturday) they may not be available until the following day. The other thing was the floors. Beautiful, good choice and looked clean, but the kids feet were black after a few minutes, even after housekeeping üòÅ Other then that it's a good price, there are 2 breakfast
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Eden Roc in a newly remodeled property that offers its guest immaculate and spacious rooms, which come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board and personal coffee maker. It is always great to hear good comments regarding our team member's customer service; we strive to provide an accurate and professional customer service, and by what you have just described, we know we are doing just that. We are looking forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The location is perfect for exploring The area around disneyland. This was for us a night away from the children and to hav4e a dinner with friends.If you were t attend Disneyland the location could not be more perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a couple of minutes to describe your recent experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, we are perfectly located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Our entire property has been recently remodeled and all rooms come nicely furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Ironing board, and personal coffee maker. The hotel also offer free Wi-Fi, and parking. We look forward to your next booking with us.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Be aware that early check in might be difficult as this is a smaller hotel and it fills up quickly. Check in time is 3pm, so if you arrive earlier than this, be prepared for a wait time until a room is ready (this happened to us but they were accommodating within 1 hour). The location is great and rooms were newly renovated. The walk to Disney was 10 minutes if you cut through The Grand Californian Hotel. This takes you right in to Downtown Disney with full access to shopping and food! If you want to stay close to the hotel, there are two restaurants (Coco's & Tiffy's) within a 3 minute walk and vending machines on site. Rooms have microwave, flat screen tv, free wifi, mini fridge, iron & ironing board. The parking lot is tight, so once you find a spot you 'll want to stay there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. Yes, even though check in time starts at 3:00PM, whenever we have the room available guest will be able to check in early, and also just like you mentioned above, in case your room in not ready, we will do our best to have your room cleaned as fast as possible. Eden Roc is the best place to stay at since one is able to walk to Disneyland, and restaurants while enjoying the beautiful scenery that Anaheim has to offer.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great value, close to Disneyland and California Adventureland.  Kids loved the pool in the afternoon. Rooms are newly renovated, clean and well furnished. Easy to walk to Disney and restaurants in the area.
Manager Response: We are happy to read that your kids loved our clean and crisp pool during the hot afternoon Southern California weather. All of our rooms have been recently renovated, and all come with a flat screen television,a microwave, Iron, Iron Board, and personal coffee maker. We are ideally located for those people who want to visit such places as Disneyland (ten minute walk), Anaheim Convention Center (adjacent), and are also walking distance to many restaurants, and shops. We also offer free Wi-Fi, and parking to all our guests. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Room was fie since we didn't spend much time there. About a 10min walk to Disneyland if you go through the Grand Californian and then Downtown Disney which isn't too bad. My sister got kidney stones while we were there and I couldn't call an ambulance from the room so I guess that was a down side...
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. As you were able to see, the entire property has been completely remodeled; all the rooms are furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board, and personal coffee maker. Since the entire property has been completely remodeled, we made sure to have working phone lines, that is why it is so unusual to hear of the phone lines not working. We will contact our phone company so they can run a test on the phone lines to make sure all phone lines are working so that our guests can have an appropriate method of communication to the front desk or outside the property. We hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites as a future destination of stay on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: when we made the reservation they said there was a free breakfast and a crib for our 2 year old. When we checked in there was NO breakfast, and they had NO cribs. so our daughter had to sleep in the bed and of course fell out in the middle of the night onto a hard floor despite pillows being all around her.  Not a young family friendly place despite being in walking distance to Disneyland. The staff was super friendly (unfortunately not friendly enough to go get a crib that was promised).    We specifically booked a crib and this hotel for the breakfast and feel deceived showing up and having 2 of the free amenities we specifically booked not even available for a charge if wanted. We travel a lot with our 3 children (ages 2-8) all over the world and have never stayed at a hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our newly remodeled property. We thank you for your feedback as we always strive in providing the best service possible. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you encountered with the amenities that were not offered to you during your stay. We will talk to higher management so issues like the one you encountered do not happen again. We are currently working on providing our guests with a better Wi-Fi service, as well as informing our team members of the amenities we offer, and the amenities we do not offer at our property. Thank you for your feedback and again, we apologies for the inconvenience you encountered during your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel is in a convenient location with easy access to restaurants and the parks it is about a 15 in walk to the parks, $5 Uber ride, or $11 cab ride.  The hotel much bigger than it looks as there are two separate parking lot/wings to the hotel.  The rooms are newly renovated & clean.  The staff was also nice but we didn't interact with them much.  Downside, (a shame because many other reviewers have mentioned these issues in the past and it appears they have not been fully addressed.  1) When we checked in there wasn't one towel in the room, we had to call to get them and it took over 2 hours for housekeeping to drop them off. 2)  again the towels!!  When the room was cleaned each day the housekeeping never replenished the towels.  we had to call every day to get towels. 3)
Manager Response: We are happy to say that we are located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Our property as recently been remodeled, so all the rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Iron board and personal coffee maker. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you encountered with the lack of towels that were put in your room and for the time housekeeping forgot to fully stock your room with towels. We will address these concerns to higher management so they can take care of the towel issue accordingly. We hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to Disneyland.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Cons: blood stain on sheet; felt never been washed, didn't have that clean feeling.  Cons: no elevator.  Cons: Only 2 pillows to a bed; at least 3 min for comfort.  Pros: distance to Disney not bad cause you can cut through California hotel or even enter from there if going California Adventure.  Pros: Unit was quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. As you might be aware, we take all feedback into account and we do our best to rectify those issues that our guest saw during their stay. We will inform all housekeeping members to be cautious when cleaning a room, and to remove any items which does not meet our standards when it comes to cleanliness. We hope you will stay again at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: A hotel close to convention center. Unfortunately the staff at the hotel where not able to call a taxicab when asked for. We waited fore 45min and eventually the staff told us that no cab was coming to this area fore some reason . So if you need a taxi during your stay in Anaheim, don't choose this hotel.
Manager Response: Please apologies us for the inconvenience you had with the taxi that never came to pick you up during your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We will investigate as to why a taxi was not able to pick you up from our Anaheim property. We just ask for another opportunity at staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your upcoming stay to the Anaheim area.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Near Disneyland. ..10 mins walk Near CVS. ... 10 mins walk Can see fireworks from car park Free Internet  No car parking fee No breakfast but Coco restaurant is opposite the hotel which can provide nice breakfast with reasonable price. Room nice and clean  Good services  Can buy Disneyland ticket at reception.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is a newly remodeled property, and the rates are at a reasonable price. We offer all our guests with free Wi-Fi and parking. All our rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board and personal coffee maker. You are absolutely correct when you state that we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and are also located adjacent to the Convention center, as well as many restaurants and stores. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: perfect for a stay at Disney.  the theme parks are at walking distance.  the room was large and clean, very nice staff, acceptable price. downside: they don't serve breakfast. swiming pool looks nice, but a bit weirdly located (on the street)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay. We are the perfect hotel, as we are recently remodeled, we are located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and best of all our rates are very affordable. We are glad to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Overall, it's average at all. The room inside got ant on our bed, and the day after, we found there were a group of ants in front of our room door. Moreover, every morning, we we're awaken by the noise upstairs, we could hear their noise and footsteps. But the location is really near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback, and informing us about the issue you had with the ants in the room. We have already taken care of the ant problem and from what we understand, the ants were do to the extreme weather we had during last couple of weeks. We hope that the small issue you had with the ants does not deter your from staying with us again. We look forward to your upcoming stay.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I initially chose this hotel due to the convenient location to Disney. You only have to tackle one major crosswalk, then you are just 10 minutes away from the parks. The renovations are truly well done and consistent throughout the entire property. I really like the hard surface flooring. My only real complaint/issue is that there isn't a hot tub. However, it is the staff that really make this place amazing. After 12 hours overnight on Amtrak, we were more than ready for a shower and a nap. Oscar was extremely flexible on his check-in times and let us in hours earlier than normally allowed. He, along with all of his staff, were extremely professional and courteous. We will definitely be staying here again and recommending to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with such a great review on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are pleased to hear that our team members shined for your during your stay, and are also happy to hear that they were able to accommodate your needs when you arrived to the hotel. Our entire property has just been completely remodeled, and all the rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron and Iron board. The rooms come with wireless internet service. And as you have stated, we are about a ten minute walk from the main entrance to Disneyland. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Rooms were very clean with daily service. Pool was small but again clean and adequate. Close to Disney land (About a 10 min walk).Denny's and other eating establishments close by. But above all staff were excellent, my husband was taken ill and they were so helpful getting us a doctor ..very reassuring.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review you have on our Anaheim property. We are glad to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay, and that they were of most help during the time your husband became ill. Yes, we are located ten minutes, walking distance, to Disneyland, and we are adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager
