Summary: Daily lacked room getting cleaned (trash emptied, beds made, new towels) when notifying the front desk we were told it was our fault for keeping the do not disturb sign out. We were at Disneyland! We weren't even in the room!
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the misunderstandings that happened during your stay. Our housekeepers are trained to not disturb a room when the "Do Not Disturb" sign is place on the door handle, and that is what exactly our housekeepers were doing when your room was not serviced.  We hope you can oversee the misunderstanding that occurred during your stay, and hope that you can choose Eden Roc Inn and Suites as you returning destination when visiting Disneyland.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This property has been totally renovated. The rooms are well appointed with modern electric plugins and charging ports for phones. New microwaves and fridge's. It is like a new hotel. The value is outstanding for the area. No breakfast but for the price you can't beat it. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites has completely been renewed. All the rooms come nicely furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board, and personal coffee maker. The rooms are also wireless internet accessible, but most importantly, we are located ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance gate to Disneyland. You may be happy to hear that we are also located adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center, and a few feet from restaurants, and stores. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Looks all new, close to Disney, and low price, with good parking
Summary: I booked last min, the night before. It showed Family Suite. It was still cheaper then most everything in the area. Booked on TripAdvisor reviews and location. Checkin was at 3pm, as shown. There was a small glitch with my room key working, but they ran a new key to me while I was at the door. The room was huge. I could see a family of 4/5 easily spreading out here with plenty of space. I love the choice of wood flooring, non-carpet. It must be so much easier to keep clean, then the usual carpets that turn your feet black on most places. The TV/Microwave/fridge workspace, was really nice. The fridge is silent. The entire room has recessed ceiling lighting, very nice. Coffee maker was nice and clean. The only thing missing is the usual clock radio/alarm clock. Set my phone alarm,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to read that you liked the renovations we did with the property, and that all went well during the check-in process. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free Wi-Fi and that the coffee maker, which is in every room was put to used. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very clean rooms and within walking distance to Disneyland. Beds were very comfortable with very helpful staff. The pool could have had additional privacy, But it was clean and cool after a day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your contribution of another great review to our newly remodeled property, which is situated in the city of Anaheim. As you were able we are only ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. All the rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge, Iron and Iron board, and also a personal coffee maker. Wi-Fi at no additional cost is also provided to our guests, and many restaurants are withing walking distance of our property. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: New, clean, close to Disney, would stay again!
Summary: Two adults and two young children....Great room, walking distance to Disney and breakfast joints. Accommodating staff. Great room and location for the price. Only downside...We stayed on the ground floor and, because of the hard floors, the people above were a little loud, but it never kept us awake.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on our Anaheim property. We are glad to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled property, and that walking down the street to have breakfast was no problem. We are happy to hear that our team members shined for you during your stay and look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Been here a year before, came back again because of the service, spacious rooms, great prices and closeness to Disneyland. The pool was great for in the middle of the day or a way to end the evening. Will be back in the future.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you are a returning guest and that you came back to stay at our Anaheim property due in part to the great customer service we offer and due to the closeness to Disneyland. Just to let you know, we are only a ten minute walk to the main Disneyland entrance. Our entire property has been recently remodeled, and we offer free Wi-Fi and parking to all our guests. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was a great place to stay with very friendly staff. I recommend it and it seems that they just renovated. I was there for business but I would also bring my kids to visit some of the theme parks.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you decided to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent business meeting you had in the city of Anaheim. Yes, you are correct when you say that our Anaheim property is recently remodeled. All the amenities inside the rooms are brand new, such as the beds, sofa beds, television, microwave, fridge, Iron and Iron board. We look forward to your next stay, along with your family.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We really enjoy our stay at the Eden Roc.  This hotel is our go to when we go to Disneyland.  Oscar who we have come to know is always giving us good tips on restaurants.  The hotel was recently renovated and the rooms are really nice.  It is an easy walk to the park and also free parking!!!  Great hotel, Great Staff (Oscar) and Great Rates!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to hear that our guest service representatives shined for your during your stay, and that they are always shinning during your every stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, as many other guests have mentioned, we are located ten (10) minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and we offer all our guests with free and fast Wi-Fi service. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Eden Roc is a hidden gem in Anaheim!
Summary: The Eden Roc hotel exceeded my expectations as a budget hotel.  I knew my family wouldn't be spending a great amount of time in our room, so I just couldn't justify spending Disney Hotel prices.  I was so happy I found this little gem.  It was withing the perfect walking distance of Disney Parks.  Even after walking all day around the parks, it is an easy 3 blocks back to hotel.  We had my elderly mother and she was able to make it 3 out of the 4 nights walking back.  One night we took the bus, which was really a waste.  In the time we spent waiting for the bus we could've easily been back to the property.    Our room was very spacious and clean.  I loved the remodel.  It looks like a much more expensive hotel on the inside than it does on the outside.  The staff was friendly
Manager Response: We are happy to read that our newly remodeled property exceeded your expectations. As you might have seen during your stay, we offer all our guest free Wi-Fi and parking. All the rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge and personal coffee maker upon other things. Just have you stated on your review, we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and walking distance to many stores and restaurants. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We could see fireworks from our window! Nice and clean rooms, very affordable and walking distance to Disneyland Parks! Just got back 3 days ago and booked a room with them again. Loved it! Can't wait to visit next month.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with you feedback on our newly remodeled property. Yes, as you were able to see on your stay, the entire property has been completely remodeled, everything inside the room from beds to hair dryer in brand new. We provide all our guests with free Wi-Fi, parking and best of all, our rates are very affordable. We are glad to hear that have already planned your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, and we look forward to seeing you next month.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed one night for a Disney visit and the renovated rooms are quite nice and a perfect location for walking to Disney!  Parking was included and we were able to leave our car during our visit to Disneyland without any issue.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on our newly remodeled rooms. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our brand new rooms, which come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron and Iron board. Yes, we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, as well as many restaurants, and shops. We hope you will consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed in a newly renovated room, and everything was very nice.  The location is great, and the room was a good value.  You can hear the fireworks at Disneyland from the room, so that was a little noisy, but usually we were too tired to be bothered by it.  (We were down there to run the Disneyland Half Marathon.) We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Let me start by congratulating you on participating on the Disneyland Half Marathon, and thank you for deciding to stay with us on such special occasion. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms, and that you were even able to enjoy the firework show from the comfort of your room. We look forward to your upcoming stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: If you are looking for a good hotel to spende the night, with great rate and walking distance to the parks, Eden Roc is your best choice! If you want to enjoy the pool, room service, and thos kind of things.. This is not for you!  I stayed here for 4 nights, and had a Great Experience! Antonio, Emanuelle.. And a girl a forgot her name, all of them at front desk had very good attitude..  Forget the bad reviews.. The hotel is renovated, the rooms are great and you have 2 dinnings at the corner.. And best of all at 10 min walk to the parks (going trough the Grand californian hotel)  For us was the best price/quality hotel.. I highly recommend it..
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your recent experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that our team members shined for your during your stay and that you truly liked our newly remodeled rooms. As you have stated, we are located walking distance to Disneyland, and we have one of the best available rates in the area. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I almost hesitated to review the Eden Roc, simply because it's been my go to hotel for years, and too many people booking it means I can't! Seriously though, even before the intensive, and very nicely done, reno, I love the Eden Roc for its nearness and staff. Super welcoming and friendly, they were the best part of this hotel, and they still are! Love the new flooring and lobby. Pillows are horrible lumps, and desperately need replacing, but the bedding is otherwise comfortable and clean. The room itself could be a bit cleaner (it was very dusty), but when we were there (Oct 2014) the property was still under construction. We're going back for a 6 night stay in just a few short weeks, and I can't wait to see how far it's come.
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you have been a returning guest and that you have seen the transition from the "old" Eden Roc to the "new" Eden Roc. And we are glad to hear that our customer service is one of the things that keeps you coming back. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I had a 4 night stay in a King room for the Disneyland Half Marathon Weekend. Arrived late at night to a welcoming open lobby and friendly staff. The room was beautifully remodeled. We never had any  issues. Parking seemed tight sometimes, but we left the property several times and were always able to park when we got back. Staff were always picking up/cleaning the grounds and pool. The hotel was a convenient walk to the race start corrals and fairly easy walk to the parks via the Grand Californian. I have already recommended the hotel to a friend & made a reservation for next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, and congratulations for your participation in the Disney Half Marathon. We are very happy to hear that you liked the way we have remodeled the hotel and we are also happy to hear that you have already made reservations for next year and that you have inform your friends about our newly remodeled property. Once again, thank you for the great review you have on Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is a great place to stay if you're going to be at Disney. Easy walking distance to the park, and all the rooms are renovated, and are very nice. Pool and parking are onsite as well, and the internet ran smoothly. My only complaint is that they do not have a breakfast available in the morning, but there are two places very close to go to. There is an instant coffee maker in each room though.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. And we are also very happy to hear that you liked the way we have completely remodeled the entire property. As you were able to see, we offer free Wi-Fi and parking at our property. By parking at our property and walking (10 minutes) to Disneyland, your family will be saving $30.00 a day. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Eden Roc has done an impressive job of upgrading a humble hotel into a "simple chic," very comfortable place to stay when you go to Disneyland (right across the street, half a block up). My favorite touch is the nice-looking faux-hardwood floors, which are so much cleaner than the old carpets most motels have. But, Eden Roc goes further, to provide stylish decor and very pleasant amenities. Super friendly staff, too!
Manager Response: Thank for the wonderful comments you have on our newly remodeled property. We are very much happy to hear that you truly liked our vinyl wooden floors, as they make for a cleaner ambiance. Yes, we are ideally located for those families visiting Disneyland, as we are only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We provide all our guests with free Wi-Fi, and parking. The rooms do contain a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board, and personal coffee maker. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We did a previous reservation with breakfast included. Just a few days before we arrived, they sent us a message advising they don't serve breakfast anymore, but the price will be the same. We felt bad, but we didn't cancel the reservation because the hotel is about 15 minutes walking to Disney. When we arrived we mention the issue but the guy in front desk was cool and took about half hour to make the check in in the middle of night. Altough we advised we are paying cash they charged our credit card. The manager never appeared to talk with us, no information, no relation with guests. Totally unpersonal. When we leave they made two checks in the room before they give the deposit back. We felt like criminals!!! Never come back and tell the most people i can.   Fizemos uma reserva
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing forward your recent experience at Eden Roc Inn and Suites and please accept our apologies for the inconvenienced you encountered while staying with us. Please know that we train our team members to be efficient and quick in checking in our guest. We will inform our team members on the proper procedure one must follow in order for our guests to have a speedy check-in process. Also, please accept our apologies for the misunderstanding we had with how the payment was going to be taken. We hope you will give us another opportunity to make your next stay a more pleasant one.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Clean and modern budget motel. This motor inn is close enough to walk to Disney parks. Parking is free. There are choices for breakfast convent to the motel. Very convenient to the convention center.  Great for those on a budget and would rather spend their money in the parks!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review you have on our newly remodeled property. As you saw all our remodeled rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron and Iron board. We are conveniently located to the Convention Center (adjacent to the hotel), and Disneyland (ten minutes walking distance). And yes, we have the most affordable rates for a hotel with the kind of service and quality we offer. We look forward to your upcoming stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We spent one night at Eden Roc to go to Disneyland. We are not usually Motel clients but were pleasantly surprised. Large spacious room, recently remodeled, good value. We were able to leave our rental car the entire day we checked out, while we were in the park. NO coffee or breakfast available here. Would book again if in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending a night at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, a newly remodeled hotel located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We are glad to hear that you liked how our room were remodeled and that you also liked the rates we offer at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  We look forward to you upcoming stay at our Anaheim property.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a quick getaway with last minute reservations. I booked it and knew what the rooms looked like but pulling in my husband was a little worried due to it looking more like a motel. But he was just as surprised as I was to see how nicely updated and clean the rooms were. It's about a 10 minute walk to get to Grand Californian. Bed was soft and I forgot my ol' trusty pillow at home and worried how my neck would ache in the morning... But no aches. And a cold running AC. I would recommend to bring an additional blanket if you're one of the ones that gets cold like me while your spouse feels it is perfect room temperature.. Because the blankets on the bed are pretty thin. Check in was a breeze and easy parking would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are very much happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms and that you found our property convenient since you were visiting Anaheim, which we are only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This property was recently renovated but its just ok. Good parking, small pool, no hot tub. Wifi was far above average in this area!  I loved the laminate flooring it felt very clean and the room had pot lights which made it bright and we loved that!  Bathroom was ok, vanity, ok not super clean. Walls seemed very thin we listened to a screaming baby next door that screamed for hours!!! We requested a top floor room as we had no kids but our request was not granted even though the property was not full. We stayed one night, it was ok for one night but I would not recommend for longer than that. We usually stay across at the Stovalls across the street and will do that in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guest with your feedback on our newly remodeled property. We are glad to hear that you liked our laminated flooring and the extra lights we have inside the rooms. Please know that we take all requests and try to fulfill these requests as best as possible, but we were not able to accommodate such needs; for that we humbly apologize. As you might have seen during your stay, we are in close proximity to the main entrance to Disneyland, as well as many restaurants, and shopping center. We hope you will be able to consider staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the Disneyland/Anaheim area.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Cool place to stay.  Cool staff.  Allowed me to check in at noon which was desperately needed.  Room was very clean.  Beds were comfortable.  We were able to watch the Disney fireworks from the parking lot of this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We are delighted to hear that our team members were able to accommodate your needs accordingly, and that you were able to enjoy the Disney fireworks from the hotel's parking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: So I was looking for a nice and convenient place to stay near Disneyland, that also wasn't to pricey, and this was perfect! Room was nice, clean, bed was comfortable and the fan/AC in the room was perfect! My only complaint was that maybe the sheets were a little rough, but I was so exhausted from the park that it didn't seem to make a difference at all. This is a great place to stay and a great value, I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review you have on our Anaheim property. Here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites, we like to say that we have the most affordable room rates, when compared to other properties of the same quality and service as is Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, our entire Anaheim property has just been completely remodeled and everything inside the rooms is brand new; flat screen television, microwave, Iron, Iron board, hair dryer and coffee maker. We provide free and fast Wi-Fi service to all our guest, and we are only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The room was very large, recently remodeled and comfortable. We left a blanket behind (w/o knowing) and they called to tell us it was in the office for pick up. My daughter was thrilled to have it back
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review you have on our newly remodeled property. We are happy to read that we exceeded your expectations, and that our team members called you to informed you of the blanket you left behind in the room that was given to you. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi, pool, and brand new room. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The close proximity to Disney, low price, and photos attracted us first off. I called to inquire and Stephanie was super clear and made booking really easy. We got there at 8am and were given a parking permit so we could go to Disneyland and come back to check in any time after 3pm. We didn't get back to the hotel until 12:30am and it was no problem at all (also we were starving and the guy at the front desk gave us menus of places in the area that delivered late at night). We were pleasantly surprised with how NICE the room was. Loved the decor, bed was super comfy, good water pressure in shower, plenty of towels. Checked out the next morning at 9am before heading back to Disney and (although we knew it was a long shot) asked if we could keep the car parked there for the day,
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites during your recent visit to Disneyland. And we are also happy to hear that our team members took care of your reservation with professionalism and efficiency. As you saw during your stay, all our newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board, and personal coffee maker. We also located only ten minutes away from Disneyland, and within a few feet of many restaurants and shops. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, very close to Disneyland
Summary: We were there for 4 nights (a family with 2 kids - 6 and 11). The room was nice though a bit crowded.  The A/C was too close to the beds so it was hard to sleep with it on.  There's not enough room and not enough chairs to eat in comfortably. The fact that it was walking distance (about 10 minutes) from Disneyland is a big plus. There's no breakfast but you get a discount at the Coco's at the end of the block.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your review on Eden Roc Inn and Suites. As you saw during your stay, our Anaheim property is newly remodeled and just as you have said, we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi and parking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Overall our stay was pleasant. Staff was very polite and helpful, and accommodated parking for our second vehicle. You really can't beat the cost for the location and proximity to Downtown Disney. Rooms are pleasantly updated and comfortable.   In reading prior reviews, there were no bugs in our room, but we could have gone without the late night serenading crickets hiding behind the vending machine outside the room. The few criticisms I have relate to cleanliness. We stayed 3 nights and the maid never came by after the 2nd night. We had to go up to the front desk to get fresh towels the last full day we spent there. Although the room had nice new flooring installed recently, it doesn't appear to be mopped regularly as little bare feet would quickly turn black. Not a problem
Manager Response: We are happy to heat that you had an overall pleasant stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. Yes, even though we are a newly remodeled property, our room rates are at a reasonable price as all the rooms come with a flat screen television (HD channels included, as well as free On-Demand movies and T.V. shows), a microwave, fridge, coffee maker, Iron and Iron board. We hope you will be able to consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your future travels to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This is an excellent hotel for what was considered a budget hotel.  Great price - the recent remodel makes it like new.  Great beds and a nice pool.  This hotel is a 10 minute walk from the back gate and Downtown Disney. Very convenient to the park.  Stefanie at the front desk was outstanding and very helpful.  Note**  There is no sign for the hotel.  It's the first hotel on the left off of south bound  West St. Right behind Tiffy's restaurant.   Highly recommended. This is a totally NON-SMOKING hotel. Free parking
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. After reading your review, we are glad about all the renovations we made to our property. As you saw during your stay, all rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron and Iron board. We offer all our guests, free Wi-Fi and parking. And just as you have stated, we are located just ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: First, I must tell readers I stayed here prior to the COMPLETE remodel, because of the wonderful staff, great rates and convenient location to the Disneyland Resort.  Now I stay because of all of those reasons PLUS the fact that the remodel of the rooms has completely restored the vitality of this little gem!  You know how you stay at the "big boy chain hotels" and you get to your room and you can't locate a wall socket to plug your cell phone or laptop into???  Of course that has happened to you!  Well, since the remodel of the rooms here at Eden Roc Inn & Suites, if you can't find a wall socket, then you are visually impaired and should seek assistance from your vision specialist!  After the remodel of this property, looking around this room (by the way, the HARDWOOD floors
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you stayed with us prior to the renovation of the process and that you very much approve of the the work we put into making Eden Roc Inn and Suites an immaculate family-friendly places. We are also happy to hear that our team members shined for your during your stay, and that they have done so since before the renovation; and also that due to their great customer service, you return to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The over all stay was nice. Of course one is always going to be woken up in the middle of the night by loud guests above. Note to self, ask to stay on the second floor next time.  The rooms were beautiful. Nicely remodeled. There does seems to be a earwig problem. I have never killed so many before in my life. Also, although it is amazing that there is no carpet in the rooms, I think the floors should be mopped after every visit. We went to wipe up some water from the floor, and the towel was black with dirt.    The rooms have nice furniture and flat screen tv's, all very nice. The one thing I wish the room did have a was a safe.   All and all the room and stay was amazing. This hotel is extremely close to downtown Disney, and I fully intend on staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to describe your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Please apologies us for the inconvenience of having those noisy second floor neighbors you mentioned. We will be happy to provide for you and your family a room on the second floor on your next stay at our Anaheim property. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel is a must stay. I was concerned about booking day of the kind of hotel I would be stuck with. It is literally across the street from the Disney resorts and Downtown Disney. My worries subsided the moment I walked into the lobby. The beautiful furniture and decor shows they really care about the property. At the front desk, Oscar was one of the best hotel staff I have ever encountered. He was helpful and friendly throughout our stay. When we got to our room it was nice, clean and neat with linoleum wood floors which makes is easy for the hotel staff to clean in between stays. The next time we are in town...we will be staying here for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments you have regarding your recent stay at our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear that as you walked into the lobby area of the hotel, you became enamored of our newly remodeled property. Yes, we do take great pride with our property, and as you were able to see, our property is kept in an immaculate condition. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi and parking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The rooms were comfortable, clean and the air conditioning worked perfect.  Pool was clean and safe.  Staff was very accomodating.  Will stay there again for another family trip in October.  Thank you....
Manager Response: Thank you for your time in providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are glad to hear that the rooms were to your liking as the are spacious and are always kept in immaculate conditions, thanks to the hard work of our housekeeping team. We hope you were able to take advantage of our free parking, and walked to Disneyland while you left your car at our property. We are looking forward to your next stay this coming October.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean room and a block and a half from Disneyland
Summary: Loved this hotel. They just remodeled it 5 months ago and it looks really good. I like the laminate flooring instead of carpet. It feels much cleaner than carpet that over time, gets stained and dirty no matter how many times it's vacuumed and shampooed. The rooms were very spacious with dressers plus a large closet.  It was about a 5-10 min walk from Disneyland. Total of about a block and a half to get to the Grand Californian and then walk through. Which conveniently has it's own entrance, so you don't have to stand in the long line at the main gate (but if you need to purchase tickets, you have to go to the main gate, which you can still get to through the Grand Californian). The only drawback was the small parking spaces. If you have a large vehicle, the parking is going to
Manager Response: Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites has just been completely remodeled. All of our spacious and immaculate rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board, fridge and a personal coffee maker. We are also located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. And yes, we no longer have carpets in our rooms, but instead we have laminated flooring in order for our guests to have a cleaner environment to enjoy while on vacation. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We rented the family suite and it was excellent. Plenty of room for 5 plus a two year old. Very clean and maintained. The service was awesome. Everyone was very helpful. Anytime we had questions or needed help they responded immediately. No waiting, no attitude. I would definitely stay there again on my next trip to Disneyland. Close to restaurants and the park.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback on Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are extremely happy to hear that your whole family (including your 2-year old) enjoyed one of our family suites; that our customer service shined for your during your entire stay, and that overall you have a satisfactory stay at our newly remodeled property. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I had a really great experience here me and my sister came out for the fit expo at the convention center it was really close. The night before I came I had a check in date issue that was the computers fault anyways I  spoke with the manager explained everything and he helped fix my problem right away he was understanding and great customer service when I arrived still gave me excellent customer service the rooms were great and clean I would def recommend this place to everyone it's also next door to Disneyland!!! Literally lol you can't beat that :)  Jacquelyn D
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at our Anaheim property and that we took care of the issue you had with your check-in date. As you were able to see during your stay, we are located adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center and are a few blocks from the main entrance to Disneyland. You will be happy to know that we are walking distance to many restaurants, shops and stores. All of our newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron and Iron board. We provide free parking (this saves you money when not parking at Disneyland), and Wi-Fi to all of our guests. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, clean and safe.
Summary: I was attending an event at the Anaheim Convention center, so I didn't spend a lot of time in the room. The front desk personal was always helpful and friendly. I arrived at 2pm and they had a clean room ready. I also checked out at 4am and the attendant at the front desk was great. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located adjacent to the Convention Center, so our Anaheim property is ideal to those business people who are visiting the city of Anaheim. What is more, our entire Eden Roc property has been completely remodeled, all rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, coffee maker, Iron and Iron board. Eden Roc also offers free Wi-Fi, and parking to all its guests, which mean one will save a bit of money when walking to such places as the Convention Center or Disneyland (ten minute walk). We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The Eden Roc Inn (Motel type property) was in a good location within easy walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center (5mins) and Downtown Disney (10mins).  There is no hidden resort fee and parking is free. The staff was friendly and courteous. The rooms are recently renovated, clean, nicely decorated, and included a mini refrigerator and microwave.  The beds were comfortable and the air conditioner (typical under the window wall mounted) worked well.  The only negatives is that there is no breakfast offered, and the WiFi was slow at times.  We initially had difficulty connecting to WiFi on our cell phones but were given directions when we inquired, (this should be provided at check-in).  We also had to log off and back in several times throughout the day for the WiFi to
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us and future guests with your feedback on your recent stay at our Anaheim property. Just as you have stated, we are located in an ideal Anaheim location as it will take one five minutes to go to the Convention Center, and only ten minutes to get into Disneyland. Please know we will take your concerns about the Wi-Fi to management so this problem can be fixed immediately. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Love this place nice rooms convenient place walking distance to disneyland.  Staff is courteous and friendly.  Rooms are good size.  Love the pool area not crowded at all.  Restaurants are walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled property and that you found Eden Roc Inn and Suites ideal when visiting such places are Disneyland or the convention center, as both of these places are within walking distance and adjacent to our property respectively. We hope you will continue to be a regular guest to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed here again!!! We were here prior to the remodel and can really confirm the improvements to the establishment and staff.  We were greeted by Grace, thank you for being helpful and confirming our stay at the Eden Roc.  Grace was pleasant and helpful with check in and check out, you are an asset for them.  Eden Roc installed phones, coffee machine and opened up their pool from the last trip in Feb/Mar 2015.  We usually stay in the family suite which allows the kids to run around in the room and play until they get settled.  Eden Roc also has a discount at the Coco Restaurant as well (very inexpensive) and you can still eat and pay less than $50 for the family.  We ate at IHOP and it was still about $60 but you choose b/w IHOP or Cocos still the best deal around.  We did
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guest with your feedback on our recently remodeled property. And thank you also for the compliments you have regarding how nicely we have renovated Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Yes, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located for those who want to visit Disneyland or the convention center. But you will be happy to know that Eden Roc is only about a 20-minute drive to Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios and Medieval Times. Please know that we provide free parking and Wi-Fi to all our guests, and just like to stated, we have a clean and crisp pool for the whole family to enjoy. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kind Regards,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Excellent location - 10min walk to Disney. Quiet location.  Room was clean and tidy everyday.  It was perfect for a little cheap few nights at Disney. No complaints. Free parking and breakfast. No issues whilst there. Service from the staff was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the excellent review you have on our newly remodeled property. We are happy to hear that you found our entire renovation process to your liking. As you have stated, we are located 10-minutes walking distance to the main entrance to Disneyland. Also, restaurants are within a five-minute walk from our Anaheim property, and we are also located adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center. We look forward to you next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I've stayed at this property numerous times before its remodel.  It has always been a great location, and you can't beat the price.  I recently stayed there in a renovated room and was pleased with the changes.  It seems like many properties in the Disney area are doing away with carpeted floors (this one had wood laminate).  I liked all the outlets in the room, especially the technology port on the bureau.  The beds were nice and comfortable, though a little soft and creaky.  Lots of closet space and new fixtures in the sink area and bathroom.  My only gripe is that they didn't make my bed for 2 days (an oversight?) and forgot to replace my used towels for 1 day (at least they picked up the old ones).
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you are a returning guest and that the entire renovation process was to your liking. Yes, we are located walking distance to such places as Disneyland and the Convention Center, as well are to many restaurants and stores. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers all its guests free Wi-Fi, parking and a pool, so the family can enjoy a dip on our clean pool during these hot summer days. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We got a suite for my 4 kids my husband and me. It was all new and clean just a big room with two beds and a sofa bed. The restroom and fridge and microwave. Just a walk of like 10 min. To get to Disneyland We really loved it!! Customer service was great Love all the people who help Us. I really will recommend them I really liked our stay in here
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review you have on our newly remodeled property. We are happy to read that you found our spacious and immaculate rooms to your liking. And just have you stated, we are located only ten minutes away (walking) from the main entrance to Disneyland. We provide all our guest with free Wi-Fi, parking and a clean pool. The newly remodeled rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, coffee maker, Iron, Iron board and a working A/C unit. We look forward to your next visit to the city of Anaheim.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: It's a pleasure stay there the people there is really nice always the rooms very clean same the pool all my family enjoy are vacations I really recommend this hotel this is 2nd time and absolutely we goin back there thanks for everything EDEN ROC INN & SUITES üòÉ
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. And thank you for been a returning guest. We are happy to read that you liked the entire renovation process and that our cleanliness and great customer service is a major factor in you upcoming return to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Did a last minute booking close to the Disneyland Resort, and by close I mean we were right behind Disney California Adventure. You can tell this place was recently remodeled which my family was really impressed by. Usually the pricing for these kind of modern rooms can be expensive during the summer.   If you are planning to stay a couple of days they have a frig and microwave to save o n meals. Also parking is complementary for one vehicle, so if you plan to stay multiple days you can walk to the park.    I didn't give them a 5 star rating because there beds weren't really comfortable. But if you can get pass this, it's a great deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for deciding to stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites on a last minute booking. We appreciate all the good comments you have regarding our newly remodeled property. And just as you have stated, we kept our room rates at a reasonable rate; we provide free Wi-Fi and parking and best of all, we are ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Please know that we are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. Thank you once again for the great comments you have regarding our newly remodeled Anaheim property.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great renovated motel that is a relatively close walk to Disneyland (at least 20 minutes), but you must have an upstairs room (because every step by your second floor neighbors sounds like they are stomping on your head). That's not a problem if your upstairs neighbors comes "home" and goes straight to bed, but our neighbor was pacing back and forth all night long (so we didn't get any sleep that night until the more moved is the next morning to an upstairs room). I have never experienced this problem before. I would never stay at this motel again unless they could guarantee me an upstairs room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience you encountered with the second floor neighbor, but please know that we tried our best to accommodate your needs accordingly. We would like to have you stay with us again, please give us a call so on your next trip to the Anaheim area so that we may guarantee you and your family a room on the second floor.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We came with 2 families... A nice, clean lil hotel with GREAT location to Disney! The staff were accommodating, friendly and smiling!  There isn't breakfast here, but all that info is available on the website... AND there are 2 places close by that have good eats!!! I'd recommend this place!    The only downfall I can think of, is the location of the AC to the beds... It can get a wee bit chilly... OTHERWISE... A great place!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. As you have stated, the entire property has been newly remodeled. All the rooms come with a flat screen television, microwave and fridge. We are also located adjacent to the Convention Center,and are ten minutes (walking distance) from the main entrance to Disneyland. The room rates are at an affordable rate, and just like you said, our team members are always ready to help you with any question you might have.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I've stayed at the Eden Roc Inn many times. I have not been back in 2 years. Due to their remodeling The room was so clean and beautifully upgraded. Also Disneyland is very close. Within walking distance.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you are a returning guest and that you were able to see the entire remodeling process we had with Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are glad that you like the new Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We had read reviews on this hotel and figured because of renovations reviews were maybe not accurate as the pictures looked wonderful. False. There is no breakfast provided at this hotel, and the first night we could hear our drunken neighbours till 2:00 am, we called the front desk and they did nothing except say they were already aware... The next night we spent the whole day at Disney came back at night only to find our room infested with bugs! Disgusting bugs all over the door, our stuff everywhere! We visited the front desk and they offered to move us to another room for one night while they had exterminators visit ours then would move us back, she also mentioned that this wasn't the first time this problem has occurred and that an exterminator actually comes once a month!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The recent renovations have served this motel very well. Lovely clean rooms. Great location. Could be improved with a guest laundry, an elevator and working wifi but all in all I was extremely happy!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review you have on our property. We are glad to liked the newly remodeled property. We will work on improving the quality of our free Wi-Fi. Yes, the location of our property is ideal for those families or individuals who are visiting such places are the Anaheim Convention Center and/or Disneyland as we are adjacent and walking distance to those places accordingly. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel was kept very clean during our stay  and the stuff was very pleasant. It was our first time in California and they were very helpful with giving us information about beaches and tickets for Disney land. My family and I were very happy with our location that the hotel was, because we were able to walk and go get a bite to eat. I was also able to let the kids go and walk around on their own. I felt very safe and very around was helpful. Great time at Eden Roc!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review you have on our Anaheim property. We are glad to hear that you liked the newly remodeled rooms and that your stay at our property an enjoyable and safe one. Just as you were able to see during your stay, we are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland and are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Great for Disney and Convention Center stay
Summary: Nicely remodeled rooms with great taste. Short walk to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center. Coco's Bakery is just across the street and there are numerous restaurants in walking distance. Wifi can use an upgrade though as it is hard to stay connected during certain hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms and that the short walking distance to Disneyland was also very much enjoyed. Yes, we are also located adjacent to the Convention center and within a few feet of many restaurants and stores. Thank you for informing us about the Wi-Fi issue, we will take the appropriate measure the find a solution to this problem. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My family had never experienced California and Eden Roc was very helpful in finding our way around.   The room was clean & the bed was very comfortable.    If we come back again, will definitely stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback on Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are glad to hear that you found our newly remodeled rooms to your liking and that you also found the area to be safe and comfortable. Finally, we are happy to hear that we made you first experience visiting California an enjoyable one that you will never forget. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: After a seven day trip and six night stay Eden Roc made our trip comfortable and accessible. The location was great with short walks to areas like Garden Walk, the Anaheim Convention Center, and Disneyland. The suite with a microwave and mini fridge were great to have for storing waters, snacks and making quick foods. The room was clean and nicely decorated. Only downfall was no complementary breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This review is a little overdue, but we had a great experience.  When we checked in we did not care for the location of our room so Oscar moved us to another room that was wonderful.  We had no problems with housekeeping.  We stayed here for the Tinkerbell Half Marathon weekend, it was great.  The walk to the race corrals and back to the hotel after the race were a breeze.  The manager was very friendly and came out to greet us.  I will be staying here again in November with more of my family and I look forward to it. I do wish that there was a little table by the chair in our room or something to put the luggage on, but we managed.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place for a short trip to Disneyland
Summary: I thought this place was really convenient since it was only about a little over a 5 minute walk from the parks. It also went under a complete make over and i thought it looked nice. It was well air conditioned and comfortable at a good price. However I do have a couple of complaints. We arrived before our check in time and they let us park in their lot which was nice and we decided to come back later in the afternoon to check in and rest in our room for a couple hours before heading back out. Unfortunately they said their computer systems were down and they were unable to check us in until they could get it fixed, which took almost an hour. But hey things happen and we eventually got checked in. I was also suffering from a cold and the next morning i wanted to take a hot shower
Manager Response: Thank you for the review you have for our newly remodeled Anaheim property. And please apologize us for the inconvenience you had with the room not having hot water. Also, thank you for understanding that sometimes technology is not always reliable, as was the case when you were about to check in. Please know that on your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites your visit will be 100% better as all the water related and technology related problems will be fixed.    Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed recently for our trip to Disneyland. It was a very clean, newly remodeled room. The hotel staff was very helpful and welcoming as well.  It is about a 15 min walk to Disneyland, but most of the walk is on Disney property making it very safe and secure.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled property.  And that Eden Roc Inn and Suites was ideal to your stay since we are located 10 minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Please know that all our newly remodeled rooms have a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board and personal coffee maker. We also offer free Wi-Fi and parking to all our guest. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Very clean nicely remodeled and very spacious
Summary: The room was nice, walking distance from downtown Disney. Very spacious room a great value. Definitely will book again in the future. I got a regular double bed room on the corner of the building, only thing and it's a given you can hear the street noise but excepted that because it's on a busy street.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review on our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled property. Yes, we located only 10 minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and are also adjacent to the Convention center. We offer free Wi-Fi and parking to all our guests, and all the rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, Iron, Iron board and personal coffee maker. We hope you can consider Eden Roc Inn and Suites on your next visit to the city of Anaheim.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: great, clean affordable option close to Disney
Summary: Hotel is well designed and nice and clean.  In the past, it was free parking, but the most recent trip they told me I could only park my car there until 6pm.  Felt a little cheap to me.  The room though was nice and looks exactly like the photos.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your review on our Anaheim property. We are happy to hear that you found our remodeled property to your liking. As you might already know, we are ideally located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland; all our rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, personal coffee maker, and free Wi-Fi. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Clean and Comfortable with an Easy Walk to Disney
Summary: We booked this hotel because it was close to Disneyland but it turned out to be the perfect place for our stay because it was clean, comfortable, and quiet. The beds were super comfortable and we found the amenities to be just as stated by the hotel. We were able to check in early and park our car at the hotel before walking to Disneyland. It was a short walk via Downtown Disney and we felt safe walking even late at night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your feedback. As you found out during your stay, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is ideally located in the city of Anaheim. Disneyland is a ten minute walking distance from the hotel, and we are also located adjacent to the Anaheim Convention Center. There are plenty of restaurants within walking distance. The room have been completely remodeled and come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, personal coffee maker, and of course, we offer free Wi-Fi. We hope you were able to enjoy our pool and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel while visiting California Adventure. The location was perfect about a ten minute walk that saved us from paying the parking fee at the park. Very nice room with new furniture. Comfy bed. Very affordable. Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes from your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. We are extremely happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms. As you were able to see, all the rooms have been entirely remodeled; everything inside the rooms is brand new, from the flooring to the beds to the furniture...everything is newly remodeled. Yes, staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites is convenient as it will save you on parking since we are only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. Please know that we are adjacent to the Convention center and so very close to many stores and restaurants. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Cottages.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: For the price, location, and substance; this hotel is beyond a great value for the Disneyland resort area. The rooms are recently remodeled, and has a very nice feel to it. The Beds are very comfortable, which is one of the reason for my five star rating. Also, parking is free! The rooms are much larger than the Best Western across West street from Eden Roc, and I was stunned by the price that was 60.00 less than it too.  I really don't care about some free breakfast, because i found one of the best Breakfast burrito I ever had down the street at Daniel's burgers. If value is a major factor coming to Disneyland, book a room with this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review. We are happy to hear that you liked our newly remodeled rooms. As a newly remodeled property, and to be only 10 minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, our room rate are very affordable. All our rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge, coffee maker, free Wi-Fi and parking. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying at Eden Roc and it was an excellent choice.  My family and I really loved the close proximity to the Disney Park.  The rooms are elegantly decorated and super clean.  The staff and manager are very helpful.  Greatly recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of you busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled rooms and that you found it an ideal place due to its proximity to Disneyland. Please know that Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers all its guest free Wi-Fi, and parking. All the rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel for a long time ever since it was called Parkside Inn & Suites. Before the remodel it was getting pretty dumpy with dirty bathrooms, showers, floors, balcony, etc.  Last time we stayed here was last summer in July and it has dramatically improved in its appearance and I must say became a very descent hotel. Their problem still lies with their services. There would be days we came back from Disneyland to find our room had not been touched by the maids. This was the second year in a row this had happened. Every single day of our stay (which was for almost 2 weeks) we would have to ask for towels and face cloths because they always short handed us. We would go to the maids and the front desk service and tell them these things but nothing really changed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of you busy schedule. We are glad to hear that you are a returning guest and have been so for the past several years. Please accept our most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you encountered during your most recent stay; there was a miscommunication between the front desk agents during the shift change. We will work hard on leaving adequate notes pertaining to our guests. Now, regarding our housekeepers, they will be retrained in regards to how promptly clean a now, and how important it is to leave all towels inside the room. Even though you had a few issues with your recent stay, we hope you will be able to provide us with another opportunity at showing you all the improvements we have made since your last stay.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My sister and I used this hotel for our last bi annual Disneyland trip and we loved it! The walk to the park was a breezy twenty minute walk with some great landscaping along the way.   As for the room itself, they had just remodeled and the rooms looked fantastic! New furniture, tv and very nice tile floor that helped keep the room cool. The only issue I'd say I had was the wifi signal was weak for the room we were in. didn't matter we weren't in the room much to use it but it could be stronger. Overall, great stay, look forward to going back!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you decided to stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property due to its proximity to Disneyland, and that you loved your stay. Thank you for informing us about the small issue you encountered with the Wi-Fi service. We will let our TI team know about this issue so that they can take care of it immediately. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Very nice, clean, modern place to stay very close to Disney.  Well within walking distance.  Very affordable; look for specials on their website first!  Parking near your room may be a challenge at night.  Lack of elevator for 2nd floor rooms and luggage is a bit rough.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you liked our "very nice, clean [and] modern place..." As you have stated in your review, we are walking distance to Disneyland, as it takes one about ten minutes to arrive to the main entrance to Disneyland. Please know that all our rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge, coffee maker and a working A/C. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kindly, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Eden Roc Inn is a great place to stay when in Anaheim. It's close to Disneyland and restaurants, right next to the Anaheim Convention Center, has free parking, nice room, comfortable bed. Only negative was that the internet connection was slow. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property, and we would like to thank you for providing us with your feedback. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is conveniently located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, adjacent to the Convention Center and walking distance to many restaurants. The Wi-Fi issues had already been mentioned to our TI team and the are working diligently of fixing this issue.  We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Good stay and close to Disney
Summary: It was a nice hotel, but some of the guys at the desk weren't the most friendly but not too bad. Only a 10 min easy walk to Disneyland. The rooms were very clean. You can see the fireworks from the 2nd floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you fully enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled Anaheim property. As you were able to see during your stay, all our rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge and a personal coffee maker. All our guests are offered free Wi-Fi, and parking. We are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland and are also adjacent to the Convention center. We look forward to your next stay at our Anaheim property.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Nice rooms but not much else
Summary: The renovated room was nice and pretty, though must have been completed in a rush. There were dents in the walls, in the tile on the floor, and grout all over the glass tiles in the shower. No elevator made a 2nd floor room with two kids and a double stroller very cumbersome. We ended up putting the stroller in the car at night, and had to wake the kids to walk up the stairs. The pool looked nice but was right next to the road and parking lot with little to no coverage.  Front office was nicely decorated and clean. Staff was friendly but overworked,  trying to take care of laundry and check people in. We wanted our sheets changed towards the end of the trip and they weren't, even with stripping all the bedding except the bottom sheet ourselves, but at midnight coming back from
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you decided to stay at our Anaheim property due to the fact that it is a newly remodeled property. The hotel rooms come fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge and personal coffee maker. Thank you for informing us of about the issues you encountered with the room. We will look to solve this problem immediately. Thank you for your feedback again, and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Really nice and clean everything was perfect walking distance from disneyland and its cheap!! i highly recommend this place!! even the staff was really friendly! to be honest the most comfortable hotel ive ever stayed at!!
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We appreciate your time in reviewing our newly remodeled property. Thank you for the wonderful comments you have. We hope you were able to enjoy our free Wi-Fi, and our immaculate rooms. We look forward to your future stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely, Guest Relations Manager

Summary: For the price of this room I was afraid of what we would encounter when we arrived. We were pleasantly surprised at how clean and beautiful this room was.  It is newly remodeled and so super clean.  Awesome that there are no carpets!  All furnishings were very nice.  I had to leave a day early and even though i had booked through a third party the owner refunded my last night!!!!  Super nice and very much appreciated. I would definitely stay there again!!!!  The only down side is that it is a bit of a walk to disneyland.
Manager Response: We would like to thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at our Anaheim property. As you were able to see, all our newly remodeled rooms are fully furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. We offer all our guest free Wi-Fi, and parking, and best of all, we are located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and are adjacent to the convention center. Thank you once again for your feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: We had the greatest vacation at the Eden Roc!  Our family booked rooms in advance hoping for a good experience, but we ended up with a great experience. This is a clean, well managed property that's close to Disneyland and restaurants.  This will be our go to place in the future.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear of the great experience you had while staying at Eden Roc Inn and Suites; a newly remodeled property, that is only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. We are also glad that our team members shined for you on your stay, and we are very much looking forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: a hotel that welcomes you and lets you feel at home
Summary: This is the second time I came to stay at this hotel. It is truly welcoming and I feel always at home due to the staff at the front desk. They can even go extra mile in making your stay with your companions comfortable. They even call your attention if you forgot to put off the light in your car. They will call you in the room and inform you.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to learn that you that you are a returning guest and that our team members always shine for you during your stay. We hope you liked our newly remodeled rooms and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.  Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: Great location 7 minute walk to the Californian Hotel. You can enter the park from there. Clean room and helpful staff. I loved the new comfy beds that are in the room. Brand new flooring comfortable pillows. Definitely staying here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback you have provided regarding our newly remodeled property. And yes, you are completely right when you say that we are located only 7-10 minute walk to the main entrance to Disneyland. Eden Roc Inn and Suites has just been completely remodeled; all rooms come furnished with a flat screen television, a microwave and a fridge. The hotel also offers free Wi-Fi and parking to all its guests. We look forward to your next visit to Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: The hotel itself is nice. Rooms, bathroom, linens all clean. Hotel staff was extremely courteous. They even allowed us to park our car there for additional time after check out which was extremely wonderful, great service. We stayed 2 nights, and were gone for most of the time at Disney. We returned at 3pm and the rooms had not been cleaned so I imagine them cleaning late. We ended up opted out of cleaning since we wanted to rest. My only complaint was that we were given a bottom floor room under the stairs. All night long you could hear people stomping up stairs and clanking their luggage against each step as they went up. You could also hear every single step that the family in the room above us made. This went on all night! My family and I got no sleep that first night. The
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you liked our newly remodeled property and that our customer services shined for your during your stay. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you have with the housekeeping service. We assure you that on your return stay this issue will be a thing of the past. We look forward to your return stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing place for an amazing price
Summary: renovations look great from what I could see from previous reviews of this motel. It is right across the street from Disneyland and way more affordable than most places I looked at when I was booking. Our room was exactly as pictured on their own photos and very clean. Took my husband and 21 month old daughter here and noticed a lot of other families as well. Spent only 2 nights here and used the room just for sleeping/resting between spending time at Disneyland. It is walking distance to both parks, but it is still a good 10 min walk. Fine for me, and I don't normally like walking.  Front staff were very polite and accommodating. Lobby and breakfast area were renovated and nicely decorated. Don't book if you're expecting a fancy hotel. It is a beautifully renovated motel. Great
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay here at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. Thank you for the wonderful comments you have on our property. As you were able to see and as you wrote on your review, Eden Roc Inn and Suites is located only ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland; are are adjacent to the Convention Center, and most importantly, our entire property has just been fully remodeled. Eden Roc Inn and Suites offers free Wi-Fi and parking to all its guests. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Sincerely,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: OK, let's keep this in perspective.  This is a motel, approx. 15 minute walk from Downtown Disney.  The area around Disney is filled with motels, many of them I would never consider staying at due to the cleanliness factor.  I prefer Embassy Suites for all of its amenities, etc.  But we went for a quick, cheap stay.  This price is cheap by Anaheim standards.  What you will get?  A very clean remodeled motel.  Laminate flooring is great (who really likes walking on a motel carpet!)  Large bathroom with good shower.  Large closet with iron and ironing board.  Microwave and small fridge in room. That would be great for a family! Coffee in room was not great; wish there was coffee in the lobby in the morning.  Very nice staff, extremely helpful.  No great amenities, but beds were
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a minute out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on our Anaheim property. We are proud to state that we are located only fifteen minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland. The entire property has been remodeled and all our room come with a flat screen television, a microwave and fridge. We also offer all our guest free Wi-Fi and parking. Just as you have stated, our room rates are very affordable, our rooms are immaculate and are always kept in the best condition thanks to the wonderful job our housekeeper perform. Thank you again for the feedback and we look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: I am not a picky person so this place worked great for my family.  LOVED how big the family suits were. It was nice to be able to move around.  They are very basic though no lamps, no alarm clock, no freezer in the mini fridge, one chair. The people checking us in and out were awesome! There was a mix up with arrival and checkout but they were very helpful. My only complaint was room service. One day we would have 4 towels the next 3, one day 2 wash cloths the next none, same with cups. Luckily the office was not far to get what we needed. The floors never got swept very well.  We went to the beach one day and needless to say we brought a lot of sand back. Kind of wish there would have been a broom and dustpan in the closet since the floors are all wood.  I love the location 2
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly remodeled property. And we thank you for informing us on the areas where improvement is needed. We will make sure to talk with our housekeeping team so they can make sure all rooms are supplied with enough towels. As you were able to see during your stay, all rooms come with a flat screen television, a microwave and a mini fridge. We are located ten minutes away from the main entrance to Disneyland, and are also located adjacent to the Convention Center. Please be aware that the hotel also offers free Wi-Fi, and parking to all its guest. Eden Roc Inn and Suites is an affordable place to stay at, and best of all, the entire property is newly remodeled. We look forward to your next stay at Eden Roc Inn and Suites.   Kindly,  Guest Relations Manager

Summary: My husband and I were on our honeymoon, and we were hit with a bunch of unexpected fees and let downs. There was a bunch of miscommunications, and no attempts to apologize for the inconveniences. It was such a bummer.
